[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/mdo sde tsa pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D181}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pany+tsa pA ra mi tA nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa pha rol tu phyin pa lnga bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_
[\[1b.2\]]bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[1b.3\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs 
[\[1b.4\]]pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_
[\[1b.5\]]khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems can thams cad la dbang 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/_sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du srid pa las grol ba/_srid par skye ba yongs 
[\[2a.2\]]su 'dzin pa/_thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/gzhan yang lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 
[\[2a.3\]]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod par byas nas/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas 
[\[2a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[2a.5\]]pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na mngon par 'du byed pa med par sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad 
[\[2a.6\]]kyi rtsa bar gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi gtso bor gyur pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das ni chos thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa lags te/_de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das las gang thos na dge slong rnams 'dzin par 'gyur ba de bcom ldan 'das 
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]nyid kyis dge slong rnams la bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur te/_lan gnyis kyi bar du gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ngas khyod la bcol gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[2b.2\]]po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/_khyod spobs par gyis shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das las go skabs gnang ba thob nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus thog ma nyid du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i 
[\[2b.3\]]pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/_bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas thog ma nyid du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par bgyi zhing sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi'o/_/gal te byang chub sems 
[\[2b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par bgyi nas sbyin pa sbyin na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' lta bar lhung bas sbyin pa sbyin pa ni mi sngo'i nyan thos kyis 
[\[2b.5\]]'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsngos pa ni de lta ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_de'i 'jigs pa ni de lags par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i slad du'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ci'i phyir na 
[\[2b.6\]]de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jigs pa yin par shes par bya/_smras pa/_nyan thos rnams dang 'bras bu mnyam par 'gyur du 'ong bas na de'i phyir de'i 'jigs pa yin par shes par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di 
[\[2b.7\]]skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa gang yin pa dang /_nyan thos dgra bcom pa mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa gang yin pa 'di la bye brag ni ci yod/_tha dad du dbye ba ni gang yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po tha dad 
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]du dbye ba ni 'di nyid yin te/_gcig ni gang nyan thos kyi sar yongs su sngo bar byed la cig shos ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa dper na skyes bu la la zhig bdag rgyal por gyur kyang ci ma rung snyam du rgyal 
[\[3a.2\]]po'i sa la dmigs nas sbyin pa sbyin la/_skyes bu cig shos ni bdag rgyal po de'i yul na gnas kyang ci ma rung snyam du mngag gzhug par khas len par 'dod de sbyin pa sbyin zhing de ltar yongs su sngo na/_skyes bu des skyes bu snga ma des dmigs pa'i rgyal po'i sa gang yin pa de nyid non par nus sam/_
[\[3a.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin pa sbyin zhing yongs su sngo la/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa ni sbyin pa gang sbyin pa de nyan thos kyis la dgra bcom pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de ltar 
[\[3a.4\]]'phags pa nyan thos byang chub sems dpa'i nye gnas su 'gyur bar 'dod na/_skyes bu des sbyin pa de nyid rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i mthu dang nus pa yod dam/_yang tshe dang ldan pa gang po mos pa gang dang ldan pas sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[3a.5\]]du yongs su sngo ba'i mos pa de ni med kyi/_sbyin pa de nyan thos su yongs su sngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dgra bcom pa'i sa la gnas pa'i tha dad du dbye ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na skyes bu la la zhig sbyin pa 'dis bdag tshong dpon nam/_
[\[3a.6\]]khyim bdag gam tshangs par gyur cig ces sbyin pa sbyin pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i sbyin par blta'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bus shin tu legs par 
[\[3a.7\]]smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na skyes bu la la zhig kAr Sha pa Na 'bum khyer te/_khyim bdag phyug po gang yang rung ba zhig gi drung du song nas 'di skad du/_kAr Sha pa Na 'bum 'di dag khyod la 'bul te/_bdag kyang khyod kyi thad na 'dug cing bya ba dang /_sbyor ba rnams la 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]g.yog bgyid do zhes zer ba de bzhin du/_tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams sbyin pa sbyin zhing /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs 'bring du khas len to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par mi byed de/_'di ni byang chub 
[\[3b.2\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa dang nyan thos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i khyad par du dbye ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na rgyal po'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi bud med gcig gis gser 'bum khyer te/_tshong dpon nam/_ded dpon gang yang rung ba'i drung du song nas 'di skad du/_gser 'bum 'di 
[\[3b.3\]]dag kyang khyod la 'bul/_bdag kyang khyod kyi g.yog bgyid cing sngar ldang ba dang /_phyis nyal ba dang /_khyod ci dgyes pa bzhin spyod par bgyid do zhes zer ba de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag sbyin pa yang sbyin zhing de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos nyid du khas 
[\[3b.4\]]len to/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sbyin pa de nyid yongs su btang du 'dra na/_gcig ni nyan thos kyis yongs su 'dzin par gyur la/_gcig ni rnam pa thams 
[\[3b.5\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin par gyur pa 'di ni ngo mtshar che ste/_tshe dang ldan pas legs par smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni thams cad du thabs la mkhas par blta bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams 
[\[3b.6\]]ma'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin par 'dod cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba na thog ma kho nar 'di skad du sbyin pa 'di las byung 
[\[3b.7\]]ba'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]pa gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces brjod par bya ste/_de ltar bdag nyid kyang de'i khongs su gtogs par byed cing byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin par byed do/_/
[\[4a.2\]]ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dzin cing rjes su srung ba de lta de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo ba de lta de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang yang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[4a.3\]]pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_sbyin pa de 'di ltar bdag gis kha zas kyi sbyin pa 'di las sems can gang dag mig lam na snang ba dang /_gang dag mi snang ba thams cad las sems can gang dag za ba dang /_cung zad za bar gyur pa'i 
[\[4a.4\]]sbyin pa de las gang bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bzung bar gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/
[\[4a.5\]]phyir mi ldog pa gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su sngo bar byed pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su 'dzin cing rnam pa thams cad 
[\[4a.6\]]mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe sbyin pa chung ngu yang dpag tu med par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang 
[\[4a.7\]]ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_bdag gi sbyin pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma gtogs pa gzhan du rnam par smin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o/_/gal te yongs su sngo bar byed na 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/ci ste phyis yun ring mo zhig lon nas yongs su sngo bar byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed na yang de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[4b.2\]]sbyin pa ni nyung ngu zin kyang mang bar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pa mang po yang nyung ngur 'gyur ba yod par rig par bya ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su ma 
[\[4b.3\]]bsngos pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa de yang gal te phyis yun ring mo zhig lon nas yongs su sngo bar byed na yang sbyin pa'i sgra bor te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'khor ba thog ma med pa 
[\[4b.4\]]nas 'khor ba na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang dag par ma brjod par sbyin pa byin pa gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpas thabs mkhas pa la brten nas pha rol tu phyin par yongs su sngo zhing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par byed na byang chub sems 
[\[4b.5\]]dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa ci 'di khyod nyid kyi spobs pa yin nam 'on te bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs yin smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[4b.6\]]bdag gi spobs pa gang yin pa 'di ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med/_tshad med pa dag na sems can gang dag gnas pa de dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya bar 'dod 
[\[4b.7\]]pa'i phyir bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du so so'i skye bo rnams sam/_nyan thos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin la/_sbyin pa de yang byang chub sems dpas bsams te/_bsams nas kyang 'di skad du sbyin pa 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo zhes zer zhing /_de ltar yongs 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]su gtong ba rnams kyi de la byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po yod la/_rjes su yi rang nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de 'di ltar yongs su sngo bar byed de/_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' 
[\[5a.2\]]yas mu med pa dag na/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog pa gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ce na/_rjes su yi rang ba 
[\[5a.3\]]dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de de ltar yongs su sngo bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_de la sems can yongs su gtong bar byed pa de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dge ba'i rtsa ba snga ma de ni/_
[\[5a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 
[\[5a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa des thams cad zil gyis non pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyis 'dir thabs la mkhas pa nyid btsan par mdzad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can de dag 
[\[5a.6\]]thams cad bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shing sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin zhing bsod nams dag kyang byed la/_de la byang chub sems dpa' rjes su yi rang ste/_kye ma sbyin pa 'di ni legs par byin no/_/legs par sbyin par byed 
[\[5a.7\]]do/_/bsti stang du byas te sbyin par byed do zhe sar byas te sbyin par byed do/_/smad pa med par sbyin par byed do/_/sbyin pa 'di la rjes su yi rang ngo zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems la snga ma'i sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni rjes su yi rang ba'i sems 
[\[5b.2\]]kyis zil gyis gnon par byed par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na skar ma'i gzugs gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyi 'od med par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba na 'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[5b.3\]]'di srog chags kyi rigs srin bu me khyer gyis gang bar gyur pa thams cad zil gyis mnan te 'od med par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mching bu'i nor bu brgya 'am/_stong ngam/_bye ba'am/_bye ba stong phung po chen por gyur la/_de'i nang du bai dUr+ya'i nor bu gcig bzhag 
[\[5b.4\]]na mching bu'i nor bu de thams cad nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig pu'i kha dog dang 'od kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/_'od mi snang zhing mi spa bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du sems can de dag thams cad bskal pa dpag tu med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas 
[\[5b.5\]]pa'i sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_rta rin po che rta stong gi nang du zhugs na/_rta phal 
[\[5b.6\]]de dag thams cad gsal ba ma yin zhing spa ba ma yin la/_rta'i rgod pa'i bag kyang ston par mi byed de/_de dag thams cad rta rin po che des zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas pa'i sems can de dag 
[\[5b.7\]]thams cad kyi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po gang yin pa de/_byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/_de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas rjes su yi rang 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]ba'i sems kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des kyang rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag na theg pa la 
[\[6a.2\]]gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog par gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig_/ces yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/ji lta ji 
[\[6a.3\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de yongs su gtong ba de lta de ltar snang bar 'gyur zhing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag bdag gir mi byed cing /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad bde bar gyur cig ces sems 
[\[6a.4\]]bskyed pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'bogs par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'bogs pa de lta de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag la bdag gi bar sems mi skyed pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i 
[\[6a.5\]]rtsa ba dpag tu med pa 'dzin to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag tu med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rjes su yi rang ba'i sems thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos nas theg pa la 
[\[6a.6\]]gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan 'dogs par byed de rjes su 'dzin cing phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mngon par shes pa myur bar yongs su sngo'o/_/des de dag la yang phan btags nas bdag nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[6a.7\]]nyid yongs su 'dzin par byed pa 'di ni/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir te/_bdag dang de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang don che bar byed do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las rjes su yi rang ba'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas pa'i sems can de thams cad kyis sangs rgyas la 
[\[6b.2\]]sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /_bsod nams dag kyang byed pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun la bsod snyoms lan cig tsam 'bul na yang /_bsod snyoms 'bul ba gang 
[\[6b.3\]]yin pa 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba snga mas brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' dang sems can de dag gi len pa po ni mtshungs te/_len pa po mi mtshungs pa ma yin mod kyi/_
[\[6b.4\]]bsngo ba dang bral ba'i phyir sems can de dag gi sbyin pa de/_byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_'di ltar bdag gis sbyin 
[\[6b.5\]]pa 'di ltar byin zhing /_'di ltar yongs su btang ba las bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa'i dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa des sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams/_sems can dmyal ba nas 'don par gyur cig_/dud 
[\[6b.6\]]'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'don par gyur cig_/gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams/_gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas 'don par gyur cig_/'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na theg pa la gsar du zhugs 
[\[6b.7\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya ste/_ji lta 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag skyed pa de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin par byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dpag tu med pa yang rnam par 'phel bar byed cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang yang nye bar 'gyur te/_'di yang 
[\[7a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la bdag gi bar 'du shes mi byed pa de lta de ltar bsod nams dpag tu med pa mngon par 'du byed pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dpag 
[\[7a.3\]]tu med pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin no/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gzugs med pa gang yin pa yang yongs su gtong na gzugs yod pa'i dngos po lta ci smos te/_de ltar na byang chub sems 
[\[7a.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/_thams cad yongs su gtong bas na/_de thams cad mkhyen par 'gyur ro/_/'di skad du nang gi'am/_phyi rol gyi 'am/_gzugs yod pa'am/_gzugs 
[\[7a.5\]]med pa yang rung ste/_gang bdag gis yongs su ma btang ba'am/_ma byin pa'am/_mchod sbyin ma byas pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong /_dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/zhes kyang seng ge'i sgra sgrog cing de ltar dga' ba skyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang 
[\[7a.6\]]po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis gzigs te/_'di skad du nang gi'am/_phyi rol gyi'am/_gzugs yod pa'am/_gzugs 
[\[7a.7\]]med pa yang rung ste/_gang bdag gis yongs su ma btang ba'am/_ma byin pa'am/_mchod sbyin ma byas pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/_gang gi phyir bdag gis dngos po de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de'i phyir bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_gang bdag gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'am/_yongs su ma shes pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/ji ltar chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[7b.2\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa dam pa thob ste/_gang bdag gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'am/_yongs su ma shes pa de ci yang med do/_/ji ltar gang bdag gis yongs su ma btang ba'am/_ma byin 
[\[7b.3\]]pa de ci yang med pa de ltar bdag gis chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'am/_yongs su ma shes pa'i chos de yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo zhes seng ge'i sgra sgrog go/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de ltar nang dang phyi rol 
[\[7b.4\]]gyi dngos po rnams yongs su btang bas na/_nang dang phyi'i chos rnams la chos gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'am/_yongs su ma shes pa'i chos ci yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[7b.5\]]pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob na byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming thob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[7b.6\]]dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' la bdud sdig can gyis kyang glags mi rnyed na/_gnod sbyin nam sha zas glags rnyed pa lta ci smos te 'di ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po phyogs gang du byang chub sems 
[\[7b.7\]]dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi chos sems shing 'gro ba'i phyogs der mi'am/_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid la byed pa de dag ni de ltar stobs dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa rnams ni de 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]ltar bsam gyis mi khyab cing de ltar rgya che'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa ni de ltar sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa yang yin la nye bar 'tsho ba yang yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam grangs 
[\[8a.2\]]'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang phan 'dogs 
[\[8a.3\]]par gyur pa dang nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i phyir chos kyang ston to/_/sems can dpag tu med pa yang phung po gsum du yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po rnam grangs 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[8a.4\]]dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mchog ces bya/_gtso bo dang /_phul dang /_rab dang /_rab mchog dang /_bla na med pa 
[\[8a.5\]]dang gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sems can rnams kyi phan 'dogs par gyur pa dang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_na bza' dang /_
[\[8a.6\]]gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis bkur stir byed/_bla mar byed/_ri mor byed/_mchod pa byed de/_de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i bsam pas de bzhin 
[\[8a.7\]]gshegs pa'i mchod rten la me tog gcig tsam 'bul ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du lung bstan to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug na yang sems can rnams kyi phan 'dogs 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]par gyur pa dang nye bar 'tsho ba yin la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sems can rnams kyis phan 'dogs pa dang nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[8b.2\]]ni nams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs par sems can gyi ris na byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di lta bu dag dang ldan pa'i sems can de gang yang mi dmigs te/_yod ces bya ba ni gnas med do/_/tshe dang ldan 
[\[8b.3\]]pa gang po dper na gser ni bsregs kyang rung /_ma bsregs kyang rung ste/_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/_bzhu yang rung /_ma bzhu yang rung /_brdungs su byas kyang rung /_brdungs su ma byas kyang rung ste/_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/tshe dang 
[\[8b.4\]]ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sems can 
[\[8b.5\]]rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na zla ba dang nyi ma gnyis ni gling bzhi po dag tu sems can rnams kyi bya ba byed cing gling bzhi po dag gi nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_'di ltar zla ba dang nyi ma 'di gnyis yod na snang zhing gsal la nyin mtshan dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_
[\[8b.6\]]dus tshigs dang /_lo rnams shes par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug na yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin la/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang yongs 
[\[8b.7\]]su mya ngan las 'das na yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de ltar chos rgya chen po dang ldan pas na nams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]na ded dpon gser 'bum dag gis nyo 'tshong byed na/_sems can tshad med dpag tu med pa dag bde bar 'gyur te des nor gyi phung po bsdus pa la de dag yongs su spyod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug 
[\[9a.2\]]gam sdod kyang rung ste/_sems can du ma bde bar 'gyur na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de nyid kyi mthus nyan thos rnams bde bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na 
[\[9a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa'i tshe'am/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'am/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang rung ste nams kyang nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/gang gi tshe bdag kyang bde la/_sems can gzhan rnams 
[\[9a.4\]]kyang bde bar byed pa 'di ni skyes bu dam pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ni/_'dug pa'i tshe yang bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams bde bar byed la/_shi na yang sngon gyi gzi byin drag po des yul de'i phyogs su 
[\[9a.5\]]rkun po dang /_chom po rnams kyis glags mi rnyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'dug na yang sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur la/_mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das na yang sems 
[\[9a.6\]]can dpag tu med pa dag bde bar 'gyur zhing /_gang dag de'i tshul khrims dran par byed pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dran par byed pa'i sems can de dag kyang bde bar 'gyur te/_sems can de dag la mi 
[\[9a.7\]]dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pas dogs par mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_sems can de dag la 'jigs pa gang gis kyang dogs par mi bya 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]ste/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba las dran par byed na/_de dag la 'jigs pa gang gis kyang dogs par mi bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom 
[\[9b.2\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang chos rgya chen po dang ldan par blta'o/_/
[\[9b.3\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rgya che ba gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gang yin pa 'di nyid rgya che ba yin no/_/de ci'i 
[\[9b.4\]]phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sangs rgyas nyid 'di ni rgya che ba'i gnas yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las/_sbyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i le'u ste/_gnyis pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang 
[\[9b.5\]]ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sems bskyed par bya ste/_gal te bdag la slong ba 'ga' zhig 'ongs na phyis sbyin no zhe'am/_bdag la med do snyam du sems bskyed par mi 
[\[9b.6\]]bya'o/_/bdag ni sbyin mi phod do snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/gzhan sbyin pa byed pa dag la yang rjes su yi rang bar bya/_yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug par bya/_yang dag par dga' bar bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[9b.7\]]rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ji ltar byas na sems can 'di dag sbyin pa gtong zhing /_bsod nams dag kyang byed par 'gyur snyam pa'i rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i sems thams 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa des ni/_de dag gi sbyin pa dang ldan pa'i sems zil gyis gnon te/_sems can de dag gi bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa de'i sbyin pa'i sems snga ma des ni rjes su 
[\[10a.2\]]yi rang ba'i sems thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa de'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod cing /_byang chub sems 
[\[10a.3\]]dpas rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis gnon te/_'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[10a.4\]]la spyod pa na/_thabs la mkhas par bya ste/_de gang dang gang sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/_thabs la mkhas par bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' thabs la 
[\[10a.5\]]mi mkhas pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas te/_sbyin pa sbyin la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar mi byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang skabs 'ga' 
[\[10a.6\]]dag tu snod 'dzam bu'i gling gi tshad tsam thogs pa'i sems can dag 'ongs te/_'di'i nang du byin cig ce na/_der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nges par sbyin par bya'i/_med do snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/snod 'di dag ni ha cang ches so snyam du sems 
[\[10a.7\]]bskyed par mi bya'o/_/snod 'di dag ji ltar yang dgang bar bya snyam du sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/ji ltar sems bskyed par bya zhe na sbyin no/_/snod 'di dag dgang bar spro bar bya'o/_/ji ltar snod 'di dag dgang bar bya ba de lta de ltar 'bad do/_/de lta de ltar btsal lo snyam du sems 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]bskyed par bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta de ltar 'bad cing rtsol la/_brtson 'grus rtsom ste/_yongs su gtong na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[10b.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can la snying brtse bas sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/byams pa dang snying rje la gnas par bya ste/_sems can rnams la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sbyin pa 
[\[10b.3\]]sbyin pa na/_'di ltar gang 'di las bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa des 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[10b.4\]]dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog pa gang dag gnas pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces sems bskyed par bya'o/_/ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge 
[\[10b.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba de dag yongs su gtong ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bogs par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na gser ni ji lta ji ltar bsregs pa dang /_bzhu ba dang /_bskol ba dang /_tshos par byas pa de lta 
[\[10b.6\]]de ltar shin tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ji lta ji ltar bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba de lta de ltar dge 
[\[10b.7\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'bogs so/_/ji lta ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyis 'bogs pa de lta de ltar sems can rnams kyis bsnyen pa'i 'os su 'gyur zhing /_kha dog dang /_'od dang /_gzi brjid kyis kyang shin tu gzi che bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_bud 
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]med me long gi byi dor byed pa na ji lta ji ltar me long byi dor byed pa de lta de ltar shin tu 'od gsal bar 'gyur la/_ji lta ji ltar shin tu 'od gsal bar gyur pa de lta de ltar bzhin gsal bar rab tu snang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems 
[\[11a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ji lta ji ltar sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo zhing /_de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang yongs su gtong ste/_gang dag theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa 
[\[11a.3\]]de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces ji lta ji ltar yongs su gtong zhing sbyin pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar 
[\[11a.4\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rgya che bar 'gyur ba de lta de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de ltar yongs su sngo ba ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa chung ngu byin na 
[\[11a.5\]]bsod nams mang po skyed par 'gyur zhe na/_gal te sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa chung ngu byin la bsod nams mang po skyed do/_/ci ste sbyin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar mi byed na/_de 
[\[11a.6\]]ltar sbyin pa mang po byin la/_bsod nams nyung ngu skyed par 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas te/_bde bar sbyar ba'i yo byad mang po yongs su gtong la/_sbyin pa de'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/_de 
[\[11a.7\]]ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa mang po sbyin zhing /_bsod nams mang po skyed do/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang ma bral bar bya'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]dpa' gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang ma bral ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni byang chub dang nye ba yin te/_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang 
[\[11b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par byed pa ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thog ma nyid du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la 
[\[11b.3\]]bslab par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi phyir des 'khor ba thog ma med pa nas ser sna bsten te/_de sbyin pa de yongs su gtong na/_ser sna rgyang ring bar byed cing /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar rnam pa 
[\[11b.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar byed pa de lta de ltar nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las ldog par byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyis dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis las ldog pa de lta de ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang 
[\[11b.5\]]ldan pa gang po dper na/_char 'bab pa'i tshe bla gab med par bum pa bzhag pa der rim gyis thigs pa bab pas gang bar gyur na dang por thigs pa bab pa gang yin pa dang /_tha mar thigs pa bab pa gang yin pa nyi tshes bum pa de gang bar gyur pa ma yin gyis/_de'i bar gyi 
[\[11b.6\]]chu'i thigs pa rgyun mi chad par rim gyis bab pa'i chu'i thigs pa rnams kyis bum pa de gang ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dang po sems bskyed pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa yang ma yin/_byang 
[\[11b.7\]]chub kyi snying po la 'dug pas kyang ma yin gyi/_dang po sems bskyed pa gang yin pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i sems bskyed pa phyi ma de'i bar gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi khyad par bskyed pa/_phan par gyur pa bsags pa gang dag 
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]yin pa de dag thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rim gyis 'bras bu bskyed pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma 'dres pa'i sems kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 
[\[12a.2\]]la dmigs par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems ma 'dres pa yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe 
[\[12a.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa byung na/_de 'ang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par gyur par mthong zhing /_gal te 'di dag las bdag gi lus grub pas na tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa 'di ni bdag gi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don 
[\[12a.4\]]yin te/_skyed par 'gyur ba'o zhes shes pa gang yin pa de ni sems ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phan 'dogs pa dang /_gnod pa byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen 
[\[12a.5\]]pa nyid kyi rgyu yin par mthong ste/_de ltar tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems ma 'dres par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_gsad par chad pa'i mi gsad pa'i sar khrid pa na bdag ni gsod do snyam pa'i yid la byed 
[\[12a.6\]]pa 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur te/_dpe de dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'ba' zhig yid la byed pa 'di ni/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ma 'dres pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/
[\[12a.7\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_rin po che khyer ba'i mi 'jigs sa'am/_'brog khong khong ya nga bar zhugs nas/_de 'jigs sa dang 'brog khong khong ya nga bar 'gro ba na/_rtag tu rgyun mi chad par yid la byed pa 'byung ste/_bdag nam 'brog khong khong ya nga ba 'di las 'da' bar 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'gyur zhing 'jigs sa 'di las 'da' bar 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa 'ba' zhig yid la byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya'i yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi skabs dbye bar mi bya ba 'di ni byang chub 
[\[12b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ma 'dres pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi g.yon can gyi rang bzhin can tshong 'dus kyi nang du zhugs te rku zhing chings ma gcod pa na 'di ltar bdag rku zhing chings ma gcod pa sus kyang ma mthong grang snyam du sems shing /_de 
[\[12b.3\]]yid la byed pa de 'ba' zhig kun tu 'byung ste/_de'i yid la byed pa gzhan mi 'byung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yid la byed pa gzhan 
[\[12b.4\]]dag gi skabs dbye bar mi bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems ma 'dres par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_skyes bu gser mgar zhig yod pa de'i lag tu gser gtad la/_gser de'ang rgyal po'i yin 
[\[12b.5\]]te/_de la 'di skad du kye mi khyod kyis gser 'di las rgyan gyi rnam pa dag byos la/_gang khyod kyis lo gcig gis zin pa'i las de khyod kyis zla ba gcig gis zin par gyis shig_/gal te zla ba gcig gis zin par ma byas na/_de'i phyir khyod kyi mgo gcad do zhes bsgo na/_
[\[12b.6\]]de skad du bsgo ba'i mi de ni gser de bsregs pa dang /_bzhu ba dang /_rgyan dag tu bya ba las yid la byed pa gzhan mi 'byung ste/_gzhan du na rgyan 'di rnams ji ltar zin par 'gyur zhig gu snyam ste/_de zan za ba'i tshe yang kha zas yid la byed pa mi 'byung gi_/gser dang ldan pa'i 
[\[12b.7\]]yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa 'ba' zhig dang /_rgyan gyi rnam pa 'ba' zhig yid la byed de/_sems dang sems las byung ba rnams de la gnas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de srog phangs pa'i shas che ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas mi des lha rgyan de dag ni 'di rnams lags so zhes rgyan byed pa de 
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dag rgyal po la phul lo/_/de nas rgyal po dga' zhing mgu ste rangs nas/_'di skad du gang khyod kyis zla ba bcu gnyis kyi las byas pa de ni khyod bya dga' chen po dbang ngo zhes smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[13a.2\]]chen pos dang po sems bskyed pa nas/_phyi ma'i sems bskyed pa de'i bar du sems ma 'dres par bya'o/_/ji ltar skyes bu gser mgar de yid la byed pa gzhan dang ma 'dres par rgyan de dag byed de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_srog phangs pa'i shas che ba'i phyir yin pa de bzhin du/_tshe 
[\[13a.3\]]dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma 'dres par bya ste/_yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi skabs dbye bar mi bya'o/_/gal te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lhur len pa'i stobs che na/_de nyid sems ma 
[\[13a.4\]]'dres pa la gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang bskal pa grangs med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bskal pa brgyar yang mi thogs par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[13a.5\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang gi phyir des yid la byed pa gzhan dag gi skabs ma phye ba'i phyir te/_de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems ma 'dres pa la gnas pa de bskal pa brgyar yang mi thogs par yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang 
[\[13a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems ma 'dres par bya'o/_/de ltar na bdag kyang don de la sbyor zhing /_sems can dag kyang don de la sbyor te/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi ye shes bla na med pa'i don la sbyor ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las dpe'i le'u ste gsum 
[\[13a.7\]]pa'o//_//de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gal te yid la byed pa de dag bar ma dor 'dres pa zhig na/_de'i ngo bo nyid ni gang yin/_gang dang ni ldan/_de skad 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi tshe nyan thos kyis dang ldan zhing /_rang sangs rgyas kyis dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'byung ba de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems 'dres pa yin par rig par bya ste/_
[\[13b.2\]]'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dag yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub la ni ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i yid la byed pa 'dod chags dang ldan pa 'am/_zhe 
[\[13b.3\]]sdang dang ldan pa 'am/_gti mug dang ldan pa 'byung na/_'byung ba des byang chub sems dpa' sems 'dres par rig par bya ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par rtog pa 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i srid pa mngon par 'grub pa ste/_phan 'dogs par 
[\[13b.4\]]gyur pa/_rgyur gyur pa grogs su gyur pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar byed pa'o/_/'di dag gis ni lus yongs su 'dzin to/_/thabs la mkhas pas ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis yongs su sngo bar byed pa de bzhin 
[\[13b.5\]]du/_nyon mongs pa grogs su gyur pa rnams kyis kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar chad byed 
[\[13b.6\]]par 'gyur ba'i yid la byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag 'byung bas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'dres pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o/_/de dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyan thos dang ldan pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan par 'byung ba de dag gis 
[\[13b.7\]]sems 'dres par rig par bya'o/_/de las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa srid pa'i rjes su 'thun pa gang dag yin pa de dag 'byung bas ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'dres par gnas pa ma yin no/_/yid la byed pa de dag ci'i phyir 'dod par bya zhe 
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i go cha bgos pa'i phyir te/_de dag 'byung na skye ba'i gnas rnams yongs su 'dzin la/_skye ba'i gnas rnams yongs su bzung bas yang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin 
[\[14a.2\]]pa yang dag par blangs te gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin te/_yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[14a.3\]]pa sgom mo/_/de ltar na yid la byed pa gang dag gis srid pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba de dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par ma gyur gyi bar du 'dod par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na nyon mongs pa rnams la 
[\[14a.4\]]yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos yongs su skyo ba'i sems bskyed par mi bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpas ci'i phyir 'dod par bya zhe na/_'di dag ni bdag la phan 'dogs par gyur pa dag ste/_gal te 'di dag gzugs can zhig yin du zin na/_bdag gis 
[\[14a.5\]]bsti stang chen pos ri mo bya ba zhig ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag la de'i phan yon rnams nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te thabs la mkhas pa gzugs can zhig yin du zin na ni/_de la yang de bzhin gshegs pa bzhin du bdag gis bsti stang chen pos ri mo bya 
[\[14a.6\]]ba zhig ste/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar bdag gi thabs la mkhas pa 'di ni srid par kun tu sbyor ba mi gcod la/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgrub pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ji lta ji ltar pha 
[\[14a.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug 'phel ba dang /_yongs su rdzogs par byed cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar srid par kun tu sbyor ba rnams srab par 'gyur/_nyam dmas par 'gyur/_zhan par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_shing rta khal chen po 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]bkal ba ni/_ji lta ji ltar shing rta 'gro ba de lta de ltar de'i srog shing yongs su zad par 'gyur te/_srog shing de yang khal de nyid kyis shin tu non pa dang /_khal khyer bas yongs su zad par 'gyur zhing zhan par 'gyur mod kyi/_srog shing de grong khyer gyi nang du zhugs te/_bya ba byas 
[\[14b.2\]]nas chag par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i srid pa 'thob par byed pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gang dag yin pa 'di dag ni gang dag gis srid pa yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dag ste/_ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' skye 
[\[14b.3\]]ba'i gnas rnams mngon par sgrub par byed pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar srid par kun tu sbyor ba rnams srab par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar srid par kun tu sbyor ba 
[\[14b.4\]]rnams srab par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes skyes pa de'i tshe/_kun tu sbyor ba bya ba byas pa de dag phyis de dag gis 
[\[14b.5\]]bya ba med de/_ji ltar srog shing de grong khyer du zhugs nas bya ba byas te/_chag nas phyis des bya ba med pa de bzhin du/_kun tu sbyor ba bya ba byas pa de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par gyur pa la/_kun tu sbyor 
[\[14b.6\]]ba de dag gis phyis bya ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de ni bya ba byas pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gshe zhing brgyad bkag la/_gshe zhing brgyad bkag nas/_byang chub sems 
[\[14b.7\]]dpa' de nyid la 'di bdag la dgos so zhes slong ste/_de dag la sbyin par byed pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/dmigs pa des kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems skyed par byed de/_dmigs pa de dag 
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin par shes so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar 'dir yang nyan thos kyis 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis ma gtogs pa de las gzhan pa'i yid la byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad 
[\[15a.2\]]ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos rnams kyang de la phan 'dogs 
[\[15a.3\]]par gyur cing /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de la phan 'dogs par gyur par rig par bya ste/_nyan thos rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis 'doms shing rjes su ston la/_des kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyar bar bya dgos pas/_de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[15a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin gnas yin pa'i phyir/_de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang de'i sbyin gnas yin pa'i phyir/_phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang 
[\[15a.5\]]ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/_gang dag de la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de dag kyang de'i sbyin gnas yin pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams kyang byang 
[\[15a.6\]]chub sems dpa' la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang sbyin gnas yin pa'i phyir/_de dag kyang de'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/gzhan yang gang dag dmigs par bya ste/_sbyin pa sbyin pa de yang 
[\[15a.7\]]rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/_de dag thams cad kyang de la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin te/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'on kyang nyan thos dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni des bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de'i sa la yang 'dod par mi bya'o/_/de 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]ci'i phyir zhe na/_de las byang chub sems dpa' ldog par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa gang yin pa de dag kyang des bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de'i sa la yang 'dod par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de las byang chub sems 
[\[15b.2\]]dpa' ldog par bya ba yin pa'i phyir te/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'on kyang nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams ni phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pa la ni 
[\[15b.3\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par mi 'gyur ba'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs so/_/dgra bcom pa'i sems de dang /_shes pa gang yin pa de yang byang chub sems dpa' la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin te/_gal te de med na de las ldog pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/'di 
[\[15b.4\]]lta bur dgra bcom pa'i sems bskyed par mi bya'i/_shes pa gcig pa zhes bya bar ni ma yin te/_des de spangs nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur ba gang yin pa der sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin du rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyis shes pa yang byang 
[\[15b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/gal te dgra bcom pa gang yin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas gang yin pa'i sems dang /_shes pa zhes bya ba de med du zin na/_phan 'dogs par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[15b.6\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /_zag pa med pa'i sems dang thun mong ma yin pa ste/_de las gzhan pa'i sems rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems ma gtogs par byang chub 
[\[15b.7\]]sems dpa'i sems nyid de ltar de dag gi mchog ces bya ba nas/_gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na/_sa 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad 
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]mkhyen pa nyid la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin te/_de ltar na 'di la byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la phan par ma gyur pa'i chos de gang yang mi dmigs so//_//bam po gnyis pa/_tshe dang ldan 
[\[16a.2\]]pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_dngos po gang yongs su gtong ba'i dngos po de la mtshan ma'i 'du shes mi bya'o/_/de ltar mtshan ma med par yongs su gtong zhing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[16a.3\]]yongs su sngo na/_phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no/_/mtshan ma ma spangs par bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnyed pa 'di ni rnyed pa che ba yin no/_/bya ba dag gis gser bye ba'am/_rin 
[\[16a.4\]]po che bye ba 'du ba gang yin pa de ni rnyed pa che ba ma yin gyi/_gang mtshan ma med par dngos po yongs su btang nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba 'di nyid rnyed pa khyad par du 'phags pa yin no/_/gang mtshan ma yongs 
[\[16a.5\]]su ma spangs par gling chen po bzhir 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid thob par gyur du zin kyang /_de ni rnyed pa chen po ma yin la/_mtshan ma ma spangs par 'dod pa'i khams su bdag po'i bya ba byed du 'jug pa 'di yang rnyed pa chen por 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/gal te mtshan ma 
[\[16a.6\]]yongs su spangs nas/_rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid dang /_rang byang chub thob par gyur na/_'di ni rnyed pa shin tu che ba yin par rig par bya'o/_/gang mtshan ma yongs 
[\[16a.7\]]su spangs nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob pa 'di yang rnyed pa che ba yin te/_'di ni rnyed pa snga ma de bas rnyed pa shin tu che ba ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnyed pa 'di ni mnyam pa'i zla med de/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa rnyed pa yin no/_/gang gos dang /_kha zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad mtshan mar yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po ni bskyed par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni mtshan ma'i grangs su gtogs pa'i phyir ro/_/gang yang gos 
[\[16b.2\]]dang /_kha zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad de yang yongs su btang la/_thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bsngos na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob bo/_/de lta bas na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnyed 
[\[16b.3\]]pa mchog yin par rig par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad du/_khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thob par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_khyod kyis gang la mtshan mar bzung ba'i dngos po 'di ni rnyed par dka' ba ste/_nang dang phyi rol gyi dngos po thams 
[\[16b.4\]]cad ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir ro/_/de ltar na khyod kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang dag gis thob pa dang /_gang dag 'thob pa dang /_'thob par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyis kyang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi na thob bo/_/
[\[16b.5\]]'thob bo/_/'thob par 'gyur ro zhes smra bar bya'o/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa bgrang ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gi yin smras pa/_'di ni 
[\[16b.6\]]byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pa'i bgrang ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems can 'di dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi na 'thob par de ltar shes su zin na ni/_sems can thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/_gang gi 
[\[16b.7\]]phyir 'di ltar de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la ma mos shing /_sems mi skyed pa'i phyir te/_gang dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems mi skyed pa de dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang dag 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mos shing sems 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]bskyed pa dag ni/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te/_sems de bskyed nas/_dngos po gang dang gang yongs su gtong ba de dang de dngos po med par mthong ngo /_/dngos po gang dang gang shes pa la 'di dag ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_'di ni ji ltar bdag 
[\[17a.2\]]gis mtshan mar bzung ba ltar ma yin no snyam nas de gtong ba'i blo shas che bar 'gyur zhing /_sbyin pa'i blo dang ldan par 'gyur te/_'dzin pa'i sems mi skyed do/_/'di ltar dngos po 'di ni sgyu ma lta bur sems can rnams kyis de ltar mi shes pas/_dngos po de dag la shas cher 
[\[17a.3\]]mngon par zhen par 'gyur te/_yongs su mi gtong ba'i blor 'gyur ro/_/yongs su mi gtong bas ser sna yongs su 'dzin to/_/ser sna des kyang ngan song rnams su skye bar 'gyur la/_dngos po de dang yang 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/de ltar dngos po de yang yongs su 
[\[17a.4\]]mi gtong zhing yongs su ma spyad la/_dngos po de las brten nas ser sna bskyed de/_ngan song rnams su yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mkhas pas 'di ltar shes te/_dngos po 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/_yongs 
[\[17a.5\]]su gtong ba yang sgyu ma lta bu yin pas na/_sgyu ma lta bu gang yin pa de ni bdag gi yang ma yin yongs su gtong ba yang ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de sgyu ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir/_de dngos po de rgya cher yongs su gtong ngo snyam du sems so/_/de de yongs 
[\[17a.6\]]su gtong bas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'dod pa skyed de/_bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni legs par gsung ba/_phyin ci ma log par gsung ba kho na ste/_sgyu ma lta bu'i dngos po yongs su btang bas/_yod pa'i mtshan nyid 
[\[17a.7\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag ji ltar byas na byang chub sems dpa' dngos po de dag 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]la mngon par zhen pa mi skyed cing /_'di ltar de yongs su gtong ba'i blor 'gyur snyam ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi dngos po de dag dang /_rkyen de dag mtshan nyid med par ston pa 'di dag ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o snyam du rig par bya'o/_/tshe 
[\[17b.2\]]dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis thob par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal 
[\[17b.3\]]te 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu'i spobs pa yin no snyam du khyod kyis shes na de ltar mi blta'i/_'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sha ra dwa ti'i bu smra bar zad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod 
[\[17b.4\]]kyis gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad smras pa bzhin du zung shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las mtshan ma med pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa byams 
[\[17b.5\]]ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar yongs su gtong ba des ci zhig yongs su btang ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[17b.6\]]po de ltar yongs su gtong ba des ci yang yongs su btang ba med do/_/ji ltar yongs su btang ba med pa de bzhin du chos ci yang thob pa med do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dngos po ci yang 
[\[17b.7\]]yongs su btang ba med pa de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas kyang chos ci yang thob pa med do/_/gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dgod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/_chos kyi 'du ba'i sgo yang 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]de kho na dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos 'ga' zhig yongs su btang bar gyur na ni byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i chos kyang yod 
[\[18a.2\]]pa zhig thob par 'gyur na gang po gang gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gtong ba byed pa na dngos po yod pa ci yang yongs su btang ba med pas de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[18a.3\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas yod pa'i chos ci yang thob pa med do/_/gang po dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob mas sgyu ma mkhan gyi lag tu la du zhig btsongs la/_de la sgyu ma mkhan gyis kAr Sha pa Na dag gcig mngon par sprul te byin na/_gang 
[\[18a.4\]]po de ltar na/_rin ji lta ba de bzhin du la du yang de dang 'dra'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa ji lta bu yongs su btang ba de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa yang de kho na dang 
[\[18a.5\]]'dra'o/_/gang po de lta bas na 'du ba ci 'dra ba de bzhin du/_dgod pa yang de kho na dang 'dra ste/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i rin ci 'dra ba de bzhin du rnyed pa yang de kho na dang 'dra ba yin no/_/gang po dper na/_skyes bu sgyu ma mkhan gyis shing ljon pa zhig mngon par 
[\[18a.6\]]sprul la/_shing ljon pa de'i drung du yang srog chags 'bum sprul te/_srog chags de dag kyang shing ljon pa de'i 'bras bu rnams za na/_gang po de ni 'bras bu ji lta ba bzhin du zab po rnams kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[18a.7\]]chen po'i yongs su gtong ba ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'du ba'i sgo yang de kho na dang 'dra'o/_/gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gtong ba na rin dang /_rnyed pa dang /_rnyed pa dang rin du mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/gang po 'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam gyi bzhi mdo chen por skye bo phal po che'i mdun du bud med gcig mngon par sprul la/_bud med de yang sbrum mar mngon par sprul te bu byung bar bstan nas/_bud med de'i bu btsas la/_khye'u zhig tu btsas 
[\[18b.2\]]nas/_khye'u de yang shi bar bstan na/_gang po 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci khye'u shi ba de'i tshe na bud med de la bdag gi bu shi'o snyam pa'i sems skye 'am/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po de 
[\[18b.3\]]lta na/_ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bu yang de kho na dang 'dra ste/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de kho na dang 'dra'o/_/gang po de ltar na 'dir yang chos de dag gi 'du ba'i sgo gnyi ga med do/_/
[\[18b.4\]]gang po 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci khyod kyis nga chos 'ga' zhig la 'dod pa che bar mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos de dag stong par mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[18b.5\]]sangs rgyas pa'i slad du lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang po de bzhin du ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa chos gang la yang 'dod pa che ba med pa de bzhin du nga byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i tshe chos gang la la zhig yongs su ma btang ba de med do/_/de 
[\[18b.6\]]bas na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ni chags pa'am/_khong khro ba 'ga' yang mi skye'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa dang khong khro ba spangs pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/gang pos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[18b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dngos po gang dang gang yongs su gtong ba de dang de nyid stong pa'am/_ya ma brla 'am/_gsob bam/_gsog tu mthong ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_
[\[19a\]]
[\[19a.1\]]gal te byang chub sems dpas 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dbyig dang /_gser gyis bkang ste slong ba rnams la stsal kyang /_byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yongs su gtong ba'i thabs ma 'tshal na/_de lta na des ni sbyin pa nyi tsher 'gyur gyi/_
[\[19a.2\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma lags so/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yongs su gtong ba na/_'di ltar yang bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o snyam du yang sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[19a.3\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_bstan pa 'di'i don bshad pa'i phyir spobs par gyis shig_/ngas bshad pa'i dus la bab pa na yang bshad par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang 
[\[19a.4\]]ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas chos thams cad stong par yid la byed cing sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs par 
[\[19a.5\]]byas nas/_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/_/zin pa dang ma zin pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su ma btang ba'am/_ma byin pa'am/_mchod sbyin ma byas pa ci yang med par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[19a.6\]]pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las sgyu ma lta bur bstan pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs 
[\[19a.7\]]so legs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs pa byas la sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]]sems dpa' chen po dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa mthong bar 'dod dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bgyid pa mthong bar 'tshal lo/_/
[\[19b.2\]]de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_de las gzhan pa'i nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis 'di nas thad ka'i phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams sgyu ma zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[19b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phung po chen po zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams la chos ston te/_de na byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba khyim na 'dug cing khyim na 'dug bzhin du dbyig dang /_gser gyi phung po ri tsam sbyin pa sbyin zhing yongs su gtong ste/_'di 
[\[19b.4\]]las khyer ba'i sems can de dag la sbyin pa byin par gyur cig ces sgrogs so/_/gos kyi phung po ri tsam dag sbyin par byed do/_/bza' ba dang /_bca' ba'i phung po ri tsam dag sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/_sems can gang dag gis pha bi las khyer ba de dag la sbyin pa byin par gyur 
[\[19b.5\]]cig ces sgrogs so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pas rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta 'bum phrag mang po bkram ste shing rta re re la yang bud med kha dog stong gis brgyan pa dag 
[\[19b.6\]]bskyon nas/_tshong 'dus kyi srang du sbyin par byed de/_tshig 'di skad du gang shing rta 'di dag dang /_bud med 'di dag 'dod pa des khyer cig ces kyang zer ro/_/bud med de dag re re yang bud med brgya brgya'i 'khor dang ldan te/_shing rta dbyig dang bcas pa bud med kyi 
[\[19b.7\]]'khor dang bcas pa de bud med de dag la sbyin par byed cing yongs su gtong ngo /_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med pa sbyin pa sbyin pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas nyan thos chen po de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus sbyin pa sbyin pa de mthong ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[20a.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sbyin pa 'di rgya che ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_a la la bcom ldan 'das rgya che ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sbyin pa 'di ltar byin zhing 
[\[20a.3\]]yongs su btang ba 'di la de las gzhan pa'i sbyin pa rnams ni brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus sbyin pa de byin nas/_'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis theg pa la gsar du zhugs 
[\[20a.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du gyur cig_/phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag yin pa de dag ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed pa yang mthong ngo /_/
[\[20a.5\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di la theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[20a.6\]]sems dang po bskyed pa/_sems dang po bskyed pa la gnas pa ni dgra bcom pa'i sems las 'da'o/_/sems gnyis pa bskyed pa ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sems las 'da'o/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sems la gnas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' ma nges shing lung ma 
[\[20a.7\]]bstan pa'i sems las 'da'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug la/_thams cad mkhyen pa ma thob par de las ldang ba 'di ni mi srid de/_go skabs ma yin zhing gnas med 
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]de/_ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa de'i tshe/_lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_bdud dang bcas/_tshangs pa dang bcas/_lha dang mi dang /_lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 
[\[20b.2\]]'jig rten gyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs so zhes rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon 
[\[20b.3\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba can du gyur pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_nyan thos de dag gis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med pa gang 
[\[20b.4\]]dag byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir mngon par 'byung ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems 
[\[20b.5\]]dpa' grangs med pa gang dag khyim na gnas shing sbyin pa gtong ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag slong ba rnams slong ba na/_mgo yongs su gtong ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag slong ba rnams 
[\[20b.6\]]slong ba na/_lus 'bigs su bcug ste/_khrag sbyin pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag bu dang chung ma yongs su gtong ba dang /_khyim gyi dngos po dang /_zhing gi dngos po dang /_rta dang /_ba lang dang /_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_
[\[20b.7\]]las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba rnams yongs su gtong ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin byed pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su skye ba dag kyang 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos te/_ma'i mngal du skye ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag btsa' ba dang chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[21a.2\]]grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams kyi ched du sdug bsngal rnams yang dang yang myong ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams kyi ched du dpag tshad brgyar yang 'gro zhing /_nyis brgya'am/_sum brgya'am/_bzhi brgya'am/_
[\[21a.3\]]lnga brgya'am/_dpag tshad stong ngam/_de las lhag par yang 'gro ba dang /_sems can rnams kyi ched du ji ltar byas na/_sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag la gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang /_yang na gsum la skyabs 
[\[21a.4\]]su 'gro bar 'gyur bar 'di la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba dang /_yang na bslab pa'i gzhi gcig 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/_yang na bslab pa'i gzhi gnyis sam/_gsum mam/_bzhi'am/_lnga 'dzin par 'gyur ba'am/_yang na sems can 'ga' yang byang 
[\[21a.5\]]chub la gnas par 'gyur bar yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu 'gro ba yang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu dag gi nang du byung nas/_pha rol tu phyin 
[\[21a.6\]]pa rnams mi thos mi mthong ba dag la byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi thos shing mi mthong bas bskal pa 'bum dag tu 'khyam zhing 'khor te/_yun ring pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs 
[\[21a.7\]]med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams ston pa yang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams tshol na yang mi rnyed pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]tshol zhing de dag gis rnyed pa yang mthong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' grangs med pa gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs 
[\[21b.2\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ched du/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por byang chub tu sems skyed du 'jug par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag sems can rnams 
[\[21b.3\]]yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_gang dag byang chub tu sems skyed du 'jug par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[21b.4\]]ldan 'das grangs med pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dag tu gshegs nas/_sems can rnams kyi ched du chos ston pa dag kyang mthong ngo /_/de ltar na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dka' ba mdzad pa'o/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sha 
[\[21b.5\]]ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gnas pa de dag kyang mthong /_shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na/_sangs rgyas bcom
