[\[21b.6\]]ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag kyang mthong /_lho phyogs dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_'og dang /_steng du yang de bzhin du sbyar te/_de ltar kho ra khor yug tu phyogs bcu'i bar du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang /_sangs 
[\[21b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa de dag mthong ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan te/_ji lta zhe na/_shar phyogs 
[\[22a\]]
[\[22a.1\]]kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu ma mchis pa dag na/_byang chub sems dpa' grangs ma mchis pa dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs ma mchis pa dag mthong ba dang /_de bzhin du lho dang /_nub dang /_byang dang /_'og dang /_steng dang /_phyogs 
[\[22a.2\]]mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams grangs ma mchis pa dag tu byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu ma mchis pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu ma mchis pa dag mthong ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad 
[\[22a.3\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan te/_gang dag gis rgya chen po'i gnas bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[22a.4\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems rgya chen po bskyed par bya'o/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mi 'gyur bar 'tshal 
[\[22a.5\]]bas ni/_dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ltar bgyi'o/_/lhar 'gyur bar 'tshal bas ni/_dper na lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin ltar bgyi'o/_/tshe ring ba yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal bas ni/_dper na 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro 
[\[22a.6\]]ba'i lha rnams ltar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur bar 'tshal ba dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'bel ba'i chos kyi gtam bgyi bar 'tshal ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'tshal bas ni thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[22a.7\]]nyid du sems bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/_
[\[22b\]]
[\[22b.1\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dang po sems bskyed pa 'di las gud na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 
[\[22b.2\]]sems bskyed pa ches bzang ba'am/_ches rgya che ba 'ga' lta mchis lags sam/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la yongs su 'dri bar sems pa legs so legs so/_/
[\[22b.3\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa'i zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa de ni spong ba'i sems kyis rang gi rgyud dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spang bar zad kyi/_sems de sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du bskyed pa ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems ni sems can 
[\[22b.4\]]dpag tu med pa'i ched du bskyed pa yin gyi/_nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi phyir ni ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang rang gi rgyud dang ldan pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams zlog par zad kyi/_byang chub kyi sems ni sems can dpag tu med pa'i nyon mongs pa 
[\[22b.5\]]rnams zlog pa yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu yang byang chub kyi sems ni bsten cing bsnyen te bsgoms la mang du byas na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob bo/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob na/_des nyan thos rnams dang /_rang sangs 
[\[22b.6\]]rgyas rnams rab tu phye'o/_/gang dag 'di la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed de/_'di lta ste/_rang byang chub la sems shing sgom na/_de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams khyed ni rang sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_bskal pa 'di snyed cig na lha rnams dang /_mi rnams kyi nang du 
[\[22b.7\]]mtshams sbyar te 'khod nas rang sangs rgyas thob par 'gyur ro zhes lung ston gyi/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rang sangs rgyas rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung mi ston 
[\[23a\]]
[\[23a.1\]]to/_/nyan thos rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' la lung mi ston to/_/gal te nyan thos lung ston na yang /_de bzhin gshegs pa las thos nas lung ston to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gis sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod kyang /_des ni thams cad mkhyen 
[\[23a.2\]]pa nyid yongs su bzung ba ma yin gyi/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' la pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyi 'doms shing rjes su ston na/_'di ltar des ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su bzung ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos las ni 
[\[23a.3\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byang chub byung ba ma yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub byung ba'i phyir ro/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[23a.4\]]bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpar rig par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 
[\[23a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ming 'thob bo/_/gsol pa bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems las byang chub kyi sems khyad par du 'phags par bshad pa 'di'i don 
[\[23a.6\]]ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar lung bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par gzung bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang 
[\[23a.7\]]bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa yin nam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_gti mug dang bcas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pa'i 
[\[23b\]]
[\[23b.1\]]sems 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de de lta lags te/_dgra bcom pa'i sems 'dod chags dang bral ba/_zhe sdang dang bral ba/_gti mug dang bral ba lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[23b.2\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pas sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la byams pa dang /_snying rjes khyab par byas kyang /_de'i tshe sems can de dag bde bas tshim par 'gyur ram/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[23b.3\]]de ltar dgra bcom pa ni thabs la mkhas pa ma mchis na/_sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams la byams pas ji ltar khyab par bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar ji srid du mnyam par gzhag pa de srid kyi bar der byams pa des kha cig ni bde bar 'gyur/_kha cig ni sdug 
[\[23b.4\]]bsngal bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob pa de'i tshe sems kyi skad cig la/_byams pa la gnas shing byams pa mngon par sgrub pa ma lags mod kyi/_bcom ldan 'das gnas ma mchis pa nan gyis 
[\[23b.5\]]dper bgyis te bshad par bgyi na/_bcom ldan 'das gal te 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir bdag dang 'dra ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa sha stag gis gang bar gyur la/_de dag kyang byams pa la snyoms par zhugs sam/_gal te snyoms par 'jug par 'tshal na 
[\[23b.6\]]yang snyoms par 'jug pa'i 'os ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis kyang zag pa med pa'i sems las byang chub sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bya ba nas/_gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan 
[\[23b.7\]]yang gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa sha stag tu gyur la/_dgra bcom pa re res kyang bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med 'khrugs med snyed mngon par sprul na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'khrugs med de dag mang ba yin nam/_
[\[24a\]]
[\[24a.1\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_dgra bcom pa de dag dang /_dpung de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[24a.2\]]dpa'i byang chub kyi sems de bzlog par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems de gnyis kyi nang na gang mthu che/_sems can thams cad zag pa zad par 
[\[24a.3\]]gyur pa rnams kyi zag pa med pa'i sems gang yin pa mthu che'am/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems mthu che/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i sems ches mthu che lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[24a.4\]]byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyi sems ches mthu che ba yin te/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa med pa'i sems kyis bdud kyi sde 'khrugs med dpag tu med pa rdzu 'phrul gyis mngon par sprul na yang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems kyis/_'dod chags dang bcas pa/_zhe sdang dang bcas pa/_
[\[24a.5\]]gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems yongs su gtugs par mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems 'di dag gi nang na sems gang mchog ces bya ba nas/_gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du gang yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[24a.6\]]sems dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas/_gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar zag pa ma mchis pa'i sems kyis gtugs par bgyir rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du'o/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang khyod nyid la yongs su dri bar byas/_khyod 
[\[24a.7\]]kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lan thob shig_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gal te mching bu'i nor bu dag gi nang du/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya bzhag na/_ci mching bu'i nor bu de dag gis nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya la gsal ba dang /_rin thang gis thub bam/_gsol pa/_
[\[24b\]]
[\[24b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/mching bu'i nor bu dag gi phung po chen pos nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig kyang zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thogs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de ci'i phyir/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu de dag ni yongs 
[\[24b.2\]]su dag pa yang ma lags/_kha dog bzang ba yang ma lags/_rin thang yang chung la/_brjod par yang nus pa lags te/_bcom ldan 'das mching bu'i nor bu ni gnas rgya chen po nas byung ba yang ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni rigs kyis 'phags pa 
[\[24b.3\]]lags te/_sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas byung ba lags te/_de ni mching bu'i nor bu mang pos zil gyis gnon par rngo mi thogs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub 
[\[24b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni nyan thos thams cad kyi sems zil gyis gnon par 'dug ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang 'di yang dag par gzigs nas/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog nyid du bzhag pa nas/_
[\[24b.5\]]gong na med pa nyid kyi bar du bzhag pa yin no/_/nyan thos dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems gang byams pa dang ldan pa dang /_snying rje dang ldan pa yang zad par byed mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan 
[\[24b.6\]]pa de dag gis kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'phang bar nus mod kyi/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byed mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan 
[\[24b.7\]]pa de dag gis kyang /_rgya mtsho chen po kha'i dbugs kyis skam par nus mod kyi/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa'am/_zad par byed mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_mngon par shes pa 
[\[25a\]]
[\[25a.1\]]drug dang ldan pa de dag gis kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed sreg pa'i me'i phung po chen po de yang kha'i dbugs kyis gsad par nus mod kyi/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems ni zil gyis mnan pa'am/_zad 
[\[25a.2\]]par byed mi nus so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs 'dis na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mchog ces bya/_gtso bo dang /_phul dang /_ra ba dang /_rab mchog dang /_bla na med pa nas gong na med pa zhes bya ba'i bar du brjod do/_/de 
[\[25a.3\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rgya che zhing zad par bgyi ba'am/_bzlog par mi nus pa ngo 
[\[25a.4\]]mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyis su mi gsung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni gnyis su med par gsung zhing /_de bzhin 
[\[25a.5\]]kho na ste gzhan du ma yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur la/_sa'i khams ji snyed pa dang /_chu'i khams ji snyed pa dang /_me'i khams ji snyed pa dang /_rlung gi khams 
[\[25a.6\]]ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sems can gzhan dag byung bar gyur na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_sems can de dag mang ba yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha 
[\[25a.7\]]ra dwa ti'i bu sems can de dag kyang mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan par gyur te/_re re zhing 'di ltar maud gal gyi bu chen po lta bur rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par gyur la/_rdzu 'phrul can de dag gis 'di ltar sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bdud sdig can mngon par sprul te/_sdig can 
[\[25b\]]
[\[25b.1\]]re re la yang sems can de dag ji snyed pa de snyed kyi glang po che'i tshogs yod pa dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta'i tshogs dang /_dpung bu chung gi tshogs yod par gyur te/_bgrang ba 'di lta bu'i tshul gyis/_dgra bcom pa rdzu 'phrul can de dag re re sprul pa byed pa'i sprul pa de dag re 
[\[25b.2\]]res kyang de bzhin du sprul pa mngon par sprul na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de dag bgrang ba la 'jug par nus sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sems can de dag gis phyir mi ldog pa'i rigs 
[\[25b.3\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de gang na gnas pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsreg par mngon par sprul pa byed na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_ci sems can de dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rnam par ston pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[25b.4\]]ldan 'das de dag ni rdzu 'phrul che ba lags so/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po dang ldan zhing /_'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis nye bar gnas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te de dag 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa gang gA'i 
[\[25b.5\]]klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par gnas la/_de ltar 'jigs pa drag po kun nas ston kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi sems zad par bya ba'am/_zil gyis mnan pa'am/_bzlog nus pa'i skal ba med do/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam 
[\[25b.6\]]du sems/_sems can dpag tu med pa de dag dang /_bdud sdig can de dag gi rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa 'di gnyis la/_gang ches mthu dang ldan pa yin/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das rdzu 'phrul dang ldan 
[\[25b.7\]]pa 'di dag gi nang na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_sems 'di ni ches mthu dang ldan pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_stobs dang 
[\[26a\]]
[\[26a.1\]]ldan pa gang yin pa de mchog byed pa'am/_mchog tu 'byung bar 'os pa yin nam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/_rnam grangs 'dis na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma gtogs par byang chub sems 
[\[26a.2\]]dpa'i sems mchog ces bgyi ba nas gong na ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par bgyir rngo mi thogs pa'i slad du lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[26a.3\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni zad par byar mi nus so/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu 
[\[26a.4\]]gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs gang gis na/_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par byar mi nus/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang gi phyir byang chub sems 
[\[26a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa na de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dmigs nas sbyin par byed de/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems zad par bya ba'am/_zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_
[\[26a.6\]]skyes bu tshong pa zhig zong 'bum phrag mang po spyod cing /_de tshong byed la/_tshong pa des tshong dpon nam/_ded dpon gang yang rung ba las lo 'bum phrag mang po zhig nas skyin po blangs pa las/_de'i tshong ma rung bar gyur nas/_des rgyal po la bskor te rgyal po'i gan du song ngo /_/
[\[26a.7\]]de rgyal po'i dpung des na rgyal pos yongs su bzung ba'i mi de la tshong dpon de dang /_ded dpon des tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar de dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs 'di lta ste/_rgyal po'i phyogs dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la rten pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[26b\]]
[\[26b.1\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du dang po sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems ni dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs la rten to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs 
[\[26b.2\]]dpung dang ldan pa'i phyogs de la rten pas na/_de nyan thos thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan par mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_skyes bu rgyal po la rten pa ni longs spyod zad par gyur kyang /_'on kyang tshugs par mi nus pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[26b.3\]]sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyogs la rten pa yang /_'di ltar nyan thos thams cad dang /_bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos thams cad kyis tshugs par 'gyur/_smras pa/_
[\[26b.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyis sgrogs shing 'chad pa na/_de'i sems skyed cing bdag kyang de ltar gyur cig ces sems skyed na/_nyan thos rnams kyis tshugs pa yin no/_/gang de'i gtam gyi ro myong bar byed pa dang /_de la yang dga' 
[\[26b.5\]]bar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa bskyed pa des na tshugs par 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/_de dag la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya/_smras pa/_'di dag byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[26b.6\]]dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gegs byed pa yin te/_'di dag skyed par byed pa ma yin la/_'di dag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/_de bas na 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[26b.7\]]gang po dper na/_rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du bya bar 'dod cing /_yang dag pa la nges par 'jug par 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug kun tu 'byung ba ni dgra bcom pa nyid ring bar byed pa yin te/_de dag de'i tshul bzhin 
[\[27a\]]
[\[27a.1\]]ma yin pa yid la byed pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[27a.2\]]rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams gegs byed pa yin te/_yid la byed pa de dag skyed na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos 
[\[27a.3\]]rnams kyis zil gyis non pa yin te/_gang nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa skyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yid la byed pa de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi chud pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[27a.4\]]tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_rgyun du zhugs pa nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod na sbyin gnas su mi 'gyur te/_gal te gang gis de'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba'i shes pa thob na/_des de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin gyi/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyis 
[\[27a.5\]]rab tu phye ba ma yin te/_de ltar na shes pa yongs su shes pa dang /_spong ba la 'dris pas de rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang ldan pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems kun tu spyod cing skye bas/_byang 
[\[27a.6\]]chub sems dpa' zhes rab tu phye ba ma yin gyi/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las brtsams pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba gang dag yin pa de dag skye bas/_'di lta ste/_de byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rab tu phye ba yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems 
[\[27a.7\]]la gnas na tshugs par mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa dper na/_'phong gi slob dpon ni gnas na 'dug kyang rung /_'gro yang rung /_dgra rnams kyis tshugs par dka' ba yin te/_gzhan gyi mda' yang gcod cing bdag kyang srung ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang 
[\[27b\]]
[\[27b.1\]]chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yang tshugs par dka'o/_/nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa thos na yang 'di ltar bdag kyang myur ba nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[27b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa da ltar nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang nyan thos rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa de ltar na thabs la mkhas pa'i byang chub 
[\[27b.3\]]sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa la tshugs par mi nus te/_nyan thos kyi gtam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam thos na yang /_chos kyi gtam 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa las byung ngo zhes de bzhin gshegs pa dran par byed de/_nyan thos rnams la chags pa mi 
[\[27b.4\]]skyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa ni thub par dka' ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa dper na/_rnal 'byor pa rnal 'byor spyod pa dmigs pa thob cing /_ting nge 'dzin legs par bsgoms pa'i phyir rnam par rtog 
[\[27b.5\]]pa rnams kyis mi tshugs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dmigs pa de la rab tu goms pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas pa yang thub par dka'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i 
[\[27b.6\]]phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po gal te byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' bar rig par bya na/_theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_phyir mi ldog pa gang dag yin pa rnams dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa gang dag yin pa thams cad 
[\[27b.7\]]dam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang thub par dka' ba yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dam bcas pa las bskyod mi nus te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dam bcas pa la gnas pa dang /_byang chub kyi 
[\[28a\]]
[\[28a.1\]]sems la gnas pa de dag ni thams cad kyang thub par dka' ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dper na/_byang chub sems dpa' da ltar mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa gang yin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa lo bye ba brgya phrag mang po nas mngon par 
[\[28a.2\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_bzhugs shing gzhes pa gang yin pa de gnyi ga yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin 
[\[28a.3\]]pa dang /_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tha ma'i sems thob pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad ni 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa rnams kyis mnyam mo/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di dag ji ltar khyad par med/_smras 
[\[28a.4\]]pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub kyi sems la ni khyad par med de/_'on kyang mgyogs bul gyis ni khyad par yod do/_/sems de gnyi ga ni mnyam ste/_gang zhe na/_byang chub tu mngon par sgrub pa gang dag yin pa rnams so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub 
[\[28a.5\]]sems dpa'i sems la gnas pa ni phyir mi ldog go/_/dgra bcom pa gang dgra bcom pa nyid las ldog la/_zag pa med pa'i sems las kyang ldog na/_de dgra bcom pa nyid du rig par bya'am/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin te/_de ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[28a.6\]]can yin par rig par bya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i sems las phyir ldog pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub tu khas 'che bar zad de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' ma yin gyi/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[28a.7\]]sun 'byin pa yin te/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar rig par bya ba ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi zhig pho mtshan dang ldan par gyur te/_dbang po ma tshang ba ma yin pa las/_
[\[28b\]]
[\[28b.1\]]phyis de'i pho mtshan med par gyur la/_pho mtshan gyi bya ba byed mi nus na/_de ni ma ning zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa'i sems rmug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro'o/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las 
[\[28b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sbyang bar bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[28b.3\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas yid la byed pa ji lta bu bskyed par bya'i/_smras pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa bskyed par bya'o/_/de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la gnas pa yin no/_/de ltar gnas 
[\[28b.4\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/gal te de ltar yongs su sngo bar mi byed na/_de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/_
[\[28b.5\]]sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa sbyin pa na rnam par rtog ste/_bdag gis cung zad ni yongs su btang la cung zad ni yongs su ma btang ngo zhes rnam par rtog par byed cing 'di ni bdag gis sbyin par bya/_'di ni 
[\[28b.6\]]sbyin par mi bya'o/_/'di la ni sbyin/_'di la ni mi sbyin no zhes rnam par rtog par byed de/_ngan pa ni sbyin par bya/_bzang po ni sbyin par mi bya/_tshul khrims can la ni sbyin par bya/_tshul khrims 'chal pa la ni sbyin par mi bya'o zhes rnam par rtog par byed na/_rnam par rtog pa 'di 
[\[28b.7\]]dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bar chad byed pa yin no/_/de ltar rnam par rtog pa ni yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdag yun ring mo zhig gis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi 'gyur grang zhes rnam par rtog 
[\[29a\]]
[\[29a.1\]]par mi bya'o/_/thams cad la mnyam par gtong zhing sems mnyam pa ni myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas 
[\[29a.2\]]de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par bya'o/_/sbyin pa zil gyis mnan te/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni gal te/_byang chub sems dpa' snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/_sems can gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/_zan zos pa'i 'og tu 
[\[29a.3\]]sems can de dag la gser gyi dong tse dang /_ras bcos bu zung dang /_gser thags can gyi ras byin la/_de bzhin du nyi ma gung dang /_phye ma red dang /_de bzhin du mtshan mo nam gyi cha stod dang /_de bzhin du nam gyi gung dang /_de bzhin du nam gyi cha smad kyi thun la/_sems can 
[\[29a.4\]]gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la zan byin la/_de bzhin du sbyin pa yang byin te/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gnas shing /_de bzhin du yongs su gtong yang ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bar bya ba mi shes na/_de ni sbyin pa yin gyi/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[29a.5\]]ma yin no/_/ji ste yongs su bsngo ba shes na/_byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/de ni byang chub sems dpa'i thad na mang du yongs su gtong ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de chos tshad med pa'i chos thob par 'dod cing /_byang chub 
[\[29a.6\]]sems dpa'i chos kyang thob par 'dod na/_tshad dang ldan pa'i yongs su gtong bas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus pa'i phyir ro/_/gal te sbyin pa de tshad nges par gyur na/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin gyi/_gang gi phyir sbyin pa de tshad nges pa ma yin pa de'i phyir/_sbyin 
[\[29a.7\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos tshad nges pa ma yin pa'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas phyis kyang yongs su gtang bar bya'o zhes de ltar yongs su gtang bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs 
[\[29b\]]
[\[29b.1\]]des na/_ser sna tshar gcod cing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su 'dzin to/_/de yang 'di ltar bdag gis sbyin pa dpag tu med pa sbyin par bya ste/_gang gi tshe bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur gyi bar du sbyin par bya'o/_/
[\[29b.2\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o/_/da ltar ni ji srid du byang chub tu spyod pa'i bar du zang zing gis phan gdags par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[29b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na ni/_zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/_sems can rnams la phan gdags par bya'o snyam du sems skyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi zhig rgyal po la sten te/_de rgyal po la sten cing 'khor la bsnyen bkur 
[\[29b.4\]]byas pas/_rgyal po des de la zan sbyin zhing /_des zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs te/_des bsten cing bskor te/_bsnyen bkur byas pas rgyal po mnyes shing dgyes par gyur nas/_rin po che brgya stong du ma bskon pa de bzhin du/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpa' bla na 
[\[29b.5\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang /_byang chub tu spyod pa na/_sems can dpag tu med pa la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_
[\[29b.6\]]zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas/_sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/_sems can dpag tu med pa dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnams las grol bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_rgyal po'i bu zhig yod la/_mi mang po gang dag gis rgyal po'i bu 
[\[29b.7\]]de la sten cing bskor te/_bsnyen bkur byed na/_rgyal po'i bu des bsten pa'i mi de dag thams cad la kha zas g.yos pas phan 'dogs par byed de/_ji tsam na rgyal po'i bu de rgyal srid la gnas pa'i dus la bab ste/_rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur zhing /_rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob 
[\[30a\]]
[\[30a.1\]]pa'i tshe/_de'i mi zhabs 'bring rnying du gyur pa gang yin pa de dag la/_'di dag ni bdag gzhon nu'i sa la gnas pa na/_bdag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin/_bdag kyang 'di dag gis sbyangs shing bdag gir byas pa yin gyis/_bdag gis mi 'di dag longs 
[\[30a.2\]]spyod la ci rigs par dgod do snyam ste/_des bdag gis 'khor rnams kha cig ni grong khyer dag tu sna bor bcug_/kha cig ni las kyi sna dag tu/_kha cig ni tshong 'dus dag tu/_kha cig ni 'or gyi grong dag tu bskos/_kha cig la ni grong dam pa longs spyod du byin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[30a.3\]]gang po de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang /_byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na sems can dpag tu med pa dag la phan 'dogs te/_zang zing gi sbyin pa gos dang /_zas 
[\[30a.4\]]dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_nad gsos dang /_sman zong dag gis phan 'dogs te/_ji ltar rgyal po gzhon nu des 'khor de dag kha zas g.yos pa dang /_bza' ba dang /_bca' ba ci 'byor pa dag gis phan 'dogs pa de bzhin du/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems 
[\[30a.5\]]dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas kyang /_sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing /_gang gi tshe de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur te/_bdud rtsi'i dbang bskur ba thob pa na/_blo ji lta 
[\[30a.6\]]ba dang /_shes rab ji lta ba bzhin du zang zing med pa'i chos kyi sbyin pas 'doms shing rjes su ston to/_/zang zing med pa'i chos kyis 'doms shing rjes su ston pa na/_kha cig ni dgra bcom pa nyid la 'god/_kha cig ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la kha cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras 
[\[30a.7\]]bu la/_kha cig ni rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la/_kha cig ni bzod pa'i sa la 'god/_kha cig ni mthong ba'i sa la/_kha cig ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji ltar rgyal po'i bu de gang gi tshe/_rgyal srid kyi dbang bskur ba thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/_
[\[30b\]]
[\[30b.1\]]sten pa'i mi de dag ci rigs par longs spyod la 'god pa de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_sems can rnams ji ltar mos pa bzhin du 'god par byed de de ltar byang chub 
[\[30b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na/_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'god par byed do/_/de 
[\[30b.3\]]ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin zhing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur la/_
[\[30b.4\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi zhig rgyal po la sten te/_bsnyen bkur byed na/_de'i tshe rgyal po des zas dang gos kyi bgo skal byin nas/_gang gi tshe mi des rgyal po de la shas cher bsten pa 
[\[30b.5\]]de'i tshe/_rgyal po de mnyes shing dgyes par gyur te/_de thugs rangs par gyur nas/_gos dang rgyan brgya stong du ma bskon te/_longs spyod kyis rgyas par byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po/_de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[30b.6\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/_sems can dpag tu med pa rnams la sbyin pas phan 'dogs par byed cing /_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang /_zang zing med pa'i 
[\[30b.7\]]chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams la 'doms shing rjes su ston te/_'khor ba las sgrol bar byed do/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji ltar bshad pa de 
[\[31a\]]
[\[31a.1\]]de bzhin te/_tshe dang ldan pa dper na/_mi gang dag gser gyi 'byung khung de'i nyen kor na gnas pa'i sems can rnams ni/_gser gyi 'byung khung des nams kyang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur te/_gang gi tshe gsar du brkos shing phyung nas ring por ma lon pa de'i 
[\[31a.2\]]tshe yang /_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe shin tu dri ma med par byas shing shin tu sbyangs nas snying por byas te phyung ba de'i tshe yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/gang gi tshe 'byung khung de nas bton nas bzhus te/_de nas sum cha'am/_
[\[31a.3\]]bzhi cha gser du gyur pa de'i tshe yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang /_nams kyang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba ma yin par mi 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na 
[\[31a.4\]]yang nye bar 'tsho ba yin/_byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par 'dod pa na yang /_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na yang /_sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba 
[\[31a.5\]]yin/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang sems can rnams kyi nye bar 'tsho ba yin te/_rgyu 'di dag ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med do/_/rgyu des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mchog ces bya/_gtso bo dang /_phul dang /_rab dang /_
[\[31a.6\]]rab mchog dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla na med pa dang /_gong na med pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa dang /_theg pa 
[\[31a.7\]]chen po la zhugs pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa rdzogs pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gnas brtan sha ra dwa ti'i bus ji skad bshad pa bzhin du zung shig_/chongs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[31b\]]
[\[31b.1\]]de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[31b.2\]]gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u dgu pa ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rdzogs so//_//bam po gsum pa/_'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na/_rgyal bu rgyal 
[\[31b.3\]]byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu 
[\[31b.4\]]rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son 
[\[31b.5\]]pa sha stag dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_gzhan yang gzi brjid che ba'i/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 
[\[31b.6\]]'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas/_bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid las brtsams nas 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[31b.7\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te/_khyod spobs par gyis shig_/
[\[32a\]]
[\[32a.1\]]de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das las skabs phye ba thob nas/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang 
[\[32a.2\]]pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya/_ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod yul ni 
[\[32a.3\]]gang yin/_spyod yul ma yin pa ni gang yin/_de skad ces smras pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la gal te byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i 
[\[32a.4\]]yid la byed pa rnams kyi gnas na/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'o/_/de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya ste/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[32a.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa'o/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin na/_byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa'i dam bcas pa spong na/_tshul khrims 'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang 
[\[32a.6\]]ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/_spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod do/_/spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod na/_de tsam gyis na tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya'o/_/gal 
[\[32a.7\]]te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la longs spyod pa tsam gyis ni/_de tshul khrims 'chal par rig par bya ba ma yin gyi/_gang sbyin pa sbyin zhing nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/_de tsam gyis na tshul khrims 
[\[32b\]]
[\[32b.1\]]'chal pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_rgyal po'i bu rgyal pos gdams pa'i tshig bzhin du byed pa zhig yod la/_rgyal rigs rnams kyi rgyal po'i bus bslab par bya ba bzo'i gnas/_'di ltar glang po che'i gnya' bar bzhon pa'am/_rta 
[\[32b.2\]]bzhon pa'am/_shing rta bzhon pa'am/_ral gri'i thabs sam/_'phong ngam/_mda' bo che 'phang ba'i thabs sam/_brgyug pa'am/_'gom pa'am/_'chong ba'am/_stobs 'gyed pa'am/_dgra thabs sam/_de la sogs pa'i bzo de dag la slob na/_rgyal 
[\[32b.3\]]po la dben pa yin te/_rgyal po yang sma dbab par mi sems so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams kyis rtse zhing dga' la/_dga' dgur spyod du zin kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' de ni thams cad mkhyen 
[\[32b.4\]]pa nyid la phan 'dogs pa nyid du gyur pa yin no/_/gal te yang sbyin pa sbyin pa na nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/_de tsam gyis na spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa yin te/_bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi zhing du mi rung bar byed do/_/ji lta ji ltar 
[\[32b.5\]]bdag nyid zhing du mi rung bar byed pa de lta de ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin to/_/ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ring du byed de/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod 
[\[32b.6\]]pa yin no/_/de'i spyod yul ma yin pa gang yin pa de nyid ni/_de'i tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gal te khyim gyi gnas nas byung bar gyur te/_de yang tshul khrims gang dang gang yang dag par bzung nas gnas pa de yang thams 
[\[32b.7\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi sngo na/_byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa ma yin no/_/gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims dang mi ldan pa de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' khyim na gnas shing /_
[\[33a\]]
[\[33a.1\]]gsum la skyabs su song bar gyur la/_de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_de 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan rnams la longs spyod du zin kyang /_de tsam gyis na de byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub 
[\[33a.2\]]sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la gnas pa de ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba yin no/_/gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod pa dang 
[\[33a.3\]]ldan pa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 'byung du zin kyang /_de dag thams cad de'i thams cad mkhyen pa yid la byed pa'i sems gcig gis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni/_mching bu'i nor bu 'bum dag dang 
[\[33a.4\]]lhan cig tu bsres te bzhag na/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i rin thang med pa dang /_kha dog bzang po dang 'od kyis mching bu'i nor bu de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa de dag thams cad kyang /_
[\[33a.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa'i sems gcig bskyed pas zil gyis gnon par rig par bya ste/_ji ltar mching bu'i nor bu de dag nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya gcig gis zil gyis non cing lam mer ma gyur pa bzhin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal 
[\[33a.6\]]te byang chub sems dpa' mtshan rnams 'dod cing sbyin pa sbyin na/_spyod yul ma yin pa la spyod pa'o/_/gang de'i spyod yul ma yin pa thams cad ni 'chal pa'i tshul khrims yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub sems dpas mtshan rnams 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par 
[\[33a.7\]]mi bya'i/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod pa de la ni mtshan rnams yod do/_/de la ni mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/_/de la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad rnams yod pa nas sangs 
[\[33b\]]
[\[33b.1\]]rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi bar du yod de/_de ltar na de'i sbyin pa ni mchog tu bzung ba ma yin no/_/gang gi tshe mchog tu ma bzung ba de'i tshe/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin to/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang thams cad mkhyen 
[\[33b.2\]]pa nyid 'dod pas sbyin pa sbyin par byed na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin nam/_gang dang gang la mchog tu 'dzin pa de nyid de'i tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'di ni yul 
[\[33b.3\]]na gnas pa'am/_phyogs na gnas pa ma yin no/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni/_gzugs sam/_tshor ba'am/_'du shes sam/_'du byed rnams sam/_rnam par shes pa yang ma yin no/_/'du byas kyang ma yin/_'du ma byas pa yang ma yin/_tshad yod pa yang ma yin te/_
[\[33b.4\]]de ni mchog tu bzung bar mi nus so/_/chos gang yang dmigs su med de/_gang dmigs su med pa de ni yod pa'ang ma yin/_med pa'ang ma yin te/_gang yod pa'ang ma yin/_med pa'ang ma yin pa ni mchog tu gzung bar mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na/_byang 
[\[33b.5\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin nam/_tshul khrims srung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_tshul khrims dang /_brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/gal te yang tshul khrims de nyan thos kyi sa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 
[\[33b.6\]]yongs su sngo na/_tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa yin te/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams pa yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar nyams pa phyir bslang bar nus sam/_smras pa/_gal te yang 
[\[33b.7\]]dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du ma byas la gal te bden pa rnams ma mthong na phyir yang bslang bar nus so/_/yang smras pa/_'di la tshe dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_yang dag 
[\[34a\]]
[\[34a.1\]]pa'i mtha' mngon sum du mi bya'o/_/smras pa/_ci'i phyir/_smras pa/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'gyur du 'ong ba'i phyir te/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems bskyed pa'i skal ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/
[\[34a.2\]]gal te de chos nub par gyur pa'i tshe byung na ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par rang byang chub mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po rgyu 'dis kyang byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug par ma gyur gyi bar du yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du byar ma gnang ngo /_/tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[34a.3\]]gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/_tshul khrims de sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir mngon par mi sgrub na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po 
[\[34a.4\]]gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems can tshad yod pa rnams kyi ched du sbyin pa sbyin nam/_tshul khrims srung na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshad yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_
[\[34a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang yin smras pa/_sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims srung ba de thams cad/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo bar byed na/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims so/_/gal 
[\[34a.6\]]te yang byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du/_tshul khrims bsgom pa'i phyir spyod la/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su mi sngo na/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin no/_/gal te nyan thos nyid dam/_rang sangs rgyas nyid 
[\[34a.7\]]du yang yongs su mi sngo na/_de ltar na yang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma yin te/_des tshul khrims 'chal par yang mi brtsi'o/_/gal te nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo na/_de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya'o/_/
[\[34b\]]
[\[34b.1\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul gang yin smras pa/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa rnams 
[\[34b.2\]]te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod yul lo/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du khyim na gnas te/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la sten cing longs spyod la/_nyan thos kyi sa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang 
[\[34b.3\]]sems mi skyed na/_de tsam gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes mi brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ltar 'dis 'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa ma dkrugs pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi la la zhig nyes pa 
[\[34b.4\]]med par btson rar bcug ste/_de btson ra der lo mang po lo brgya phrag mang po/_lo 'bum phrag mang por btson rar bcug la/_de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugs par ma gyur/_des rkun po'i sems kyang ma bskyed du zin kyang /_de btson rar bcug na/_de tsam gyis ni de rkun 
[\[34b.5\]]po zhes brjod pa ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de yang khyim na gnas shing /_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la yongs su longs spyod pa des/_tshul khrims 'chal pa zhes bya bar mi brjod do/_/gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du tshangs par 
[\[34b.6\]]spyad pa spyod la/_de yang nyan thos kyi sa'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su sngo zhing /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yang 'khrugs na de tsam gyis na de tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes mi bya'o/_/gang gi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyan thos kyi tshul khrims la gnas 
[\[34b.7\]]na de byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi brjod do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'gal ba'i phyir ro/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u dang po'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 'di ltar bskal 
[\[35a\]]
[\[35a.1\]]pa mtha' yas par mtshams sbyar zhing 'khor bar byas la/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed de/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[35a.2\]]so/_/tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gal te 'di ltar bskal pa 'di snyed kyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par bya'o zhes tshad nges par byed par gyur na/_'di la nyes pa ci yod/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor bas skrag cing [{]rings te[,]ring ste[}]/_de rings pas 
[\[35a.3\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par yang tshad yod pa nyid du gyur te/_de ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa gnyis su 'gyur bar shes par bya ste/_tshad yod pas ni sems can tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar mi nus so/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu 
[\[35a.4\]]phyin pa ni tshad med grangs med pas na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob pa ma gtogs par yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba med do/_/gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod kyang da dung sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mi 
[\[35a.5\]]'gyur te/_mtha' yas pa'i phyir na/_de'i tshe thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor 
[\[35a.6\]]zhing /_'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par yongs su bsgoms par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_snod sar pa sman gyi khu ba'i chus bkang ste bzhag na/_ji lta ji ltar bzhag pa de lta de ltar shin tu bsgos pa dang /_shin tu sra bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang 
[\[35a.7\]]ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing /_'khor ba de lta de ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa legs par bsgoms shing ches brtan par 'gyur ba dang /_ljid bzod par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na 
[\[35b\]]
[\[35b.1\]]bum pa sar pa'i nang du mar ram til mar bzhag na/_de ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring du bzhag pa de lta de ltar bum pa de snum dang ldan par 'gyur te/_bum pa de snum gyis khyab par ma gyur pa cung zad kyang med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang 
[\[35b.2\]]ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor zhing /_'khor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /_'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /_'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos 
[\[35b.3\]]so/_/ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo/_/ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa de lta de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gang dang gang skyed pa de 
[\[35b.4\]]thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa skyed de/_sems gzhan dag skye ba'i go skabs mi 'byed do/_/gang gi tshe sems gzhan skye ba'i go skabs mi rnyed pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po rnams kyis sems kyi rgyud yongs su 
[\[35b.5\]]bsgos pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mar gyi bum pa ni gang dang gang nas bzung yang /_de dang de mar gyi dri dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems gang dang gang skye ba de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 
[\[35b.6\]]ldan pa nyid skye bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la ni bdud sdig can gyis glags btsal kyang glags mi rnyed de/_de ni dmigs pa gang las glags 'tshol ba'i dmigs pa de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgom par byed pa'i phyir te/_de bzhin du bdud kyi 
[\[35b.7\]]ris rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji lta ji ltar shin tu yun ring por mtshams sbyor ba de lta de ltar sangs rgyas rnams dang /_'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar sangs 
[\[36a\]]
[\[36a.1\]]rgyas rnams dang /_'phags pa nyan thos rnams dang phrad pa 'thob pa de lta de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thos pa de lta de ltar de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed cing sgom mo/_/ji lta ji ltar nan tan byed cing sgom pa de lta de ltar thams 
[\[36a.2\]]cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa na/_thog ma kho nar sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung ba'i tshul khrims dang ldan par gyur la/_de nas de'i 'og tu pha rol 
[\[36a.3\]]tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug go/_/de ltar yang dag par 'dzin du bcug nas sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa gang yin pa de/_byang chub sems dpas zil 
[\[36a.4\]]gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/gal te nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rab tu 'doms la/_btams pa'i sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang 
[\[36a.5\]]zag gang de la 'doms pa de/_byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi la la gser gyi mi khyer te 'gro na khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid gser gyi 
[\[36a.6\]]mis kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms na/_nyan thos de dag thams cad byang chub sems dpas zil gyis non 
[\[36a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di lta ste/_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi zhig gis shel gyi mi pang par thogs te 'gro na/_khyer ba gang yin pa de nyid shel gyi mis/_kha dog dang /_dbyibs dang /_
[\[36b\]]
[\[36b.1\]]'od kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gang dag yin pa de dag gi bye ma snyed kyi nyan thos yod par gyur la/_de dag byang chub sems dpa' 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes 
[\[36b.2\]]su ston na/_de dag thams cad des tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar de dag 'doms pa de lta de ltar nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dug 
[\[36b.3\]]ste/_nyan thos de dag byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/_de tsam du byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'bogs la/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/_nyan thos rnams ni zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang 
[\[36b.4\]]ldan pa gang po dper na/_gser ni ji lta ji ltar bzhu zhing bskol ba de lta de ltar ches 'od gsal zhing /_ches kha dog bzang por 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms 
[\[36b.5\]]shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/_
[\[36b.6\]]nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni ji lta ji ltar nor bu'i byi dor mkhan 'chang ba de lta de ltar ches 'od gsal ba dang /_shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag 
[\[36b.7\]]gis/_ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 
[\[37a\]]
[\[37a.1\]]'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir nyan thos rnams zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_ri mo mkhan nam/_ri mo mkhan gyi slob ma shin tu lobs pas kha dog sna lnga'i tshon gyis ji lta 
[\[37a.2\]]ji ltar kha dog dang /_dbyibs su gzugs 'dri zhing tshon bkye ste/_rdzogs par byed cing sha tshon byed pa de lta de ltar yid du 'ong zhing chags par byed par 'gyur te/_gang gis gzugs rnams bris pa de nyid kha dog dang /_dbyibs kyis zil gyis non par 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de 
[\[37a.3\]]bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos 
[\[37a.4\]]rnams zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byed de/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas/_de dag thams cad zil gyis gnon to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyin gcig bzhin du rnam par 'phel lo/_/
[\[37a.5\]]de dag ni tshul khrims de tsam nyi tshe dang ldan pa yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi zhig gis shing bskyed la shing bskyed nas dus dus su byi dor byed cing chus bran na ji lta ji ltar byi dor byed cing chus bran pa de lta de ltar chu zheng dang 'phang du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de 
[\[37a.6\]]bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/_ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul 
[\[37a.7\]]khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel lo/_/ji lta ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par 'phel ba de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpas 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas nyan thos thams cad 
[\[37b\]]
[\[37b.1\]]zil gyis gnon cing snang bar byas nas/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo bas gang dag de la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de dag kyang zil gyis gnon to/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang 
[\[37b.2\]]po dper na/_mi la la me chung ngu'i nang du rtswa dang /_shing dang /_lci ba rnams 'jug na/_de ji lta ji ltar 'jug pa de lta de ltar de'i rgyu las me de mched par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ji ltar me de mched pa de lta de ltar me'i phung po de shin tu che bar 'gyur te/_des dpag tshad mang po/_dpag tshad 
[\[37b.3\]]brgya phrag mang po dang /_dpag tshad stong phrag mang po rnams sreg cing snang bar byed do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du gal te nyan thos dpag tu med pas/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston na/_ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med 
[\[37b.4\]]pas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar/_'di lta ste/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i snang ba dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/ji lta 
[\[37b.5\]]ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la snang ba dpag tu med pa de lta de ltar/_byang chub sems dpa' la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas 'doms pa'i nyan thos gzhan gang yin pa dag gis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir 
[\[37b.6\]]ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na/_mi zhig gis gser gyi 'byung khung nas gser blangs te/_des gser de blangs nas bdag nyid kyang btsongs la/_gser de yang btsongs na/_des gser de btsongs pa'i rin ni ches che ba yin gyi/_gang gis gser blangs pa'i mi de'i ni 
[\[37b.7\]]ma yin no/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ji lta ji ltar nyan thos dpag tu med pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms shing rjes su ston pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dpag tu med cing ches rin thang med 
[\[38a\]]
[\[38a.1\]]par 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de la nyan thos de dag gis tshul khrims kyis kyang zil gyis non par mi 'gyur la/_byang chub sems dpas ni nyan thos de dag tshul khrims kyis zil gyis gnon par 'gyur te/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[38a.2\]]yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag 'doms shing rjes su ston pa gang yin pa de nyid/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos zil gyis gnon pa ni byang chub sems 
[\[38a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin te/_'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu/_tshe dang ldan pa gang pos bshad pa la mngon par rjes su yi rang 
[\[38a.4\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa de de bzhin te/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rgya chen po dang ldan pa yin no zhes smras so/_/tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las le'u gnyis pa'o//_//tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus gzhan yang tshe dang ldan 
[\[38a.5\]]pa byams ma'i bu gang po la smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/_gal te byed pa po'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/_de byang chub sems dpa'i chos la gnas par rig 
[\[38a.6\]]par bya ba ma yin te/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos spong zhing tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pas spyod do/_/de'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa gang yin pa de ni/_de'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[38a.7\]]gang byed pa po'i chos 'ga' yang /_yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing /_de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par blangs nas 'dug na/_chos gang la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod par 'gyur/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 
[\[38b\]]
[\[38b.1\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/_chos gang la yang phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod par byed pa ma yin no/_/gal te chos 'ga' zhig la phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod pa byed par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims mchog tu 'dzin pa 
[\[38b.2\]]yin par rig par bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di chos 'ga' la phan 'dogs pa'am/_gnod par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yang dag par rjes su mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[38b.3\]]'dzin pa ma yin no/_/byed pa po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste/_tshul khrims de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang 
[\[38b.4\]]po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa gang dang gang yongs su btang nas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims gang 
[\[38b.5\]]dang gang srung ba de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' pha rol gyis spyos sam/_brgyad bkag kyang rung ste/_bzod par byed 
[\[38b.6\]]cing /_bzod pa de yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gzhan dag dang /_gang zag gzhan rnams kyi ched du rtsol bar byed la/_
[\[38b.7\]]brtson 'grus de'ang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa zhes bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gang dang gang skyed pa de bzhin du/_bsam gtan 'di dag bskyed nas/_rdzu 'phrul 
[\[39a\]]
[\[39a.1\]]mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/rdzu 'phrul des kyang sems can rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 'jug cing shes par bya'o/_/de nas snod du gyur par bya'o snyam ste/_sems kyi khyad par de dag thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_byang chub 
[\[39a.2\]]sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' shes rab gang dang gang la spyod cing /_phung po la mkhas pa'am/_khams la mkhas pa'am/_skye mched la mkhas pa'am/_rten cing 'brel par 'byung 
[\[39a.3\]]ba la mkhas pa'am/_gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhas pa'am/_mnyam pa nyid du 'du shes nas 'du shes thams cad spang ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam ste/_sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo na/_byang chub sems 
[\[39a.4\]]dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/bla na med pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan par rig par bya'o/_/gal te byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa drug thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de la ni nyan thos gang gis kyang tshul khrims 
[\[39a.5\]]kyis zil gyis gnon nus pa gang yang med do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed 
[\[39a.6\]]pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni/_theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang 
[\[39a.7\]]chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad byams pa la gnas par gyur/_snying rje dang /_dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms 
[\[39b\]]
[\[39b.1\]]la gnas par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de yang theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang 
[\[39b.2\]]gal te sems can thams cad stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang 
[\[39b.3\]]nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims 
[\[39b.4\]]kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad smon pa med pa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa dang ldan par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang 
[\[39b.5\]]chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te sems can thams cad brgyad par gyur na/_de dag gi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po 
[\[39b.6\]]zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/gal te tshe dang ldan pa sha ra 
[\[39b.7\]]dwa ti'i bus bdag gi dri ba dris pa lan gdab pa'i skabs phye na/_tshe dang ldan pa la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig 'dri'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po dris shig dang thos pa'i don brda sprad par bya'o/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji gzugs brgyad pa yin par 'dod 
[\[40a\]]
[\[40a.1\]]dam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa brgyad pa yin par 'dod dam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_de las gzhan pa'i chos rnams 
[\[40a.2\]]la brgyad par 'dod dam/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'o na brgyad pa de gang yin par 'dod/_bdag gis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus bshad pa'i don de ji lta bur shes par bya/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos 
[\[40a.3\]]'di rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid sems can thams cad kyis mi shes pa de la shes pa gang gis mnyam pa nyid de mngon sum du byed pa'i shes pa de ni bya ba byas pa'i phyir thob pa yin te/_de la brgyad pa ni yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo /_/gal te gnas 'di rnyed na ni mnyam pa nyid shes pa 'di 
[\[40a.4\]]la brtag cing brgal ba med do/_/smras pa/_'di skad du brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du'ang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes kyang zer na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la snga ma dang phyi ma 
[\[40a.5\]]dang /_phyi ma dang snga ma ji ltar 'thun par 'gyur/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba de ni ji ltar las dang po pa la bshad pa de 
[\[40a.6\]]ltar bstan to/_/ci nas sems can rnams 'jug par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to/_/ci nas skye bo mang pos go bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to/_/ci nas theg pa chen po dang /_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'bar bar 'gyur ba de ltar bstan to/_/brgyad pa'i tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni 
[\[40a.7\]]theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang rgyun du zhugs pa thams cad dang /_/lan cig phyir 'ong ba thams cad dang /_phyir 
[\[40b\]]
[\[40b.1\]]mi 'ong ba thams cad dang /_dgra bcom pa thams cad dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims gang yin pa de ni theg pa la dang po zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang po bskyed pa'i tshul khrims kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar 
[\[40b.2\]]mi 'gro'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang nyan thos gang byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par sems pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par 'dod par zad de/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang rtsod par sems su zad do/_/
[\[40b.3\]]tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na gang rgyal po'i bu dang rtsod par sems pa de ni/_rgyal po dang rtsod par sems par zad do/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis mnan par sems pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis 
[\[40b.4\]]mnan par sems par zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni thub par dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po dper na mi la la zhig rkang lag med par gyur la 'di skad du/_bdag 'di nas rgya mtsho chen po'i pha rol 
[\[40b.5\]]gyi 'gram du mchong bar bya'o zhes zer na/_de skad zer ba de la mi de ni mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis nga rgyal byed de bla bar rig par bya'o/_/tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du nyan thos sam/_rang sangs rgyas gang 'di skad du/_bdag gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis 
[\[40b.6\]]gnan par bya'o zhes zer na/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di ltar de ni bla bar rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgya mtsho dug can pa dang 'dra ba yin pa'i phyir ro/_/ji ltar mi de rkang lag rnams med bzhin du rgya mtsho la mchong 
[\[40b.7\]]bar 'dod pa de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams med bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims zil gyis non par 'gyur ba de ni gnas med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[41a\]]
[\[41a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams ni tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po sems can 
[\[41a.2\]]tshul khrims 'chal pa dpag tu med pa dag 'chal pa'i tshul khrims las yongs su dgrol bar 'dod pa dang /_tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas[,]bla dwags[}]/_smras 
[\[41a.3\]]pa/_'di lta ste/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang /_nga yir 'dzin pa dang /_dmigs pa'i 'du shes dang /_sems can du 'du shes pa dang /_srog tu 'du shes pa dang /_gang zag tu 'du shes pa dang /_yod par 'du shes pa dang /_med par 'du shes pa'i 
[\[41a.4\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]te/_nyon mongs pa de dag dang gzhan rnams yod na 'chal pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ba rab tu phye'o/_/de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dpag tu med pa rnams tshul khrims la dgod par 'dod cing theg pa 'di la zhugs te/_tshul khrims 
[\[41a.5\]]dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa de ni nyan thos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis zil gyis mnan par sla ba ma yin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di lta ste/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir ming tsam gyis kyang nyan thos 
[\[41a.6\]]rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams zil gyis gnon to/_/smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu zag pa dang bcas pa'i tshul khrims kyis zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims ji ltar zil gyis gnon par 'gyur/_smras pa/_tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'di la zag pa med pa'i tshul 
[\[41a.7\]]khrims ni bdag nyid la phan pa'i phyir bskyed pa yin la/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims ni sems can dpag tu med pa rnams kyi ched du yongs su bsngos pa yin te/_de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyis zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims zil gyis gnon to/_/tshe 
[\[41b\]]
[\[41b.1\]]dang ldan pa gang po gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims tshad nges pa zhig sgrub tu zin na ni/_zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims kyang zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la/_de'i tshul khrims kyang pha rol tu phyin par mi 'gyur ba zhig na/_gang gi phyir sems can dpag tu
