[\[81b.3\]]bdag la yang srog 'di sdug cing phangs la dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin gyis su yang bdag la gsod pa 'am/_gsod du 'jug pa'am/_bsad pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig bdag gis kyang su la yang bsad par mi bya/_gsod du gzhug par mi bya/_gsod pa la 
[\[81b.4\]]rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog gcod pa spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mngal na gnas pa yan chad kyang /_/kun la srog ni sdug pa'i phyir/_/bdag gi srog phangs gang 
[\[81b.5\]]yin pa/_/de ni srog chags gsod mi byed/_/de la ma byin par len pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_nor zhes bya ba ni tha na rigs ngan dang /_g.yung po yan chad la yang sdug cing phangs la dga' zhing yid du 
[\[81b.6\]]'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang nor 'di sdug cing phangs la dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin gyis su yang bdag la 'phrog pa'am/_'phrog tu 'jug pa'am/_phrogs pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang dbrog par mi bya/_'phrog tu gzhug par mi 
[\[81b.7\]]bya/_phrogs pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma byin par len pa spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_shing dang bong ba yan chad la/_/gzhan gyi bor bar gyur pa yang /_/gang la pha yi nor 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]sdug pa/_/de ni nor la 'phrog mi byed/_/de la 'dod pas log par g.yem pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_chung ma zhes bya ba ni tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa rnams la yang /_
[\[82a.2\]]sdug cing phangs la dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang chung ma 'di sdug cing phangs la dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la 'phrog pa'am/_'phrog tu 'jug pa'am/_phrogs pa la rjes su yi rang ba'am/_nan gyis mnan te/_dga' 
[\[82a.3\]]dgur yongs su longs spyad par ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang dbrog par mi bya/_'phrog tu gzhug par mi bya/_phrogs pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya/_nan gyis mnan te/_dga' dgur longs spyad par mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[82a.4\]]sems dpa' chen po 'dod pa la log par g.yem pa spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bran mor gyur pa yan chad kyang /_/gzhan gyi bzhag par gyur pa la/_/gang la rang gi chung ma sdug_/de ni chung ma 'phrog mi byed/_/de la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa ji lta bu yin 
[\[82a.5\]]zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_bden pa zhes bya ba de ni tha na gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za rnams la yang sdug cing phangs la dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang bden pa 'di sdug cing phangs la/_dga' 
[\[82a.6\]]zhing yid du 'ong ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas sun 'byin pa'am/_sun 'byin du 'jug pa'am/_sun phyung ba la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bas sun dbyung bar mi bya/_sun 'byin du gzhug par mi bya/_sun 
[\[82a.7\]]phyung ba la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gnod sbyin 'byung po yan chad kyang /_/gang la bden par smra ba sdug_/shes rab can de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]tshig gis/_/
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]lus can rnams la sun mi 'byin/_/de la phra ma'i tshig spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_phra ma'i tshig ces bya ba ni/_tha na gang zag phra ma can rnams la yang yid mi sdug cing mi 'dod la/_mi dga' zhing yid 
[\[82b.2\]]du mi 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang phra ma'i tshig 'di mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la phra ma zer bas gleng ba'am/_gleng du 'jug pa'am/_glengs pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang phra ma 
[\[82b.3\]]zer bas gleng bar mi bya/_gleng du gzhug par mi bya/_glengs pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phra ma'i tshig spangs pa yin no/_/de la ngag rtsub po smra ba spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[82b.4\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_ngag rtsub po zhes bya ba ni tha na gang zag ngag rtsub po dang ldan pa rnams la yang mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang ngag rtsub po 'di mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin 
[\[82b.5\]]gyis/_su yang bdag la ngag rtsub po smra ba dang /_gtum pa'i tshig dang /_brlang ba'i tshig dang /_mi bden pa'i tshig gis tho 'tsham pa'am/_tho 'tsham du 'jug pa'am/_tho 'tshams pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang ngag rtsub po smra ba 
[\[82b.6\]]dang /_gtum pa'i tshig dang /_brlang ba'i tshig dang /_mi bden pa'i tshig gis tho btsam par mi bya/_tho btsam du gzhug par mi bya/_tho btsams pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ngag rtsub po 
[\[82b.7\]]spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gang dag su yang rung ba la/_/phra ma ngag rtsub mi sdug pa/_/de ni phra ma mi zer te/_/rtsub pa'i tshig kyang srung bar byed/_/de la tshig kyal pa spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]dpa' chen po de 'di snyam du sems te/_tshig kyal pa zhes bya ba ni tha na gang zag tshig kyal pa can dag la yang mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang tshig kyal pa 'di mi sdug cing mi 'dod la/_mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong 
[\[83a.2\]]ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la tshig kyal pa smras pas dran par byed pa'am/_dran par byed du 'jug pa'am/_dran par byas pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang tshig kyal pa smra bas dran par mi bya/_dran par byed du mi gzhug_/dran par byas pa 
[\[83a.3\]]la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig kyal pa spangs pa yin no/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brnab sems spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[83a.4\]]'di snyam du sems te/_brnab sems zhes bya ba ni tha na gang zag brnab sems can rnams la yang mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang brnab sems 'di mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la brnab 
[\[83a.5\]]sems kyi tshig gis rjod pa'am/_rjod du 'jug pa'am/_brjod pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang brnab sems kyi tshig gis brjod par mi bya/_rjod du gzhug par mi bya/_brjod pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang 
[\[83a.6\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brnab sems spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_kyal pa'i tshig dang brnab sems gnyis/_/gang zhig bdag nyid mi 'dod pa/_/de ni kyal pa'i tshig mi smra/_/brnab sems kyang ni srung bar byed/_/de la gnod sems 
[\[83a.7\]]spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_gnod sems zhes bya ba ni tha na gang zag gnod sems su gyur pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams la yang /_mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]gnod sems 'di mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la gnod sems kyi tshig gis 'chad pa'am/_'chad du 'jug pa'am/_bshad pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang gnod sems kyi tshig gis bshad 
[\[83b.2\]]par mi bya/_'chad du gzhug par mi bya/_bshad pa la rjes su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gnod sems spangs pa yin no/_/de la log par lta ba spangs pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la 
[\[83b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_log par lta ba zhes bya ba ni tha na gang zag log par zhugs pa rnams la yang mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong ba yin te/_bdag la yang log par lta ba 'di mi sdug cing mi 'dod la mi dga' zhing yid du mi 'ong 
[\[83b.4\]]ba yin gyis/_su yang bdag la log par lta ba'i tshig gis ston pa'am/_ston du 'jug pa'am/_bstan pa la rjes su yi rang bar ma gyur cig_/bdag gis kyang su la yang log par lta ba'i tshig gis bstan par mi bya/_ston du gzhug par mi bya/_bstan pa la rjes 
[\[83b.5\]]su yi rang bar mi bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log par lta ba spangs pa yin no/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gnod sems log par lta ba gnyis/_/yong gis mi 'dod gang yin pa/_de ni gnod sems mi byed de/_/
[\[83b.6\]]gang la'ang log par mi 'jug go/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam 'di dag la mngon par brtson par byed do/_/dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na 
[\[83b.7\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyan dang /_spud pa dang /_lhab lhub bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo las le'u dang po'o//_//rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pas ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu la mngon par brtson par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 
[\[84a.2\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs dang /_smon lam dang /_stobs dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin 
[\[84a.3\]]pa bcu po de dag la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa sbyin par byed/_tshul khrims srung bar byed/_bzod pa sgom par byed/_brtson 'grus rtsom par byed/_bsam gtan la bsam gtan du byed/_
[\[84a.4\]]shes rab 'bar bar byed/_thabs la mkhas par byed/_smon lam 'debs par byed/_stobs la 'jug par byed/_ye shes la 'jug par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par 
[\[84a.5\]]byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas dang /_skom dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan sbyin pa la mngon par brtson par byed pa nas rkang sbyin pa'i bar dag la mngon par brtson par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems 
[\[84a.6\]]dpa' zas sbyin pa dag la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_zas sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni tshe dang /_kha dog dang /_stobs dang /_bde ba 'grub par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin no/_/de lta bas na 
[\[84a.7\]]bdag gis zas sbyin pa la mngon par brtson par bya dgos te/_bdag gis zas kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/des zas kyi sbyin pa de byin pas tshe byin pa dang /_bde ba byin par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]stsal to/_/kha zas sbyin pa byin na ni/_/des na tshe dang kha dog dang /_/stobs dang bde ba lnga pa spobs/_/shes rab can gyis byin pa yin/_/kha zas byin pas dga' ba dang /_/tshe ring stobs ldan bde skyid 'gyur/_/skyid cing brten pa de dag ni/_/thogs med 
[\[84b.2\]]spobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/phyug cing nor mang dpal dang ldan/_/mi ni des shing blo ldan la/_/bsod nams ldan zhing mkhas la zhi/_/kha zas byin pas de ltar 'gyur/_/de la skom sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang 
[\[84b.3\]]chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_skom sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni nyon mongs pa'i sred pa thams cad sel bar 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin te/_de lta bas na bdag gis skom gyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de skom gyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas 
[\[84b.4\]]kyis bsngags pa'i smon lam bzhin du skom gyi sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa sred pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad skems par byed par gyur cig_/rnam par grol ba'i ro'i skom gyis kyang tshim par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/'di 
[\[84b.5\]]la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_rga shi'i chu srin gyis dkrugs pa'i/_/nyon mongs sred pa'i mtsho skems nas/_/rnam grol ro yi skom gyis ni/_/mi rnams bdag gis tshim par bya/_/skom byin pas ni mkhas pa de/_/kun tu 'bar zhing rab 'bar ba'i/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]nyam ngar 
[\[84b.6\]]mi skye zhing /_/skom pa'i gnod pa 'byung mi 'gyur/_/de la bzhon pa'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_bzhon pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni bde ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhi thams cad spud 
[\[84b.7\]]pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis bzhon pa'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya ste/_bzhon pa shing rta'am/_bzhon pa khyogs sam/_bzhon pa rta'am/_bzhon pa glang po che'am/_lha ma sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de bzhon pa'i sbyin pa de dag sbyin pa na/_sangs 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i smon lam bzhin du bzhon pa'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi bde ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi gzhi thams cad sdud par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_bzhon pa shing rta byin pa yis/_/
[\[85a.2\]]rtag tu sems can thams cad kyis/_/theg pa chen po thob gyur cing /_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa thob par shog_/bzhon pa sbyin pas drang srong che/_/sangs rgyas zhing nas zhing dag tu/_/blo ldan bya yi shugs 'dra bar/_/rdzu 'phrul gyis ni mkha' la 'gro/_/de la gos sbyin pa 
[\[85a.3\]]la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_gos sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_mdog yongs su dag par byed pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis gos kyi 
[\[85a.4\]]sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de gos kyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i smon lam bzhin du gos kyi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi ngo tsha shes pa dang /_khrel yod pa dang /_mdog yongs su dag par byed par gyur cig ces 
[\[85a.5\]]smon lam 'debs so/_/'di la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_gos kyi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag_/sems can kun gyi ngo tsha shes/_/khrel yod pa ni sbyong ba dang /_/mdog kyang dag par byed gyur cig_/gos sbyin shin tu dpal dang ldan/_/rtag tu rigs ldan gzugs 
[\[85a.6\]]bzang zhing /_/mi de ngo tsha shes par 'gyur/_/mi ni grags ldan skal dang ldan/_/de la rgyan sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyan byin pa zhes bya ba de ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[85a.7\]]cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis rgyan gyi sbyin pa gser gyi rgyan nam/_nor bu'am/_mu tig gam/_bai dUr+ya'am/_dung ngam/_man shel lam/_byi ru'i rgyan sbyin pa sbyin par bya 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de rgyan gyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_rgyan gyi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po dag gis brgyan pa mthong bar gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/
[\[85b.2\]]de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_gser gyi rgyan ni byin pa yis/_/mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa yi/_/sems can thams cad mthong gyur cing /_/bdag kyang byang chub tshol bar shog_/nor bu mu tig byin pas ni/_/gang dang gang du de skye ba/_/skye gnas de dang de 
[\[85b.3\]]dag tu/_/rin chen char ni 'bab par 'gyur/_/de la mar me sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_mar me sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_
[\[85b.4\]]bdag gis mar me'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de mar me'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i smon lam bzhin du mar me sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi lha'i mig yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i don byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 
[\[85b.5\]]'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_kun mkhyen ye shes 'gyur ba yi/_/mar me sbyin pa des na bdag_/sems can kun gyi lha yi mig_/rnam par dag par byed gyur cig_/mi de mar me sbyin pa yis/_/'jig rten dag na dus kun tu/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[85b.6\]]kyi spyan lnga dang /_/rim gyis su ni ldan par 'gyur/_/de la rol mo'i sgra sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_rol mo'i sgra'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni lha'i rna ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig 
[\[85b.7\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis rol mo'i sgra'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de rol mo'i sgra'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_rol mo'i sgra'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi lha'i rna ba yongs su rdzogs par 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_rol mo'i sgra byin des na bdag_/sems can kun la lha rna dang /_/sangs rgyas byang chub 'gro phan pa/_/rab tu rdzogs par byed gyur cig_/rol mo sgra ni byin pas na/_/
[\[86a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/_/dpa' bo rnams kyi lha yi snyan/_/gang du skyes pa de yis 'thob/_/de la spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_
[\[86a.3\]]spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/
[\[86a.4\]]de spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis dgongs pa'i smon lam bzhin du spos dang /_phye ma dang /_byug pa'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag gis sems can thams cad tshul khrims dang /_thos pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi spos kyis byug 
[\[86a.5\]]par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_spos dang phye ma byin pa dang /_byug pa dag ni byin pa yis/_/tshul khrims thos dang ting nge 'dzin/_/lus can rnams kyis thob gyur cig_/spos dang phye ma byin pa dang /_/byug pa byin 
[\[86a.6\]]pas skyob rnams kyi/_/lha yi shangs dang lha yi sku/_/skyon med de yis 'thob par 'gyur/_/de la me tog sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_me tog dang /_me tog phreng gi sbyin 
[\[86a.7\]]pa zhes bya ba de ni gzungs dang /_spobs pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che'i me tog thob par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis me tog dang /_me tog phreng gi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de me tog dang /_me tog phreng gi sbyin pa de sbyin 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhin du me tog dang /_me tog phreng gi sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi lus gzungs dang /_spobs pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che'i me tog gis brgyan par byed par gyur cig ces 
[\[86b.2\]]smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_me tog me tog phreng byin pas/_/myur bar rnam pa thams cad du/_/byang chub yan lag me tog gis/_/lus can kun la brgyan par shog_/me tog me tog phreng byin pas/_/gang dang gang du skyes 
[\[86b.3\]]pa der/_/rgyal po blon po zhang blon gyis/_/rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byed/_/de la ro bro ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_ro bro ba sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ro bro ba'i mchog tu 
[\[86b.4\]]'gyur ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan du 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis ro bro ba'i sbyin pa rgun gyi ro'am/_bu ram shing gi ro'am/_sbrang rtsi'i ro'am/_mar gyi ro'am/_'bru mar gyi ro'am/_lan tshwa'i ro sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de 
[\[86b.5\]]ro bro ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_ro'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag gis sems can thams cad la ro bro ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ba'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/
[\[86b.6\]]de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_ro yi sbyin pas sems can kun/_/kun mkhyen ro yi snying po yis/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub kyi/_/spyod pa yongs su rdzogs gyur cig_/ro yi sbyin pas yid gzhungs shing /_/dran ldan blo gros rgya mtsho bzhin/_/des ni ro yi 
[\[86b.7\]]rnam grangs 'thob/_/lhun gyis grub par longs spyod ldan/_/de la gnas sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_gnas sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /_skyob 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]pa dang /_gling dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis gnas kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de gnas kyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis dmigs pa'i smon lam bzhin du gnas 
[\[87a.2\]]kyi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi gnas dang /_skyob pa dang /_gling dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gzhal med khang gnas sbyin pa yis/_/bdag ni 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu/_/
[\[87a.3\]]lus can rnams kyi skyob dang gling /_/skyabs dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog_/gzhal med khang gnas sbyin pa yis/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa na/_/khyim dang gnas dang yul 'khor gyi/_/bdag po dang ni gtso bor 'gyur/_/de la mal dang sngas sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon 
[\[87a.4\]]par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_mal dang sngas kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni sgrib pa thams cad gtan spong ba'i 'phags pa dang /_lha'i tshangs pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal dang /_'phangs sbyin pa'i 
[\[87a.5\]]tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis mal dang sngas kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de mal dang sngas kyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa'i smon lam bzhin du mal dang sngas kyi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad gtan spong 
[\[87a.6\]]ba'i 'phags pa dang /_lha'i tshangs pa'i gnas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal dang /_'phangs sbyin par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_mal dang sngas rnams byin pas bdag la ni/_/bsod nams tshogs ni cung zad ci yod 
[\[87a.7\]]pa/_/des na bdag gis skye bo'i sgrib pa dag_/sdig pa'i blo gros ngan pa 'joms par shog_/lus can rnams kyi lta ba ngan pa yi/_/dra ba shes rab mtshon gyis gcod par shog_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams la 'os pa yi/_/mal mchog tshangs gnas bsten pa sbyin 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]par shog_/mal dang sngas rnams sbyin par byed pa'i mi/_/bstan bcos dag la mkhas par skye bar 'gyur/_/zhi gnas 'thob cing rgya cher sbyin pa dang /_/pad ma las byung gzi can gzhon nur 'gyur/_/de la stan sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[87b.2\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_stan sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sa gzhi la/_byang chub kyi snying po rdo rje'i gdan thob par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis stan gyi sbyin pa sbyin par 
[\[87b.3\]]bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de stan gyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'thun pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_stan gyi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag gis sems can thams cad kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sa gzhi la byang chub kyi snying po 
[\[87b.4\]]rdo rje'i gdan thob par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_stan gyi sbyin pa 'di yis na/_/byang chub snying po'i rdo rje'i gdan/_/bzang zhing sra la brtan pa dag_/lus can rnams la 'byung bar shog_/sna tshogs rin chen bdun las byas/_/
[\[87b.5\]]'phang du dpag tshad gnyis yod la/_/kho ra khor yug dpag tshad gcig_/ri rab bzhin du spa ba dang /_/rin chen ljon shing brgyas bskor cing /_/gzhal med khang gis legs par brgyan/_/dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bkab/_/nor bu rin chen spras gsal ba/_/
[\[87b.6\]]tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod rnams la/_/khri'u dang stan dang stegs byin pas/_/'khor ba dag na 'khor ba'i tshe/_/de 'dra'i stan ni thob par 'gyur/_/de la yo byad kyi sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du 
[\[87b.7\]]sems te/_yo byad sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis yo byad kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de yo byad kyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa la 'os pa'i smon lam bzhin du 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]yo byad byin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi byang chub kyi yo byad yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_yo byad yongs su btang ba des/_/bdag gis kyang ni lus can gyi/_/byang chub yo 
[\[88a.2\]]byad btsal ba dag_/yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig_/yo byad rab tu byin pa yis/_/gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i/_/yan lag thams cad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/de la sman sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_
[\[88a.3\]]rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_sman gyi sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni sems can thams cad kyi rga ba dang 'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis sman gyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/
[\[88a.4\]]de sman gyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_sman byin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi rga ba dang /_'chi ba med pa'i bdud rtsi'i bde ba yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces 
[\[88a.5\]]bya ste/_rtsi dang sman gyi sbyin pa yis/_/sems can thams cad tshe dpag med/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i bdud rtsi yang /_/myur ba nyid du thob gyur cig_/rtsi dang sman gyi sbyin pa yis/_/zla ba nya ltar nad med cing /_/gnod chung skyid cing bde bar gnas/_/mi 
[\[88a.6\]]rnams tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/_/de la bran dang bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las 
[\[88a.7\]]byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang dga' dang /_rang dbang dang /_rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de bran dang /_bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shing bstan pa'i smon lam bzhin du bran dang /_
[\[88b.2\]]bran mo dang /_las byed pa dang /_zho shas 'tsho ba yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi rang dga' dang /_rang dbang dang /_rang byung gi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces 
[\[88b.3\]]bya ste/_bran dang bran mo btang ba yis/_/mdor na lus can thams cad kyi/_/rang byung gi ni ye shes kyi/_/snying po yongs su rdzogs gyur cig_/bran dang bran mo btang ba yis/_/mi ni bran du mi skye zhing /_/brtan po rang dbang yod pas 'tsho/_/zhum pa med cing 
[\[88b.4\]]'jigs pa med/_/de la gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la 
[\[88b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad yongs su gtong ba zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 
[\[88b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu snang bar 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis gser 
[\[88b.7\]]dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas ji ltar mkhyen cing bshad de gsal bar mdzad pa'i smon lam bzhin du gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig 
[\[89a.2\]]dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_rin po che thams cad byin pa des na bdag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu 'od zer sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel 
[\[89a.3\]]dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bus snang bar byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_rin chen byin pa des na bdag_/'od zer sna tshogs snang ba yis/_/sangs rgyas drang srong che rnams kyi/_/zhing rnams thams cad snang byed shog_/rin chen 
[\[89a.4\]]sna tshogs byin pa yis/_/nges pa gang dang gar skyes pa/_/'jig rten mtshams med yan cad du/_/des ni 'od zer snang bar byed/_/de la rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta'i bzhon pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la 
[\[89a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta'i bzhon pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po dang /_theg pa mchog dang /_theg pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi theg 
[\[89a.6\]]pa bla na med pa/_gtso bo dam pa rab mchog sdud pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta'i bzhon pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta'i bzhon pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 
[\[89a.7\]]sbyin pa na de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs shing bsgoms pa'i smon lam bzhin du rta dang /_glang po che dang /_shing rta'i bzhon pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa chen po dang /_theg pa mchog dang /_theg pa mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang /_
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pa/_gtso bo dam pa/_rab mchog gis sdud par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_bdag gis glang chen byin pa yis/_/sangs rgyas theg pa theg pa che/_/theg pa mchog gis lus can rnams/_/myur 
[\[89b.2\]]du sdud par byed par shog_/glang chen byin zhing rta byin pas/_/gsal zhing mkhas la shes nyen can/_/theg pa che la mos pa dang /_/mi de skal ba can du 'gyur/_/de la skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_gtsug lag khang yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji 
[\[89b.3\]]ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_gtsug lag khang yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi yan 
[\[89b.4\]]lag yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_gtsug lag khang yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_
[\[89b.5\]]gtsug lag khang yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin pa na/_sangs rgyas kyis bstod cing bsngags pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_skyed mos tshal dang /_dka' thub kyi nags tshal dang /_gtsug lag khang yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad kyi bsam gtan 
[\[89b.6\]]gyi yan lag yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_lha gang skyed mos tshal byin pas/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi/_/bsam gtan yan lag rim bzhin du/_/yongs su rdzogs par byed par shog_/lha gang skyed 
[\[89b.7\]]mos tshal byin pas/_/rnal 'byor can gyi mi de ni/_/bsam gtan yan lag yongs rdzogs shing /_/rnal 'byor spyod la dka' thub che/_/de la chung ma dang bu dang /_bu mo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]snyam du sems te/_chung ma dang bu dang /_bu mo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis bdag gis chung ma dang /_
[\[90a.2\]]bu dang /_bu mo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bsnyen bkur mdzad mdzad pa'i smon lam bzhin du chung ma dang /_bu dang /_bu mo yongs su 
[\[90a.3\]]gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_bu yi sbyin pa des na myur bar yang /_/sems can rnams ni 
[\[90a.4\]]re re'i don gyi phyir/_/sems can thams cad bla na med pa yi/_/byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgya byed par shog_/chung ma bu dang bu mo gtong byed pa/_/de la byang chub zag med dga' ba med/_/brtson 'grus ldan pa'i mi ni gang la yang /_/dka' ba ci yang med par blta 
[\[90a.5\]]bar bya/_/de la nor dang /_'bru dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub 
[\[90a.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis nor dang /_'bru dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nor dang /_'bru dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin 
[\[90a.7\]]pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhin du nor dang /_'bru dang /_bang mdzod yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]ces bya ste/_nor dang dbyig rnams gtong ba'i bsod nams ni/_/mkha' las lhag pa bdag la ci yod pas/_/mi rnams rgyud ni dam pa'i chos mdzod kyis/_/rgyal po'i mdzod ltar myur du rgyas gyur cig_/nor dang 'bru dang bang mdzod bud med rnams/_/gtong ba'i bsod 
[\[90b.2\]]nams bdag la ci yod pa/_/des na bdag gis byang chub myur 'thob cing /_/dam pa'i chos kyi mdzod ni thob par shog_/de la gling bzhi dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[90b.3\]]'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_gling bzhi dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]
[\[90b.4\]]yin gyis/_bdag gis gling bzhi dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de gling bzhi dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin 
[\[90b.5\]]pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_gling bzhi dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug thams cad yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad dam pa'i chos kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug 'thob pa thob par gyur cig 
[\[90b.6\]]ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_gling bzhi ril gyis btang ba 'di dag las/_/bdag gis bsod nams cung zad ci bsgrubs pa/_/des na mi rnams 'di dag dam chos kyi/_/rgyal srid 'thob pa'i mtha' ni thob gyur cig_/'dzam bu gling ni byin pa 
[\[90b.7\]]yis/_/rin chen sna bdun ldan pa yi/_/rgyal po gling bzhi dbang byed pa/_/dbang phyug rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur/_/de la gtsug gi nor bu dang /_cod pan yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]snyam du sems te/_gtsug gi nor bu dang /_cod pan yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis gtsug gi nor bu dang /_cod pan yongs su gtong 
[\[91a.2\]]ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de gtsug gi nor bu dang /_cod pan yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_gtsug gi nor bu dang /_cod pan yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na bdag sems 
[\[91a.3\]]can thams cad kyis spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba thob par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_mgo bo'i nor bu cod pan byin pa yi/_/bsod nams tshogs ni bdag la ci yod pa/_/des na 'dir ni sems can thams cad kyi/_/spyi gtsug 
[\[91a.4\]]bltar med rtag tu thob gyur cig_/gtsug gi nor bu byin des bdag_/n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab/_/gser dang nor bu byas pa yis/_/gtsug tor phun sum tshogs par shog_/de la rkang pa sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[91a.5\]]dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_rkang pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi rkang pa byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis rkang pa sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de la rkang pa sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[91a.6\]]pas brnyes pa'i smon lam bzhin du rkang pa sbyin pa 'dis na/_mi rnams dang sems can thams cad rtag tu myur bar khyim nas mngon par byung nas skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i gnod pa zhi bar bya ba'i don gyi phyir 'dod bzhin du bag brkyang nas rab tu dga' zhing dbang po zhi 
[\[91a.7\]]la skyabs su 'os pa'i zla ba'i 'od ltar gzugs zhi ba snang byed nyi ma sna tshogs kyi gzi brjid ltar snying rje las byung ba'i 'od zer 'phro bas mtshams med pa yan cad mun par zhugs pas nyam thag pa'i mi rnams kyi mun pa snang bar byas nas lus rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal rnams sel cing 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]pad ma'i rkang pa 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa'i mtshan gyis spras la/_mnyam zhing 'jam pa dang /_sor mo ring zhing ngang pa'i rkang pa ltar dra bas 'brel pa dang /_sen mo me long bzang po dag par phyis pa lta bus brgyan te/_me tog kun da ltar 'dug pa dang /_long bu mi 
[\[91b.2\]]mngon pa dang /_rje ngar smyig ma dang [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]e na ya'i byin pa 'dra ba'i ya mtshan gyi stabs kyis dal bus dal nas byang chub kyi snying po'i gdan rdo rje'i stegs bu'i gdan/_chos kyi seng ge'i khri la bdud rnam par gzhom pa'i phyir shin tu gnon par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/
[\[91b.3\]]de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_rkang pa byin pa 'di yis na/_/rkang thil 'khor lo'i mtshan can gyis/_/byang chub snying po'i gdan [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]la/_/brtan pos shin tu gnon par shog_/rkang pa sbyin pa 'dis na bdag_/byang chub snying po'i gdan mchog la/_/'dug nas bdud rnams sde 
[\[91b.4\]]dang dpung /_/bzhon dang bcas par 'dul bar shog_/de la lag mthil sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_lag mthil sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can 
[\[91b.5\]]thams cad la chos kyi lag pa sbyin pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis lag mthil sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de la lag mthil gyi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par mkhyen pa'i smon lam bzhin du lag mthil sbyin pa 'dis na/_
[\[91b.6\]]bdag sems can dman pa dang /_long ba dang /_bkren pa dang /_mgon med pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_dbul po dang /_gnas med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa rnams dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 
[\[91b.7\]]'jig rten dang /_ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba dang /_mi khom par skyes pa rnams la chos kyi lag pa sbyin par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_lag mthil sbyin pas myur du bdag_/rnam 'dren lag na rin chen dang /_/
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]lag pa ring zhing gser mdog ldan/_/'jig rten mchod gnas gyur par shog_/snying rjes non par gyur nas ni/_/chos kyi lag pa bstod byas la/_/ngan song kun las lus can rnams/_/bdag gis rtag tu 'byin par shog_/de la rna ba dang sna yongs su 
[\[92a.2\]]gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_rna ba dang sna yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang po tshang ba yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin 
[\[92a.3\]]gyis/_bdag gis rna ba dang /_sna yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de rna ba dang sna yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gzhag pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_rna ba dang sna yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag 
[\[92a.4\]]sems can thams cad dbang po thams cad dang ldan par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_rna ba dang ni sna btang bas/_/srog chags rnams ni thams cad kyang /_/dbang po kun dang ldan gyur te/_/yan lag thams cad rdzogs par shog_/rna ba 
[\[92a.5\]]dang ni sna btang bas/_gang dang gang du skyes pa der/_/blta na sdug cing gzugs bzang la/_/mi ni de bzhin mdzes par 'gyur/_/de la mig gi sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_mig sbyin pa zhes bya 
[\[92a.6\]]ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos kyi mig sgrib pa med pa yongs su dag pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis mig gi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de mig gi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas dag par mdzad pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_mig 
[\[92a.7\]]gi sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig sgrib pa med pa yongs su dag par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_mig gi sbyin pa 'dis na bdag_/bla med byang chub sangs rgyas nas/_/sems can kun gyi chos kyi mig_/
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]rnam par dag par byed gyur cig_/mig byin brtul zhugs bzang po des/_dri ma med cing skyon med la/_/dag cing yangs la mdzes [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dang /_/zhi ba'i mig ni thob par 'gyur/_/uta pal sngon po'i 'dab 'dra dang /_/byi'u ku na la'i mig 'dra zhing /_/mig gi rdzi ma ba yi 'dra/_/
[\[92b.2\]]de 'dra'i mig ni de yis 'thob/_/de la mgo bo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_mgo bo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams 
[\[92b.3\]]gsum thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob pa'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis mgo bo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de mgo bo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[92b.4\]]pa'i rkyen du bab pa'i smon lam bzhin du mgo bo yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad 'jig rten gsum las khyad par du 'phags pa'i mchog thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang 
[\[92b.5\]]yod de/_mgo bo yongs su gtong ba yis/_/bsod nams bdag la ci yod pa/_/des na sems can kun mkhyen gyi/_/go 'phang mi g.yo thob gyur cig_/de la pags shun yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems 
[\[92b.6\]]dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_pags shun yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pags pa 'jam zhing srab la gser gyi mdog lta bu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis pags shun yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin 
[\[92b.7\]]pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de pags shun yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_pags shun yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi pags pa 'jam zhing srab la/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_pags shun yongs su btang ba yis/_/bdag gis su ni lus can rnams/_/pags shun lus las skyes pa dag_/'jam srab gser gyi mdog sgyur shog_/
[\[93a.2\]]de la sha dang khrag yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_sha dang khrag yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po med pa thams cad las snying 
[\[93a.3\]]po blang ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis/_bdag gis sha dang khrag yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de sha dang khrag yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bskyed pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_sha dang khrag yongs su gtong ba'i 
[\[93a.4\]]sbyin pa 'dis na bdag gis sems can thams cad snying po med pa thams cad las snying po len du 'jug par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_sha dang khrag gi sbyin pa yi/_/rnam smin bdag la ci yod des/_/snying po med pa ma lus las/_/
[\[93a.5\]]'gro kun snying por thob gyur cig_/de la rkang sbyin pa la ji ltar mngon par brtson par byed ce na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam du sems te/_rkang sbyin pa zhes bya ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur 
[\[93a.6\]]ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin gyis bdag gis rkang gi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de rkang gi sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pas bskyed pa'i smon lam bzhin du/_rkang gi sbyin pa 'dis na/_bdag sems can thams cad kyi lus rdo rje ltar mi shigs pa yongs 
[\[93a.7\]]su rdzogs par byed par gyur cig ces smon lam 'debs so/_/de la tshig phyi ma yang yod de/_rkang gi sbyin pa 'di yis na/_/bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi/_/rnag gi lus kyi za ma tog_/rdo rje mi shigs rdzogs byed shog_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de 'di snyam 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]du sems te/_kha dog phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni/_kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur gyis bdag gis kha dog phun sum tshogs pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam sems shing dri phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni grags pa'i dri dang ldan par 'gyur/_ro bro ba phun sum tshogs pa byin 
[\[93b.2\]]pas ni yo byad gya nom pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur/_reg pa phun sum tshogs pa byin pas ni rka lag 'jam la gzhon sha chags par 'gyur/_rang gi lag nas byin pas ni bsnyen bkur byed pa 'thob par 'gyur/_gus par byas te byin pas ni gnyen la sogs pa'i nang du gzhan 
[\[93b.3\]]gyis bkur sti bya bar 'gyur/_dus su byin pas ni de'i nor rnams dus su 'grub cing rgyas par 'gyur/_'thun pa dang yid du 'ong ba byin pas ni mal dang gos la sogs pa longs spyod yid du 'ong ba rnams la sems 'jug par 'gyur/_gzhan la mi gnod par byin pas ni longs spyod 
[\[93b.4\]]brtan pa dag 'thob par 'gyur/_mi dga' ba dang du len pa'i sbyin pas ni 'khor snying nye bar 'gyur/_zas byin pas ni stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_skom byin pas ni skom pa med par 'gyur/_gos byin pas ni kha dog dang ldan par 'gyur/_mar me byin pas ni mig dang ldan 
[\[93b.5\]]par 'gyur/_rol mo'i sgra byin pas ni rna ba nyams pa med par 'gyur/_bzhon pa byin pas ni bde ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_sman byin pas ni nad nyung bar 'gyur/_me tog byin pas ni gzhan gyis mchod par 'gyur/_me tog phreng byin pas ni gzhan gyis rim gro bya bar 'gyur/_
[\[93b.6\]]bstod pa byin pas ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan par 'gyur/_stan byin pas ni bla ma'i gnas thob par 'gyur/_bzhon pa byin pas ni rdzu 'phrul dang ldan par 'gyur/_byug pa byin pas ni rma med par 'gyur/_phyag dar bya ba byin pas ni rdul dang bral bar 'gyur/_dril bu byin pas 
[\[93b.7\]]ni tshe rabs dran par 'gyur/_gnas byin pas ni thams cad byin par 'gyur/_chos byin pas ni bdud rtsi byin par 'gyur gyis bdag gis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de sbyin pa de lta bu sbyin pa na chags pas sbyin par mi byed/_sdang bas sbyin par mi byed/_rmongs 
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]pas sbyin par mi byed/_tshig pa za zhing sbyin par mi byed/_brnyas bzhin du sbyin par mi byed/_rdeg cing sbyin par mi byed/_tshar bcad de sbyin par mi byed/_khyad du gsod cing sbyin par mi byed/_smad de sbyin par mi byed/_nga rgyal gyis khengs bzhin du sbyin par mi byed/_'gying bzhin du sbyin par mi 
[\[94a.2\]]byed/_lhag mar gyur pa sbyin par mi byed/_rul cing myags pa sbyin par mi byed kyi sbyin pa gang dang gang sbyin pa de gus par byas te sbyin par byed/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas shing brjod nas sbyin par byed/_mang du sbyin par byed/_
[\[94a.3\]]bzang po sbyin par byed/_rab tu dga' bas sbyin par byed/_dga' zhing mgu bas sbyin par byed/_gtsang ba dang /_rgya cher sbyin par byed/_rang gi lag nas sbyin par byed gus pa dang bcas pa dang /_zhe sa dang bcas pas sbyin par byed/_bsam pa dag cing bzang la dge 
[\[94a.4\]]bas sbyin par byed/_ser sna med par sbyin par byed/_brkam pa med par sbyin par byed/_zhum pa med par sbyin par byed/_'jigs pa med par sbyin par byed/_rgya che zhing yangs par sbyin par byed do/_/de sbyin pa de lta bu de sbyin pa na 'di snyam du 'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa 
[\[94a.5\]]yin gyis/_bdag gis sbyin par bya'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal pa yin no/_/'di ni dge ba'i chos dang ldan pa yin no/_/'di ni dge ba'i chos ma yin pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'di la byin na ni 'bras bu che ba dang /_phan yon che ba dang /_mthu che bar 'gyur ro/_/'di la 
[\[94a.6\]]byin na ni 'bras bu mi che ba dang /_phan yon mi che ba dang /_mthu mi che bar 'gyur ro snyam du mi sems so/_/gzhan yang yang dag pa'i blo dang ldan gyi yang dag pa ma yin pa ma yin pa'i phyir de sbyin pa de sbyin pa na/_'di snyam du sbyin pa 'di dang dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa de 
[\[94a.7\]]yongs su gtong ba 'dis na bdag rgyal por gyur cig ce'am/_rgyal po gzhan nam/_blon po chen po'am/_lha'am/_klu'am/_lha'i bu'am/_lha gzhan gang yang rung ba zhig tu gyur cig ces sems skyed par mi byed do/_/'o na gang du zhe na/_gzhan du na bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed de/_dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang chos kyi phyir yongs su gtong ba 'dis na/_bdag sems can ma rgal ba rnams sgrol ba dang /_ma grol ba rnams dgrol bar byed pa dang /_dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa dang /_yongs 
[\[94b.2\]]su mya ngan las ma 'das pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten long ba 'dren pa med pa dang /_skyo ba med pa dang /_skyabs med pa dang /_gnas med pa dang /_gling med pa dang /_dpung gnyen med pa rnams kyi 'dren pa dang /_yongs su 'dren pa dang /_
[\[94b.3\]]sgrol ba dang /_skyabs dang /_gnas dang /_gling dang /_dpung gnyen du gyur cig ces yongs su sngo bar byed do/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_chos phyir sbyin pa 'dis na bdag_/'khor ba yi ni rgya mtsho las/_/gzhan min theg pa chen po yis/_/sems can rnams ni 
[\[94b.4\]]sgrol gyur cig_/skye bo thams cad nyon mongs pa'i/_/'ching ba dag las 'grol bar shog_/dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs 'byin cing /_/mya ngan 'das lam ston gyur cig_/'jig rten long ba 'dren med pa'i/_/yongs su 'dren par bdag gyur cig_/lus can rnams la 
[\[94b.5\]]skyob pa dang /_/dpung gnyen gling dang skyabs gyur cig_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par brtson par byed pa yin no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri'i phug dang /_zom dang /_ri 
[\[94b.6\]]sul dang /_gseb dang /_sman ljongs na seng ge'i mchog rnam par bsgyings shing nga ro rnam par sgrogs pa lta bu'i mi'i dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bus/_bcom ldan 'das las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par dbye ba bshad pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu 
[\[94b.7\]]dga' zhing bde ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga pad ma'i snying po la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]pa'i dbyangs kyis legs so zhes bya ba gsol to/_/sbyin mdzad legs so rtag tu yab 'dra khyod legs so/_/sbyin mdzad legs so gsang mdzad bde gshegs khyod legs so/_/gnyen gyur legs so mdza' bo ston par gyur pa legs/_/gcig 
[\[95a.2\]]pu 'di na dmyal ba skyob pa khyod legs so/_/thu bo legs so lha mi rnams nang bgres pa legs/_/mchod gnas legs so mi rnams nang na dpa' bo legs/_/gsungs pa legs so bdag nyid chen po rab tu legs/_/mi rnams nyon mongs dug sel sman pa'i rgyal 
[\[95a.3\]]po legs/_/grol ba legs so srid pa gsum las rnam grol legs/_/sman pa legs so phan bzhed dam pa sbyin mdzad legs/_/dpal yon can legs bkra shis snyoms pa'i thugs mnga' legs/_/skal ldan zla ba nyi 'dra dri med zhal mnga' legs/_/
[\[95a.4\]]blo ldan mthon mthing spyan yangs ring ba legs/_/dpal ldan shangs 'tsham cha byad rmad du byung ba legs/_/smra mkhas snyan shal gser gyi 'phyang thag 'dra ba legs/_/mche ba kha ba dung 'dra legs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/gtso bo bgres pa mgon po khyod kyis de ring du/_/
[\[95a.5\]]mi rnams sbyin pa dbye ba legs par gsungs pa legs/_/slar zhing tshul khrims bzod pa stobs dang ye shes dang /_/thabs dang bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul smon lam mnyan par 'tshal/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal 
[\[95a.6\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_ri'i phug dang /_zom dang /_ri sul dang /_gseb dang /_sman ljongs na seng ge'i mchog rnam par bsgyings shing nga ro rnam par sgrogs pa lta bu'i mi'i dbang po'i gtsug gi nor bu la sogs pa/_byang chub 
[\[95a.7\]]sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha'i bu de dag dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sbyin pa'i 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[95b.2\]{D183}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dA nA nu shan+sa niR+de sha/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan 
[\[95b.3\]]yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag mkhas pa rnams kyis rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sum cu rtsa bdun gang zhe na/_ser sna 
[\[95b.4\]]rnam par spang ba'i phyir dad pas sbyin pa sbyin no/_/dus su sbyin pa sbyin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ba'i rung ba dngos po gsum yongs su dag par sbyin pa sbyin no/_/sems kyi 'khrug pa'i skyon thams cad spang ba'i phyir bsti stang du byas te sbyin pa sbyin no/_/snying po med 
[\[95b.5\]]pa'i lus las snying po blang ba'i phyir rang gi lag nas sbyin pa sbyin no/_/gzhan la mi gnod pa'i sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gtong ba chen po rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/kha dog phun sum tshogs pa sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa kha dog mdzes pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[95b.6\]]dri phun sum tshogs pa sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa grags pa'i dri rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/ro bro ba phun sum tshogs pa sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa ro bro ba mchog gi dpe byad bzang po rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gya nom pa sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa longs spyod 
[\[95b.7\]]gya nom pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rgya chen po sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa longs spyod rgya chen po rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa tshe rabs thams cad du bkres pa rnam par gcod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/btung ba sbyin pa 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]byin na rnam par smin pa tshe rabs thams cad du skom pa rnam par gcod pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bgo ba sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gos kyi longs spyod sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gnas kyi sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa pu shu dang khang pa 
[\[96a.2\]]brtsegs pa dang /_khyams dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_yul rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mal cha sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa rigs mthon po rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhon pa sbyin pa byin na 
[\[96a.3\]]rnam par smin pa rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sman sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa rga shi med cing mya ngan dang kun nas nyon mongs pa 'gog pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/chos sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa skye ba dran pa 
[\[96a.4\]]rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/me tog sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa byang chub kyi yan lag gi me tog rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/phreng ba sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug gi dri ma rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/bdug pa 
[\[96a.5\]]sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa nyon mongs pa'i dri nga ba thams cad med pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gdugs sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa chos la dbang ba'i dbang phyug rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dril bu sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa sgra dbyangs yid du 'ong ba rab tu 
[\[96a.6\]]'thob par 'gyur ro/_/sil snyan sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/mar me sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa lha'i mig sgrib pa med cing rnam par dag pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/dar sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa lha 
[\[96a.7\]]dang mi'i nang na rnam par grol ba'i dar gyis bcings pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs la 'bru mar dri zhim po phul lam/_spos kyi khrus chu dbul ba phul na rnam par smin pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum 
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/khrus kyi yo byad sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa tshe rabs thams cad du nad nyung ba dang /_rigs kyi mchog tu skye zhing kun tu mdzes pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying po lnga sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa 
[\[96b.2\]]tshe rabs thams cad du mthu che zhing spro ba chen po mi thul ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/byams pa la gnas te sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa gnod sems med pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/snying rje la gnas te sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa 'tshe ba med pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur 
[\[96b.3\]]ro/_/dga' ba la gnas te sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/btang snyoms la gnas te sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa mi dga' ba spong ba rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa longs 
[\[96b.4\]]spyod sna tshogs rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lan la mi re ba la gnas te sbyin pa byin na rnam par smin pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu 'thob par 'gyur te/_dge slong dag mkhas pa rnams kyis rnam pa sum cu rtsa bdun po de dag sbyin pa sbyin no/_/bcom 
[\[96b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/'phags pa sbyin pa'i phan yon bstan pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu 
[\[96b.6\]]chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D184}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bo d+hi sa twa tsar+ya nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byang chub sems 
[\[96b.7\]]dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na dge slong stong 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med pa/_dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_cang shes pa/_glang po chen po/_
[\[97a.2\]]bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_spyod lam zhi ba dang /_dul ba 
[\[97a.3\]]dang /_rnam par grol ba dang /_ma brtags pa dang ldan pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo gang zag gcig ni ma gtogs te/_de yang bcom ldan 'das kyis nyams su len par bka' stsal te/_tshe 'di nyid la lung bstan pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[97a.4\]]dpa' stong tham pa thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa/_thams cad kyang gzungs thob pa/_thams cad kyang mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa dang ldan pa/_thams cad kyang ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa'i sa thob pa/_mkhas pa/_drang po/_dad pa dang ldan pa/_rtog pa mang ba/_dang ba gtso 
[\[97a.5\]]bor byed pa/_bzhin 'dzum pa/_khro gnyer med pa/_g.yo med pa/_bsgrub pa dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin rjes su rtogs pa/_chos bstan pas yongs su mi skyo ba/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yang dag par skyes pa yongs su smin par byed pa/_
[\[97a.6\]]ldem po dag la phyin ci ma log pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/_yul thams cad phyin ci ma log pa'i sa dang ldan pa/_dus shes pa/_tshod shes pa/_skabs shes pa/_ran pa shes pa/_rgod pa med pa/_khengs pa med pa/_spyod lam tha mal pa phun sum tshogs pa/_
[\[97a.7\]]stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la mkhas pa/_'byung ba dang 'jig pa yongs su spangs pa/_smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/_'khor ba la yun ring du spyod pa la zhugs pa/_mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa/_spros pa'i rnam pa thams cad kyi 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]mtshan ma legs par bzung ba/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mkhas pa/_'du shes thams cad dang bral ba/_nyan thos kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa/_chos bstan pa yang dag par dbye bar 'jug par byed pa/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ston 
[\[97b.2\]]pa/_nye bar zhi ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa/_byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par slong ba/_spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du zhe 'gras pa med par chos ston pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_
[\[97b.3\]]spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_lag na rin chen ldan dang /_spos 'od dang /_mtha' yas snang ba'i blo gros dang /_ngan song spong dang /_don grub sems pa dang /_yon tan rgyal po snang dang /_mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad sel ba'i blo gros dang /_mi mnyam pa thams 
[\[97b.4\]]cad ston pa dang /_de'i rang bzhin du mi gnas pa dang /_blo mtha' yas dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_rtsal brtan por sems pa dang /_rin chen 'byung gnas dang /_bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyal po dang /_'khrul pa med pa'i mthu rtsal dang /_
[\[97b.5\]]khyad par blo gros dang /_kun nas mdzes dang /_sgrib med ston dang /_rnam par rtse dang /_gser mchog 'od dpal dang /_chos thams cad la rtag tu lta ba'i blo ldan dang /_spos dri myur sbyin me tog kun tu rgyas dang /_gtso bo brtsegs dang /_mya ngan med pa'i 
[\[97b.6\]]dpal dang /_lhun po'i lto dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_spos kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po dang /_blo mtha' yas sgrub pa dang /_dam pa'i chos thams cad mi brjed par gnas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[97b.7\]]sems dpa' chen po seng ge ltar sgra mngon par sgrogs pa dang /_de dag dang byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag mang po gzhan dag dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te/_lhung bzed bsnams 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]nas dge slong nyis stong gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te yangs pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la gshegs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs sgo'i them pa la bzhag ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams grong khyer du gshegs 
[\[98a.2\]]pa na ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams 'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag yin pa de dag byung ste/_long ba rnams ni mthong bar gyur/_'on pa rnams ni thos par gyur/_smyon pa rnams ni dran pa rnyed par gyur to/_/lha'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/snang ba 
[\[98a.3\]]chen po yang byung ngo /_/srang yang dri ma med par gyur to/_/lha'i sil snyan yid du 'ong ba dag kyang ma brdungs par grag go/_/mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal ba la thug pa nas 'og min gyi gnas man chad kyi sems can thams cad kyang gcig tu nges par bde ba dang ldan 
[\[98a.4\]]par gyur to/_/de'i tshe yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po na lits+tsha bI seng ge'i bu rin chen byin zhes bya ba skyes nas lo gsum lon pa ma ma'i pang pa na 'dug pa khang [{]bzangs kyis [,]bzang gis [}]brgyan pa'i khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]steng na 'dug ste/_khye'u rin chen byin gyis rmad du byung ba'i mtshan ma dag mthong 
[\[98a.5\]]ngo /_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis rang gi ma ma la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ma ma gang gi mthu stobs kyis/_/shin tu ya mtshan byung ba snang /_/nyi ma bye ba rnams kyi 'od/_/zil gnon snang 'di su zhig yin/_/stong gsum sa gzhi khyab gyur nas/_ngan 'gro skems 
[\[98a.6\]]par byed pa yi/_/rdzu 'phrul snang ba gang yin 'di/_/ma ma bdag la myur du smros/_/dus min me tog char pa yis/_/sangs rgyas zhing mtshams med par mdzes/_/phyogs rnams bya yi tshogs rnams kyis/_/skad snyan pas ni khyab par gyur/_/srang yang me tog rnams kyis 
[\[98a.7\]]khebs/_/me tog gdugs kyang rnam par bres/_/skyes pa bud med dga' rnams kyis/_/kun nas rab tu mdzes par 'dug_/long ba rnams kyis mig kyang thob/_/skye bo 'on rnams sgra yang thos/_/byad ngan byad gzugs phun sum tshogs/_/mdog ngan kha dog phun sum tshogs/_/
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]g.yengs pa rnams kyang dran pa rnyed/_/lce med tshig ni rnam par dag_/sems can byams pa'i sems med pa/_/byams pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur/_/ma ma sems can khyad par can/_/rdzu 'phrul grub pa mthu ldan pa/_/'jig rten dag na rgyu ba 'di/_/su yin bdag 
[\[98b.2\]]la myur du smros/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyi ma mas khye'u rin chen byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_rnam par dag pa spyod mchog ldan/_/rgyal ba dri med blo mi dman/_/bsam yas ma lus yongs su dag_/dbang ldan yon tan rin chen 'phags/_/'jig rten 
[\[98b.3\]]mgon po 'khra sa mig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtsa lag 'di/_/blo ldan bsod snyoms don du gshegs/_/'jig rten chos la rten pa med/_/'di la sdug dang mi sdug sogs/_/'jig rten pa yi rtog mi mnga'/_/pad ma chu las skyes pa ltar/_/mnga' bdag mi gos 
[\[98b.4\]]spyod par mdzad/_/blo gros ldan pa the tsom gcod/_/phan mdzad thugs rjer ldan pa ste/_/'gro ba'i sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir/_/rnam par 'dren pa 'dir gshegs so/_/bstod kyang dgyes par mi 'gyur la/_/smad kyang 'khrug par mi 'gyur te/_/khong khro rjes su 
[\[98b.5\]]chags pa spangs/_/chags med rgyu ba rlung dang 'dra/_/'di ni chos rgyal dam pa ste/_/ye shes zab mo phun sum tshogs/_/don dam don la mkhas pa po/_/'gro ba'i slob dpon gshegs pa yin/_/de ni dbu ma ston pa ste/_/yod med 'dzin las rnam par grol/_/
[\[98b.6\]]chos lam ldan zhing zhi ba ste/_/brten pa thams cad yongs su spangs/_/ye shes phung po bdag med bdag_/bsod nams tshogs rnams bstsags pa yi/_/bde gshegs 'jig rten 'dren pa po/_/mtha' yas gzugs can deng gshegs so/_/dbu skra g.yas su 
[\[98b.7\]]'khyil par gnas/_/'jam zhing mdog snum lcang lo can/_/gnag cing 'dzings pa med rnams kyis/_/de yi dbu ni rnam par mdzes/_/gtsug tor g.yas su 'khyil pa ste/_/dbu skra 'khyil zhing legs par gnas/_/ri rab rtse mo 'dra bar ni/_/de yi dbyibs ni mdzes 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]pa yin/_/de yi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes/_/'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/_/'od ni shel dang zla ba yi/_/'od zer dra ba mang bas lhag_/de yi zhal nas spyan mdzes pa/_/me tog uta pal sngon po 'dra/_/ba yi rdzi ma yongs su dag_/mi dmar 
[\[99a.2\]]ma 'dzings zhi bar gzigs/_/dpal ldan seng ge'i 'gram pa 'dra/_/de ni rtag tu zhal yang 'dzum/_/sgros ni bim pa bzhin du dmar/_/zhal mdzes lus can kun 'dren pa/_/mthu stobs chen po phun sum tshogs/_/bsod nams brgya yi stobs mnga' ba/_/
[\[99a.3\]]tshems kyi phreng ba spa ba'i 'od/_/snyoms shing thags bzang yongs su dag_/de yi tshems ni shin tu dkar/_/ljags ni shin tu ring zhing srab/_/bdag nyid kyi ni zhal gyi ngos/_/de yis kun tu khyab par gnas/_/dpal ldan dbu ni gdugs dang 'dra/_/de bzhin de 
[\[99a.4\]]ni shangs kyang mtho/_/mdog ni btso ma'i gser dang 'dra/_/de yi zhal gyi 'phral ba mdzes/_/de yi zhal gyi smin tshugs ni/_/kha dog mthon mthing shin tu sdug_/zhi ba'i spyan ni mdzes pa ste/_/snyan gyi drung du thug par gnas/_/snyan shal ring la rab tu 'phyang /_/zhal 
[\[99a.5\]]mdzes ston gyi zla bas lhag_/zhal ras pad ma rnam dag 'dra/_/zhal mdangs dkar la dang zhing gsal/_/brtan po tshangs pa'i sgra skad ldan/_/de gsung ka la ping ka'i 'dra/_/de yi gsung bzang yid du 'ong /_/'jam zhing sems can tshim par byed/_/rma bya ngang 
[\[99a.6\]]pa mi'am ci/_/ne tso ri skegs khu byug dang /_/'brug sgra khrung khrung ku na la/_/shang shang te'u dang gling bu dang /_/rdza rnga'i sgra dang gzhan dag kyang /_/sgra skad snyan pa ci yang rung /_/de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yi/_/gsung gi bcu drug char mi phod/_/skul mdzad 
[\[99a.7\]]de bzhin mnyen pa ste/_/de ni snyan cing 'jam pa dang /_/yid 'ong dga' byed gsal ba ste/_/skyon dang bral zhing 'jigs pa med/_/re ba rnams la char rgyun ltar/_/sems rgyun tshim par byed la zhi/_/ma nyams ma 'khrul rab tu zhi/_/de bzhin dag cing brda phrad sla/_/
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]skal dang ldan zhing snyan par ldan/_/don dang yon tan thams cad tshogs/_/gsung gi rgyan rnams phun sum tshogs/_/de yi gsung ni dge skyed pa/_/sems can mos pa tha dad dang /_/de bzhin nges tshig tha dad rnams/_/de yi gsung la nges par dad/_/yid kyang 
[\[99b.2\]]rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/des ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/_/gnas pa'i sems can gsung gis khyab/_/mgon po de yi gsung tshig ni/_/sems can rnams la don yod 'jug_/thub pa skyes mchog de yi ni/_/mgur yang dung 'dra dpung mgo zlum/_/
[\[99b.3\]]de yi thal gong rgyas pa ste/_/de ni bdun po mtho ba mnga'/_/de yi phyag kyang rab tu ring /_/pags pa gser mdog 'dra ba ste/_/gser gyi sdong po bzhin du mtho/_/n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab/_/thugs ka dpal gyi be'us brgyan/_/'khor lo'i mtshan can 
[\[99b.4\]]pad ma'i phyag_/shing bal 'dab ltar reg na 'jam/_/de yi phyag gi sor mo ring /_/spu rnams re rer skyes shing yar phyogs stug la 'jam/_/brang gi phel ka che la rab rgyas lte ba zab/_/phyal dbyibs gzhu 'dra glang chen bzhin du sbubs su nub/_/rje ngar e ne ya 
[\[99b.5\]]'dra mdangs dkar 'dam bu'i sbubs/_/long bu mi mngon de yi rting pa legs par grub/_/de bzhin drang srong sor mo ring zhing sen mo dmar/_/bde bar gshegs kyi zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon te/_/'khor lo lcags kyu bkra shis ldan dang dung gis spras/_/mgon po 
[\[99b.6\]]de yi zhabs gnyis mnyam zhing legs gnas dang /_/shing bal bzhin du reg na 'jam zhing bzang ba dang /_/me tog uta pal dmar po legs par skyes pa yi/_/kha dog 'dra bas sa gzhi dag la gshegs par mdzad/_/de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i sgra sgrogs 
[\[99b.7\]]bde sbyin pa/_/'gro ba rnams kyi gtso bo de ni 'dir gshegs te/_/yong gis 'jigs pa med par seng ge'i sgra skad kyis/_/gnyis su med cing spros pa med pa'i chos kyang ston/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis bdag gi ma ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma ma bdag 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]skar khung 'dir zhog shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa blta'o/_/de nas ma ma des khye'u rin chen byin skar khung du bzhag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas srang de kho 
[\[100a.2\]]nar gshegs so/_/khye'u rin chen byin gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang de 'di snyam du sems te/_/gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa 'di lta bu mthong nas byang chub kyi sems skyed par mi byed pa de 
[\[100a.3\]]dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin gyi sgo drung du gshegs so/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin 'di snyam du sems te/_sems can khyad par can 'di lta bu ni bskal pa bye ba phrag 'bum du yang rnyed par dka' bas/_khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[100a.4\]]'di las bdag gis mchong bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis ril gyis gser las byas pa'i pad ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pa brtsen pa lag mthil du khyer ro/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]de las bdag nyid kyis mchongs so/_/
[\[100a.5\]]de sangs rgyas kyi mthus nam mkha' bar snang la 'dug go/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis ril gyis gser las byas pa'i pad ma 'dab ma 'bum dang ldan pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/de khye'u rin chen byin gyi lag nas btang nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbu'i drang thad 
[\[100a.6\]]kyi steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la pad ma'i gdugs su byas te rin po che'i dra ba yang bres so/_/de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas pad ma 'di phul ba/_/bdag ni ci yang mi 'tshal te/_/don rnams thams cad bcad slad du/_/
[\[100a.7\]]bdag ni byang chub mchog 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar byang chub ma skyes la/_/thob pa ma mchis bshig ma mchis/_/blang du ma mchis dor ma mchis/_/de ltar bdag gis me tog dbul/_/byis pa rnams kyis don gang brtags/_/brtags pa de ni don ma mchis/_/rtog pa 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]thams cad bcad slad du/_/gang zag mchog la bdag mchod bgyid/_/de phyir me tog phul ba 'di/_/bdag la rnam smin 'bras ma gyur/_/dngos po thams cad bcad slad du/_/pad ma 'di ni bdag gis phul/_/bdag gi sangs rgyas zhing du ni/_/rgyal mchog 
[\[100b.2\]]theg pas 'gro ma gtogs/_/nyan thos kyi ni ming yang rung /_/rang rgyal ming yang 'byung ma gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_khyod ni ston pa 'di 'dra la/_/dad pas mchod pa byed mod kyi/_/blo 
[\[100b.3\]]gros phyin ci log gyur na/_/sangs rgyas su ni ji ltar 'gyur/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'di dag thams cad ma skyes te/_/'dus byas dag ni gsob dang gsog_/de 'dra ba yi chos rnams la/_/
[\[100b.4\]]dngos por 'gyur ba ga la yod/_/khyod ni chos gos ngur smrig bgos/_/dgra bcom nyid du 'dzin par byed/_/rnam shes 'di dag spyod yul yang /_/stong pa kho na ma yin nam/_/dmigs pa la ni gnas bcas pas/_/sangs rgyas bye ba ma mnyes byas/_/bye ba de yang 
[\[100b.5\]]zhi bar mthong /_/su yang ma mnyes byas pa med/_/maud gal bu la da dung yang /_/dmigs pa 'jug pa yod dam ci/_/khyod kyi sems ni gang zhig gis/_/yon yang yongs su sbyong bar byed/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen pos khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad 
[\[100b.6\]]ces smras so/_/khye'u ci de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas sam/_chos kyang ma bstan tam/_khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_maud gal gyi bu mkhas pas ni byang chub spros par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[100b.7\]]gshegs pa yang rlom sems su mi bya'o/_/chos mi skye'o snyam du brtag par mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad 'dus byas so snyam du brtag par mi bya'o/_/chos thams cad 'dus ma byas so snyam du brtag par mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te chos thams cad skye ba dang /_mi skye ba dang /_
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]dngos po dang /_dngos po med pa zhes bya ba dang /_'dzin pa dang /_gtong ba zhes bya ba dang /_phrad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_gnas pa dang /_'pho ba dang /_'dod chags kyi chos dang /_zhe sdang gi chos dang /_gti mug gi 
[\[101a.2\]]chos dang /_chos dang /_chos ma yin pa zhes brtag par mi bya'o/_/ma rig pa la sogs pa nas so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang /_nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos 
[\[101a.3\]]rnams dang /_rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_'du shes dang /_'du shes med pa dang /_mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_mi mnyam pa nyid 
[\[101a.4\]]dang /_lus dang /_sems dang /_chos thams cad tshul bzhin dang /_tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes brtag par mi bya'o/_/maud gal gyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[101a.5\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/_smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_ci de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang /_byang chub de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs pa dang /_so so'i skye bo de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par 'dod ma/_maud 
[\[101a.6\]]gal gyi bus smras pa/_de ni ma yin no/_/khye'us smras pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod spros pa med pa la spros par byed ma/_maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_kho bo ni 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyi sgo nas ston to/_/khye'us smras pa/_maud gal gyi bu 'jig rten ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_slu ba sgyu ma'i 
[\[101a.7\]]rnam pa/_byis pa 'drid par byed pa'o/_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_gal te 'jig rten 'di [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i chos can yin pa dang bstan pa 'di yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa/_slu ba'i chos can yin na khyod ci'i phyir ston par byed/_smras pa/_maud gal gyi bu chos thams cad ni bstan du med pa ste/_
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]de dag ni bstan par bya ba ma yin/_thob par bya ba ma yin/_mngon sum du bya ba ma yin/_spang bar bya ba ma yin/_yongs su shes par bya ba ma yin/_bsgom par bya ba ma yin no/_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_'o na khyod kyis gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod/_
[\[101b.2\]]khye'us smras pa/_maud gal gyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'am/_sbyin pa po'am/_sbyin par dmigs sam/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_maud gal gyi bu bdag gis de las bsams nas de bzhin 
[\[101b.3\]]gshegs par 'gyur ba yongs su spangs te/_nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems skyed par byed pa gang dag yin pa de dag ni rnyed pa nyes par rnyed pa'o zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so/_/maud gal gyi bus smras pa/_khyod ni na tshod shin tu gzhon/_/shes rab kyis ni rgya mtsho bzhin/_/
[\[101b.4\]]khyod kyis ji srid tsam zhig nas/_/chos 'di dag la bslabs par gyur/_/khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_bslab pa thams cad rnam 'jig pa/_/bslab pa gang yin de bslab min/_/gang la bslab pa med pa de/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi bslab pa yin/_/don gang 
[\[101b.5\]]khyod kyis bdag dris pa/_/sems can 'du shes gnas pa ste/_/'dir ni chos rnams thams cad la/_/gang la'ang skye ba mi rnyed do/_/byis pa rnams ni byang chub dang /_/'khor ba nyid du rtog par byed/_/'dir ni da dung btsun pa khyod/_/byis pa'i chos la 'brang ngam ci/_/
[\[101b.6\]]ring po'am yang na thung ngu zhes/_/mkhas pa dag ni rtog mi byed/_/chos kun snying po med par ni/_/de bzhin de dag khong du chud/_/byis pa'am byis pa'i chos rnams sam/_/sangs rgyas chos sam rgyal ba'ang rung /_/blo ldan tha dad mi 'byed kyis/_/stong pa nyid 
[\[101b.7\]]la de ltar ltos/_/drang srong chen pos byang chub thob/_/de ni mi rigs brtags pa yin/_/chos 'di la ni skye med na/_/mya ngan 'das pa ji ltar thob/_/chos rnams mtha' yas rab tu gsungs/_/sems can grol ba'ang dngos po med/_/mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba la/_
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]tha dad dbyer med gzung bar gyis/_/'di la rnam pa thams cad du/_/bsnan dang dbri ba ci yang med/_/tha dad med pa'i chos rnams la/_/mkhas pa rnams ni rmongs mi 'gyur/_/byis pa rnams kyis thob cing rnyed/_/byis pas mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/
