[\[102a.2\]]'khor ba la ni de kun chags/_/rlom sems bdud kyi 'ching ba yin/_/gang gis blo la ngas thob snyam/_/des ni ci yang thob pa med/_/de yi yang srid 'gro ba yi/_/ma rig pa yang 'jug par 'gyur/_/byang chub snying por 'dug nas ni/_/mthong ba med cing spangs pa'ang 
[\[102a.3\]]med/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub 'di/_/tha snyad yin te don du min/_/byang chub dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/tha snyad dag gis brjod mi nus/_/gang dag de ltar yang dag mthong /_/de dag chos nyid rnam par shes/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di 
[\[102a.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin gyis yun ji srid cig nas chos 'di la spyad lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis nga mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba lung bstan pa de'i tshe/_
[\[102a.5\]]'di mar me mdzad kyi gsung rab la stong pa nyid la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mchog tu gyur to/_/gang gi tshe ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu dang po sems bskyed pa de'i tshe 'dis bzod pa thob nas bskal pa sum 'bum lon no/_/shA ri'i bus 
[\[102a.6\]]gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das khye'u rin chen byin bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis khye'u rin chen byin 'di nyid la dris shig 
[\[102a.7\]]dang 'di nyid kyis khyod la ston par 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas/_rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma dmigs pas na de'i phyir bdag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'o na ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'di mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa las na dmigs pa la spyod dam/_rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_gal te de bzhin gshegs 
[\[102b.2\]]pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'dzin na ni/_de'i dmigs par 'gyur ba zhig na/_chos gsung ba ni mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi mdzad la spong bar yang mi mdzad do/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_khyod chos bzhi sgrub pa dang yongs su smin pa mnyam 
[\[102b.3\]]pas bzod pa gang la gnas/_khye'u rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_bdag gis ni chos gcig kyang yongs su grub par yang dag par ma mthong na bzhi lta ci smos/_'di la yang dag par grub pa gang zhig yod de/_chos rnam par rig pa zhes bya ba 'di ni dmigs pa'o/_/byang 
[\[102b.4\]]chub ces bya ba 'di ni dmigs pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni 'dzin pa'o/_/grol ba zhes bya ba 'di ni spros pa'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_rigs kyi bu khyod 'di lta bu'i chos rnams la spyod la rdzus te skye bas sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du gyur par skye zhing rtag 
[\[102b.5\]]tu rab tu 'byung ba 'di ni ngo mtshar to/_/de nas de'i tshe khye'u rin chen byin gyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/skye dang de bzhin skye med gnyis ni spros pa ste/_/kun tu rtogs pa'i sa dang bdud kyi spyod yul yin/_/lus la sogs pa'i chos 'dzin rlom sems 'dod pa yi/_/
[\[102b.6\]]lha dang lha min 'gro ba rnams ni 'dir brlag go/_/rgyal bas bdud rtsi 'dus ma byas pa brnyes snyam du/_/de ltar gang dag bsam pa rab tu 'jug byed pa/_/de dag sangs rgyas la ni sku ngas gsol bar byed/_/brnyes kyang 'di la 'dren pa rnams kyis brnyes pa med/_/'dir ni 
[\[102b.7\]]skye bo mang po dag_/rab tu byung nas rang byung rlom/_/sems kyi dmigs pas rnam 'khrul nas/_/bstan pa la ni sun 'byin rnams/_/bdud rtsi bdag gis thob bo zhes/_/thob pa'i nga rgyal can dag smra/_/skyob pa shAkya seng ge yi/_/bstan pa la ni spros med pa/_/sems 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]kyis rnam pa thams cad du/_/sems kyis ngo bo nyid mi rtogs/_/de bzhin rnam 'dren gsungs pa yi/_/lta ba de ni rang bzhin med/_/spyan dag rgyal bas gsungs pa yi/_/lta ba la ni lta ba med/_/de phyir shes rab ldan pa ni/_/bdag nyid grol 
[\[103a.2\]]snyam 'dzin pa med/_/mtshan mar 'dzin pa sgom pa rnams/_/bdag tu dmigs pas rmongs par 'gyur/_/mkhas pa ma yin kha cig ni/_/yang dag ma yin stong pa spong /_/dngos po rmi lam sgyu ma 'dra/_/rang gi blos ni brtags nas kyang /_/mi mkhas de dag 
[\[103a.3\]]dngos po rnams/_/gzhig phyir mya ngan 'das pa smra/_/lus la yang ni rten bcas nas/_/tshul khrims 'du shes rnam par 'jig_/sems kyi dmigs pa dag la yang /_/bsam gtan 'du shes rnam par 'jig_/de bzhin shes rab dmigs nas kyang /_/sa 
[\[103a.4\]]bon 'du shes rnam par rmongs/_/'jig rten 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis/_/de dag chos kyi rkun por brjod/_/'di 'dra ba yi chos rnams la/_/chos dbyings 'od gsal nyon mongs med/_/'o na rab tu byung ba'i don/_/khyod kyis bdag la ji skad brjod/_/chos 
[\[103a.5\]]rnams thams cad tha dad med/_/'di dag brag ca 'dra ba yin/_/mkhas pa de dag nam du yang /_/'phags pa'i spyod yul rtog mi byed/_/gzhan min mtshan nyid de bzhin nyid/_/gzhan dag tu ni yong mi 'gyur/_/chos rnams 'gyur ba med pa la/_/rab byung brtags 
[\[103a.6\]]pas ci zhig bya/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khye'u byang chub ces bya ba de gang gi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal byang chub ni tshig gi [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]med pa'o/_/'jam dpal 
[\[103a.7\]]gyis smras pa/_khyod ci las bsams te de skad smra/_rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_'jam dpal chos nyid ni bsam du med pa yin na/_de bdag gis 'di ltar bsams te bstan par bya/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_'di la las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]ji ltar gdams ngag bstan par bya/_ji ltar rjes su bstan par bya/_rin chen byin gyis smras pa/_'di skad ces smra bar bya ste/_'dod chags ma spangs shig zhe sdang ma gzhil cig_/gti mug ma bsal cig_/rang gi lus las gyen du ma bskyod cig_/mi dge ba spyod cig_/
[\[103b.2\]]lta ba tshar ma gcod cig_/kun tu sbyor ba rnams ma ston cig_/phung po rnams yongs su zung shig_/khams rnams ril por gyis shig_/skye mched rnams la spyod cig_/byis pa'i sa las 'da' bar ma byed cig_/mi dge ba la rtogs shig_/dge ba spongs shig_/
[\[103b.3\]]sangs rgyas yid la ma byed cig_/chos ma sems shig_/dge 'dun la ni mchod pa ma byed cig_/bslab pa dag yang dag par ma len cig_/srid pa nye bar zhi ba don du ma gnyer cig_/chu bo las ma rgal cig_/ces gdams ngag 'di lta bus las dang po pa'i byang chub 
[\[103b.4\]]sems dpa' la gdams par bya'o/_/rjes su bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos rnams kyi chos gnas pa 'di ni gnas pa kho na yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byis pa de dag ni skye ba'i chos su lung ston par byed do/_/'gag pa'i chos su lung ston par byed do/_/
[\[103b.5\]]chos kyi dbyings 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pas rab tu phye ba yin te/_chos 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin de ltar rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo zhes de ltar gdams na/_gal te mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur na/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni phyir 
[\[103b.6\]]mi ldog pa ste/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i skal ba can yin no snyam du shes par bya ste/_gdams ngag 'dis yang dang yang du yang dag par dga' ba bskyed par bya'o/_/de'i tshe dmigs pa can gyi dge slong brgyad kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma bsten par spangs nas 'khor 
[\[103b.7\]]de nas song ste/_kha nas khrag dron mo byung nas shi'o/_/shi nas sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du skyes so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]'di thos pas gnod pa chen po ji tsam du gyur pa la gzigs/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal khyod de skad ma zer cig_/gal te dge slong 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na/_bskal pa sa ya'i bar du 
[\[104a.2\]]nams kyang bzang 'gror skye bar yang mi 'gyur na sangs rgyas dang phrad cing mnyes par byed pa lta ci smos/_da ni de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas thos nas da gzod kho nar sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod nas shi 'phos te dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su 
[\[104a.3\]]skye'o/_/de dag bskal pa drug cu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa khrag khrig phrag bcu mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/_thams cad du rdzus te skye zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po sha stag tu 'gyur la/_bskal pa gcig la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[104a.4\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba dag tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis bdag cag lung bstan pa lha'i rna ba'i khams kyis thos nas/_de dag lha'i bu brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas 
[\[104a.5\]]lha'i me tog gis yangs pa'i grong khyer thams cad du gtor to/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la yang rjes su yi rang ste/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rjes su yi rang lags so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub kyi tshul 'phel bar mdzad du gsol zhes 
[\[104a.6\]]kyang gsol to/_/de dag rjes su yi rang ba'i mod la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/yangs pa'i grong khyer chen po'i srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog 
[\[104a.7\]]par gyur to/_/srog chags khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bskal pa 'bum gyi 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]bar du thabs la mkhas pa med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad pa bas/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas thos na/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed na gang gis som nyi med par thos pa lta ci smos/_gang gis yi ger 'dri ba 
[\[104b.2\]]dang /_lung nod pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa lta ci smos/_'jam dpal de lta bas na dgra bcom pa nyid thob par 'dod pas kyang chos 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/rang byang chub thob par 'dod pas kyang chos 'di la bslab 
[\[104b.3\]]par bya'o/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas kyang chos 'di la bslab par bya'o/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis rang gi ma ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ma ma kho bo la kha zas byin cig dang /_bcom 
[\[104b.4\]]ldan 'das kyi zhal zas dbul bar bya'o/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyi ma mas khar ba'i snod zas ro brgya dang ldan pas bkang ste/_khye'u rin chen byin la byin no/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[104b.5\]]thams cad mi zad pa'i bden pa gang lags pa'i bden pa des na dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad tshim par ma gyur gyi bar du khar ba'i snod 'di yongs su 'grib par ma gyur cig_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi lhung bzed bkang nas dge slong gi dge 'dun la 
[\[104b.6\]]smras pa/_btsun pa rnams bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du gang gis bdag la 'bras bu chen por 'gyur ba'i bsod snyoms 'di bzhes te/_gang lus kyis yon sbyong bar mi byed pa dang /_sems kyis sbyong bar mi byed pa dang /_gang la phul na bsod nams su mi 'gyur ba 
[\[104b.7\]]dang /_rnam par smin par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las dang mi ldan pa dang /_/gang 'dus byas la mi gnas pa dang /_gang 'dus ma byas la mi gnas pa dang /_gang so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyis ma gos pa dang /_
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]nyan thos kyi chos rnams la mi rten pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la nges par mi 'byung ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar mi 'dod pa des bzhes shig_/de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun de dag gi nang nas sus kyang snod de ma blangs so/_/khye'u rin 
[\[105a.2\]]chen byin gyis smras pa/_btsun pa dag bdag kyang sbyin par 'dod pa lags/_khyed kyang gsol bar bzhed pa lags te/_bdag btsun pa rnams las ci yang re ba ma mchis kyi bzhes shig_/'jam dpal gyi tshad dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba 
[\[105a.3\]]phrag 'bum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de bas kyang ches bye ba phrag 'bum las lhag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/_bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gyur ba'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des na khar ba'i 
[\[105a.4\]]snod 'di las khyed thams cad kyi lhung bzed rnams gang bar gyur cig_/khar ba'i snod 'di yang yongs su zad par ma gyur cig ces byas so/_/de nas dge slong gi dge 'dun thams cad kyi lhung bzed de dag gang bar gyur to/_/de nas khye'u rin chen byin gyis yangs 
[\[105a.5\]]pa'i grong khyer gyi skye bo'i tshogs ji snyed yod pa thams cad kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa des tshim par byas so/_/bsod snyoms de yang zad par ma gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u rin chen byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rin chen byin lnga po 'di dag ni byang 
[\[105a.6\]]chub sems dpa'i yon yongs su sbyong ba ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_lus mi dmigs pa dang /_sems mi dmigs pa dang /_sbyin pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang /_rnam par smin pa mi 'dod pa dang /_len pa po rnams la rnam par smin pa med pa'o/_/rin 
[\[105a.7\]]chen byin bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas rtag tu mngon du bya ba ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_bdag gi las kyi rnam par smin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/'jam dpal khye'u rin chen byin 'di bskal pa sum cu na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[105b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang grags pa don yod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 
[\[105b.3\]]'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i 'khor du 'dus pa yang mtha' yas par 'gyur te/_thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sha stag go/_/de dag kyang 'od mtha' yas pa dang /_tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'jam dpal gzhon nur 
[\[105b.4\]]gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/chos nyid kyi skye bo zhes bya bar 
[\[105b.5\]]yang zung shig_/de nas bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun dang thabs cig tu bsod snyoms bzhes nas gshegs so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen byin dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 
[\[105b.6\]]'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen 
[\[105b.7\]]po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_pradz+nyA warma dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]{D185}]@##/_rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya ta thA ga ta gu Na dz+nyA na a tsin t+ya bi Sha ya a ba tA ra ni ra de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa zhes bya ba 
[\[106a.2\]]theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na chos kyi dbye dgon pa na byang chub kyi snying po kun tu 'od 
[\[106a.3\]]kyi khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]bsod nams kyi rgyan gyi tshogs chen po bsags pa/_dga' ba rgya chen po skyed pa/_kun nas ma smad pa/_yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa na bzhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[106a.4\]]sangs rgyas pa/_legs par thugs su chud pa'i blo dang ldan pa/_kun tu spyod pa gnyis mi mnga' ba/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos la mchog tu gzhol bar mdzad pa/_sangs rgyas kyi gnas pas gnas pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid brnyes 
[\[106a.5\]]pa/_sgrib pa med pa'i rtogs pa brnyes pa/_phyir mi zlog pa'i chos dang ldan pa/_spyod yul gyis mi 'phrogs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' yas pa rgyun mi gcod pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'jog pa/_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi dam pa'i 
[\[106a.6\]]pha rol tu byon pa/_dus gsum la mnyam pa nyid tshar phyin pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa'i sku dang ldan pa/_chos thams cad la the tsom med pa'i mkhyen pa mnga' ba/_spyod pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i blo mnga' ba/_chos mkhyen pa la nem 
[\[106a.7\]]nur mi mnga' ba/_rnam par ma brtags pa'i sku mnga' ba/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis ye shes yang dag par blangs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi gnas pa gnyis su med pa dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa ma 'dres pa rnam par thar par mdzad 
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin pa/_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa/_chos kyi dbyings dam pa can/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor 
[\[106b.2\]]lo bskor ba rgyun mi gcod pa'i sku mnga' ba pad ma'i snying po can gyi seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/_dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_'od srung chen po dang /_ma 
[\[106b.3\]]'gags pa dang /_rab 'byor dang /_kA t+yA'i bu dang /_ka pi na chen po dang /_nag pa dang /_dga' bo dang /_chu klung 'od srung dang /_ga yA 'od srung dang /_lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_byams ma'i bu gang po dang /_ba lang bdag dang /_lam phran bstan dang /_
[\[106b.4\]]gyad bu nor dang /_seng ldeng nags pa dang /_skul byed dang /_gsus po che chen po dang /_sgra gcan zin dang /_kun dga' bo dang /_de dag la sogs pa dge slong 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis po de dag thams cad kyang chos gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba/_
[\[106b.5\]]'phags pa'i spyod yul la gnas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyi tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang gzhi med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul ba sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang mi rten par gnas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad 
[\[106b.6\]]kyang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral ba sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul dang spyod yul la zhugs pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/
[\[106b.7\]]thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos kyi tshul gcig la yang dag par gzhol ba sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon du phyogs pa sha stag go/_/
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rgyun ma bcad pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las yid phyir ma log pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang shes rab dang ye shes mngon par grub pa'i yid dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/
[\[107a.2\]]thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang lhag mthong dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang thabs kyi yul dang /_spyod yul la nges par byung ba sha stag go/_/dge slong ma skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo dang /_dge slong ma grags 
[\[107a.3\]]'dzin la sogs pa dge slong ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang yang thabs cig ste/_thams cad kyang dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su bsdus pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 
[\[107a.4\]]thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi snang ba'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos thams cad dngos po med par rab tu rtogs pa sha stag go/_/chos thams cad la mtshan nyid med par zhugs pa/_chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mthar rig pa/_chos thams 
[\[107a.5\]]cad ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_gnyen po med par mos pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gnas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'dul ba'i sems can ji lta ba de bzhin du rnam par mi rtog cing lhun gyis 
[\[107a.6\]]grub par gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog dang /_spyod lam shin tu ston pa sha stag go/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 
[\[107a.7\]]'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang /_kun nas 'dren dang /_kun tu sprul dang /_kun tu shes rab dang /_kun tu mig dang /_kun tu 'od dang /_kun tu snang ba dang /_kun tu 'od 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]zer dang /_kun tu rtog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu blo dang /_shugs chen dang /_shugs chen 'dzin dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa chen po'i rgyal po dang /_brtson 'grus chen pos rnam par 
[\[107b.2\]]gnon dang /_rtsal chen dpa' ba dang /_cher bsgyings dang /_bsgyings pa chen po'i stobs dang /_tshogs kyi dbang po chen po dang /_spos kyi bal glang glang po che chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zla ba chen po dang /_zla ba 
[\[107b.3\]]bzang dang /_yon tan zla ba dang /_rin chen zla ba dang /_kun tu snang ba'i zla ba dang /_chos dri ma med pa'i zla ba dang /_rnam par snang byed zla ba dang /_rnam par bsgrags pa'i zla ba dang /_'od zer rab tu gtong ba'i zla ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[107b.4\]]sems dpa' chen po zla gang dang /_tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang /_tshangs pa'i dbang pos bsgrags pa'i dbyangs dang /_sa'i sgra dbyangs dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi sgra dbyangs dang /_bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'joms pa'i dbyangs dang /_chos 
[\[107b.5\]]kyi rnga chen sgra dbyangs dang /_kun tu go bar byed pa'i dbyangs dang /_mi rtog rnam par mi rtog dbyangs dang /_sa steng sgra dbyangs dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbyangs kyi yan lag thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i dbyangs dang /_kun nas 
[\[107b.6\]]snying po dang /_kun tu dri ma med pa'i snying po dang /_yon tan snying po dang /_rnam par snang mdzad snying po dang /_rin chen snying po dang /_zla ba'i snying po dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_snang byed snying po dang /_pad ma'i dpal gyi snying po dang /_rdo rje'i snying po dang /_
[\[107b.7\]]blo gros bzang po dang /_blo gros chen po dang /_khyad par blo gros dang /_rnam grags blo gros dang /_rgyal chen blo gros dang /_bla ma'i blo gros dang /_'phel ba'i blo gros dang /_mtha' yas blo gros dang /_yangs pa'i blo gros dang /_sangs rgyas blo gros dang /_blo 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]gros mi zad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros rgya mtsho dang /_brtan pa'i blo gros dang /_rdo rje blo gros dang /_sangs rgyas mngon sum blo gros dang /_ri rab mar me dang /_mar me chen po dang /_chos kyi sgron ma'i 
[\[108a.2\]]mar me dang /_phyogs thams cad du khyab pa'i mar me dang /_kun tu mar me dang /_mun pa thams cad sel ba'i mar me dang /_'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i mar me dang /_gcig tu snang ba'i mar me dang /_zla ba'i mar me dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[108a.3\]]sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i mar me dang /_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lag na rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin chen gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rin chen 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_nam mkha' mdzod gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[108a.4\]]dang /_sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rnam par sel ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_dpal gyi snying po 
[\[108a.5\]]gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_seng ge gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_zla ba'i 'od zer gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_mchog gi blo gros gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_rgyan bkod pa gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_lag na pad ma dang /_lag na rdo rje 
[\[108a.6\]]dang /_nyi 'od dang /_nor bu dang /_glog dang /_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i 'od dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_mya ngan dang mun pa thams cad 'joms pa'i blo gros dang /_byang 
[\[108a.7\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yul thams cad las nges par 'byung ba'i blo gros dang /_rdul med rnam par gnon dang /_rnam dag rnam par gnon dang /_phung po rnam par gnon dang /_skye mched rnam par gnon dang /_khams rnam par gnon dang /_stong 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]pa nyid rnam par gnon dang /_mtshan ma med pa rnam par gnon dang /_smon pa med pa rnam par gnon dang /_skye ba med pa rnam par gnon dang /_'gag pa med pa rnam par gnon dang /_'gro ba med pa rnam par gnon dang /_'ong ba med pa rnam par gnon dang /_'chi 'pho med pa rnam par gnon dang /_
[\[108b.2\]]mi skye ba rnam par gnon dang /_rang bzhin 'od gsal rnam par gnon dang /_'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon dang /_mtha' yas rnam par gnon dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par gnon dang /_chos 
[\[108b.3\]]thams cad rnam par gnon dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad rnam par gnon dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa rnam par gnon dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnam par gnon dang /_yang 
[\[108b.4\]]dag pa'i mtha' rnam par gnon dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par gnon dang /_mnyam pa nyid rnam par gnon dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos dbyings rnam par gnon dang /_bdud yul mi gos dang /_bdud las rgyal dang /_
[\[108b.5\]]bdud las rgyal chen po dang /_gtsug na rin po che dang /_'od zer stong gi 'od 'phro dang /_mngon par 'byung dka' dang /_rab tu thub dka' dang /_rtogs dka' dang /_bsnyen par dka' ba'i blo dang /_ngan 'gro skem dang /_bzang skyong dang /_dkon mchog 
[\[108b.6\]]'byung gnas dang /_ded dpon bzang po dang /_mis byin dang /_chu lha'i lha dang /_zla ba'i lha dang /_dri ma med kyis byin dang /_dri ma med par grags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub 
[\[108b.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed thams cad kyang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dang gzhan dag nas 'dus pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la dpyod pa dang /_thabs dang /_tshul dang /_'dul ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i chos la 'god pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 
[\[109a.2\]]la dpyod pa'i tshul shes pa rab 'byam la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sa'i spyod yul shes pa la dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang spros pa thams cad shin tu chad cing spyod pa len pa rnam par chad 
[\[109a.3\]]de sems can gyi khams thams cad sdud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa la shin tu mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa chud mi za ba mi dmigs par 
[\[109a.4\]]dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal dang /_dbang po dang /_rtsom pa dang /_sbyor ba la shin tu dpyod cing so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad 
[\[109a.5\]]kyang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'i don dang tshig dang /_yi ge gzung ba dang blang ba shes pa yang dag par 'dzin cing rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa dang /_
[\[109a.6\]]'jig rten las 'das pa dang /_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_dus dang rim pa'i tshul la so sor rtog pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'das pa dang /_
[\[109a.7\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor skad cig gcig gis de ma thag tu thob par gnas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig la 'chi 'pho dang /_'byung ba dang /_skye ba 
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' bar spyod pa sbyor ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la 
[\[109b.2\]]mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi phyir sems bskyed cing byang chub rnam par 'tshang rgya ba dang ma bral ba sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi sems kyi dmigs pa la 'jug pas sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems 
[\[109b.3\]]kyi dmigs pa la mkhas pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang rang byung gi ye shes kyi sa las ma bskyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis thob par sbyong ba las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag go/_/
[\[109b.4\]]thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du byed pa'i stobs rgyun mi gcod cing mngon par 'du mi byed pa shes pa'i tshul la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi bya ba la bskal pa mtha' yas par spyod pa kun tu 'dzin par byin gyis rlob pa 
[\[109b.5\]]la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang phyad par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byin gyis rlob cing gdul bya'i khams 'gro ba thams cad 'dzud pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[109b.6\]]thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gnas la 'jug pa dang /_sbyong ba'i stobs kyi khyad par dang smon lam phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyi bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 
[\[109b.7\]]sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad kyi thad du 'gro zhing skul ba la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul kun tu 'dzin pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs rgyun mi gcod par byed pa 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston par byed pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyong bar byed pa sha stag go/_/
[\[110a.2\]]thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod par byed pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa la zhugs pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang nam mkha'i khams ltar tshad med pa'i chos dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/
[\[110a.3\]]thams cad kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' dang chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang las kyis kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa la 
[\[110a.4\]]mos pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang rgyus kun nas bslang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu la mos pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang rgya'i 'bur kun tu 'byung ba lta bur chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang mig yor dang /_
[\[110a.5\]]gzugs brnyan ltar ston pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs kyi rnam par rig pa brag ca dang mtshungs pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas 
[\[110a.6\]]pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsen pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa'i mdog yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzugs la gnas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 
[\[110a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag tu skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'chi 'pho dang /_'byung ba dang /_skye ba dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyad par sbyor ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba dang /_mngon par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang skyil mo krung gcig gis phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi 
[\[110b.2\]]khams thams cad kyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gengs par shes pa dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan zhing gcig tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa 
[\[110b.3\]]sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gang dag yin pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi 'khor du ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[110b.4\]]gcig gi 'khor gang yin pa de phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos thams cad mtha' dang dbung med par ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/
[\[110b.5\]]thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus rang gi lus su kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku sangs rgyas gcig gi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas gcig 
[\[110b.6\]]gi sku sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur zhugs par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rang gi lus su chud par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can gcig gi lus 
[\[110b.7\]]la dus gsum gyi sems can rnams kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang 'das pa'i dus la ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus la 'das pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus dang /_da ltar byung ba'i dus la 'das pa 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang lus gcig gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la lus dpag tu med grangs med pa las ldang ba la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/lus dpag tu med cing grangs 
[\[111a.2\]]med pa dag gis ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs la/_lus gcig las ldang bar kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus snyed kyi mngon par byang chub pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams 
[\[111a.3\]]cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus la sems can gcig gi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/sems can gcig gi lus la sems can thams cad kyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can thams cad kyi lus las 
[\[111a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku las sems can gyi lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems can gyi lus chos kyi skur kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad 
[\[111a.5\]]kyang zhing thams cad kyi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing gcig tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/zhing gcig gi rgyan bkod pa de dag zhing thams cad du kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang chos kyi sku sems can gyi lus su kun tu ston pa la 
[\[111a.6\]]mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang spu'i khung bu gcig tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jug par byed pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i smon lam gyi stobs 
[\[111a.7\]]kyi gnas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na gdul bya'i sems can yongs su smin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]tu kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang bskal pa bgrangs pa thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i lus kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang sems bskyed pa 
[\[111b.2\]]gcig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams re re na sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_
[\[111b.3\]]'du shes can dang /_'du shes can ma yin pa dang /_rkang gnyis pa dang /_rkang bzhi pa dang /_rkang mang dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin 
[\[111b.4\]]dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa sems can gdul bya yongs su smin pa thams cad ji lta ba de bzhin du lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par spyod pa dang /_spyod lam dang bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa 
[\[111b.5\]]sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag 'jug par byed kyang sems can la gnod pa med pa la mkhas 
[\[111b.6\]]pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag yud tsam gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/yud tsam gcig 
[\[111b.7\]]bskal pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa la mkhas pa sha stag go/_/thams cad kyang spyod lam ji lta bus sems can rnams yongs su smin 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par gzugs kyi lus kyi kha dog dang /_spyod lam kun tu ston pa la mkhas pa sha stag ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /_gzhan dag thams cad kyang 
[\[112a.2\]]yon tan bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang ldan pa sha stag go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nas 'dus pa'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_
[\[112a.3\]]lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa sha stag dang yang thabs cig go/_/
[\[112a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas kyang rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga 
[\[112a.5\]]la ba der lhags so/_/brgya byin bye ba phrag brgya dang /_lha'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral bye ba phrag brgya dang /_lha'i rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan bye ba phrag brgya dang /_lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul bye ba phrag brgya dang /_lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa bye ba phrag 
[\[112a.6\]]brgya la lha'i rgyal po re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/ded dpon 
[\[112a.7\]]la sogs pa bdud kyi ris kyi lha bye ba phrag mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/srin po'i rgyal 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]po 'bum phrag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_'byung po'i rgyal po 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa brgyad dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po 'bum phrag brgyad cu dang /_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa lnga dang /_drang srong 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu thams cad kyang 
[\[112b.2\]]mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa sha stag dang /_rlung gi rgyal po chen po rnam par 'thor rlung dang /_rnam par 'thor rlung chen po g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag dang /_tshangs pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshangs pa chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'od chung bye ba 
[\[112b.3\]]phrag brgya dang /_tshad med 'od bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'od gsal bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dge chung bye ba phrag brgya dang /_tshad med dge bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dge rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang /_sprin med bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'bras bu che bye ba phrag brgya dang /_
[\[112b.4\]]bsod nams skyes bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gya nom snang bye ba phrag brgya dang /_shin tu mthong bye ba phrag brgya dang /_mi che ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_mi gdung ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_'og min gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag la tshangs pa chen po re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po 
[\[112b.5\]]dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa gnas 
[\[112b.6\]]gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/klu'i dbang po bye ba phrag 
[\[112b.7\]]brgya dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_dri za'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_lha ma yin gyi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_nam mkha' lding gi dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_mi'am ci'i dbang po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po bye ba 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/
[\[113a.2\]]mi dang ma yin pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/dge bsnyen 
[\[113a.3\]]dang dge bsnyen ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/rtswa 
[\[113a.4\]]dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal gyi lha gang dag yin pa dag dang /_lhun po dang /_lhun po chen po dang /_btang bzung dang /_btang bzung chen po dang /_gangs ri dang /_khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po la sogs pa ri rnams kyi lha 
[\[113a.5\]]gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad gnas dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/rgya mtsho dang /_
[\[113a.6\]]rgya mtsho chen po dang /_chu klung dang /_chu bran dang /_mtsho bran dang /_mtshe'u dang /_chu mig dang /_'bab chu rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyang gnas dang bcas te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod 
[\[113a.7\]]pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang /_'or rnams kyi lha gang dag yin 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]pa de dag kyang rang gis gnas dang lhan cig tu/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/klu dang /_gnod 
[\[113b.2\]]sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas rnams kyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang rang rang gi gnas su zhugs te/_bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod 
[\[113b.3\]]pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi mthus sems can 'ga' la yang gnod pa med cing sgrib pa med do/_/zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dang /_
[\[113b.4\]]rgya mtsho bye ba phrag brgya re re yang g.yog 'khor mang po dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/
[\[113b.5\]]klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa yang 'khor dang bcas te bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/dud 'gro'i skye 
[\[113b.6\]]gnas su song ba'i sems can thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir dang /_phyag bya ba'i phyir dang /_mchod pa'i phyir dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir dang /_chos mnyan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags so/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 
[\[113b.7\]]song ba'i sems can de dag thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la mos pa/_theg pa chen po la gzhol ba thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes 'dod pa sha stag go/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi kha dog dang /_gzugs dang /_gzi brjid dang /_'od kyis 'khor thams 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]cad zil gyis mnan te/_lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na nyi mas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa phyung ste srin bu me khyer thams cad zil gyis mnan nas lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom 
[\[114a.2\]]ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad zil gyis mnan te lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga la zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprin gyi dra ba las grol ba ni skar ma'i tshogs thams 
[\[114a.3\]]cad zil gyis mnan nas lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad spa bkong ste zil gyis mnan nas lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge ste/_ri'i rgyal po ri rab ltar dpal 
[\[114a.4\]]gyis rab tu 'bar te/_sku mi g.yo/_mi 'gyur/_mi 'gul bar lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[114a.5\]]sras de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'di ni sku mi g.yo/_mi 'gyur/_mi 'gul bar bzhugs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[114a.6\]]so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni rab tu 'byung bar mngon du phyogs shing khyim nas mngon par 'byung bar shes so/_/kha cig gis ni rab tu byung zhing dka' ba spyod pa la gnas par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang 
[\[114a.7\]]nas kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying por gshegs par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bdud 'khor grangs med dpag tu med pas bskor ba bcom par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni lha dang /_
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis ded dpon chen po rgyal lo rgyal lo zhes spro bar byed par 
[\[114b.2\]]shes so/_/kha cig gis ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas brgya byin rnams gsol ba 'debs par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni tshangs pa rnams la gsol ba 'debs par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni 'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 
[\[114b.3\]]'das la gsol ba 'debs par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la sbyin pa'i gtam ston par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la tshul khrims kyi gtam ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni 
[\[114b.4\]]bzod pa'i gtam/_kha cig gis ni brtson 'grus kyi gtam/_kha cig gis ni bsam gtan gyi gtam/_kha cig gis ni shes rab kyi gtam bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni thabs la mkhas pa'i gtam/_kha cig gis ni rdzu 'phrul 
[\[114b.5\]]gyi gtam/_kha cig gis ni smon lam gyi gtam/_kha cig gis ni ye shes kyi gtam bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam/_kha cig gis ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam/_kha cig gis ni theg 
[\[114b.6\]]pa chen po'i gtam/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni sems can dmyal bar skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni dud 'gror skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par 
[\[114b.7\]]shes so/_/kha cig gis ni [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang du 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba dang /_kha cig gis ni 'thab bral gyi gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/kha cig 
[\[115a.2\]]gis ni dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang /_kha cig gis ni 'phrul dga'i gnas su skye ba dang /_kha cig gis ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas su skye ba dang /_kha cig gis ni bdud kyi gnas su skye bu dang /_kha cig gis ni tshangs pa'i gnas su skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 
[\[115a.3\]]'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs 'khor dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu 
[\[115a.4\]]che dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min dang /_nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 
[\[115a.5\]]'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni mir skye ba'i chos rnams/_kha cig gis ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams/_kha cig gis ni gling gnyis dang /_gsum dang /_bzhi pa'i 'khor los 
[\[115a.6\]]sgyur ba dang /_stong gnyis dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba'i chos rnams bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la ston par shes so/_/'jam 
[\[115a.7\]]dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'dom do tsam du 'phags par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni rgyang grags tsam du 'phags/_kha cig gis ni rgyang grags gnyis tsam du 'phags/_kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]tshad tsam du 'phags par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad gnyis tsam du 'phags par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad bcu tsam du 'phags par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis 
[\[115b.2\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong du shes so/_/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad stong phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni dpag tshad 'bum dang /_kha cig gis 
[\[115b.3\]]ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu par shes so/_/kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad khri bzhi stong par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas 
[\[115b.4\]]kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dpag tshad 'bum phrag bgrangs pa las 'das par shes so/_/'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu/_kha cig 
[\[115b.5\]]gis ni nor bu rin po che chen po an+da rnyil gyi kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che skar 'od kyi kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che pad ma rA ga'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya 
[\[115b.6\]]byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu/_
[\[115b.7\]]kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che shel gyi kha dog tu shes so/_/kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu/_kha cig gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu shes so/_/
[\[116a.2\]]'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i kha dog tu shes so/_/'jam dpal kha dog dang /_spyod lam dang /_dbyibs gang dang gang kho nas sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba/_'jam dpal de bzhin ga
[\[116a.3\]]shegs pa kha dog dang /_spyod lam dang /_dbyibs de dang de kho nar sems can rnams kyis mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal chos bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i chos de dang de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa ston par sems can rnams 
[\[116a.4\]]kyis shes so/_/'jam dpal spyod pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'dzud cing 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs par sems can rnams kyis shes so/_/'jam dpal gal te shar phyogs kyi 
[\[116a.5\]]'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[116a.6\]]mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su gang bar gyur la/_shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho dang /_de bzhin du nub dang /_de bzhin du byang dang /_de bzhin du 
[\[116a.7\]]shar lho dang /_de bzhin du lho nub dang /_de bzhin du nub byang dang /_de bzhin du byang shar dang /_de bzhin du steng dang /_de bzhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]tshad med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin 
[\[116b.2\]]pa dag gis dper na 'dam bu'i tshal lam/_bu ram shing gi tshal lam/_til gyi zhing bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag 'jam dpal gal te de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas 'dul ba yin na/_sems can de dang de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan 
[\[116b.3\]]snga na 'dom gang tsam na 'khod par shes so/_/'jam dpal kha dog dang /_spyod lam dang /_gnas gang dang gang gis sems can de dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang de kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par sems can de dag gis mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal chos 
[\[116b.4\]]bstan pa gang dang gang gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de dang de nyid kyi chos ston par thos so/_/'jam dpal spyod pa gang gis sems can de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'i spyod pa de dang de la de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs te/_
[\[116b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba yar gyi ngo'i dkyil 'khor nam phyed kyi dus na 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad kyis so so'i mdun na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dug par 
[\[116b.6\]]shes kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni sems can de dag gis bdag ci'i phyir zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du shes par 'gyur bar bdag sems can de dag gi mdun na 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ma 'dres pa'i chos 
[\[116b.7\]]dang ldan pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de lta bu'i bya ba 'di 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang 'khor dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal 
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]du med/_tshad med/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i dbus na bzhugs na de dag thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par mthong mod kyi/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[117a.2\]]mdun na bzhugs par shes par 'gyur bar nga sems can de dag gi mdun du 'dug par bya'o snyam du mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mdun na bzhugs par shes so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma 
[\[117a.3\]]'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal dper na sems can rnams kyi las kyi tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams kyi 'du byed tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab rnams 'byung bar 'du byed rnams ni mi rtog_/rnam 
[\[117a.4\]]par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang 'du byed de dag lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab rnams kyi bya ba dag la 'jug go/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can 
[\[117a.5\]]rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab kyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha ma dang /_'bring dang /_rab tu sems can rnams kyis mthong yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 
[\[117a.6\]]mdzad pa de lta bu de lhun gyis grub par 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya rigs ma ni ras tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa nyid du 'gyur te/_'jam dpal gal te nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ras ser po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya kha dog 
[\[117a.7\]]ser por 'gyur/_gal te ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya kha dog dmar por 'gyur/_gal te ras sngon po'i steng du bzhag na ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya kha dog sngon por 'gyur te/_de ltar ras kha dog ci dang ci 'dra ba'i steng du bzhag pa de dang de nyid kyi kha dog kho 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]nar 'gyur yang 'jam dpal nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang sems can tha dad pa nyid kyi dbang gis kha dog tha dad pa 
[\[117b.2\]]nyid du 'gyur te/_'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog 
[\[117b.3\]]lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can rnams mu tig gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mu tig gi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/
[\[117b.4\]]gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog lta 
[\[117b.5\]]bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[117b.6\]]sku nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te 
[\[117b.7\]]sems can rnams nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni de dag gis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/
[\[118a.2\]]gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/_de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal gal te sems can rnams 
[\[118a.3\]]nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/_de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gal te sems can rnams nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog lta bus gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/_
[\[118a.4\]]de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nor bu rin po che chu 'dang gi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong bas gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/_de dag 
[\[118a.5\]]gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba'i kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sbyar te sems can rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog gis 
[\[118a.6\]]gdul bar bya ba yin na ni/_de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i bar gyi kha dog tu mthong ngo /_/gzugs med par skyes pa'i bar gyi gzugs dang /_lus dang /_
[\[118a.7\]]kha dog dang /_spyod lam gang dang gang gis sems can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog dang /_spyod lam de dang de lta bur de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/de bzhin du sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_'du shes can dang /_'du shes can ma yin pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi sems can rnams kyi gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog dang /_spyod lam gang dang gang 
[\[118b.2\]]gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog dang /_spyod lam de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa mthong yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can 'di dag gis gser gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong 
[\[118b.3\]]bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che bai dUr+ya'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che an da rnyil gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la nor bu rin po 
[\[118b.4\]]che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che 
[\[118b.5\]]'od thams cad bsdus pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa 
[\[118b.6\]]rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho'i gnas rnam par dag pa rin po che bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can 
[\[118b.7\]]gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_/nor bu rin po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]po che seng ge'i rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che brgya byin thogs pa'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che rdo rje 
[\[119a.2\]]snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che rdo rje snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che lha thams cad snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che lha thams cad 
[\[119a.3\]]snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che nyi zla snang ba'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig_/
[\[119a.4\]]sems can 'di dag gis ni nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron ma'i kha dog tu mthong bar gyur la/_nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi kha dog tu mthong bar ni ma gyur cig ces mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can 
[\[119a.5\]]rnams la yang brjod par bya ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog pa de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo //_//bam po gnyis pa/_'jam dpal dper na nor 
[\[119a.6\]]bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po gang du 'byung ba der lcags dang lcags las byas pa'i yo byad rnams mi 'byung mod kyi/_'jam dpal 'on kyang nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'di snyam du bdag gang du byung ba der lcags dang lcags las byas pa'i yo 
[\[119a.7\]]byad rnams 'byung bar ma gyur cig snyam du mi sems mod kyi/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ba der mu stegs can spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]bu pa la sogs pa mu stegs can gyi gnas thams cad mi 'byung /_der lta bar gyur pa thams cad mi 'byung /_der 'khrug pa thams cad mi 'byung /_der mtshams med pa lnga po dag mi 'byung /_der mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams mi 'byung /_der rgyal po'i bka' 
[\[119b.2\]]lung dang /_chos gces pa 'dor ba mi 'byung /_der nyi zla'i 'od dag mi 'byung /_der brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dag dang lha thams cad kyi 'od dag mi 'byung /_der nor bu rin po che'i 'od rnams dang /_me'i 'od rnams dang /_glog gi 'od rnams 
[\[119b.3\]]mi 'byung /_der yud tsam dang /_yud tsam phyed dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_lor bgrang ba rnams mi 'byung ste/_'jam dpal gzhan du na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs ni ma gtogs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[119b.4\]]gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i 'od kyis reg pa de dag thams cad nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen 
[\[119b.5\]]po'i kha dog tu 'gyur yang nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa'i 'od kyis reg 
[\[119b.6\]]pa de dag thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi kha dog tu 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na nor bu 
[\[119b.7\]]rin po che chen po bai dUr+ya byi dor legs par byas pa mgo'i rgyan nam/_mgul ba'i rgyan nam/_lag pa'i rgyan nam/_rkang pa'i rgyan yang rung ste/_gang dang gang gis logs na rgyan du 'dug pa de dang der rgyan du shin tu lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/nor bu rin po che chen po bai dUr+ya de 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]nyid kyi mthus rgyan de dag kyang shin tu lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger 'dug kyang nor bu rin po che chen po bai dUr+ya mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[120a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang spyod lam gyi gnas gang dang gang gis nyan thos kyi spyod pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa'am/_spyod pa pa dang /_kun tu rgyu dang /_gcer bu 
[\[120a.3\]]pa'i spyod pa'am/_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_srin po'i spyod pa'am/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za'i spyod pa'am/_spyod pa gang dang gang la gnas pa'i spyod pa de dang de nyid shin tu 
[\[120a.4\]]lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid kyi mthus spyod pa de shin tu lam me/_lhan ne/_lhang nger rnam par mdzes kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa 
[\[120a.5\]]de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na sa la gnas/_sa la brten nas sa bon thams cad dang /_rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal rnams skye zhing 'phel la shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang 'jam dpal sa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun 
[\[120a.6\]]gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye zhing 'phel te/_shin tu rgyas pa nyid du 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs 
[\[120a.7\]]pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na sprin chen pos 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad khebs par byas nas rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]su char pa chen po rab tu phab ste/_ro gcig pa'i chu'i rgyun des rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal rnam pa tha dad pa rnams skye bar byed cing gnas rnam pa tha dad pa rnams su chu de ro tha dad pa dang /_kha dog tha dad par yang gnas la/_'jam dpal sprin ni mi 
[\[120b.2\]]rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba tha dad pa rnams 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad 
[\[120b.3\]]sangs rgyas kyi sku'i sprin gyis khyab par mdzad de/_sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/_smon lam dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa thams cad la chos kyi char chen po mngon par phab ste/_'jam dpal chos kyi char 
[\[120b.4\]]de yang ro gcig pa yin mod kyi/_'jam dpal sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bsags pa/_smon lam dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa tha dad cing mos pa tha dad pa la gnas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_smon lam dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa 
[\[120b.5\]]tha dad pa la zhugs pa rnams la rnam pa tha dad pa nyid kyi chos tha dad pa kho na'i char pas nus pa ji lta ba dang /_mthu ji lta ba bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'di lta ste/_sems can 'di dag la ni nyan thos kyi ye 
[\[120b.6\]]shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag la ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/
[\[120b.7\]]sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha'i gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag la ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas su skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin du sbyar te 'thab bral rnams dang /_dga' ldan 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]rnams dang /_'phrul dga' rnams dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang /_de bzhin du tshangs pa rnams dang /_tshangs chen rnams dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang /_'od chung rnams dang /_tshad med 'od rnams dang /_'od gsal rnams dang /_dge chung 
[\[121a.2\]]rnams dang /_tshad med dge rnams dang /_dge rgyas rnams dang /_sprin med rnams dang /_bsod nams skyes rnams dang /_'bras bu che ba rnams dang /_mi che ba rnams dang /_mi gdung ba rnams dang /_gya nom snang rnams dang /_shin tu mthong rnams dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris rnams 
[\[121a.3\]]dang /_'og min rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/sems can 'di dag la ni rgyal por skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[121a.4\]]ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag la ni mir skye ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o/_/sems can 'di dag la ni dbang phyug tu 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs dag rnam par bskyed par bya'o snyam du 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[121a.5\]]pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can smon lam dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa ji lta ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji ltar bsags pa bzhin du mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/_de bzhin 
[\[121a.6\]]gshegs pa ni thams cad du btang snyoms su bzhugs shing btang snyoms la rnam par mi rtog go/_/'jam dpal dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas 'dzam bu'i gling gi mun pa mun nag thams cad med par 'gyur yang 
[\[121a.7\]]nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ma thag tu ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]bas sems can rnams kyi lta bar 'gyur ba'i mun pa thams cad med par gyur te/_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 'jig rten gyi khams su lta bar gyur pa 'byung ba ni ma gtogs so/_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs 
[\[121b.2\]]pa ni ngas sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa bsal lo snyam mam/_bsal bar bya'o snyam du mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_'on kyang 'jam dpal lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[121b.3\]]gshegs pa ni thams cad du rnam par mi rtog cing mnyam ste btang snyoms pa'o/_/'jam dpal dper na sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis bya ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_lus tha dad pa sna tshogs ston kyang 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa de ni brjod du med pa ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_
[\[121b.4\]]yi ge med pa/_sgra med pa/_yul med pa/_dngos po med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshan nyid med pa/_gnyis su med pa/_kun tu spyod pa med pa/_chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam zhing gnyen po med pa yin yang 'jam dpal sgyu ma sprul pa ni sgyu ma mkhan gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub 
[\[121b.5\]]cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba sna tshogs ston to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor gyi nang na gzugs kyi sku dang /_kha dog dang /_spyod pa dang /_spyod lam dang /_bya ba la 'jug pa'i 
[\[121b.6\]]gnas sna tshogs 'byung mod kyi/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de ni brjod du med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_yi ge med pa/_sgra med pa/_yul med pa/_dngos po med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mtshan nyid med pa/_gnyis su med pa/_kun tu spyod pa med pa/_chos 
[\[121b.7\]]kyi dbyings dang mtshungs shing gnyen po med pa/_khams gsum las yang dag par 'das pa ste/_'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can gyi dbang gis mdzad pa sna tshogs dag ston to/_/'jam dpal dper na nyi ma ni gcig kho na yin 
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]na ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi rnams su sems can rnams kyis rnam pa mang por mthong ste/_kha cig gis ni de 'char bar mthong /_kha cig gis ni shar zin par mthong /_kha cig gis ni bag dros pa tsam du mthong /_kha cig 
[\[122a.2\]]gis ni dros chen tsam du shes/_kha cig gis ni nam phyed/_kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed/_kha cig gis ni nyi ma mel tse thun gcig tsam du shar bar shes/_kha cig gis ni nyi ma phyed yol tsam du shes/_kha cig gis ni nyi ma snur tsam du shes/_
[\[122a.3\]]kha cig gis ni tho rangs tsam du shes te/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gcig yin mod kyi/_'on kyang gling bzhi dag tu sems can rnams kyis gzhan dang gzhan dag tu mthong yang nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_lhun gyis grub cing rnam par 
[\[122a.4\]]mi rtog bzhin du ri rab kyi dbang gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba sna tshogs ston to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can gyi dbang gis 'khor gcig kho na'i nang nas kyang 
[\[122a.5\]]sems can kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes/_kha cig gis ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par shes so/_/'khor de nyid kyi 
[\[122a.6\]]nang nas kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes/_kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo bcu lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[122a.7\]]'das nas lo bcu lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa snying por gyur par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa nub par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan nas lo bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum 
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs 
[\[122b.2\]]par sangs rgyas nas lo brgya dang /_lo stong lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_lo brgya dang /_lo stong lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas lo 
[\[122b.3\]]stong phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu lon par shes/_kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu lon par shes/_
[\[122b.4\]]kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu lon par shes/_/kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das 
[\[122b.5\]]nas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag bcu dang /_nyi shu dang /_sum cu dang /_bzhi bcu dang /_lnga bcu lon par shes so/_/'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang /_mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par
