[\[122b.6\]]sangs rgyas nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa lon par shes/_'jam dpal 'khor 'di nyid kyi nang nas lha dang /_mi kha cig gis ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod 
[\[122b.7\]]du med pa lon par shes kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog bzhin du sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na 'dzam bu'i 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]gling du rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po langs pas rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo ma thams cad g.yo/_rab tu g.yo/_kun tu rab tu g.yo/_'gul/_rab tu 'gul/_kun tu rab tu 'gul/_'ur 'ur/_rab 
[\[123a.2\]]tu 'ur 'ur/_kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/_'khrugs/_rab tu 'khrugs/_kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing lo ma kha cig ni shar phyogs su dma' la nub phyogs su mtho/_kha cig ni nub phyogs su dma' la/_shar phyogs su mtho/_lo ma kha cig ni mtha' 
[\[123a.3\]]dma' la dbus mtho/_kha cig ni byang phyogs dma' la lho phyogs su mtho yang rtswa dang /_shing gel ba dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_lo ma rnams mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang 'jam dpal rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi dbang gis bya ba sna tshogs 
[\[123a.4\]]ston to/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang sems can gyi dbang gis rtag tu skad cig skad cig la gzugs kyi sku dang /_kha dog dang /_
[\[123a.5\]]spyod pa dang /_smon lam dang /_bya ba la 'jug pa'i gnas grangs med pa dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams su 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa la dmigs pa yid la byed pa ji snyed 
[\[123a.6\]]'byung ba de snyed kyi bskal par sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba'i rgyun chad cing ldog ste/_'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni yon tan 
[\[123a.7\]]tshad med pa dang ldan te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig la dmigs pa'i yon tan gyi mtha' yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]phrag dpag tu med pa grangs med pa dag gis kyang rtogs par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi lha rnams dang /_mi rnams ni ches nyung gi phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags 
[\[123b.2\]]dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal phyi rol gyi drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa 'dod pa dag la 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyis lha'i 
[\[123b.3\]]mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches nyung gi/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i 
[\[123b.4\]]tshad tsam gyi phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[123b.5\]]na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni 'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong ba ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal rang sangs rgyas kyis lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 
[\[123b.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag mthong 
[\[123b.7\]]ba ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pas lha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed mthong ba de bas ni 'jam dpal de bzhin 
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]gshegs pas lha'i spyan gyis shing rta'i phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs gcig na sems can dag gzigs pa ni ches grangs med do/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na shing rta'i 
[\[124a.2\]]phang lo'i tshad tsam gyi sa phyogs thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can re re'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos byung ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba gang dag gzigs pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis 
[\[124a.3\]]mi khyab pa la gnas pa rnams kyis kyang bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du yang bgrang ba'am/_bsam pa'am/_grangs su bya bar sla ba ma yin te/_'jam dpal sems can 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba de dag gis sems dang 
[\[124a.4\]]sems las byung ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis lhun gyis grub par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i 
[\[124a.5\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las 'byung ba rnams rgyu gang dang /_dmigs pa gang dang /_rkyen gang gis ji ltar byung ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can de dag gis spyod pa dang /_spyod lam dang /_bya ba la 'jug pa'i 
[\[124a.6\]]gnas gang dag byung ba dang /_'byung ba dang /_'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal sems can de dag ji 
[\[124a.7\]]ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'dul ba yang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal sems can re re'i ma rig pa'i gnas kyi sa'i nyon mongs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]ma bas mang ba de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pas lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal rgyu gang dang /_dmigs pa gang dang /_rkyen gang gis nyon mongs pa de dag ji ltar 'byung ba dang /_
[\[124b.2\]]thabs kyi shes pa gang gis sems can de dag gi nyon mongs pa ji ltar zhi bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par mi rtog par skad cig thang cig yud tsam cig la rab tu mkhyen to/_/'jam dpal de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[124b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling du gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_'od rab 'bring tha mar snang yang zla ba'i 
[\[124b.4\]]dkyil 'khor ni 'bri ba'am/_'phel ba yang med de/_'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma bgrang ba dang /_yud tsam dang /_yud tsam phyed kyi grangs brtsi bar bya ba de lta bu de yang 'byung la 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog rnam par 
[\[124b.5\]]mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du bsam pa 
[\[124b.6\]]rab 'bring tha mas sems can rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs dang /_kha dog dang /_gzi brjid dang /_'od rab 'bring tha mar mthong yang 'jam dpal sems can gang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_mos pa dang /_smon lam gyi stobs 
[\[124b.7\]]dang /_byin gyi rlabs ci 'dra ba yin pa de 'dra bar de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa la ni rab 'bring tha ma med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni chos 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]kyi sku ste/_shin tu ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_ma 'gags pa yin na/_'jam dpal 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi bsam pa rab 'bring tha mas de bzhin gshegs pa rab 'bring tha mar mthong gi/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog 
[\[125a.2\]]rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_
[\[125a.3\]]mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba dang /_gang dag 
[\[125a.4\]]bshos mi gsol ba dang /_gang dag mthong ba dang /_gang dag mi mthong ba dang /_gang dag sdod pa dang /_gang dag mi sdod pa dang /_gang dag gshe ba dang /_gang dag mi gshe ba dang /_gang dag reg pa dang /_gang dag mi reg pa de dag thams cad kyi bya 
[\[125a.5\]]ba de lta bu rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na gang dag gis nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po mthong ba dang /_reg pa dang /_spyod yul du gnas pa de dag thams cad ni nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po'i 
[\[125a.6\]]kha dog tu 'gyur yang nor bu rin po che mthon ka chen po ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa tha na ri mor bris pa dang /_gzugs su byas pa mthong ba dang /_reg pa dang /_de'i spyod yul yang shes pa de dag 
[\[125a.7\]]thams cad ni gzugs dang /_kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub pa thob par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/'jam dpal dper na rtsi'i rgyal po legs par mthong zhes bya ba sems can gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung /_gang dag gis mthong ba de dag gi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gi rna bas de rlung gis bskyod pa'i sgra thos pa de dag gi rna ba rnam par dag par 
[\[125b.2\]]'gyur/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gi dri tshor ba de dag gi sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gi lces de'i ro myong ba de

[\[125b.5\]]gzugs su byas pa mthong ba de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba des mig rnam par dag par 'gyur/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba yang rung ste/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis de la sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'am/_de 
[\[125b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba'am/_'jig rten mgon po zhes bya ba'am/_thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des rna ba'i dbang po rnam par dag par 'gyur/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang 
[\[125b.7\]]rung gang dag gis de'i yon tan gyi dri tshor ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des sna rnam par dag par 'gyur/_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis de'i chos kyi ro myong ba de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lce rnam par dag par 'gyur/_
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa yang rung gang dag gis lus kyi reg pa de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba des lus rnam par dag par 'gyur yang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam par mi rtog ste/_ma 'dres 
[\[126a.2\]]pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba zhes bya bas bskus pa'i rnga sgra sems can zug rngus zug pa dang bcas pa/_dug dang bcas pa gang dag gis thos pa de 
[\[126a.3\]]dag gi zug rngu thams cad 'byung zhing dug kyang mi gdug par 'gyur yang 'jam dpal rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang dang rgyu rkyen tshogs pas lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog 
[\[126a.4\]]par rtsi'i rgyal po 'bral ba'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos ma thag tu sems can rnams kyi lta bar gyur pa'i zug rngu dag 'byung zhing 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi dug kyang mi gdug

[\[126a.6\]]ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang 
[\[126a.7\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/_'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po dag gis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dag ni ches mang ngo /_/'jam dpal phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]bye ma snyed dag gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul rnams ni ches nyung gi/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rgyun mi gcod par lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sems 
[\[126b.2\]]can bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par mdzad zin pa dang /_yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_yongs su smin par mdzad par 'gyur ba dag ni ches mang ste/_'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[126b.3\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni nyi ma'i dbang gis 'bri ba dang /_skye ba dang /_mi snang bar 'gyur bar yang 
[\[126b.4\]]snang la/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba dang /_mi snang ba dang /_skye ba med de/_'on kyang sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pas nyi ma'i grangs dang /_yud tsam dang /_yud tsam phyed dang /_zla ba phyed 
[\[126b.5\]]dang /_zla ba dang /_lo bgrang ba'i grangs bzhag pa'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bya ba de lta bu dag 'byung yang 'jam dpal zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ni 'bri ba'am/_'phel ba'am/_mi snang bar 'gyur ba med de/_
[\[126b.6\]]'on kyang 'jam dpal sems can rnams kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /_nyi ma'i dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[126b.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs bsags pa'i sems can rnams kyi nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pa yang dag par gzhom pa'i phyir dang /_sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs rnams 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la gzud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 'grib pa dang /_nub par kun tu ston te/_'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos 
[\[127a.2\]]nub pa dang /_'grib pa dang /_'phel bar 'gyur mod kyi/_'on kyang 'jam dpal sems can gyi dbang gis lhun gyis grub cing /_rnam par mi rtog par de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na nam mkha' la gnas/_nam 
[\[127a.3\]]mkha' la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung yang nam mkha' ni ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_'dus ma byas pa/_yi ge med pa/_sgra med pa/_brjod du med pa/_brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/_gnyis su med pa/_gnyen 
[\[127a.4\]]po med pa ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba sna tshogs dag 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gnas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[127a.5\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la brten nas sems can thams cad kyi bya ba thams cad 'byung yang /_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi skye mi 'gags te/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'dus ma byas pa/_yi ge med pa/_sgra med pa/_brjod du med pa/_
[\[127a.6\]]brjod par bya ba ma yin pa/_gnyis su med pa/_gnyen po med pa ste/_'on kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi stobs dang /_byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams la de'i chos kyi mdzad pa sna 
[\[127a.7\]]tshogs dag kyang 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal theg pa chen po la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i yid la bya ba gcig gis kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa dag tu rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sems can dpag tu med 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]grangs med pa dag ni bla na med pa'i ye shes rtogs par 'gyur bar byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur bar byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni tshangs pa thob par byed/_sems 
[\[127b.2\]]can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'phrul dga'i lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dga' 
[\[127b.3\]]ldan gyi lha'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'thab bral gyi lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/_sems 
[\[127b.4\]]can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha'i gnas su skye ba thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha'i rgyal po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/_
[\[127b.5\]]sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni klu'i dbang po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po thob par byed/_
[\[127b.6\]]sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni dri za'i dbang po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mi'am ci'i dbang po thob par byed/_sems can 
[\[127b.7\]]dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mi'i rgyal po thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni mir skye ba thob par byed/_sems can dpag tu med grangs 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]med pa dag ni rigs chen por skye ba thob par byed na/_thal mo sbyar ba lta ci smos/_bdug pa phul ba lta ci smos/_de bzhin du mar me phul ba lta ci smos/_spos phul ba lta ci smos/_me tog phul ba lta ci smos/_mchod pa 
[\[128a.2\]]rnam pa mang po gzhan phul ba lta ci smos/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang nyan pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'dzin pa lta ci smos/_dam pa'i chos rnam pa mang po yongs su 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/_de bas ches grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[128a.3\]]mdzad pas nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa'am/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med par sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin 
[\[128a.4\]]rje'i 'jig rten du skye ba thob pa ni bla'i/_byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas mnyes par ma byas/_chos dang dge 'dun mnyes par ma byas pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/'jam dpal de la sangs rgyas mi mnyes par byed pa dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun mi mnyes par 
[\[128a.5\]]byed pa ni tha na bdag gi chung ma la mi tshangs par spyod pa las byung ba'i tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la rnam par zhe sdang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la brnyas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la khyad du gsod pa dang /_
[\[128a.6\]]chos spong ba dang /_chos 'don pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' la gus par mi byed pa dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur mi byed pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 'dor ba dang /_bla ma dang /_sbyin pa'i gnas dang /_slob 
[\[128a.7\]]dpon dang /_pha ma dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze yang dag par song ba dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa la gus par mi byed pa dang /_chos smra ba/_chos khyad par can rtogs pa/_chos rgya chen po ston pa/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa/_
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi bya ba shes pa/_gzungs dang /_mdo sde'i rgyal po thob pa rnams la mi 'dud cing brjid byed pa dang /_khengs pa yin/_chos dang /_chos smra ba la mi gus skyed pa dang /_sri zhu dang /_rim gro mi byed pa dang /_chos rgya mtsho 
[\[128b.2\]]chen po bsgrags pa byung na la la zhig dad par gyur na mi rung ngo snyam nas/_chos smra ba'i gang zag la legs so zhes bya ba sbyin par mi byed pa dang /_bdag shes pa la mi 'jug pa dang /_chos la nges par sems pa mi skyed pa dang /_mngon pa'i nga rgyal 
[\[128b.3\]]bskyed de/_bsngags par 'os pa'i gang zag rnams kyi bsngags pa bcabs shing mi snyan par brjod pa dang /_pha rol gyi yon tan dang /_bsngags pa la mi dga' ba yin/_gang zag la zhe sdang bas chos la zhe sdang bar byed cing /_chos spong ba dang /_
[\[128b.4\]]gzhan dag kyang rtsod du 'jug pa dang /_stan mthon po 'dod cing thabs tshol ba dang /_gzhan las rim gror bya ba bdag gis byed cing mngon par dga' ba dang /_gnas brtan rgan zhing yun ring du tshangs par spyad pa rnams la rim gro mi byed cing bsu bar mi byed la 
[\[128b.5\]]bzhin khro gnyer can yin/_rtag tu sems rtsub cing klan ka tshol ba dang /_glags lta ba dang /_nga rgyal bskyed nas mkhas pa'i gan du mi 'gro mi sten/_bsnyen par mi byed/_bkur sti mi byed cing dge ba ni gang /_mi dge ba ni gang /_bya ba ni 
[\[128b.6\]]gang /_bya ba ma yin pa ni gang /_ci zhig byas na yun ring po'i don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde bar 'gyur zhes mi 'dri ba dang /_nges par 'byung bar mi lta zhing rtsod pa mang ba yin te/_'jam dpal de ltar na sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun 
[\[128b.7\]]mi mnyes par byed pa yin no/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/_rgya mtsho dam pa'i snying po dri ma med par snang ba 'od gsal ba'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag tu sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin 
[\[129a.2\]]rje'i 'jig rten du gnas par 'gyur ba'i las rnams tshe 'di la rnam par smin par 'gyur te/[ {]glad pa [,]klad pa [}]tsha bas sam/_rims tsha bas sam/_rtsib logs na bas sam/_rgyal srid 'khrugs pas sam/_kla klo 'khrugs pas sam/_mu ge'i 'khrugs 
[\[129a.3\]]pas sam/_lus la gnod pa dang /_yid la gnod pa gang yang rung bas brgyad bkag pas kyang tshe gcig la byang bar 'gyur te/_tha na rmi lam tsam gyis kyang byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub 
[\[129a.4\]]sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_mchod pa las byung ba dang /_de dag gi thad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/_
[\[129a.5\]]de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen bkur bya ba ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gter bcu rnyed par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[129a.6\]]la bgrang bar sbyor ba'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la nges par sems pa'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la gzungs snang ba'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la so so yang dag par rig pa rab tu ston pa'i gter 
[\[129a.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brjod du med pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/_rtogs par byed pa'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_cho 'phrul thams cad mngon sum du mthong ba'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]mnyam pa nyid du sgrub pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'i gter dang /_sgyu mar gyur pa'i bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su 'grub par 'jug pa la mkhas pa'i gter dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[129b.2\]]sems dpa' thams cad la dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_dang ba chen po 'thob pa'i gter ro/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[129b.3\]]'di lta ste/_tshe'i tshad bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag tu byin gyis rlob pa'i phyir tshe la dbang ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la nges par sems pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'i phyir sems la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi 
[\[129b.4\]]khams thams cad bkod pa dang /_rgyan du mas brgyan pa'i byin gyi rlabs kun tu ston pa'i phyir yo byad la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir skye ba la dbang ba dang /_dus ji lta ba bzhin du las kyi rnam par smin pa byin gyis rlob pa 
[\[129b.5\]]kun tu ston pa'i phyir las la dbang ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyis gang bar byin gyis rlob pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir mos pa la dbang ba dang /_dus gang dang /_gang gi tshe byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i dus de dang der byang 
[\[129b.6\]]chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang /_gang du 'dod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang der/_byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir smon lam la dbang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul dang /_
[\[129b.7\]]rnam par 'phrul pa kun tu ston pa'i phyir rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba kun tu ston pa'i phyir chos la dbang ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bzang 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]po rnams dang /_rdzogs pa'i byang chub kun tu ston pa'i phyir ye shes la dbang ba'o/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni skra'i khyon tsam gcig la phyogs bcu'i nam mkha' mthas klas 
[\[130a.2\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams 'jug par byed kyang sems can gang la yang gnod pa dang /_sgrib pa med de/_sngon ji lta bar phyis kyang de bzhin no/_/bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med pa rnams yud tsam 
[\[130a.3\]]gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing yud tsam gcig ni bskal pa dpag tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab par byin gyis rlob ste/_bskal pa re re la yang mes 'jig pa dang /_chus 'jig pa dang /_rlung gis 'jig pa byin gyis rlob kyang sems can gang la yang 
[\[130a.4\]]yo byad cis kyang phongs par mi 'gyur zhing lus la gnod pa'am/_sems la mi bde ba yang mi 'byung la/_sems can gang ji ltar yongs su smin par 'gyur ba des bya ba de lta bu yang shes so/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub 
[\[130a.5\]]sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re yang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su/_'jig rten gyi khams re re na rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i lus rnams kyis lus re res kyang dga' ldan 
[\[130a.6\]]gyi gnas nas shi 'phos pa dang /_skye ba dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyod par sbyor ba dang /_byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba dang /_bdud 'dul ba ston pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul 
[\[130a.7\]]ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ston to/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re rer rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha' klas 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'jug par byed cing /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing gcig tu ston par byed/_zhing gcig gi rgyan gyi yon tan bkod pa gang dag yin pa de dag zhing thams 
[\[130b.2\]]cad du ston par byed/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi nang na yang snang la gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod na phyogs 
[\[130b.3\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi lus sems can gcig gi lus su ston te/_sems can gcig gi lus sems can thams cad kyi lus su ston kyang lus 'dres par yang mi byed de/_sems can gang la yang gnod par mi 'gyur 
[\[130b.4\]]zhing bya ba de lta bu de yang ston te/_lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed do/_/'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[130b.5\]]pa gcig kyang sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis rlob la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur te/_lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu thams cad kyang ston to/_/lus 
[\[130b.6\]]gcig gis mnyam par 'jog la lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis ldang zhing lus dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gis mnyam par gzhag la lus gcig gis ldang ngo //_//bam po gsum pa ste tha ma/_'jam dpal 
[\[130b.7\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings la spyod yul ba yang yin la sems can gyi khams la spyod yul bar yang snang ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la mngon par dga' ba yang yin la bdud kyi spyod yul bar 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]yang rnam par snang ngo /_/mya ngan las 'das pa'i spyod yul ba yang yin la 'khor ba'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo /_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes spyod yul ba yang yin la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo /_/zhi 
[\[131a.2\]]ba'i spyod yul ba yang yin la ma zhi ba dang /_rab tu ma zhi ba dang /_nye bar ma zhi ba'i spyod yul bar yang snang ste sems can rnams kyang 'dul lo/_/blang ba med pa dang /_dor ba med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_ma spros pa dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[131a.3\]]med pa dang /_dngos po med pa dang /_shes par bya ba med pa dang /_bar snang dang mtshungs pa spyod yul ba yang yin la spros pa dang /_mtshan ma dang /_dmigs pa spyod yul ba'i sems can thams cad kyi nang na yang snang ngo /_/stobs bkod pa'i 
[\[131a.4\]]spyod yul ba yang yin la gzugs bzang po'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo /_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pas gnyen po spyod yul ba yang yin la sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i spyod yul bar yang snang ngo /_/ye shes dang /_rnam par 
[\[131a.5\]]thar pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_rig pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i spyod yul ba yang yin la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[131a.6\]]dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_srin po dang /_'byung po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_srul po dang /_lus srul po dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_
[\[131a.7\]]dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang /_sgo nga las skyes pa dang /_mngal nas skyes pa dang /_drod gsher las skyes pa dang /_rdzus te skyes pa dang /_gzugs can dang /_gzugs can ma yin pa dang /_'du shes can dang /_'du shes 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]can ma yin pa dang /_'du shes med 'du shes med min nas gzugs med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par yang snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bkod pa thams 
[\[131b.2\]]cad kyi spyod yul thob pa yang yin la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi cho ga dang spyod lam yang kun tu ston to/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sgra sems can gcig 
[\[131b.3\]]gi sgrar 'jug par byed la/_sems can gcig gi sgra sems can thams cad kyi sgrar 'jug par byed cing /_sgra rnams 'dres par yang mi 'gyur la sems can gang gi sgra la yang sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i 
[\[131b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' ni lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du rang gi lus sa'i khams dang /_chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams su byin gyis rlob bo/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i 
[\[131b.5\]]bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi lus la zhing gi lus kun tu ston kyang sems can gyi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed/_zhing gi lus la sems can gyi lus kun tu ston kyang zhing gi lus dang 'dres par yang mi byed do/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[131b.6\]]kyi sku la nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lus su kun tu ston kyang sangs rgyas kyi sku dman par yang mi byed do/_/nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lus la sangs rgyas kyi sku kun tu ston kyang nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi lus rgya chen por yang mi byed do/_/
[\[131b.7\]]spyod pa'i lus la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku kun tu ston kyang spyod pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do/_/mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku la spyod pa'i lus kun tu ston kyang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku nyams par yang mi byed do/_/mya ngan las 'das 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]pa la 'khor ba'i rgyan du ston kyang mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par zhen pa yang mi skyed do/_/'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par kun tu ston kyang gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed do/_/mnyam par yang 
[\[132a.2\]]bzhag la bya ba thams cad kyang ston te/_'di lta ste/_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'greng ba dang /_nyal bar byed do/_/spyod lam thams cad kyang kun tu ston la ting nge 'dzin rnam par 'khrugs par yang mi byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi zhabs kyi drung na chos nyan 
[\[132a.3\]]par yang snang la/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dag na gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog yongs su 'grub pa gzhan dang gzhan dag gis kyang chos nyan la ting nge 'dzin tha dad par 
[\[132a.4\]]yang mi byed cing chos kyang len la 'dzin te 'don cing kun chub par yang byed la sangs rgyas de dag las chos nyan pa'i rgyun chad par yang mi byed do/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog yongs su 'grub pa tha dad pas 
[\[132a.5\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed la lus tha dad par mi byed cing gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du bya ba thams cad kun tu ston kyang ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed do/_/sems kyi skad cig sems 
[\[132a.6\]]kyi skad cig la ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mngon par sgrub la ting nge 'dzin tha dad par yang mi byed de/_'jam dpal rnam grangs des na rnam par thar pa dang ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[132a.7\]]dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthas klas pa'i bskal par ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa mngon par sgrub kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgrub pa rnams kyi mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin phun sum tshogs pa 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]de dag thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo brjod du med pa mngon par bsgrub pa mtha' yas dpag tu med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_tshad med pa dag dang 
[\[132b.2\]]gzungs thob pa phun sum tshogs pa de dag thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen las nges par 'byung ngo /_/stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_mtshungs pa med/_gzhal du med/_
[\[132b.3\]]tshad med/_brjod du med pa phun sum tshogs pa rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal mdor bsdu na de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bsgrub pa mtha' yas pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos phun sum tshogs pa thams cad ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 
[\[132b.4\]]nges par byung ba yin no/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa'i sgo la 'jug pa sems can la kun tu ston pa'i yul dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs su mngon par 
[\[132b.5\]]sgrub pa 'gro ba thams cad shes par byed pa'i yul dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sprul pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byang chub sems dpa'i lus su mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i lus de bzhin gshegs 
[\[132b.6\]]pa'i skur mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /_nam mkha'i khams 'jig rten gyi khams su mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha'i khams su mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /_'khor ba mya ngan las 'das par mngon par bsgrub pa dang /_mya ngan 
[\[132b.7\]]las 'das pa 'khor bar mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul dang /_sems can gyi skad brjod pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bstan pa'i yul dang /_gdong dang lus mtha' yas pa kun tu bstan pa lus gcig tu byin gyis rlob cing lus kyi rim pa thams cad mngon par 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]bsgrub pa'i yul dang lus gcig gis chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa'i yul dang /_sems can gcig gis sems bskyed pa rnams la sems kyi skad cig sems kyi skad cig re re la yang sgo mtha' yas pas bsgrub pa'i byang chub rnam par mi rtog pa'i yul 
[\[133a.2\]]dang /_'jam dpal de la sogs pa yul bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' la yang dag par 'grub bo/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems 
[\[133a.3\]]dpa' ni 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams gcig tu mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams gcig 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad pad ma'i gdan gcig dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[133a.4\]]pa'i sku gcig gis yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid du kun tu ston par mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi rgyan du mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[133a.5\]]byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyis yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad skra tsam gyi khyon gcig la 'jog par mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig tu 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go/_/
[\[133a.6\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi byang chub kyi shing dang byang chub kyi snying pos yongs su khyab par mos shing 'jug go/_/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sgra skad gcig gis go bar byed cing sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi sgra la 'jug pas 
[\[133a.7\]]tshim par byed par mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dang lus su mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la 'jug pa dang ldan par mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]sems dpa'i khong du song bar mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i khong du zhugs par mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad sems can gcig gi lus la rten par mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams 
[\[133b.2\]]thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snod du mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba gang 'dod pa dang mos pa'i gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog dang rtags la mngon du phyogs pa ston par mos shing 'jug go/_/
[\[133b.3\]]sems can gyi khams thams cad nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog dang /_rtags dang /_tshul du ston par mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyis legs par brgyan pa'i byin 
[\[133b.4\]]gyi rlabs kun tu ston par mos shing 'jug go/_/sems can gyi khams thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs dang /_mtshan dang /_dpe byad bzang po dang /_gzugs dang /_lus dang /_kha dog sna tshogs dang /_spyod lam dang /_spyod pa kun tu ston pa gzhan 
[\[133b.5\]]shes par byed par mos shing 'jug go/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod pa'i khams nas kyang mi g.yo la gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i bsam gtan dang /_rnam par thar pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_
[\[133b.6\]]snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye'o/_/nyan thos kyi lam mngon du shes pa la zhugs pa yang yin la snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi lam mngon du shes shing mthong ba la mkhas pa 
[\[133b.7\]]yang yin la snying rje chen po'i stobs kyang rgyun mi gcod do/_/g.yog 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor ba yin la lha dang mi'i g.yog 'khor mang po rnam par dag pa dang yang ldan no/_/lha'i bu mo 'bum dag glu dbyangs rjes su sgrogs shing sil snyan 'bum dag sil khrol 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]'byin pa dang yang ldan la byang chub sems dpa'i lam dang ldan pa'i bsam gtan dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi 'dor ro/_/'gro ba'i dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_bzhad gad dang /_'jo sgeg thams cad dang /_sems 
[\[134a.2\]]can brkam chags pa'i 'du 'dzi thams cad kyi nang na gnas pa yang yin la sems kyi skad cig gcig la yang byang chub kyi sems kyi mnyam pa nyid kyang mi 'dor ro/_/'jig rten las 'das pa yang yin te 'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres la pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam la 
[\[134a.3\]]slob par yang snang zhing las dang nyon mongs par bying ba'i sems can rnams yongs su smin par yang byed do/_/lam la gnas shing lam ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa mthong ba la zhugs pa yang yin la/_lam ngan par lhung ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i 
[\[134a.4\]]phyir lam ngan pa na yang snang zhing lam de la snying por 'du shes pa yang ma yin la des dag par 'dod pa yang ma yin no/_/lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi las kyi mtha' kha na ma tho ba med pa yang yin te/_rtag tu tshul khrims legs par bsrungs shing de bzhin 
[\[134a.5\]]gshegs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la yang gzhol la sems can tshul khrims 'chal pa yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo phal pa'i spyod yul ba la yang kun tu snang ngo /_/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsags shing byang chub sems 
[\[134a.6\]]dpa'i 'gro ba la yang gzhol la ngan 'gror skyes pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang /_dbul po'i khyim du skye ba'i 'gro ba yang kun tu ston la 'gro ba der 
[\[134a.7\]]yang dag par gzhol ba yang ma yin no/_/ye shes dang spobs pa thogs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pas gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa yang yin no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang lus gzugs gcig tu gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i chos kyi tshul dang dgongs pa snang ba rtogs pa dang /_theg pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod 
[\[134b.2\]]yul la mngon du phyogs pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyis bsngags par 'os pa dang /_sems can gyi khams thams cad kyis gdong du lta ba dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang /_zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[134b.3\]]gyis rnam par rtse ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs thob pa yang yin la chos yongs su tshol ba'i rgyun yang mi gcod do/_/lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi slob dpon 
[\[134b.4\]]dam pa yang yin la/_tsog tsog por 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas mkhan po dang /_slob dpon las chos len par yang kun tu ston cing gus par bya ba thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par yang snang ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam la gnas nas thabs gang dang gang gis 
[\[134b.5\]]sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'am 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i thabs de dang de nyid sems can rnams la ston to/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad shin tu bsdus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad kyi rtse mor phyin pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 
[\[134b.6\]]kyis dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ba dang /_chos kyi dbang phyug gi bdag po dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang /_chos kyi cod pan thogs pa med cing dri ma med pas bcings pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thogs pa med par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku kun tu ston pa 
[\[134b.7\]]dang /_thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa dang /_lus gzugs 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du zhugs pa dang ldan pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thob pa dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dbang 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]thams cad thob pa dang /_'gro ba'i zhing thams cad du skye ba ston pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang yul gcig tu gyur pa yang yin la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i 
[\[135a.2\]]rgyun yang mi gcod/_byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par 'du bya ba'i stobs las kyang yongs su mi nyams/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i byin gyi rlabs las kyang thag ring du mi 'gyur/_byang chub sems dpa'i chos nyid kyang mi 'dor/_byang chub sems dpa'i las 
[\[135a.3\]]kyi mtha' las kyang mi 'da'/_byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang phyir mi ldog byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba la zhum par yang mi byed de/_'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la blang ba med pa dang /_
[\[135a.4\]]dor ba med pa dang /_'deg pa med pa dang /_'jog pa med pa dang /_sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_gzugs brnyan dang /_chu zla dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang /_brjod du 
[\[135a.5\]]med pa dang /_smrar med pa dang /_bsnyad du med pa dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_rnam par 'jig pa med pa dang /_mnyam pa nyid dang /_dbyer med pa dang /_gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa yin te/_chos thams cad ni gnyen 
[\[135a.6\]]po med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos thams cad ces bya ba de ni de'i dmigs pa ste/_'du shes pa 'dzin pa'i phyir dmigs pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sems med pa la sems su dmigs pa ni 'du shes phyin ci log yin pa'i phyir te/_sems phyin ci log tu gyur na sems myos 
[\[135a.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/sems myos na sems bslad par 'gyur ro/_/sems bslad pa las sems skrag par 'gyur ro/_/sems skrag pa las byang chub kyi sems nyams par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas sems la sems kyis rjes su 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]blta bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni dbang bcu 'thob par 'gyur te/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_tshe la dbang ba dang /_sems la dbang ba dang /_yo byad la dbang ba dang /_las la dbang ba dang /_skye ba 
[\[135b.2\]]la dbang ba dang /_mos pa la dbang ba dang /_smon lam la dbang ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang /_chos la dbang ba dang /_ye shes la dbang ba'o/_/rnam par 'phrul pa bcu yang 'thob ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can rnam par sprul pa dang /_zhing 
[\[135b.3\]]rnam par sprul pa dang /_chos rnam par sprul pa dang /_lus rnam par sprul pa dang /_smon lam rnam par sprul pa dang /_spyod yul rnam par sprul pa dang /_ye shes rnam par sprul pa dang /_mngon par shes pa rnam par sprul pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa dang /_stobs 
[\[135b.4\]]rnam par sprul pa'o/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi mos pa la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /_phyogs thams cad kyi dri ba rnam par 'byed 
[\[135b.5\]]pa la 'jug pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams steng g.yogs med cing gzhi phyal ba'i rgyud thams cad la 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad gcig pa dang tha dad pa nyid rab 'byam rnam par gzhag pa la mkhas pa la 'jug pa dang /_las thams cad bsgyur bar gzhug pa 
[\[135b.6\]]la 'jug pa dang /_'du shes phyin ci log gis phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes can tha dad pa nyid la 'jug pa dang /_chos thams cad bsgyur ba la 'jug pa'i mtha' nges par 'byung ba gcig la 'jug pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings thams 
[\[135b.7\]]cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul par byin gyis rlob pa la 'jug pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad dus gsum la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa la zhugs pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub bo/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa sbyin pa las byung ba dang /_mchod pa las byung ba dang /_de dag gi thad nas bslab pa bzung ba las byung ba 
[\[136a.2\]]rnams snga dro gcig gis zil gyis gnon te/_'jam dpal de ltar dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan no/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[136a.3\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de dag phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa mu med pa dag tu 'jig rten gyi khams re re na yang rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re la dus gsum la 'jug cing bskal pa'i phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par bskal par byin 
[\[136a.4\]]gyis brlabs te/_dus gsum la 'jug pa'i chos ston to/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rtag pa/_brtan pa/_ther zug pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes 
[\[136a.5\]]gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du shes phyin ci log tu mi 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal 'du shes phyin ci log gis sems phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no/_/
[\[136a.6\]]zhes mngon par zhen nas chos spong bar byed do/_/mi dge ba'i las sna tshogs kyang byed do/_/'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni skye ba'am/_'gag pa med de/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_yi ge med pa/_sgra med 
[\[136a.7\]]pa/_gnyis su med pa/_gnyen po med pa/_sgra las yang dag par 'das pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnyen po med pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so/_/'jam dpal 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin no/_/zhes bya ba 'di gnyis 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]ni mtha' ste/_'jam dpal mtha' gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma yin te/_'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos ni mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/'jam dpal mtha' med pa'i ngo bo nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag go/_/'jam dpal mi skye mi 'gag pa gang yin pa de ni mtha' dang 
[\[136b.2\]]mtha' med pa yongs su spangs pa ste/_yi ge med pa/_sgra med pa/_sgra las yang dag par 'das pa/_gdags par bya ba ma yin pa/_gnyis su med pa/_gnyen po med pa'o/_/'jam dpal gang gnyen po med pa de ni mi skye mi 'gag go/_/gang mi skye mi 'gag 
[\[136b.3\]]pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku ste/_shin tu ma skyes pa/_ma byung ba/_ma 'gags pa'o/_/de la ni tshigs med mod kyi sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi stobs 
[\[136b.4\]]bskyed pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa chu'i nang du bcug ma thag tu 'dam rdzab dang rnyog pa thams cad 'dang bar byed kyang 'jam dpal nor bu rin po che chu 'dang bar byed pa ni mi rtog_/
[\[136b.5\]]rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byung ma thag tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i 'dam 
[\[136b.6\]]rdzab dang rnyog pa thams cad dang bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na/_rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo shin tu myur zhing stobs kyi shugs kyis 
[\[136b.7\]]'phangs pa ni rdza mkhan gyi dbang gis snod spyad sna tshogs mngon par 'du byed kyang 'jam dpal rdza mkhan gyi 'khor lo ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_spyod pa dang /_smon lam gyi stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi shugs kyis sems can gyi dbang gis sems can rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad kyang de bzhin 
[\[137a.2\]]gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro/_/'jam dpal sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la bshos gsol ba 
[\[137a.3\]]dang /_gang dag bshos mi gsol ba dang /_gang dag gis mthong ba dang /_gang dag gis ma mthong ba dang /_gang dag stod pa dang /_gang dag mi stod pa dang /_gang dag gshe ba dang /_gang dag mi gshe ba dang /_gang dag zhu ba byed pa dang /_gang dag zhu ba mi byed 
[\[137a.4\]]pa de dag thams cad kyi bya ba rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog tu gyur pa thams cad kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo /_/'jam 
[\[137a.5\]]dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi sku dang kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa grub pa'i gzungs 'thob ste/_gzungs de thob pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi skus khyab par byed 
[\[137a.6\]]do/_/'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sku ston to/_/lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba grangs med pa dang /_chos tha dad pa nyid grangs med pa ston te gnas nas kyang mi g.yo'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar na 
[\[137a.7\]]dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yin no/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba bzhin du dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/_/bsnyen par bya'o/_/bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni brag gi bya skyibs rab tu 'bar ba bzhin du yongs su spang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten na byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang 'du shes phyin ci log tu 'gyur ro/_/sems phyin 
[\[137b.2\]]ci log tu gyur na kun du 'khrul par 'gyur ro/_/sems kun du 'khrul par gyur na rnam par rmongs par 'gyur ro/_/sems rnam par rmongs na skrag par 'gyur ro/_/sems skrag par gyur na byang chub kyi sems 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/byang chub kyi sems bor na lha yongs 
[\[137b.3\]]su gtong bar 'gyur ro/_/lha yongs su btang na lha rnams kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/klu rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_dri za rnams dang /_mi'am ci rnams dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_mi rnams dang /_mi ma yin pa rnams 
[\[137b.4\]]nas sangs rgyas kyi bar dag kyang de la bsngags pa ma yin pa smra bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal de lta bas na byang chub sems dpas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsten par bya'o/_/bsnyen par bya'o/_/bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/'jam dpal dper na skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni 
[\[137b.5\]]gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pas mthong yang rung ste/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba de dag gi nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang skyabs zhes bya ba'i sman ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun 
[\[137b.6\]]gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa'am/_dang ba'i sems dang ldan pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa'am/_gzugs su byas pa mthong na tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su 
[\[137b.7\]]song ba yang rung ste/_de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i nad thams cad med par 'gyur yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par bya ba de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dper na nyi 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]ma'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho chen po las mngon par 'phags te/_nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa btang bas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i 
[\[138a.2\]]pho brang 'khor thams cad du mthong ba sbyin par byed cing mun pa sel bar byed/_'dam rdzab dang /_rnyog pa thams cad skems par byed/_pad ma rnams kyang kha 'bye bar byed/_rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal thams cad kyang skye bar byed/_sman thams cad 
[\[138a.3\]]kyang yongs su smin par byed/_las kyi gnas thams cad ni gnas par byed la/_chu klung dang /_mtshe'u dang /_mtsho bran thams cad la yang dus gcig tu snang ba thob par 'gyur yang gnas las kyang mi g.yo zhing 'jam dpal nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog ste/_
[\[138a.4\]]'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i bya ba de lta bu de rtag tu 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las mngon par 'phags te/_chos 
[\[138a.5\]]kyi dbyings kyi nam mkha'i spyod yul la gnas nas ye shes kyi 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig grangs med pa btang bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du snang ba sbyin par mdzad cing sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa mun nag dang /_rab rib dang /_ling tog 
[\[138a.6\]]rnams rnam par sel bar mdzad/_nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab dang /_rnyog pa thams cad skems par mdzad/_yun ring po nas gnyid kyis log pa'i sems can gyi khams ni sad par mdzad/_sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad ni skye bar mdzad/_sems 
[\[138a.7\]]can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs thams cad ni yongs su smin par mdzad/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad ni rab tu 'jog par mdzad de/_dus gcig tu de'i mdzad pa thams cad 'byung yang gnas nas kyang mi g.yo zhing 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa ni mi rtog rnam 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]par mi rtog ste/_'on kyang ma 'dres pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i phyir lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par de'i mdzad pa de lta bu de 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i gnas rnams kyang dge 
[\[138b.2\]]ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa las 'byung ngo /_/'jam dpal dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed cing dpyod pa la mkhas par 'gyur te/_de chos rnams la 'di ltar dpyod do/_/mig ni gzugs kyi dmigs 
[\[138b.3\]]pa'i rgyu ma yin/_gzugs kyang mig gi dmigs pa'i rgyu ma yin la dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/_rnam par shes pa de yang mig las kyang ma byung /_gzugs las kyang ma byung zhing rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o/_/
[\[138b.4\]]rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus kyang de bzhin no/_/yid kyang chos kyi rkyen ma yin zhing chos kyang yid kyi rkyen ma yin la/_dmigs pa'i rgyu rkyen nyid kyis kyang rnam par shes pa 'byung ste/_rnam par shes pa de ni yid las kyang ma byung /_chos rnams las kyang ma byung zhing /_
[\[138b.5\]]yid kyi rnam par shes pa de ni byung nas zhig la zhu zhing mi gnas pa'o/_/de bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba yang byang chub kyi rkyen ma yin/_byang chub kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rkyen ma yin mod kyi/_dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang byang chub kyi rkyen la dmigs pa las sems skye ba rnams kyis skye ste/_de dag 
[\[138b.6\]]kyang skyes nas zhig cing zhu la mi gnas pa'o/_/de la sems gang gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus byas pa dang /_sems gang gis byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de gnyis ni phan tshun mi sbyor ro/_/dper na me ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ste/_'on kyang rgyu dang 
[\[138b.7\]]rkyen gyis 'bar ro/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar ba yang gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du yang mi 'gro ste/_'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu la brten nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi me 'bar te/_shes pa de lta bu dang ldan pa de ni myur du 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/'jam dpal de ltar na dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa yin no/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis phyogs bcu'i 
[\[139a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas/_nyan thos dang bcas pa rnams la rtag par nyin gcig bzhin du zhal zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i na bza' dag phul la/_de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang gA'i 
[\[139a.3\]]klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu phul zhing de bzhin gshegs pa de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i re re'i phyir yang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang mchod rten 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa nor bu 
[\[139a.4\]]rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/_nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re 
[\[139a.5\]]bres pa/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas khebs par byas pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/_mchod rten de dag la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i na bza' dag 
[\[139a.6\]]dang /_gdugs kyi sprin dag dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang /_ba dan gyi sprin dag dang /_me tog gi sprin dag dang /_spos kyi sprin dag dang /_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i sprin dag dang /_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sprin dag gis gtor/_mngon par gtor la 
[\[139a.7\]]nyin gcig bzhin/_de ltar mchod cing bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu mchod la/_sems can gzhan dpag tu med grangs med pa dag kyang mchod pa de nyid la 'god pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la tha na mos par byed na 'di nyid de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni pha rol tu phyin pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[139b.2\]]phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/sa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gnon to/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag phyir snyil bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa bye ba khrag 
[\[139b.3\]]khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rab tu shes so/_/nga rgyal gyi ri dpag tu med grangs med pa dag rnam par 'jig par byed do/_/phrag dog dang ser sna'i rgyal mtshan dpag tu med grangs med pa dag snyol bar byed do/_/srid pa'i chu klung dpag tu med grangs med pa dag 
[\[139b.4\]]skems par byed do/_/skye ba'i rgya mtsho dpag tu med grangs med pa dag las rgal bar byed do/_/bdud kyi zhags pa dpag tu med grangs med pa dag gcod do/_/nyi zla rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyi gzi brjid zil gyis mnan te 
[\[139b.5\]]'dug go/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/_/sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[139b.6\]]rnams dang yang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rnam par bkod pa zhes 
[\[139b.7\]]bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rin po che 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]'jig rten thams cad kyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/dam pa'i chos pad ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/yul la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/cher bsgyings zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob 
[\[140a.2\]]bo/_/rnam pa dang sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/seng ge bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rab tu g.yo ba'i 
[\[140a.3\]]rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rdo rje lte ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/
[\[140a.4\]]sa 'dzin zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/lhun po sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/lhun po rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rin po che'i mdzod ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[140a.5\]]kyang 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad kyi sems la dbang byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/spyod pa thams cad kyi yul la nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/sbyor ba zab cing gsang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/sna tshogs 
[\[140a.6\]]snang ba'i spobs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/bltar mi mthong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/mngon par shes pa 
[\[140a.7\]]thams cad las nges par skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/gzugs thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/gzugs thams cad kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/lus rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/spyod pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/mngon sum du byang chub snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 
[\[140b.2\]]'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rin po che bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/yon tan gyi rnam pa thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad 'dul bar rnam par nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 
[\[140b.3\]]kyang 'thob bo/_/rab tu zhi ba rnam par nges pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob bo/_/zab cing brtan pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu'i dus rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob ste/_de dag la sogs pa'i 
[\[140b.4\]]ting nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku dang kha dog mtha' yas pa yongs su 'grub pa sgrub pa'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/ye shes dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/sgra dbyangs rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 
[\[140b.5\]]'thob bo/_/mi zad pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/pad ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/chags pa med pa'i sgor 'jug pa zhes bya 
[\[140b.6\]]ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/so so yang dag par rig pa rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi rgyan gyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi sku dang /_kha dog mtha' yas yongs su 'grub pa zhes bya 
[\[140b.7\]]ba'i gzungs kyang 'thob ste/_de dag la sogs pa gzungs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad la spyod pa'i khyad par nyid kyang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad la gzhan la rag ma las pa'i shes pa yang 'thob bo/_/chos thams cad la 
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]som nyi gcod pa nyid kyang 'thob bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa stong phrag grangs med pa dag kyang 'thob bo/_/sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i bye brag la mkhas pa yang 'thob bo/_/'jam dpal dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab ni ri thams cad zil gyis 
[\[141a.2\]]gnon nas lam me/_lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/'jam dpal de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis gnon nas lam me lhan ne lhang nge'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems 
[\[141a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang gzhan dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos kyi bye brag gzhan dag kyang yod dam/_de skad ces smras 
[\[141a.4\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag la mos na/_yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang /_gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa'i chos 
[\[141a.5\]]lnga po 'di dag ste/_lnga gang zhe na/_chos thams cad gnyen po med pa dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_brjod du med par mos pa dang /_rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par skad cig skad cig la de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa dang spyod lam la 'jug pa'i gnas 'dzam bu'i 
[\[141a.6\]]gling gi rdul phra rab kyi rdul las kyang lhag pa dag la lhun gyis grub cing rnam par mi rtog par 'jug par mos pa dang /_seng ge bran [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]bu'i rtogs pa brjod pas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa de bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye 
[\[141a.7\]]ma snyed nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_mdzad par mos pa dang /_mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa nas bzung ste/_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i bar der bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang yin pa de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas bstan pa yin par mos pa dang /_shAkya thub pas bstan pas sems can yongs su smin par byas pa gang yin pa de/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthas klas pa'i bskal pa nas/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[141b.2\]]shAkya thub pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mdzad pa yin par mos pa ste/_'jam dpal lnga po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas gang dag la mos pas yon tan gyi khyad par 'di dag dang /_gzhan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'thob pa yin no/_/'jam dpal 
[\[141b.3\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed kyi dgra bcom pa mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa/_rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa rnams la nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i gos 
[\[141b.4\]]dag byin te/_de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis rang sangs rgyas gcig la nyi ma gcig zas byin na/_de ni de bas bsod nams ches grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam 
[\[141b.5\]]dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'jig rten gyi khams re rer yang gtsug lag khang 'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/_nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/_nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su 
[\[141b.6\]]bskor ba/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rin po che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal 
[\[141b.7\]]pos khebs par byas pa/_rgya mtsho na gnas pa'i rin po che rnam par dag pa bkod pa kun nas 'od zer snang ba'i nor bu rin po che'i ka ba mang pos dkrigs pa/_nor bu rin po che seng ge ral pa zhes bya ba'i spang leb bres pa/_nor bu rin po che seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]mo las byas pa'i sgo gang dang /_rta babs dang /_skar khung gis brgyan pa/_dar gyi lda ldi mang pos bres pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/_rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas stong phrag grangs med pa dag dang /_
[\[142a.2\]]rang sangs rgyas de dag la nyin gcig bzhin lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i gos dag kyang byin zhing de ltar byin pa bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu byin pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig gis sangs rgyas 
[\[142a.3\]]zhe'am/_'jig rten gyi mgon po zhe'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa zhe'am/_thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i sgra thos na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed na gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ri mor bris pa'am/_gzugs su byas pa 
[\[142a.4\]]mthong ba lta ci smos te/_'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/gang gis mar me phul ba'am/_bdug pa'am/_spos sam/_me tog dag gam/_rol mo'i sgra'am/_mchod pa sna tshogs gzhan dag byed pa lta ci smos te/_'di nyid 
[\[142a.5\]]de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir nyi ma gcig bslab pa gcig bsrung ba lta ci smos te/_'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[142a.6\]]gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' dang bcas pa/_nyan thos dang bcas pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab snyed rnams las nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i na bza' dag kyang 
[\[142a.7\]]'bul la/_de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'bul zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i phyir mchod rten tshad gling bzhi pa tsam rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa yon 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa dang /_'dzam bu'i chu bo'i gser las byas pa/_nor bu rin po che glog gi sgron mas spras pa/_nor bu rin po che 'od thams cad bsdus pa'i stegs bus yongs su bskor ba/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_rin po 
[\[142b.2\]]che'i phreng bas mdzes par byas pa/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ba/_dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/_tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po'i byug pas byugs pa/_nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po'i dra bas g.yogs pa/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[142b.3\]]thams cad kyi rdul snyed dag byas te/_mchod rten de dag la nyin gcig bzhin du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad tsam gyi lha'i gos dag dang /_gdugs kyi sprin dag dang /_rgyal mtshan gyi sprin dag dang /_ba dan gyi sprin dag dang /_me tog gi sprin dag dang /_spos kyi sprin 
[\[142b.4\]]dag dang /_rin po che'i sprin dag dang /_rol mo'i sgra'i sprin dag dang /_rgyan gyi sprin dag dang /_seng ge rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i zla ba'i sprin dag dang lha'i sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa dang /_glu dbyangs kyi sgra'i sprin rnams kyis gtor/_mngon par gtor la chos kyi rnam 
[\[142b.5\]]grangs 'di la mos pa bas 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang /_ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos shing tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas 
[\[142b.6\]]su song ba'i sems can gcig la zan kham gcig byin na 'di nyid de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam dpal mdo sde 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis/_mdo 'di las ji skad smos pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[142b.7\]]la mchod pa byed pa bas/_byang chub sems dpa' mdo 'di nyid la mos pa gzhan gang zhig gis mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig mthong nas byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mdo 'di nyid la mos pa'o snyam ste dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]chen po rnyed la/_de sems dang bas langs te/_de la thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal te/_ci nus ci lcogs su de la yongs su bzung ba byas na/_'di nyid de bas ches sangs rgyas kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur ba'i bsod nams grangs med pa skyed do/_/
[\[143a.2\]]'jam dpal de lta bas na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams mes yongs su gang ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang rgal te 'gro bar bya'o/_/'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang 
[\[143a.3\]]la la zhig gis bskal pa bye ba stong phrag brgyad du pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la spyad pa bas/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag pa'o snyam du mos par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par skyed do/_/'jam 
[\[143a.4\]]dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag la lha'i zas ro brgya dang ldan pa dang /_lha'i na bza' dag nyin gcig bzhin du 'bul zhing /_de ltar 'bul ba bskal pa gang 
[\[143a.5\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu 'bul ba bas/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gzhan gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 'jug pa bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ngo 
[\[143a.6\]]mtshar du 'dzin par gyur nas/_khyod chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mos pa legs so legs so/_/khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya ba'i 'os yin no zhes bsam pa thag pa nas legs so zhes bya ba byin la/_khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[143a.7\]]gsang ba'i gnas rnams su zhugs la chos kyi 'khor lo skor cig ces byas na/_'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' ni de bas ches bsod nams grangs med par 'phel te/_bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba 'di la sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams snga ma des 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro stong gi cha dang /_'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba'i cha dang /_bye ba brgya'i cha dang /_bye ba stong gi cha dang /_bye ba 'bum gyi cha dang /_bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi cha dang /_grangs dang /_cha dang /_bgrang ba dang /_dpe dang /_zla dang /_rgyur 
[\[143b.2\]]yang mi bzod do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel bas de skad ces smras nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_nyan thos chen 
[\[143b.3\]]po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan dang ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul la 
[\[143b.4\]]'jug pa ston pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D186}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud d+ha ba la 
[\[143b.5\]]war+d+ha na prA ti hAr+ya bi kurbA Na nir de sha nA ma ma hA yA na sUtra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos 
[\[143b.6\]]pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das chu bo chen po klung nai rany+dza nA'i 'gram na/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_byams pa dang /_'jam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun stong dang /_rab 'byor dang /_shA ri'i bu 
[\[143b.7\]]dang /_maud gal gyi bu la sogs pa nyan thos chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag thams cad kyis bskor cing /_mdun 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]du bdar te/_zhal zas kyi bya ba byas nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag chos dang ldan pa'i gtam gyis tshim par byas/_bskul/_gzengs bstod/_yang dag par dga' bar byas te/_'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang /_thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs
