[\[144a.2\]]pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen pos grong khyer gA rA Na sI'i gshegs te/_bA rA Na sI'i shing a mra srung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so/_/de nas de'i tshe na sa cher g.yos par gyur nas seng ge'i khri chen po rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/_'phang du dpag tshad gcig tsam/_zheng du 
[\[144a.3\]]dpag tshad phyed tsam gyi tshad legs par spras pa/_shin tu dga' bar 'gyur ba/_yid du 'ong ba dar gyi chun po btags shing dpyangs pa/_lha'i na bza' brgya stong du ma bting ba/_lha'i me tog gi chun po bye ba du ma rab tu dpyangs pa/_lha'i dri dang ldan pa/_kha dog 
[\[144a.4\]]dang ldan pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa/_de mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs te sangs rgyas phal po che 
[\[144a.5\]]zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khyod song la mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig 
[\[144a.6\]]rten gyi khams gzhan dag na/_khyod kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i sems can snyigs ma'i rang bzhin can ma dad pa/_sdig pa spyod pa/_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag gis bsgribs pa/_mar mi shes pa/_phar mi shes pa/_dge sbyong la 
[\[144a.7\]]dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa/_bram zer mi 'dzin pa/_dkon mchog gsum la mngon par ma dad pa/_de dag thams cad lag na rdo rje dang /_gnyis kyis rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi shugs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'dir bsdus shig_/de nas byang 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa las tshig 'di thos na/_sems can thams cad la blta ba dang /_yang dag par skul bar 'gyur ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la 
[\[144b.2\]]snyoms par zhugs so/_/ting nge 'dzin de'i mthus sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/_rab tu g.yos/_yang dag par rab tu g.yos so/_/de nas lus las 'od zer brgya stong du ma byung ngo /_/byung nas kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[144b.3\]]'di kun tu snang bar byas te/_tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad gzugs yod pa dang /_gzugs kyis khyab pa man chad du snang bar byas te/_'od zer de dag las kyang yang dag par skul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo /_/bag yod pa dang nyon mongs 
[\[144b.4\]]med par byos/_/bag med pa yi dbang du ma 'gro zhig_/skye dang rga shis gtses pa'i sdug bsngal te/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'byung bar dkon/_/bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya grangs med du/_/srid pa'i rgya mtshor nges par 'khor ba dang /_/nyon mongs dog par 
[\[144b.5\]]rtag tu 'khor ba na/_/'tsho ba ma rungs pa ni skrag mi 'gyur/_/rnyed dang chags dang bud med rtag pa min/_/rtag tu glu gar sgyu ma'i chos dang ldan/_/bskal pa du mar bde ba myong nas kyang /_/phyis ni sdug bsngal rjes su thob par 'gyur/_/rnam par slu bar 
[\[144b.6\]]gyur pa 'di la ltos/_/'di la mar gyur pa yang chung mar 'gyur/_/de yi sha dag yongs su zos nas kyang /_/mi mkhas pa dag mi shes dga' bar 'dzin/_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal rgya mtshor skye ba de/_/mis ni ma myong med la skrag pa med/_/mi rnams kyi ni 
[\[144b.7\]]dam pa'i chos 'chad kyis/_/bde bar gshegs la mchod par 'dod rnams deng /_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba de mthong nas/_/ting 'dzin zhi ba bsgom pa thob 'gyur gyi/_/de phyir sdug bsngal rgya mtshor mi gang rnams/_/skrag par gyis la thar pa 'dod par byos/_/
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]mi rnams kyis ni dam pa de la mchod/_/gzhan gyi srog ni ma gcod de bzhin du/_/gzhan gyi nor dag ma byin len ma byed/_/gzhan gyi bud med dag la 'tshe ma byed/_/sangs rgyas chos la rtag tu gus par byos/_/nga rgyal rgyags dang brlang 
[\[145a.2\]]ba spangs nas kyang /_/bA rA Na sI zhes ni bya ba yi/_/a mra srung ba mo yi tshal du deng /_/mi mchog la ni myur du blta bar gyis/_/de yi bkod pa rgya cher yid du 'ong /_/dge slong dge 'dun rtag tu rdzu 'phrul ldan/_/byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen rdzu 'phrul che/_/
[\[145a.3\]]sems can mi mkhas khong du chud bya dang /_/sems can bye ba mang po thar bya'i phyir/_/'od zer rtag tu gang gis btang ba de/_/mtshan ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go/_/gang dag nga rgyal rgyags khengs bgyid gyur cing /_/sangs rgyas chos la rim 
[\[145a.4\]]gro mi byed pa/_/lag na rdo rje mgon po sems can mchog_/rtag tu 'od zer gtong zhing go bar byed/_/de yi gzugs ni yangs shing rdzu 'phrul che/_/bskal pa bye bar de ni bshad mi rdzogs/_/'dir ni bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i phyir/_/dri dang phreng 
[\[145a.5\]]ba gos mchog rgyan khyer la/_/mi yi 'dren pa 'di la mchod par byos/_/sangs rgyas 'byung bar 'gyur ba rab dkon no/_/'dod phyir bskal pa bye ba mang por yang /_/rtag tu sdug bsngal thob cing 'thob par 'gyur/_/mkhas pas rtag tu thar pa 'dod par 
[\[145a.6\]]gyis/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas la ni mchod par byos/_/bu dang bu mo de bzhin gnyen rnams dang /_/pha ma chung ma bshes mang skye bo rnams/_/thams cad sgyu ma 'dra bas don med de/_/rtag par gzhan dang gzhan du skye bar 'gyur/_/de ltar gser dang dngul yang 
[\[145a.7\]]glog dang 'dra/_/'di la snying po 'ga' yang snang ba med/_/byang chub go 'phang thob par bya ba'i phyir/_/mi rnams 'dren pa la ni mchod par byos/_/de nas de'i tshe na 'od zer las byung ba'i tshigs su bcad pas bskul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'dis stong gsum gyi stong 
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sgras gang bar gyur nas sems can thams cad la bskul bar gyur te/_sems can gang dag log par lta ba de dag ni yang dag pa'i lta ba la bkod par gyur/_gang dag nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_khengs pa dang /_'gying ba de dag 
[\[145b.2\]]ni nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_khengs pa rnams dang bral bar byed par 'gyur/_gang dag 'dod chags la rjes su spyod cing bag med par gyur pa/_de dag ni 'dod chags dang bral bar gyur/_gang dag srog gcod pa dang /_ma byin par len pa dang /_'dod pas 
[\[145b.3\]]log par g.yem pa dang /_mi dge ba'i chos brgyad la gnas pa de dag thams cad lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa rnams 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gnas par gyur/_thams cad kyang rgod pa dang /_ku re dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba dang /_'dod 
[\[145b.4\]]pa dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag dog dang /_chags pa yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_bsten pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba la spro bar gyur/_thams cad kyang chos nyan par 'dod par gyur to/_/lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam 
[\[145b.5\]]mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal po mkhar gyi bdag po dang /_rgyal phran dang /_stobs kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge 
[\[145b.6\]]bsnyen ma de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir lha'i me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_sil snyan dang /_dar gyi chun po rnams thogs te grong khyer chen po bA rA Na sI zhes bya ba gang 
[\[145b.7\]]na ba dang /_a mra srung ba mo'i tshal gang na ba der dong nas bdag gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams la mngon par mchod de/_me tog gi char dang /_dri'i char chen po mngon par phab bo/_/de nas de'i 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]tshe na bcom ldan 'das 'dzam bu'i gling dang /_a mra srung ba mo'i tshal de dpag tshad khrag khrig brgya stong du ma srid du rgya che bar byin gyis brlabs te/_sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam la/_lha'i yid du 'ong ba kha dog dang ldan pa/_dri dang ldan pa/_
[\[146a.2\]]lha'i me tog gi shing dang /_'bras bu'i shing dang /_spos kyi shing dang /_rin po che'i shing dang /_dpag bsam gyi shing dang /_gos kyi shing rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa/_lha'i seng ge'i khri dang ldan pa/_rin po che dang /_dar dang /_me tog gi chun po rab 
[\[146a.3\]]tu dpyangs pa/_lha'i dril bu'i sgras brgyan par gyur te/_'di lta ste/_dper na bde ba can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin du yid 'phrog par byed pa/_tshim par byed pa/_mgu bar byed pa/_mngon par dga' bar byed pa/_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan 
[\[146a.4\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po nas dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon 
[\[146a.5\]]po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyi bar du de dag gis gang bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas bcom ldan 
[\[146a.6\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyi ba ni mang ngo /_/bde bar 
[\[146a.7\]]gshegs pa mang ngo /_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzi brjid dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_nyan thos chen po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma rnams mang du 'dus so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs 
[\[146b.2\]]so legs so/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin te de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni mang ngo /_/sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta bu dang /_ji ltar 'dul ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu dang /_sems can rnams 
[\[146b.3\]]kyi mos pa sna tshogs kyi spyod pa mkhyen nas chos ston te/_sems can kha cig ni byang chub sems dpas 'dul/_kha cig ni nyan thos kyis 'dul/_kha cig ni rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul/_kha cig ni lhas 'dul/_kha cig ni brgya byin gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni 
[\[146b.4\]]tshangs pas 'dul/_kha cig ni klus 'dul/_kha cig ni rdzu 'phrul chen pos 'dul/_kha cig ni rgyal pos 'dul/_kha cig ni ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni chos nyan pas 'dul/_kha cig ni cho 'phrul gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni de bzhin gshegs pa mya 
[\[146b.5\]]ngan las 'da' bas 'dul/_kha cig ni ring bsrel gyis 'dul/_kha cig ni mchod rten byed du gzhug pa dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_'chag sa dang /_skyed mos tshal byed du gzhug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni sku gzugs byed 
[\[146b.6\]]du gzhug pa dang /_ri mo dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_ra gan gyi sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa dang bkur sti bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni 
[\[146b.7\]]mdo sde 'dri ba dang /_'drir gzhug pa dang /_bklag pa la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul/_kha cig ni mar me dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_do shal la sogs pas brgyan pa la spro ba bskyed pas 'dul ba yin te/_don dam pa la mkhas 
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]pa'i chos dang ldan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos dang ldan pa ni ma yin no/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu dag yang de bzhin gshegs pa dag la mi mkhyen pa dang /_mi gzigs pa'am/_mi gsan pa dang /_rnam par mi mkhyen pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' 
[\[147a.2\]]ste/_'ongs pa yang mkhyen/_ma 'ongs pa yang mkhyen/_'das pa yang mkhyen/_da ltar byung ba yang mkhyen/_sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang mkhyen/_spyod pa yang mkhyen/_khams kyang mkhyen/_skye ba yang mkhyen/_'byung ba yang mkhyen to/_/kye rgyal 
[\[147a.3\]]ba'i sras dag 'di lta ste/_dper na sman pa legs par bslabs pa/_tshe'i rig pa yan lag brgyad pa thams cad la ches mkhas shing /_khams thams cad la mkhas pa/_sman dang yo byad sbyor ba la brtson pa ni sems can nad pa nad sna tshogs kyis lus yongs su gzir ba rnams 
[\[147a.4\]]kyi khams kyang shes/_dus kyang shes/_tshod kyang shes/_sman yang shes/_rlung las gyur pa dang /_mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /_bad kan las gyur pa dang /_'dus pa las gyur pa dang /_khrag las gyur pa dang /_ma zhu ba las gyur pa dang /_skran dang /_dmu rdzing dang /_snying 
[\[147a.5\]]nad dang /_mdze dang /_g.yan pa dang /_shu ba dang /_'bras la sogs pa dang dug dang me dbal la sogs pa yang shes so/_/des thams cad shes nas sman gyi rdzas sna tshogs kyis skyug pa dang /_bkru ba dang /_phye ma sbyar ba dang /_sna nas blug pa'i las dang /_
[\[147a.6\]]gtar ka gdab pa dang /_mar dang /_'bru mar bskol ba dang /_smin par bya ba rnams sbyor ba'i thabs kyis sems can thams cad kyi nad de dag thams cad nye bar zhi bar byed cing nad sna tshogs kyi 'jigs pa las yongs su thar bar byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin 
[\[147a.7\]]du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_lha'i mig dang /_rna ba rnams kyi tshe'i rig pa yan lag brgyad dang ldan te/_sems can gyi khams dang /_bsam pa dang /_sbyor ba sna tshogs 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]la mkhas pas 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gi nad dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i nad kyis gzir ba'i sems can dang /_nga rgyal dang /_rgyags pa dang /_dregs pas bsgribs pa dang /_chags pa dang /_mya ngan dang /_'jigs 
[\[147b.2\]]pa dang /_khro bas bsgribs pa rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi gnas nas yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs dang /_sbyor ba sna tshogs dang /_ting nge 
[\[147b.3\]]'dzin sna tshogs dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par rol pas sems can rnams yongs su grol bar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar la bkod nas/_lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[147b.4\]]mdzad do/_/mi dge ba'i chos brgyad las yongs su thar bar mdzad cing 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la so sor 'god de/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni thabs la mkhas pa dang ldan pas ji ltar khams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dul ba'i 
[\[147b.5\]]sems can rnams kyi don du bdag nyid mi snang bar yang ston/_zla ba kham pa lta bu'i dkyil 'khor kyang ston/_zla ba mar gyi ngo dang /_yar gyi ngo yang ston/_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su rgyas pa yang ston/_mun nag thibs po thams cad kyang rnam par sel/_rtswa dang /_
[\[147b.6\]]shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_'bras la sogs pa yang sim par byed do/_/kye rgyal ba'i bu dag de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas kyang sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bsgribs pa'i sems can rnams dang /_khams sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i sems can 
[\[147b.7\]]rnams kyi spyod pa mkhyen nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston/_skye ba yang ston/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po yang ston/_rtse ba dang /_dga' ba dang /_bud med kyi bzhad gad dang /_ku re dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_dga' zhing rtse ba yang ston/_/khyim 
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]nas 'byung ba dang /_rab tu 'byung ba dang /_dka' ba spyad pa rnams kyang ston/_bdud btul ba dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas chos kyi sprin chen po'i char phab pas sems can rnams tshim par byas pa'i bar du yang ston te/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[148a.2\]]pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang sbyor ba sna tshogs kyis ring bsrel mchod pa dang /_mchod rten dang /_gtsug lag khang dang /_sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang /_rab tu 'byung ba'i phyir khyim nas 'byung ba dang /_dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod pa dang /_dam 
[\[148a.3\]]pa'i chos 'dri ba dang /_bklag pa dang /_kha ton du bya ba la spro ba bskyed pa dag gis kyang sems can thams cad thar bar mdzad/_bslab pa 'dzin pa dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_sdom pa dang /_nye bar gnas pa dang /_dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa rnams 'dzin du gzhug pa'i thabs 
[\[148a.4\]]mkhas pas kyang sems can rnams thar bar mdzad de/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su thar bar mdzad nas chos nyan pas tshim par mdzad de/_
[\[148a.5\]]bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du bkod do/_/de nas de'i tshe na lha'i bu blo chung ba kha cig ni 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_ji ltar sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[148a.6\]]mdzad pa mdzad de/_sku tshe shin tu ring por byin gyis brlabs nas sems can thams cad skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar 
[\[148a.7\]]bar mdzad pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa thams cad da dung ma mdzad kyis kyang /_'dis mya ngan las 'da' ba la shin tu bsngags shing brjod de/_'khor mang po bsdus nas rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ston pa las na/_de ci de bzhin gshegs pa 'di myur ba nyid du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bzhed pa lta snyam nas de dag yid mi dga' ste cang mi smra bar gyur to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems shes nas lha'i bu de dag la 'di 
[\[148b.2\]]skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu dag de ltar ma sems ma smra/_yid mi dga' bar ma byed cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ni mang ste/_thabs dang /_shes rab dang /_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[148b.3\]]sems can bsam pa sna tshogs dag la chos ston te/_lha'i bu dag ngas sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul ji ltar mthong ba de ltar ngas shes pa las na/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[148b.4\]]stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'chad par bzhed pa dang /_rgyas par mdzad par bzhed par mi 'gyur ram/_yang lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 
[\[148b.5\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba yang med/_sku tshe zad par 'gyur ba yang med/_bskal pa bye ba dpag tu med pa'i bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bzhugs mod kyi/_thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la yongs su 
[\[148b.6\]]mya ngan las 'da' ba yang ston/_dam pa'i chos nub par 'gyur ba yang ston to/_/sems can mya ngan las 'da' bas 'dul ba dang /_ring bsrel gyis 'dul ba'i snyigs ma'i rang bzhin can/_de bzhin gshegs pa la ma dad pa/_bla ma la bsti stang byed par mi 'gyur ba'i sems 
[\[148b.7\]]can dag ji lta ji ltar mthong ba/_de lta de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba ston mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni byon pa yang med/_gshegs pa med do/_/gang gi tshe sems can rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur cing de bzhin gshegs 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]pa la blta bar 'dod pa dang /_mchod par 'os pa dang /_chos nyan par 'dod pa dang /_zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du 'dod par gyur pa de'i tshe lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde bar bya ba dang /_dkon mchog 
[\[149a.2\]]gsum gsal bar bya ba dang /_rgyas par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa la skye ba med de/_rga ba dang 'chi ba yang med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor shin tu legs par phyis pa la 
[\[149a.3\]]gzugs sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur/_mi snang bar yang 'gyur mod kyi/_gzugs brnyan ni der 'ong ba dang /_'gro bar snang ba ni med do/_/lha'i bu dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la yang de ltar blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sgyu ma byed pa legs par 
[\[149a.4\]]bslabs pa ni grong khyer dang /_rta babs dang /_skyed mos tshal sna tshogs dang /_shing rta sna tshogs dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i gzugs dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtse ba sna tshogs bstan te mi snang bar byed kyang de la 'pho ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med/_'gro ba yang med do/_/de 
[\[149a.5\]]bzhin du/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung ba dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba la yang blta bar bya'o/_/yang lha'i bu dag sngon gyi smon lam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas lo stong lon pa'am/_mya ngan las 'das nas bskal par lon pa'am/_mya ngan las 
[\[149a.6\]]'das nas bskal pa bye bar lon yang sems can rnams kyis mchod par bya ba dang /_bkur stir bya ba dang /_ring bsrel gyi mchod rten byed du gzhug pa dang /_sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang /_mtshan nas brjod pa dang /_dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_mchod pa byed 
[\[149a.7\]]pa'i sems can 'jig rten gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa rnams thar par mdzad de/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_mi khom pa dang /_ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro log par ltung ba thams cad dang /_sdug 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]bsngal thams cad las yongs su thar bar mdzad nas rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/_gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon sum du me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba 
[\[149b.2\]]dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan rnams kyi mchod pas mchod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_lha'i bu dag gang sems can la las sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas lo brgya stong ngam/_bskal pa bye ba lon yang sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo 
[\[149b.3\]]zhes mtshan nas lan bdun du brjod nas nam mkha' la me tog gtor na de dag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi mthar byed par 'gyur ro/_/me tog nam mkha' la gtor blta zhog gi/_gang dag dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su slob pa la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[149b.4\]]pa la mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims bslab pa gcig tsam 'dzin tam nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig gam/_yud tsam zhig la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa yid la byed par brtson na/_de sdug bsngal mthar byas nas rim gyis bla na med 
[\[149b.5\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir bzhad gad dam/_ku re'am/_byis pa'i kyal ka'am/_rtsed mor byed pa'am/_'jim pa las mchod rten byed na/_de 
[\[149b.6\]]dag thams cad sdug bsngal mthar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur na/_gang gis ring bsrel gyi mchod rten nam/_ring bsrel gyi sku gzugs byas te/_sems can thams cad la snying rje gtso bor 
[\[149b.7\]]shes nas sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las yongs su dgrol lo snyam ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes nas lha'i me tog dang /_lha'i spos dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_sil snyan dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]mtshan rnams kyis mchod pa byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/de ni skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[150a.2\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams las yongs su thar bar 'gyur te/_ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu dag de ltar na de bzhin 
[\[150a.3\]]gshegs pa rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam la mkhas shing 'thun pa yongs su dag pa yin no/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/_kye ma'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni shes rab chen po dang ldan no/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[150a.4\]]mchog tu thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ni lags na/_gang 'jam dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa bye ba du ma lon yang 'jig rten gyi khams dag na bzhugs shing thabs mkhas pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams yongs su 
[\[150a.5\]]smin par mdzad do zhes des smras pa de lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam mo/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sems kyis lha'i bu de dag gi sems shes nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha'i bu dag legs so legs so/_/yud tsam zhig sdod cig_/khyod kyi yid la byed pa skyes 
[\[150a.6\]]pa 'di dang sngar zhus par gyur pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad pas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug phud can dang /_thams cad skyob dang /_log 
[\[150a.7\]]par dad sel dang /_gser thub dang /_'od srung dang /_rnam par gzigs dang /_mi 'khrugs pa dang /_'od dpag tu med pa de dag 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs shing de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]dpar bcas pas bskor cing 'khor rgya mtsho lta bu la chos ston par snang ba dang /_shar dang /_lho dang /_nub dang /_byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag na yang de bzhin gshegs pa du ma seng ge'i khri chen po la bzhugs nas chos 'chad cing bzhugs par mthong ba 
[\[150b.2\]]de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang /_lha'i bu de dag dga' bar gyur te/_mchog tu dga' zhing yid bde ba skyes nas bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs bskyed pas de 
[\[150b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_na bza' dang /_rgyan rnams kyis mngon par mchod de/_lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/e ma ye shes ye shes ni/_/ting nge 
[\[150b.4\]]'dzin dang shes rab sgom/_/ji ltar 'jig rten sgron ma rnams/_/'das nas bskal pa du ma na/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/dpa' bo chen po 'di na bzhugs/_/byang chub sems dpas yongs bskor cing /_/seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa gda'/_/
[\[150b.5\]]sangs rgyas mthong ba legs pa ste/_/chos mnyan pa yang legs pa yin/_/dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba dang /_/mnyan pa'ang de bzhin legs pa yin/_/gang dag 'dir ni bslab 'dzin pa'i/_/lus kyi sdom pa legs pa yin/_/nan tan gyis ni sgrub pa 
[\[150b.6\]]dag_/de kun byang chub thob par 'gyur/_/thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa rnams/_/'dir ni sems can thar bar mdzad/_/zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang /_/de bzhin sgyu ma byed pa 'dra/_/'ong ba dang ni 'gro ba yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa ston par mdzad/_/
[\[150b.7\]]mchod rten dang ni ri mo dang /_/sku gzugs byed du gzhug pa dang /_/mchod dang bkur sti bya ba'i phyir/_/gang dag mtshan ni dran byed pa/_/byang chub phyir ni gnas pa rnams/_/thams cad thar pa thob par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/dam pa'i 
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]chos ni mnyan pa dang /_/mchod cing 'dzin pa'ang de bzhin te/_/sdug bsngal kun las grol bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang rnam par 'phrul ba'i cho 'phrul 'di yang dag par bstan pa 'di bshad pa na srog chags drug khri bzhi 
[\[151a.2\]]stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/srog chags nyi khris chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/_/lha'i bu lnga stong gis len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par gyur to/_/dge slong dang /_
[\[151a.3\]]dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma bdun brgyas ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs thob par gyur to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal ba'i sras khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi don du dris pa'i 
[\[151a.4\]]lan bshad pa 'di ni khyod kyis legs par bshad de legs mod kyi/_kho bo the tsom cung zad cig skyes kyis/_gang thos nas sems can rnams kyis yid la byas te/_de dag thams cad 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las grol bar 'gyur ba dang /_bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba 
[\[151a.5\]]dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar kho bos dris pa de bstan cing lung ston cig_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis 
[\[151a.6\]]spobs pa skyes pa ni legs so/_/khyod gang dang gang 'dod pa dris shig dang ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/smras pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan thos pa tsam dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur sti byas pa nyid kyis sdig pa byed pa'i sems can 
[\[151a.7\]]rnams sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba de dag gang lags/_de dag 'jig rten gyi khams ni gang na bzhugs/_de dag la mchod pa ni ji ltar bgyi/_'jam dpal gyis 
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]]smras pa/_rigs kyi bu gang gi phyir sems can rnams ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang ngan song du skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[151b.2\]]gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams dang /_'jig rten gyi khams su mchod cing bsti stang bya ba bshad kyis nyon cig_/'jig rten gyi khams bai dUr+ya snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sman gyi bla bai dUr+ya'i 'od ces bya ba 
[\[151b.3\]]bzhugs te/_'tsho la gzhes shing chos kyang ston pa yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams gtsug pud can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i gtsug pud can zhes bya ba yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na 
[\[151b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri ma med par 'byung ba zhes bya ba yod do/_/'jig rten gyi khams zhi ba na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi bar bkod pa zhes bya ba yod do/_/'jig 
[\[151b.5\]]rten gyi khams bde ba can na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams pad mo'i bla ma na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo 'byung 
[\[151b.6\]]ba zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje na de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje mkhregs pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan bral ba zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'jigs pa med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs 
[\[151b.7\]]pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rtogs pa dang blo gros su ldan pa na de bzhin gshegs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ngan 'gro dang bral ba na de bzhin gshegs pa ngan song thams cad zhi bar 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dri ma med pa na de bzhin gshegs pa blo gros rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams dbang po na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i blo gros zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i mtshan bzung ba nyid kyis 
[\[152a.2\]]lha'i dbang por 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams zla ba na de bzhin gshegs pa zla ba rgyas pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams khyad par thob pa na 
[\[152a.3\]]de bzhin gshegs pa ngan 'gro thams cad zhi bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas ngan 'gro thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams legs par snang ba na de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad sdug par mthong ba zhes 
[\[152a.4\]]bya ba yod de/_de'i mtshan bzung zhing mchod pas 'jig rten pa thams cad mngon par dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi dpal dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo dang /_de bzhin 
[\[152a.5\]]gshegs pa bdud thams cad kyi stobs rab tu 'joms pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug pud can dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad skyob dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa log par dad sel dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa gser thub dang /_de bzhin 
[\[152a.6\]]gshegs pa 'od srung dang /_rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa de dag mya ngan las 'das nas lo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong lon pa'am/_mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan bzung ba dang /_ring bsrel 
[\[152a.7\]]gyi mchod rten byed du 'jug pa dang /_ri mo dang sku gzugs byed du 'jug pa dang /_mar me dang /_spos dang /_me tog dang /_dri dang byug pa rnams kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas pa dang /_bslab pa 'dzin dang /_brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub dang /_sdom pa 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]dang /_nye bar gnas pa rnams kyis sems can thams cad ngan song dang /_ngan 'gro thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/bskal par gnas pa'i las kyi sgrib pa mtshams med pa lnga la sogs pa yang yongs su dag par 'gyur te/_bde 
[\[152b.2\]]'gror 'gro bar 'gyur zhing ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba nas/_rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/_/gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang byang chub kyi sems dran pa nyams 
[\[152b.3\]]pa zhig gis sdig pa byed pa dang /_dam pa'i chos spong ba dang /_'phags pa dag la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_mtshams med pa lnga byed pa dang /_srog gcod pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum gyi nor rku ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba mnar med par 'gro ba 
[\[152b.4\]]dang /_ngan song gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi don dang /_grogs po dang gnyen rnams yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ri mo'i sku gzugs dang /_'jim pa'i sku gzugs byed du 'jug cing /_byed du bcug 
[\[152b.5\]]nas kyang sems can thams cad la snying rje ba'i sems gtso bor byas te/_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan par gyur nas zla ba yar gyi tshes brgyad nas brtsams te bco lnga'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng 
[\[152b.6\]]ba dang /_byug pa dang /_mar me dang /_sil snyan dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis mtshan lan gsum nyin lan gsum du mchod de/_sems can de dag thar par bya ba'i phyir ci nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye 
[\[152b.7\]]shes kyis ni mkhyen/_lha'i snyan gyis ni gsan/_lha'i spyan gyis ni gzigs shing sems can de dag bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur gyi ngan 'gror 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_legs par bya ba byed kyi ngan par bya ba mi byed par yongs su bsngo zhing /_de ltar sems 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]can ngan song du skyes pa de dag thar par bgyi ba'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba gdab bo/_/bshags pa dang mthol bas sdig pa bsrabs par gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan thos par gyur cig_/ngan 'gro thams cad 
[\[153a.2\]]las yongs su grol bar gyur cig_/ji srid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du bdag gi spyod pa dang 'thun par spyod par gyur cig ces de ltar yongs su bsngo bar bya'o/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang 
[\[153a.3\]]bris pa dang /_'drir bcug pa dang /_bcangs pa dang /_bklag pa dang /_mchod pa de'i phyir sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi smon lam gyi mthus sems can mnar med par 'gro ba dang /_ngan song gsum du skyes pa de dag gi rna bar mtshan rnams thos par 
[\[153a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus kyang sdig pa thams cad bsrabs par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi gzi brjid kyi mthu dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthus dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las rjes su dran par gyur nas phyis sdig pa'i las 
[\[153a.5\]]byed par mi 'gyur te/_de nas sdug bsngal de dag las yongs su grol bar 'gyur zhing bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du spyod pa 'thun par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na chos kyi 
[\[153a.6\]]rnam grangs 'di ni yon tan mang po dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che chen po dang 'dra ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che bzhin du bsam pa thams cad 'grub ste/_sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed/_ngan 'gro'i sgo thams cad gcod par byed bde 'gro'i sgo dang /_sangs 
[\[153a.7\]]rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo rnams ni 'byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa dang /_smon lam dang /_rnam par 'phrul pa dang /_byin gyi rlabs dang /_ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pas mya ngan las 'das nas bskal pa brgya lon pa 'jig rten 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]gyi khams sna tshogs na gnas pa dag mnyan cing mchod pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nyid kyis ngan song thams cad las yongs su thar te bde 'gror bkod par 'gyur na/_gang 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir gzhug pa dang /_gzhan la rgya 
[\[153b.2\]]cher yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/_yon tan de dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur na/_de'i bsod nams mngon par 'du bya ba dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba'i yon tan de ni de bzhin gshegs pa ma gtogs 
[\[153b.3\]]par brjod par sla ba ma yin no/_/rgyal po chen po de lta bas na yon tan 'di dag la ltos la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcang bar bya'o/_/bklag par bya'o/_/bshad par bya'o/_/mchod par bya'o/_/dkon mchog gsum la dad pa mi phyed par bya'o/_/de bzhin 
[\[153b.4\]]gshegs pa la rtag tu mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bya'o/_/'khor ba las yid skyo zhing bag yod pa dang /_'khor ba skad cig mar yid la byed pa dang ldan par bya'o/_/yang rgyal po chen po 'dod pa 
[\[153b.5\]]la bsten pas bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar sdug bsngal ba/_skye ba dang 'gag pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_mngal na gnas pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal 
[\[153b.6\]]dang /_dbul ba'i sdug bsngal dang /_gcad pa dang /_gzhom pa dang /_brdung ba dang /_brdeg pa dang /_bsreg pa'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur te/_'du byed thams cad yongs su spangs te/_'gro dgos pas rgyal po chen po khyod kyis snying brtse ba gtso bor bya ba 
[\[153b.7\]]dang /_chos dang thar pa 'dod par bya'o/_/de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis 'jam dpal la legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/chos kyi char phab pas bdag cag tshim par bgyis 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]rangs par bgyis/_byang chub la rab tu bzhag pas bag yod par bgyis so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_
[\[154a.2\]]klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_'dri ba po dang /_'chang ba po dang /_klog pa po de dag la me tog dang /_spos dang /_dri dang /_phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_gos dang /_rgyan rnams kyis mchod na bcom 
[\[154a.3\]]ldan 'das de'i bsod nams ji snyed cig skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'am/_rgyal po'am/_blon po'am/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma la la zhig gis 
[\[154a.4\]]chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pas bcangs pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_yang dag par bstan na des yon tan chen po brgyad thob par 'gyur te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_gang dag 'jig rten na nad dang gnod pa de dag 
[\[154a.5\]]de la thams cad kyi thams cad du mi 'byung ba dang /_gang 'jig rten na gnod sbyin dang /_'byung po dang /_sha za mdangs 'phrog pa de dag thams cad byams pa la gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dag gshed byed dang /_byad dang /_sngags dang /_ro langs gzhan gyi 
[\[154a.6\]]gnod pa de dag de'i lus la gnod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim bdag dang /_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma thams cad de la dga' zhing mgu bar gyur nas de'i don thams cad 'grub 
[\[154a.7\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_lha thams cad kyis yongs su gang bar 'gyur ba dang /_bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_lag na rdo rjes yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ba dang /_ji ltar 'dod pa'i gnas su skye zhing tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ba ste/_yon tan chen po de brgyad thob 
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/des ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lha'i mchod pa dang /_mngon sum du mchod pas lo 'bum gyi bar du mchod par 'gyur ro/_/gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi mchod rten rin 
[\[154b.2\]]po che sna bdun las byas pas gang bar byas te/_lha'i phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_me tog dang /_mar me dang /_rin po che'i gdugs dang /_sil snyan dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan rnams kyis lo 'bum du bkur sti byas te rjed cing mchod pa bas gang chos kyi 
[\[154b.3\]]rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu bstan na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig gis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de 
[\[154b.4\]]dag 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la gzhog cing /_bzhag nas kyang lha'i lo stong du yo byad thams cad kyis mi brel bar rjed cing mchod pa bas/_gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa tsam yang nyan pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_
[\[154b.5\]]'dri ba dang /_'drir 'jug pa dang /_gzhan la rgyas par byed na de bas 'di ches bsod nams mang du 'phel lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rgya cher brjod par bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/zhing stong bye ba gzhan du gnas pa yi/_/
[\[154b.6\]]sangs rgyas mkhas pa mtha' yas bye ba dag_/sems can rnams kyi phyir ni dgongs mdzad cing /_/ngan 'gro las ni sems can thar bar mdzad/_/bstir med las la gnas shing sbyin byed dag_/las byas nas ni ngan 'gror song ba rnams/_/de dag thar bar bya phyir 
[\[154b.7\]]chos 'dod pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di dag mchod par bgyi/_/ri mor mchod rten rnam pa sna tshogs byos/_/gser dang dngul dang de ltar lugs rnams dang /_/'jim pa'i sku gzugs dag ni byed bcug nas/_/mchod pa sna tshogs kyis ni mchod par gyis/_/
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]me tog dang ni phreng ba byug pa dang /_/mar me sil snyan dri dang spos kyis mchod/_/shes rab che bas bsngo ba dag kyang gyis/_/mdo sde bshad cing 'dir yang bzhugs par gyis/_/de bzhin gshegs dang mdo sde'i gzi brjid kyis/_/sdig pa'i 
[\[155a.2\]]las las sems can de thar gyis/_/bla med byang chub reg par 'gyur bar du/_/dag pa'i gnas su skye ba 'dzin par 'gyur/_/sngon gyi las rnams rjes su dran 'gyur zhing /_/dran nas mkhas pa sdig pa byed mi 'gyur/_/mi yi byang chub sems dpas mdo sde 'di/_/
[\[155a.3\]]bshad pa des ni bsod nams mang du thob/_/de ni lha rnams kun gyis bsrung bar 'gyur/_/de yi lus 'di la ni nad mi 'byung /_/de yi rgyal srid kun la gnod mi 'byung /_/khyim dang grong dang grong khyer zhi bar 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni rtag 'dzin pa/_/
[\[155a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzod ni rtag 'dzin 'gyur/_/gang zhig mchod cing rjed dang 'drir 'jug dang /_/las gzhan med par nyan du 'jug pa ni/_/des ni sangs rgyas yang dag mchod par 'gyur/_/des ni myur du byang chub mchog rtogs 'gyur/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[155a.5\]]'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'di la the tsom skyes te/_bcom ldan 'das ci lus 'dis rgyal srid kyi longs spyod bsgrubs nas slar yang sdug bsngal bsgrub par 'gyur ram/_
[\[155a.6\]]'khor bar 'khor ba'i tshe skyo bar mi 'gyur ram/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba rnams myong bar 'gyur zhing ji ltar skye/_ji ltar 'gum/_ji ltar 'tsho/_ji ltar bde ba sgrub 
[\[155a.7\]]par 'gyur/_ji ltar sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ltad mo can la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ltad mo can 'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang 'di la gang yang 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]skye ba med/_'chi ba med/_'tsho ba med de/_rigs kyi bu 'di la rga ba dang /_'chi ba med kyi/_'tsho ba'i khams ni rtag tu lus kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas so/_/yang las kyi rkyen dang las kyi gzhis skye ba sna tshogs su 'ongs shing 'phos nas bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[155b.2\]]myong bar 'gyur te/_bde ba la bde bar 'du shes/_sdug bsngal la sdug bsngal du 'du shes/_bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa la bde ba yang ma yin/_sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa'i 'du shes skyed mod kyi/_lhag ma ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das 
[\[155b.3\]]pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can du gyur gyi bar du skyo ba'i sems skyed par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na skyes bu la la zhig gos sar pa gyon te/_de la de gyon nas las thams cad byed cing bde ba dang sdug bsngal yang myong bar 
[\[155b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/yang dus gzhan zhig na gos de rnyings shing mugs te dri ma can mthar bshad par gyur pa dang /_des de bor ba'i chos can du shes nas bor ro/_/bor nas yang gos sar pa gsar ma gzhan zhig btsal te gyon no/_/des gyon na yang las byed cing bde ba 
[\[155b.5\]]dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur nas don dam pa'i gos sra zhing brtan la mi shigs shing mi chod pa gyon par ma gyur bar du gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa 'di lta bus bskal pa du ma 'das kyang gos de bgos so she'am/_bor ro/_/zhes mi rtog rnam par mi rtog gis de ni 
[\[155b.6\]]lus kyi dbang du 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang gi tshe 'tsho ba'i khams des lus 'jig pa dang /_'gyel ba'i mthar gyur pa mthong ba de'i tshe lus de bor nas yang sar pa gzhon nu gzhan btsal te/_de de'i las byed cing de bgos nas bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur 
[\[155b.7\]]ro/_/ji ltar rang gi bsod nams las skyes pa'i gos de 'jam pa dang /_sra ba dang /_rtsub pa'i bgo ba de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams kyis bgo ba lta bu'i lus blangs te/_ji ltar rang gi las kyi rkyen gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las skyes pa bzhin du lha dang /_rgyal po dang /_sems 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten rnams su skye bar 'gyur te/_lus de yang 'tsho ba'i khams kyi dbang gis 'gro zhing 'tsho ba'i khams kyis yongs su btang yang mi rtog_/rnam par mi rtog go/_/rigs kyi bu de 
[\[156a.2\]]bzhin du lus gos lta bur blta bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na sbrul ni las kyi rkyen gyis dus kyi mthar shun pa de bor nas rang gi lus kyi gzugs kyis 'gro zhing 'ong ste/_bde ba dang sdug bsngal myong bar gyur kyang shun pa de mi rtog_/rnam par mi 
[\[156a.3\]]rtog go/_/de bzhin du 'tsho ba'i khams ni sbrul lta bur blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/_dper na shing lo ma dang 'dab mar ldan par gyur pa las/_yang dus kyi rkyen gyis 'jig pa dang ltung bar mthar 'gyur ba'i chos can du gyur nas phyis yang dus kyi rkyen gyis myu gu dang /_
[\[156a.4\]]yal ga dang /_'dab ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu rnams len te/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin du las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par blta'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na sems can dag rnyed pa dang /_chags pa dang /_khro ba dang /_phrag 
[\[156a.5\]]dog dang /_nga rgyal mang ba dag 'byung ste/_srang dang gzhal ba la g.yo byed par dga' ba 'dod chags kyi rjes su spyod pa dag 'byung ste/_de dag 'dod pa'i rgyu dang 'dod pa'i gzhis sdig pa mang du byed par 'gyur te/_sdig pa mang du byas nas sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur zhing mi 
[\[156a.6\]]rtag pa la rtag pa'i 'du shes can dang /_mi gtsang ba la gtsang ba'i 'du shes can gyis sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la mchod pa byed par mi 'gyur te/_byis pa'i blo can de dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen mi tshol gyi/_gang de lta bu'i sems can de dag la chos ston pa de dag la 
[\[156a.7\]]dgod cing kyal ka byed pa mang bar 'gyur gyi/_dad par mi byed/_yid ches par mi byed de/_de lta bu'i sems can de dag ni sdig pa spyod do/_/de dag gis 'tsho ba'i khams des las kyi rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du myong bar 'gyur ba'i bgo ba'i lus blangs nas sdug bsngal la dga' ba'i 'du shes 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]skyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_'di ni las kyi rkyen yin par blta ste/_'di la su yang 'chi ba med/_'tsho ba med/_bde ba dang /_sdug bsngal yang myong bar mi 'gyur te/_las kyi rgyu las kyi rkyen gyis skye ba dang 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/sems 
[\[156b.2\]]can de dag gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mdzad nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/_sems can thams cad 
[\[156b.3\]]kyang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la bkod do/_/de nas de'i tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sa chen g.yos par gyur to/_/ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol to/_/rgyal po gsal rgyal dang gzhan yang mthu chen po 
[\[156b.4\]]mthu che ba rdzu 'phrul chen po mang pos lha'i na bza' lnga brgyas de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par mchod nas lus 'dar bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar sdig pa thams cad nyes pa la nyes so zhes so sor bshags 
[\[156b.5\]]te bslab pa la yi dam bca' bar bya ste/_ji ltar lhags pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad du smras so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba thams cad las slar log pa/_sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las sgrol ba/_grol ba thams cad la phyag bgyi'o/_/phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom 
[\[156b.6\]]ldan 'das slan chad bdag cag skye ba'i 'khor bar sdug bsngal myong bar spro bar mi bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 
[\[156b.7\]]las grol bar mdzad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag nan tan snying por byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dkon mchog gsum la lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par byos shig_/'du byed thams cad mi rtag cing sgyu ma lta bur shes par byos shig_/dam 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la spro bar byos shig_/mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_bkur sti mang bar byos shig_/sems can thams cad la mchog tu snying rje bar shes par byos shig_/chos smra ba la de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'du shes bskyed par byos shig_/dge ba'i 
[\[157a.2\]]bshes gnyen la bla mar 'du shes bskyed par byos shig_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bya ba dang /_sgom pa dang /_rgyas par byos shig_/rigs kyi bu sdug bsngal thams cad dang /_skye ba thams cad dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid 
[\[157a.3\]]mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa chen po las yongs su grol bar 'gyur/_'khor ba'i zhags pa las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la bsgrub par byos shig_/bag med pa'i gnas las slar ldog par byos shig_/rigs 
[\[157a.4\]]kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa cig yud tsam pa bzung bas kyang sems can rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol zhing bde 'gror 'gro ste ngan 'gror mi 'gro bar 'gyur na/_gang dag dgod pa dang /_ku re dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo rnams yid 
[\[157a.5\]]kyis yongs su spangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchog tu mos pas rim gro byed cing lhag pa'i bsam pas bzhugs te/_'phags pa'i nye bar gnas pa yan lag brgyad pa la nye bar gnas nas gso sbyin yang dag par blangs te/_spyod pa de dag ngan song gsum du mi skye zhing /_
[\[157a.6\]]bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /_lha dang mi'i bde ba myong nas sdug bsngal mthar byas te/_rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos/_bud med kyi lus nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas nyon 
[\[157a.7\]]mongs par gyur pa la la zhig nyin gcig gam nyi ma phyed dam/_yud tsam yang rung ste/_gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba yang dag par len cing bslab pa 'dzin par byed na de dag thams cad bud med kyi dngos po dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa thams 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]cad rnam par bzlog ste/_sdug bsngal mthar byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bde 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi yi dam 'cha' ba dang /_bslab pa 
[\[157b.2\]]'dzin pa yang dag par len par byed pa ni yon tan dang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po dang ldan pa yin na/_byis pa dag gis ni de mi shes so/_/de nas de'i tshe na bar snang las sgra chen po byung bar gyur pa dang /_'khor de dag thams cad kyis e ma'o e ma'o zhes dam pa'i 
[\[157b.3\]]sgra byung nas me tog dang /_dri'i char chen po rab tu phab bo/_/sems can 'bum tshang ba rnams sdug bsngal thams cad las grol bar gyur te/_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod do/_/gzhan yang sems can bye ba rnams 
[\[157b.4\]]sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro ba yid la byas shing sems dang po bskyed par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa 
[\[157b.5\]]dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag dbugs phyung ste/_bdag cag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi mtshan rnams 
[\[157b.6\]]thos te/_bcom ldan 'das la chos smra ba dang /_'chang ba dang /_'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_sgrogs pa de dag gi yul lam/_grong khyer ram/_gtsug lag khang rnams bdag cag gi lus dang srog dang yang bsngos te/_bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyab 
[\[157b.7\]]par bgyi/_don thams cad grub par bgyi/_nor dang 'bru rnams legs par bsgrub par bgyi/_thams cad du mchod par 'gyur bar bgyi/_nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi/_dran pa dang /_stobs dang /_spro ba stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]kyis de dag la legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/ci nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam tshig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba de ltar khyed kyis byos shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces 
[\[158a.2\]]bka' stsal pa dang /_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lag na rdo rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad dang nyan thos chen po rnams dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[158a.3\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi stobs skyed pa'i cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo 
[\[158a.4\]]rdzogs so//[ {D187}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya bud d+ha d+ha rma a tsin t+ya nir de shA/_bod skad du/_'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa la 
[\[158a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas de na byang chub sems dpa' mang po 'dus pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du gyur te/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[158a.6\]]'das rnams kyi sngon gyi smon lam las byung ba rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[158a.7\]]'byung ba bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyangs bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod 
[\[158b.2\]]pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam/_kha cig ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyi rtog pa sems kyis mkhyen pas byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[158b.3\]]ud pa la'i snying po la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyi brlabs nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi shugs su gyur/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang bas snang bar gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi gzi brjid kyis kun tu khyab par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi mi 'jigs pa la gnas par 
[\[158b.4\]]gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dbyings su 'jug cing 'bab pa dang ldan par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi che ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyis yul la zhugs par gyur/_chags pa med pa'i rnam par spyod pa med pa bcu rdul yab la gnas par gyur/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung 
[\[158b.5\]]gcig nas gcig tu 'ba' zhig shes par gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul brjod du med pa la spyod cing bsgrub par gyur to/_/de nas ud pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su 'jug pa rtogs shing shes nas/_yid la chags pa med pa'i dbyings 
[\[158b.6\]]su bsgrubs te/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas chos thams cad kyi sgrib pa spangs pa dang /_kun tu bzang po'i smon lam dang ldan par zhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su rtogs shing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i go cha chen po bgos 
[\[158b.7\]]nas sems can thams cad la lta zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i yi dam gyi dkyil 'khor brtsams pa dang /_skad cig ma'i mthar song ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa dang /_mi zad pa mthong ba dang /_thams 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]cad mkhyen pa mngon du bya ba dang /_gzungs thams cad snang bar gyur pa dang /_so sor yang dag par rig pa rtogs nas ud pa la'i snying po byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi mthus pad ma'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[159a.2\]]sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyod pa dpag tu med do/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par sprul pa chen po la gnas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i mtshan thams cad kyi mdzad pa brnyes so/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[159a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ting nge 'dzin gyi bsam pa dang ldan zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so sor yang dag par rig pa bzhi brjod du med par ston to/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi 
[\[159a.4\]]chos bsam du med pa la gnas so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sgra dbyangs dpag tu med par 'gro'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings rtogs shing chud do/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon 
[\[159a.5\]]par shes pa thams cad kyi khyu mchog sangs rgyas so/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' sgrib pa med pa la 'jug pa mdor bsdus pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang 
[\[159a.6\]]dbus med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pa rnam par dag cing ma brnyogs pas thams cad du 'gro ba spangs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la 
[\[159a.7\]]chags pa med pa'i spyan mtha' dang dbus med pas spyan mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chags pa med pa'i snyan mtha' dang dbus med pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi sgra sgrib pa med par gsan pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis shangs kyi skye mched mtha' dang dbus med pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnga' mchog brnyes pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi ljags che zhing srab pa mtha' dang dbus med pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings su sgra dbyangs kyis 'gro 
[\[159b.2\]]ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku mtha' dang dbus med pas las kyi lhag ma ma lus shing sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can gyi rgyud du de bzhin gshegs pa ston cing dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yid kyi las mtha' dang 
[\[159b.3\]]dbus med pas chos kyi dbyings kyi sku dbyer med cing dus gsum la ma chags pas rjes su 'gro ba rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa la gnas pa mtha' dang dbus med pas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul 
[\[159b.4\]]pa dang cho 'phrul mi zad pa ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rnam par dag pa mtha' dang dbus med pas brjod du med pa'i rgyan byin gyis brlabs shing nyon mongs pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ston pa 
[\[159b.5\]]dmigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i khyad par dang /_smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa dang /_chos kyi yongs su rdzogs shing ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i chos 
[\[159b.6\]]yongs su rdzogs pas chos thams cad mngon par byang chub pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[159b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'pho bar ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i tshe ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par byung bar ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing mngon par byang chub par 
[\[160a.2\]]ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis sems can rnams ji ltar smin cing 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du mkhyen nas mgu bar mdzad pa ston 
[\[160a.3\]]pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can rnams ji ltar 'dul ba bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sna tshogs brjod du med pa'i dmigs pa ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan 
[\[160a.4\]]cing /_khyu mchog de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i mdzod ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du thams cad rnam par dag pa ston pa dang /_skad cig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da 
[\[160a.5\]]ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /_dbang po dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_dad pa sna tshogs kyis spyod pa'i rim pa dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyis rigs mngon par mkhyen pa ston pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs 
[\[160a.6\]]rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dus las mi 'da' ba bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba las mi 'da' 
[\[160a.7\]]ba dang /_dus de rnams sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yang dag par dge ba'i rnam par smin pa'i rnam par smin pa las mi 'da' ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas yongs su smin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lung 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can gyi bsam pa bzhin du cho 'phrul ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas sems can rnams ji ltar dad pa bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku'i byin gyi rlabs ston pa 
[\[160b.2\]]dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas btang snyoms la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal du 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen 
[\[160b.3\]]nas ji ltar rab tu dang ba'i sems can rnams rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas nyon mongs shing gdul dka' ba'i sems can la mi btsams pas 'dul ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus mkhyen nas 
[\[160b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi rnam par sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dmigs pa ston pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus de nas dus las mi 'da' ba'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul mtshungs pa med 
[\[160b.5\]]cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_skyil mo krung gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus par khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba gcig yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /_'od zer gcig gis 'jig rten 
[\[160b.6\]]gyi khams thams cad ma lus par snang ba dang /_sku gcig gis sku thams cad du ston pa dang /_phyogs gcig gis gnas dmigs pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku dang /_ye shes gcig gis chos thams cad bsgribs pa med 
[\[160b.7\]]par chud pa dang /_dus mkhyen nas sems gcig bskyed pas chos thams cad kyi dbyings kyis ma lus par khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi che ba tshad med pa'i rjes su song zhing gom pa gcig la de kho na nyid ston pa dang /_dus gsum thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhing 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]phun sum tshogs pas khyab pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'gro ba thams cad dang mi 'dre zhing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo nyid gcig ste/_gnyis su med par spyod pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[161a.2\]]kyi yul mtshungs pa med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_chos thams cad la mi gnas par 'jug cing smon lam mngon par sgrub 
[\[161a.3\]]pa mkhyen pa dang /_lus med pa'i lus mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_chos thams cad gnyis su med pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_sems can bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa la sems can 'dul ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_
[\[161a.4\]]chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa la mtshan ma sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul thams cad ma lus pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_yul thams cad la mngon par 'du 
[\[161a.5\]]mi byed cing las kyi rnam par smin pa mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i dbyings su mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa yang ma yin/_rnam par byang ba yang ma yin par mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa dang /_chos 
[\[161a.6\]]thams cad skye ba med pa la skye zhing 'god pa'i mtshan nyid rkyen dang 'du ba tshogs te byung ba mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs mngon par sgrub pa mkhyen pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 
[\[161a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_dus gsum thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul gsum sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_gzungs dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i rtsa ba rab tu dbye ba la mkhas pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo thams cad dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[161b.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_snying rje chen pos sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_dus thams cad du sems can thams cad 
[\[161b.3\]]la rnam par gzigs shing rtag tu mnyam pas phan par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can thams cad 'dul ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi 
[\[161b.4\]]dbyings la mi chags par gnas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang /_skad cig la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba thams cad sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa dang nyi ma gcig la dus gsum gyi bskal 
[\[161b.5\]]pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams su gtogs pa tshad med pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod 
[\[161b.6\]]par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_bdud kyi rgol ba bcom zhing gtor ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_gzhan mur 'dug dang pha rol rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa shin tu bzod 
[\[161b.7\]]par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_sems can thams cad 'dul zhing tshim par mdzad pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_chos kyi dbyings rab tu phigs shing mkhyen pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_'jig rten 
[\[162a.2\]]gyi khams thams cad ma lus pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'i sku gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par phye ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyangs kyi 
[\[162a.3\]]yan lag thams cad kyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la 'jug pa'i gnas dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang /_sems can gti mug med cing dang ba'i sems can thos pas 'dul ba shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[162a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig bzhin du ba spu'i khams thams cad nas rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa de snyed gshegs pa gnas pa'i tshul gyis 'byung ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu gnas 'di bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[162a.5\]]thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems can 'byin pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[162a.6\]]gnas gcig gi rab tu phra ba'i rdul la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rgyan rang bzhin gyis 'tsher bas chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing sems can 'dul ba rgyun mi gcod la 
[\[162a.7\]]gtong ba med kyang gnod pa med cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du'ang gnod pa med de/_rab tu phra ba'i rdul de rgyas par byas pa'ang med/_'jig rten gyi khams chung ngur byas pa'ang med pa chos kyi dbyings rab tu rtogs shing mkhyen nas gnas pa ste/_
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po'o/_/mun pa med pa'i dbyings su de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te mun pa dang bcas pa snang bar gyur nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rab rib 
[\[162b.2\]]med pa/_rnam par rab rib med pa'i gnas la sems can pha rol 'dzud pa dang /_de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i rjes su song ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu bzod par dka' ba'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o/_/
[\[162b.3\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zil gyis gnon pa'i chos kyi bla re chen po bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[162b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba shin tu bsgrubs te/_thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs sngon nas mtho bas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 
[\[162b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag cing de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa la mi gnas shing phyi ma'i mtha' ma'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[162b.6\]]kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thams cad la gnas pa bcom zhing dus gsum la mi gnas par spyod pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma 
[\[162b.7\]]tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sna tshogs kyi blang ba med pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyan gcig pa'i ngo bo ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams zad mi shes pas sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' mnyam pa'i chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams 
[\[163a.2\]]cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi dbang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs dang kha dog mtha' med par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na chags pa med par bzhugs te/_'di ni sangs rgyas 
[\[163a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig pa med pa bzhi brnyes te/_bag tsha ba med par gnas nas khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrog ste/_stag chen po ltar rgol ba 
[\[163a.4\]]rnam par gnon cing /_me mar lta bu'i kun tu rtog pas chos ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal 
[\[163a.5\]]pa nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das mod kyi/_'on kyang ming mang po rnam par rigs pas sems can rnams kyi sbyin gnas sbyong ste/_ji ltar zhugs pa bzhin no/_/de srid du yun ring po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa rnams kyang rung ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[163a.6\]]'das rnams la sbyin gnas bskrun pa ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 
[\[163a.7\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad las ring ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs kyang /_'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i sems can gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran na sku ston par mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi che 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]ba thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi che ba ste/_thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin 
[\[163b.2\]]tu rnam par dag pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sngon gyi smon lam shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ma chags pa'i tshul khrims rnam par dag 
[\[163b.3\]]cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sems can thams cad phung po las byung bar mdzad pa shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[163b.4\]]g.yog 'khor shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag cing shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[163b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bsgribs pa med pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phung po shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa dang /_
[\[163b.6\]]rnam par gnon par mdzad pa dam pa'i mchog brnyes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras su dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na 
[\[163b.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa rab tu rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la dus thams cad du sangs rgyas ston pa dang /_dus thams cad du sems can shes kyi sems can la chos ston pa dang /_dus thams cad du 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]sangs rgyas la sems rab tu dang ba'i sems can la tshad med pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_dus thams cad du chos mi 'gyur ba'i lam du 'das pa'i sems can la ye shes rtogs par mdzad pa dang /_dus thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad la sangs 
[\[164a.2\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mi chags par bzhud pa dang /_dus thams cad du sems can thams cad la thugs rje chen po rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[164a.3\]]ldan 'das rnams rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs pa dang /_dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas sna tshogs su sprul par bzhugs pa dang /_dus thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi dbyings la 
[\[164a.4\]]gnas pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni dus thams cad du 'jig rten gyi yul khams thams cad na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 
[\[164a.5\]]ye shes kyi rgya mtsho'i tshul mi zad pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa tshad med pa brnyes pa'i ye shes kyi rgya 
[\[164a.6\]]mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi yul gyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[164a.7\]]ldan 'das kyi chos thams cad kyi char 'bebs pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_kha dog gi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pas 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]sngon gyi mtha' nas smon lam spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das phyi ma'i mthar 'gro ba thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can ma lus pa'i ris 
[\[164b.2\]]thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i bsod nams zil gyis mi gnon pa'i ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[164b.3\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi rgya mtsho mi zad pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[164b.4\]]cing mngon par byung ba'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad mi mkhyen pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams thams cad la thugs rje che ba'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas 
[\[164b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams tshad med pa'i stobs bcu thams cad dang ldan pa'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can thams cad 'dul bar 
[\[164b.6\]]zhugs pa'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mdzad pa'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pas 'dul ba'i sems can la 'dul ba'i spyan dang /_gang 'di 
[\[164b.7\]]ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gnyis su med par spyod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid la dbang ba'i spyan dang /_gang 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ji ltar sems can btul te smin par mdzad nas/_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mtha'i phyir sangs rgyas 
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar ston pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyan bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu ste/_bcu gang 
[\[165a.2\]]zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams la mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi spyod pa sna tshogs mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam 
[\[165a.3\]]par smin pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la gdams pa rjes su bstan pa mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams rnam par spyod pa'i nan tan mtha' yas par ston
