[\[165a.4\]]pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gdams pa mtha' yas pa bstan pa la 'god pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i rim pa'i khyad par bzhin smon lam gyis 'byung ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /_
[\[165a.5\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la sdud pa dang 'gyur ba mtha' yas par ston pa'i sgo dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa bzhin 
[\[165a.6\]]ston pa'i sgo dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba de dang de dag tu sangs rgyas thams cad gcig nas gcig tu bskal par 'byung ba sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthus bsdus nas yongs su 
[\[165a.7\]]snang zhing /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes rnam par rig pa mtha' yas pa'i sgo ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos mtha' yas par ston pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]kyi mdzad pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzugs kyi sku bstan pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas 
[\[165b.2\]]kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gzung bas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis mi 'dzin pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa 
[\[165b.3\]]dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung gis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis yul gyi dbang gis brtsam pa'i yul thams cad kyis 
[\[165b.4\]]kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mtshan gyis kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhing rtsom pas kyang sems can rnams la 
[\[165b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas kyang sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsungs pas kyang sems can rnams la 
[\[165b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu ste/_bcu 
[\[165b.7\]]gang zhe na/_smon lam rgyun mi gcod cing smon lam brtan pa dang /_gnyis su med par bshad pa ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po dang po'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la rab tu brtson zhing ma zhum par phyi ma'i mtha' bskal par 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]'gro zhing yon tan gyi rgyan thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gnyis so/_/brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na 'dul bar 'os pa'i sems can gcig gzigs na yang mi 
[\[166a.2\]]bzhugs par 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs te/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po gsum mo/_/sems can gyi sems mi 'phrogs pa la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa dang /_sems can sems rab tu dang ba la thugs rje chen po mnyam pa ste/_
[\[166a.3\]]'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bzhi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang ma yin/_ma byung ba'ang ma yin/_gang nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas nam bla na med pa yang 
[\[166a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du byang chub kyi sems mi 'jig ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po lnga'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsdus nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo bar 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi 
[\[166a.5\]]phyir mi spyod pa ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po drug go/_/thog mar sems kyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rjes su lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las la slob ste/_thams cad mkhyen par bsngo zhing nyan thos dang rang 
[\[166a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi spyod par ma yin pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bdun no/_/mtha' yas par 'od thams cad kun tu snang ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 
[\[166a.7\]]snang ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems rnam par dag pa 'di snang ba thams cad mtshungs pa thams cad mtshungs par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po brgyad do/_/'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad spong 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]ba dang /_'jig rten gyi dga' ba la mi 'dod pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis ma gos pa'i smon lam thams cad mtshungs par 'jig rten gyi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pas sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig cing spros pa thams cad med pa ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi 
[\[166b.2\]]snying po dgu'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi yul la dad pas dka' ba dang dka' thub kyi sems bskyed do/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rigs bsrung ba la brtson pas 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam par sdug bsngal thams cad rig pas rig cing stobs dang sa bcu'i bar gyi mthar byung ba 
[\[166b.3\]]ste/_'di ni sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sems can gyi chos kyi snying po bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[166b.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na bzhugs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[166b.5\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na 'chag bzhengs bzhugs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na chos ston pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[166b.6\]]'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dang /_dga' ldan gnas su gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar 
[\[166b.7\]]byung ba la yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du tshad med pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du gshegs pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]rnam par gzigs shing sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la cho 'phrul gsum ston cing sems can 'dul ba yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gcig gis tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa 
[\[167a.2\]]chen po spyod pa yang mi chags par spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab par gshegs shing sems can tshad med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad la ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[167a.3\]]ma lus pa thams cad kyi mtha' yas bsdus pa yang mi chags par spyod pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mi chags par spyod pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog 
[\[167a.4\]]dam pa bla na med pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa sangs rgyas kyi sku'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yan lag drug cu mchog 
[\[167a.5\]]dam pa dang ldan zhing gsung gi yan lag brgya rtsa lnga yongs su bzung ba brgya stong du mas brgyan pa mtha' dang mu med pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par dag pa brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dang /_don tshig 'bru rab tu dang ba dang /_'jigs pa med pa chen 
[\[167a.6\]]pos mi 'jigs shing bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pas chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can thams cad la thos pa dang /_snang ba dang /_shes par mdzad pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa sna tshogs dang /_dbang po sna tshogs 
[\[167a.7\]]kyi rim pa so sor slong zhing 'dul ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gsung gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi yid kyi las stobs bcus brgyan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin chen pos 
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]rgyas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan te chags pa med pa'i yul gyi spyod yul ba/_chos kyi dbyings la rab tu gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi yan lag brnyes te/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 
[\[167b.2\]]rgyan dang /_sems kyi skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi dus gsum ma lus pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad rab tu mkhyen pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[167b.3\]]kyi thugs kyi rgyan dam pa mchog bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis brjod du med pa'i 'od bye ba khrag khrig rab tu btang nas/_'od zer brjod du med pa gcig nas gcig tu 'od zer gyi dra bar bskor cing zhing med bcu rdul yab ma lus pa thams cad du 
[\[167b.4\]]snang bar byas pa/_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi mun pa'i rigs ston pa/_'dzum pa ston pa'i zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs du ma kha dog brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig tshad med grangs med pa byung bas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs 
[\[167b.5\]]med pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can gyi khams la snang bas shes par byed cing /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang mi bral zhing /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gdon mi za ba phyir mi ldog pa brjod du med pa'i 
[\[167b.6\]]sangs rgyas 'byung zhing bzhugs pa'i sku rnam par dag pas dga' ba med par 'byung ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gzhan du lung ston pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi 
[\[167b.7\]]sgrib pa med par mdzad pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rab rib med pas 'jig rten thams cad du 'dzum pa mdzad pa ston pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sku sgrib pa med cing 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]rnam par dag pa/_chos thams cad la ma chags pa mtha' med pa'i chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbung med par chud pa/_'jig rten thams cad dang ma 'dres pa/_'jig rten thams cad de kho na nyid kyi rjes su 'brang ba 'jig rten thams cad 'jig rten las 
[\[168a.2\]]'das par spyod par 'jug pa'i tshig gi lam chad cing brjod du med par chud pa/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched dang bral ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od tshad med 
[\[168a.3\]]pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad dbyer med pa'i 'od brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rgyan kha dog sna tshogs du ma'i rkyen kun nas mi 'phrogs pa'i 'od/_'jig rten thams cad la ma chags pa'i 'od/_tshad med pa sgrib pa med pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 
[\[168a.4\]]'khor gyi mdzod thams cad khang pa ltar gyur pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 'od kyi rgyan bla na med pa mchog dam pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi kha dog mtha' yas pa/_kha dog 'tsher ba/_kha dog rang bzhin gyis 'tsher ba/_kha 
[\[168a.5\]]dog tshad med pa/_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par byed pa'i kha dog ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mi zlog pa'i kha dog dang /_kha dog thams cad kyi mchog brnyes pas de las gzhan pa'i kha dog 
[\[168a.6\]]dang /_khams gsum gyi kha dog thams cad khyab pa zil gyis mnan pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi kha dog gi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba shin tu rnam par dag pas 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa 
[\[168a.7\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi rigs dge ba rin po che 'byung ba'i 'jig rten thams cad kyis ma smad pa/_kha na ma tho ba med pas chos thams cad kyi de kho na mnyam pa dang /_mi mnyam par spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i rgyan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs sgrib 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]pa med cing rigs rnam par dag pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes las byung zhing 'dus pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rigs dang /_gdung rnam par dag pa'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku byams 
[\[168b.2\]]pa chen po'i stobs kyis brgyan pa shin tu dang zhing rnyog pa med pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i sku'i 'du byed nyam rangs pa/_shin tu rnam par phye ba blta bas mi ngoms pas/_thugs rje chen po'i thugs 'gro ba thams cad kyi sbyin gnas dang /_skyabs med kyi mchog bla na med pa so sor 
[\[168b.3\]]'dzin pa rnams la thugs brtse zhing phan par bzhed pa/_sems can thams cad la ye shes chen po'i byin gyis rlob pa bsod nams chen po 'phags pa/_'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams mtha' yas pa'i zhing sems can thams cad la yon tan dang ye shes kyi 
[\[168b.4\]]phung po thams cad rnam par 'phel bar mdzad pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi byams pa chen po dang /_thugs rje chen po dang /_bsod nams kyi mtha'i rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[168b.5\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi rgyan mchog dam pa bla na med pa'o//_//'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/_bam po gnyis pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag po dbang gi chos bcu ste/_
[\[168b.6\]]bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi bdag po dbang gis chos thams cad snang bar mdzad pa dang /_mtha' med pa'i tshig dang 'bru la spobs pa chags pa med pa dang /_chos ma lus pa thams cad yongs su ston pa ste/_'di ni sangs 
[\[168b.7\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dang po'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos ji ltar sems can gnas pa'i 'dul zhing yongs su smin pa de ltar smon lam dang chos ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i chos 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]gnyis so/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam pa drug tu g.yos kyang sems can gcig la yang gnod pa med pa tshad med grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha'i 
[\[169a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad gcig nas gcig tu 'deg pa dang /_'jog pa dang /_sad pa dang /_'phen pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig dang /_phyogs gcig nas gcig tu 'jog kyang sems can gyi khams kun nas gti mi mug 
[\[169a.3\]]cing the tsom med de/_'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos gsum mo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag po'i sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs te/_rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[169a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu byin gyis rlob pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lhab lhub dang rgyan ston pa dang /_grangs med pa'i bskal par 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du nyon mongs pa med pa'i lus su ston cing lhab lhub dang /_
[\[169a.5\]]rgyan thams cad kyi kha dog mi zad par ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu kun 'brang bar byin gyis rlob pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bzhi'o/_/
[\[169a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can gzigs nas sems can gcig gi phyir brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par skyil mo krung mi 'jig pa gang zag de la dgongs kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang 
[\[169a.7\]]thugs la skyo ba mi mnga' zhing 'dul ba'i dus su de las mi 'da' ste/_ji ltar gang zag re re la yang de bzhin du rim pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mthar tshe la dbang ba byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la kun 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]du bsnyengs pa mi mnga'/_skyo ba mi mnga' ste/_de bzhin du sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i gang zag gi phyir rim pas rab tu skyong ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos 
[\[169b.2\]]lnga'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'brang zhing gshegs nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'gyur ba rgya mtsho med pa bcu rdul yab ma lus pa 
[\[169b.3\]]thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig nas gcig tu thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang /_phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs kyi dra ba bzlog cing tshad med par gshegs te/_chos kyi dbyings ston pa dang /_mi 'phrogs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[169b.4\]]bskor ba ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos drug go/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams 'dul ba'i phyir sems kyi skad cig ma la bla na med pa 
[\[169b.5\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang 'di ltar mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa'ang med/_mngon du rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'ang med/_slob 
[\[169b.6\]]pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub tu phye ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sgrib pa med par rtogs shing rig pa'ang med de/_sems can 'dul ba'i phyir sangs rgyas rnam par sprul pa chen po'i yul rgyun mi gcod cing dpag tu med pa'i ye 
[\[169b.7\]]shes brnyes te 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bdun no/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag pos gang spyan gyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de snyan gyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/_gang snyan gyi skye mched kyis 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de shangs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/_gang shangs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de ljags kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/_gang ljags kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de sku'i skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/_gang 
[\[170a.2\]]sku'i skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de thugs kyi skye mched kyis kun tu sgrub/_gang thugs kyi skye mched kyis sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa de'i bar gyis 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sna tshogs su rtsom zhing 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par 
[\[170a.3\]]phye ba brnyes te/_de bzhin du rtsom pa re res sgrub cing sprul pas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rtsom pa gcig ji lta ba bzhin du rtsom pa ma lus pa thams cad kyang de bzhin te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos brgyad do/_/
[\[170a.4\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang pos rang gi sku'i ba spu gcig gi bu gar sems can re re'i lus kyang brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ltar che ba'i sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad bcug cing nang du 'dus par mdzad de/_de la sems can re 
[\[170a.5\]]res kyang bskal pa grangs med par gnas kyang sems can de dag la gnod pa yang med/_kun tu gnod pa med do/_/'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams gcig nas gcig tu gom pa gcig gis gshegs te 'jig rten gyi khams de dag gis 
[\[170a.6\]]sangs rgyas byung zhing sangs rgyas byung ba dang /_de dag gis brjod du med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das te/_de'i dbang gis sems can gyi snying pos brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar shes so/_/de la ba spu'i bu ga'i sems can brjod du med pa dag gcig 
[\[170a.7\]]nas gcig tu sangs rgyas su gyur te/_gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing /_gcig nas gcig tu brjod du med pa'i chos kyi dbyings ston/_gcig nas gcig tu 'das pa brjod du med pa dang /_gcig nas gcig tu ma 'ongs pa brjod du med pa 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]dang /_gcig nas gcig tu da ltar byung ba brjod du med pa snang bar byed/_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i nam mkha'i khams skabs byed pa ston/_sems can thams cad 'ong ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_thams cad skye ba'i skye mched dang /_bsgribs pa med pa dang /_'dod chags 
[\[170b.2\]]la yongs su spyod par 'jug pa mkhyen te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos dgu'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bdag pos chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad pad mo'i rgyan chen pos brgyan te pad mo'i 
[\[170b.3\]]snying po'i seng ge'i gdan la de bzhin gshegs pa re re bzhugs pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /_sku dpag tu med pa dang /_byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad rnam par rol pa ston te/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[170b.4\]]gcig pa de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam par sems can gyi snying po re re sems kyi skad cig ma la byin gyis rlob bo/_/sems kyi skad cig ma gcig ji lta ba bzhin du sems kyi skad cig ma thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/ji ltar pad ma'i le'u 
[\[170b.5\]]dang /_rnam par dag cing mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /_'jig rten 
[\[170b.6\]]gyi khams su rtsom pa sna tshogs kyi rim pa dang /_med bcu rdul yab brjod du med pa'i zhing rnam par dag pa dang /_sna tshogs kyi mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid sna tshogs med pa dang /_rigs med bcu rdul yab tshad med pa dang /_grangs med pa'i dus 'gyur ba dang /_mi 
[\[170b.7\]]chags pa ston pa dang /_tshad med pa'i blo rgyas pa'i dad pa dang /_skad cig ma sna tshogs dang /_gnas med pa dang /_skad cig ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_tshad med par gshegs pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig ma dang /_sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la thams cad 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]ston te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod du mdzad pa ni mi mnga'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[171a.2\]]bdag po'i dbang gi chos bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gang gis bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mtshan re re nas 
[\[171a.3\]]yongs su dag nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_'di ni yongs su rdzogs pa dang po'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[171a.4\]]rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'byung gnas dang /_spyod pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs 
[\[171a.5\]]pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[171a.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi bdag po 'gro ba thams cad gang gis kyang zil gyis mi gnon pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag par mdzad pa yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par 
[\[171a.7\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad gti mug med par ston pa 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs nas byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs 
[\[171b.2\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[171b.3\]]sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs ma yin pa'i chos thams cad mkhyen nas spros pa med pa dang /_dge ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs 
[\[171b.4\]]ston cing snang bar mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa dang po'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad bltar med pa dang /_phan tshun shes par mi rung ba dang /_ma bcing ba dang /_ma grol ba dang /_gzung 
[\[171b.5\]]du med pa dang /_reg par mi rung ba dang /_ma byung ba'i chos thams cad la mnga' dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes shing /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos de dag thams cad yang dag pa nyid dang /_de kho na dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa'i 
[\[171b.6\]]chos thams cad dang /_bdag med pa dang /_gzung ba med pa'i chos rnams kyi de kho na'i mtha' la chags pa med pa'i dbang du gyur pa de la dbang gis chen po bslabs te/_bslab pa'i rjes su 'brang zhing chos thams cad la gzigs te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[171b.7\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gnyis pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtshan ma thams cad kyi mtha' dang bral zhing mtshan ma thams cad la mi gnas pa/_mtshan ma mngon par mkhyen pas mi chags pa de'i ngo bo nyid dang ngo bo nyid med pa 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]dang /_ji ltar ngo bo nyid smra ba'i tshul gyis rjes su song ba/_grangs med pa'i gzugs kyi mtshan ma'i tshogs kyi sku rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi zhing thams cad kyi mtshan ma dang spyod pa'i mtshan ma zad par ston pa/_mun pa'i 'du shes kyi phung po 
[\[172a.2\]]yang dag par rab tu 'chang ba mun pa'i 'gro ba thams cad la sgron ma chen pos snang ba ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa gsum pa'o/_/sngon gyi mtha' dang /_phyi ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba la ma chags pa dang /_
[\[172a.3\]]'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba dang /_chos kyi dbyings la mi gnas pa/_de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma byung ba dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas byung ba snang bar mdzad pa/_brjod du med par 
[\[172a.4\]]bstan pa/_de ltar tshad med pa'i rigs kyi phyir dang /_sangs rgyas kyi phyir lta ba/_sangs rgyas kyi yul kun tu gzigs pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bzhi pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[172a.5\]]lus kyi las dang /_ngag gi las dang /_yid kyi las mngon par 'du mi byed pa/_blang ba med pa dang /_rgya med pa'i mtha' la gnas pa/_dor ba med pa'i chos kyi gnas kyi pha rol tu song ba/_ma nges pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod dang /_grangs kyi spyod pa las legs par 
[\[172a.6\]]tshogs mtha' yas pa sgrub pa dang /_sna tshogs kyi rim pa 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i grangs su gtogs pa'i rjes su song ba/_sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi lta ba tshad med mtha' yas pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs mngon par 'du mdzad pa/_chos kyi 
[\[172a.7\]]dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams 'dul zhing rnam par rig par byed pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa lnga'o/_/chos thams cad bltar med pa dang /_sna tshogs med par song ba de ni med med par song ba/_
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]ma byung bar song ba/_mtshan nyid med par song ba/_sna tshogs med par song ba/_rgyan med par song ba/_blang ba med par song ba/_ngo bo nyid med par song zhing chos thams cad mkhyen te/_chos kyi klong las rim par 'byin pa rab tu mkhyen pa/_'jig rten gyi chos dang mi 
[\[172b.2\]]'gal bar mdzad pa/_yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par lta ba/_thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/_ye shes kyis ma lus par gzigs pa/_chos thams cad dbang gis snang bar mdzad cing de bzhin nyid kyi ngo bo nyid las mi 'pho ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas 
[\[172b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa drug pa'o/_/dus gcig tu mtshan ma gcig phan tshun rtogs shing mkhyen pa de chos gsha' mar 'jug pa yongs su mi gnas pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mnyam pa rnam par dag pa/_chos gsha' ma nyid dang /_
[\[172b.4\]]dus thams cad du mi gnas pa de la nyi ma gcig dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_lo gcig dang /_lo brgya dang /_bskal pa sdud pa dang 'gyur ba'i rjes su 'jug pa'ang ma yin/_ldog pa'ang ma yin/_tshad med pa'i dus dang /_nyi ma gcig dang /_yud tsam gyi dus dang /_
[\[172b.5\]]snga dro dang /_nyi ma phyed kyi dus dang /_phyem red dang /_srod dang /_nam gyi gung dang /_tho rangs kyi dus dang /_nyi ma dang /_grangs su gtogs pa'i dus dang /_zhag bdun dang /_zla ba phyed kyi dus dang /_zla ba gcig dang /_lo gcig dang /_lo brgya'i dus dang /_bskal 
[\[172b.6\]]pa gcig gi dus dang /_tshad med/_grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_brjod du med pa'i dus dang /_phyi ma'i dus kyi mtha'i bar dus chos ston te/_chos kyi 'khor lo la gnas pa'ang med ldog pa'ang med/_rgyun kyang mi gcod/_sbyor ba'ang med/_mtshams su'ang 
[\[172b.7\]]mi 'gyur/_mi 'dor/_mi 'pho/_mi g.yo/_ring ba'ang ma yin/_de mtha' la yang gnas pa ma yin te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bdun pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]thams cad dang /_tshad med pa'i mi 'jigs pa brnyes pa/_so so yang dag par rig pa grangs med pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa tshad med pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa gnas pa med pa dang /_
[\[173a.2\]]so so yang dag par rig pa mtha' yas pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa kun nas gzung ba med pa dang /_de kho na nyid so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_tshig dang /_tshul dang /_rtog pa so so'i yang dag par rig pa dang /_chos 
[\[173a.3\]]thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_ji ltar bsam pa dang /_dad pa dang /_dbang po dang /_ji ltar btags pa'i chos rnams dang /_chos kyi gzhung gi mtshams ston pa dang /_de dang de dag tu brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i mdo sde bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 
[\[173a.4\]]gi thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma'i mdo yang dag par rab tu ston te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa brgyad pa'o/_/ming med pa dang /_ming dang /_rigs dang /_'byung ba yang chos thams cad kyi ming dang /_
[\[173a.5\]]'byed pa dang /_khams 'bar ba dang /_mngon du rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_'das pa med pa'i ming dang /_ma 'ongs pa med pa'i ming dang /_da ltar byung ba med pa'i ming dang /_sems can med pa'i ming dang /_zhing med pa'i ming dang /_chos med 
[\[173a.6\]]pa'i ming dang /_yon tan med pa'i ming dang /_byang chub sems dpa' med pa'i ming dang /_sangs rgyas med pa'i ming dang /_grangs med pa'i ming dang /_grangs med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang /_ma byung ba'i ming dang /_mi 'gog pa'i ming dang /_med pa'i ming 
[\[173a.7\]]dang /_med pa ma yin pa'i ming dang /_gcig ma yin pa'i ming dang /_rnam pa thams cad ma yin pa'i ming rang bzhin gyis brjod du med pa'o/_/chos thams cad ni phyogs ma yin/_brda ma yin/_ngag gi lam gyi sgra dang bral ba/_sgra byung ba thams cad kyis 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]ma bsgrubs pa/_ma bskyed pa dang /_sna tshogs su bskyed pa dang /_rnam pa gcig ma yin pa dang /_rnam pa mang po ma yin pa dang /_smra ba thams cad brjod du med pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/_kun tu mi rtog pa'i yul mngon par 'du mi byed pa 
[\[173b.2\]]dang ldan pa/_rtog pa dang /_kun tu rtog pa dang /_yongs su rtog pa thams cad 'gags pa/_smra ba thams cad la mi gnas pa gnas pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa dgu'o/_/gzugs kyi chos thams cad 
[\[173b.3\]]ma skyes par mkhyen te/_tshor ba ma yin/_spros pa ma yin/_grangs ma yin/_'du shes kyi spyod pa ma yin/_'du byed ma yin/_len pa ma yin/_rnam par shes pa ma yin te/_rang bzhin gyis zhi bar rab tu mkhyen/_skye mched med par 'jug pa dang /_
[\[173b.4\]]chos thams cad kyi dbyings mi dmigs pa dang /_chos thams cad mi 'jigs pa dang /_chos thams cad ldang ba med de/_rang bzhin gyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa/_chos thams cad dben pa/_las ma yin pa spyod pa med pa las byung ba/_ma skyes pa/_ma 
[\[173b.5\]]byung ba/_grangs mang bar rtogs pa/_yod pa ma yin pa/_med pa ma yin pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin/_ming med pa/_gsha' ma ma yin pa/_mi gnas pa yongs su mi gnas pa yongs su 
[\[173b.6\]]smin pa ma yin pa/_dul ba ma yin pa/_sems can med pa/_sems can med pa ma yin pa/_srog med pa/_srog med pa ma yin pa/_rkyen med pa/_rkyen med pa ma yin pa/_rkyen dang 'du ba med pa ma yin par chos thams cad mkhyen te/_chos thams 
[\[173b.7\]]cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/_tshogs gsum pa rnam par gnas pas nges pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_log par nges pa dang /_ma nges pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_mi 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]'jigs pa bzhi rnam par dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul chen po ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[174a.2\]]kyi thabs la mkhas pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs yangs pa/_tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus 
[\[174a.3\]]pa/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 'jug par mi nus pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' dang /_chos thams cad kyi dbyings dang /_
[\[174a.4\]]'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du dga' ldan du skye ba ston pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mtha' med pa dang /_kha dog tshad med pa dang /_gzi brjid tshad med pa dang /_snang ba tshad med pa dang /_dbyings tshad med pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam par 
[\[174a.5\]]dag pa tshad med pa dang /_sgra sgrogs pa rnam par rig pa tshad med pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa la gnas pa dang /_shes rab dang /_ye shes kyi yul tshad med pa dang /_mtha' dang 'jig rten du bcas pa rjes su 'dzin pa dang /_bdud du bcas/_tshangs par bcas/_
[\[174a.6\]]dge sbyong dang /_bram zer bcas pa dang /_skye dgu dang /_lha dang /_mir bcas pa dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'jig rten rjes su 'dzin pa/_mi 'phrogs pa'i byams pa chen po'i spyod yul ba/_snying rje chen po la phyogs pa'i mtha' la phyogs pas sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/_
[\[174a.7\]]gzhan mtho ris su skye ba'i sems can rjes su 'dzin pa/_bsod nams kyi stobs kyi dbang po phun sum tshogs pa/_dbang po rnam par dag pa dang /_sems cang shes yongs su dag pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/_theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa'i sems 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/_theg pa chen po yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa/_'gro ba thams cad las 'byung ba'i sems can yang rjes su 'dzin pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa dang spyod pa rnam par dag pa rdzogs 
[\[174b.2\]]pa'o/_/dga' ldan gnas nas 'pho zhing yum gyi lhums su gshegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshe dang /_bdag gi lus su skye ba dang /_sgyu ma lta bur spyod pa dang /_sprul pa lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la thug pa dang /_mig yor lta bu'i rnam par rig pa dang /_yul 
[\[174b.3\]]nam mkha' ltar tshad med par song ba/_'dod pa lta bur skye ba la ma chags pa/_smig rgyu dang /_mnyam par snang ba dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la 'brang ba/_gnas med pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa/_rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral zhing rnam par dag pa/_bla 
[\[174b.4\]]re dang rgyan chen po'i mdzod bdag gi lus skye ba'i mtha' yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_rin po che chen pos spras pa'i khang bu brtsegs pa rin po ches mchod pa'i gnas chen po la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang sangs 
[\[174b.5\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_yid la byed pa chen po'i byin gyi brlabs kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_rnam par sprul pa chen po'i mdzod ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_ye shes chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis kyang sangs rgyas 
[\[174b.6\]]kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_ma las skyes pa de la gnas pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_yul chen po sangs rgyas kyi yul rab tu brnyes pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs mtha' yas pas kyang sangs rgyas 
[\[174b.7\]]kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_grangs med pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po la rnam par spyod cing mnyam par 'jog pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin de dang de dag las bzhengs pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_thog ma dang /_bar ma dang /_tha ma dang /_
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]spyod pa dang po nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i mtha'i bar gyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sa 'di nas gnyis kyi bar du thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas phyis 'jig rten gyi grangs la shes par ston pa dang /_gzi brjid sna tshogs 
[\[175a.2\]]kyis kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_gzhon nur gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_byang chub sems dpar gyur pas kyang 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_
[\[175a.3\]]mngon par byung ba dang /_rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bas kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad 
[\[175a.4\]]pa dang /_sna tshogs kyis kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_'jig rten dpag tu med pa dang /_'jig rten kun dang /_phyogs thams cad du rgya mtsho'i rgyun dang /_rigs kyis 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_zhing dang 
[\[175a.5\]]dus ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_las kyi rnam par smin pa ma lus pas 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sems can gyi rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_'chi 'pho zhing skye ba dang /_
[\[175a.6\]]rigs ma lus pas kyang 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sprul pa chen po dang /_rigs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang /_chos dran pa'i sgo'i 'khor los kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs 
[\[175a.7\]]rgyas kyi mdzad pa gnyis pa'o/_/dge bar spyod pa las rnam par dag pa dang /_skye ba thams cad dang /_ye shes dang /_spyod pa rnam par dag pa dang /_skye ba bstan pa'i rjes su song ba dang /_sems can 'dul zhing rjes su chud par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]thams cad dang yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la dgos pa'i slas ston pa'i rjes su song zhing sangs rgyas thams cad 'dod chags dang bral te gnas la gnas pa dang /_gnas pa med pa dang /_sgra dbyangs thams cad dang bral bar so sor rtog pa 
[\[175b.2\]]dang /_srid pa thams cad dang /_mi dang srid par 'byung ba la rtog pa dang /_dngos po thams cad ye shes su 'jug pa dang /_tshul khrims thams cad mkhyen pa'i mthar yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_snying rje chen pos slas ltar 'gro ba la rnam par lta ba dang /_
[\[175b.3\]]byams pa chen pos sems yul la so sor rtog pa dang /_dga' ba chen pos 'jig rten las mngon par dga' ba shes par byed pa dang /_btang snyoms chen pos sems la dbang sgyur zhing 'jug par byed pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bdag la yongs 
[\[175b.4\]]su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du lus mngon par sgrub pa dang /_thams cad du gnas pa med pa'i lus yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_g.yog 'khor thams cad rnam par dag par nan tan byed pa dang /_chos ston cing 
[\[175b.5\]]smra ba rjod pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dbang po smad pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad kyi nyes pa rtogs pa ji ltar spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyi rnam par smin pa ston pa dang /_ji ltar gnas pa'i sems can rnams 'dul ba dang /_yongs su ma smin pa'i sems can yongs su smin 
[\[175b.6\]]par byed pa dang /_ji ltar yongs su smin pa 'dul ba dang /_thabs la mkhas pa grangs med pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa las mi ldog par ston pa dang /_spyod pa'i sgo sna tshogs kyi chos snang bar byed pa dang /_gnas med pa'i rnam pa'i sems can 
[\[175b.7\]]rnams kyi bsam pa rnam par dag pa byed pa dang /_snying rje chen po skyes pa'i chos kyi sprin mngon par 'bebs par byed pa dang /_sbrang bu 'gro ba ltar byams pa la 'jug cing cho 'phrul gsum yongs su 'bebs par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba rnam par 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]rig cing slas kyi dbus na 'dug pa ston pa dang /_de las mtha'i mtha' dang /_dbung med pa'i 'jig rten du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa ston pa dang /_ye shes chen po la gnas pas gnod cing sgrib pa med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mngon par shes pa 
[\[176a.2\]]mngon par sgrub pa dang /_las kyi mtha'i chos gsum la thabs mkhas pa ste/_lus kyi las shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_ngag gis mi 'phro ba'i ye shes shin tu rnam par dag pa dang /_yid kyi las zab mo chags pa med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i sems 
[\[176a.3\]]can rnams kyi don mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gsum pa'o/_/mngon par byung ba'i rnam par rgyal ba chen pos slas tshad med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yid du 'ong ba spangs te/_'byung ba'i spyod pa ston cing 'jig rten gnas 
[\[176a.4\]]pa'i sems can 'dzud pa dang /_'jig rten mngon par chags par 'gyur bar byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi grangs mi rtog go zhes shes par byed pa dang /_'jig rten sna tshogs la mngon par chags pa zlog par byed pa dang /_'jig rten gyi dga' ba'i sred pa gcod pa dang /_
[\[176a.5\]]nyon mongs pa spangs pa 'jig rten sbyong du 'jug pa dang /_don thams cad rjes su dran par byed pa dang /_'byung ba'i don gyi phyir 'brang bar byed pa dang /_khyim pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gtong ba ston pa dang /_nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos la sbyor zhing gnas par byed pa dang /_
[\[176a.6\]]sngon gyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang /_dpag tu med pa'i yon tan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa dang /_ye shes chen po'i dkyil 'khor so sor rnyed par byed cing sems can rnams kyi mi shes pa'i rab rib la lta ba dang /_bdag bla na med pa'i bsod nams 
[\[176a.7\]]kyi zhing du gyur pas 'gro ba thams cad nye bar khrid pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'du zhing sangs rgyas las bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skye dgu thams cad la bsngags pa dang /_bdag ye shes kyi don mthong ba'i ston pa dang /_sems can rnams la rnam par 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]dag pa'i sgo brjod pa dang /_sems can rnams la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i sgo sgrub tu 'dzud pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad la 'byung ba'i sgo rab tu ston pa dang /_mngon par 'byung zhing thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan kun sgreng bar byed pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[176b.2\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bzhi pa'o/_/mdzad pa dang ye shes du ma dang rab tu ldan pas byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs te/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi mthar phyin nas byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas chos thams cad thugs su chud de/_
[\[176b.3\]]bdud kyi stobs rab tu bcom zhing zil gyis mi non pa'i sku'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mdzod dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad du khyab par byed pa dang /_byin gyi brlabs mi zad pa'i mthas mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang /_tshad med pa'i spyod pa rab tu brnyes pas thams 
[\[176b.4\]]cad mkhyen pa'i yul la rnam par rol pa'i ye shes kyi don gyi rjes su gshegs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du spras pa'i gdan yongs su gsal ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[176b.5\]]zhing ma lus pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rig par byed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i mchog rab tu brnyes pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i rnam pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang /_yang dag pa'i khyad par gyi smon lam la 
[\[176b.6\]]rnam par lta ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la dgongs pa dang /_zab mo'i byang chub sems dpa' la chos zab mo'i 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul rtsom pa dang /_brjod du med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung gnas kyi phyir 'brang 
[\[176b.7\]]zhing sna tshogs kyi spyad pa spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi yul du byas pa dang /_sems can la dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rig par byed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]thams cad dbyer med pas 'byung ba'i sa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas shing yon tan thams cad kyi khyad par ma lus pa'i mtha' rab tu rnyed de 'dug pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_sems can 
[\[177a.2\]]thams cad ma lus pa'i mthar 'gro ba dang /_zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_yongs su smin pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_dus thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_'dul ba thams cad du 
[\[177a.3\]]'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par rol par 'gro ba dang /_'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par chud par byed pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad 
[\[177a.4\]]pa lnga pa'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_'jig rten thams cad mngon par shes par byed pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_ma lus pa thams cad du ma lus par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing mi 'jigs pa'i 
[\[177a.5\]]seng ge'i sgra chen po'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mdzod dang /_mun pa med pa'i chos kyi mdzod kyi sgo snang ba'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_nam mkha'i ngos ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes tshad med pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_chos thams 
[\[177a.6\]]cad ngo bo nyid med pa'i ngo bo nyid bsgribs pa med pa la so sor rtog pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_sems can thams cad kyi chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi sgron ma'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos snang bar byed pa'i dus 
[\[177a.7\]]gsum du 'jig rten thams cad la khyab pa'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gcig tu snyug pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang mi 'gal ba'i tshul gyis 'khor lo dang /_de la sogs pa grangs med pa'i rnams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod par 'gro ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ro/_/'di ltar chos kyi 'khor lo skor bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas 
[\[177b.2\]]kyi mdzad pa drug pa'o/_/grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang du 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_lha'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_klu'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_
[\[177b.3\]]gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_dri za'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_lha ma yin gyi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_mi'am ci'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_'bar ba'i rgyal po'i pho brang dang /_sha za'i rgyal po'i 
[\[177b.4\]]pho brang de dag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jug pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_gang 'di grong khyer gyi sgor gshegs nas sa g.yo zhing 'od zer gyi snang bas long ba rnams ni so sor mig thob/_'on pa rnams ni so sor sgra thos/_smyon pa rnams ni so sor dran pa rnyed/_
[\[177b.5\]]gcer bu rnams kyang so sor gos rnyed/_sdug bsngal ba rnams ni so sor bde ba thob/_sil snyan dang brdung ba rnams ma brdungs par yid du 'ong ba'i sgra skad 'byin pa dang /_brdung ba ma brdungs pa dang /_'phyang 'phrul rnams 'phyang ba dang /_brdungs pa'i sgra dang /_bram ze sna 
[\[177b.6\]]tshogs mang po rnams kyi sgra skad yid du 'ong ba dang /_lta bas mi ngoms shing mi mthun pa med pa gzugs kyi sku ston pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_mtshan dang dpe byad bstan pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[177b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_kun tu gzigs pa dang /_rnam par gzigs pa dang /_brkyang ba dang bskum pas kyang sems can la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_byon pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_'chag pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]gzims pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_chos 'chad pa dang /_cang mi gsung bas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[178a.2\]]cho 'phrul dang /_ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sna tshogs kyi sems can gyi bsam pa rgya mtsho ma lus pa dang /_'jig rten gyi spyod pa grangs med pa 
[\[178a.3\]]thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams kyi yul dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs lta bas mi ngoms pa'i phyir 'brang ba dang /_
[\[178a.4\]]sangs rgyas rnams 'byung zhing skye ba dang /_smra ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang /_smra ba shin tu dkon pa dang /_dkar po'i chos thams cad dang /_bsod nams kyi 'byung gnas dang /_sangs rgyas mnyes par bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog mtha' 
[\[178a.5\]]yas pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon du rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rtogs pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa zhing thams cad la gzigs shing 'jug pa dang /_'di ltar dge 
[\[178a.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad nye bar spyod pas kyang 'jig rten gyi sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_de dag dang ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_thal mo sbyar ba'i las dang /_rjes su ston pa dang /_tshig tu 'byin pa dang /_yang dang yang du yid la byed pa dang /_
[\[178a.7\]]mngon par lta ba dang /_mngon du dran pa dang /_sems dang bas sangs rgyas la sdug par sems pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas lta bar 'dod pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i ro dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung bas 'jig rten thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[178b.2\]]kyi yon tan dang /_kha dog mtha' yas pa la lta ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs 'dzin pas dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_dad pa sna tshogs dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[178b.3\]]pa'i sku kha dog dang /_dbyibs sna tshogs tshad med pa la lta ba'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra thos pa'i sems can rnams la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_de la sogs 
[\[178b.4\]]pa'i mtha' med bsam gyis mi khyab brjod du med pa'i rnam pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul 
[\[178b.5\]]ba las mi 'da' ste/_'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa thams cad la 'jig rten thams cad 'dzud de/_yul las phyir mi ldog cing thugs rje chen po gtong ba dang /_sngon gyi smon lam la mi skyo ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad 
[\[178b.6\]]la rtog pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa la gnas shing dge ba rgyas pa tshad med pa brnyes te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdun pa'o/_/dgon pa na bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[178b.7\]]rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang /_dben pa na bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zhi bar bzhugs pa dang /_dben pa na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul la bzhugs pa dang /_ting nge 'dzin chen po la gnas shing bzhugs pa na gcig pur dgyes 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]pa na bzhugs pa dang /_sku bltar mi snang bar bzhugs pa dang /_ye shes zab mo la gnas shing bzhugs pa dang /_dpag tu med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi stobs la bzhugs pa dang /_sku'i spyod pa bltar med pa la bzhugs pa rgyun mi gcod 
[\[179a.2\]]pas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dang ba ji lta ba bzhin du 'dul zhing gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i ye shes dang /_smon lam gyi tshul gyis sangs rgyas lha yongs su 'tshol zhing sangs rgyas 
[\[179a.3\]]kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas klu yongs su 'tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas nam mkha' lding yongs su tshol ba dang /_sangs rgyas mi'am ci yongs su tshol ba dang /_sangs rgyas lto 'phye chen po yongs su tshol ba dang /_
[\[179a.4\]]sangs rgyas 'bar ba yongs su tshol ba dang /_sangs rgyas mi dang mi ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sangs rgyas yongs su tshol bas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_
[\[179a.5\]]chos ston pas kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas gcig gi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa'i 
[\[179a.6\]]khyad par dang /_smon lam gcig tu bsdus pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi spyod pa rnam par phye ba dang /_spyod pa'i rim pa'i mthu dang /_'jig rten gyi yul dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul dang /_'jig rten gyi yul gyi mthu dang /_yul 
[\[179a.7\]]ma yin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi mthus kyang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad pa dang /_mtshan mo dang /_nyin par dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_lo gcig dang /_bgrang bar gnas na bzhugs pa nas brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal par gnas na bzhugs pa'i bar 
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]gyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa brgyad pa'o/_/khang pa lta bur gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams rnam par sbyangs par gyur pa dang /_
[\[179b.2\]]sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rnams dad par gyur pa dang /_mos par gyur pa la sems 'jug cing sgrub par gyur pa dang /_dbang po rnams 'dul bar gyur pa dang /_sems can dang skye dgu thams cad la dad par gyur pa dang /_'gro ba thams cad 'byung 
[\[179b.3\]]bar gyur pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskur bar gyur pa dang /_rtog pa la gnas shing ye shes snang bar gyur pa dang /_gzhan dring la mi 'jog pa'i yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mya ngan las 'das pa ston cing 
[\[179b.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_'jig rten mi rtag pa ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi snang bar mdzad pa rgyun mi gcod pa dang /_byas pa'i dgos pa'i mtha' bsdus pa dang /_ngo bo ma tshang ba med pas chos la 'jug pa snang bar byas pa dang /_rtsa ba bcad 
[\[179b.5\]]pa la srid pa'i mig snang bar byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la skyo ba ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rjes su song ba'i sems dang 'thun par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams tshe'i mtha' ston pa dang /_sems can thams cad la 'jig rten gyi mngon par mi dga' ba nye bar ston pa dang /_
[\[179b.6\]]sems can rnams ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba la mnyes par byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bltar mi smad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing rnam par chud par mdzad pa dang /_'jig rten spro ba snang bar mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas sems rtsom pa 
[\[179b.7\]]dang ldan pa dang /_ldan par 'jog pa dang /_su de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran zhing lta ba rnam par dag pa'i yongs su rtog pa'i sems can rnams la sems can rnams slong bar mdzad pa dang /_dbang po skyo ba zlog cing yongs su sbyong bar mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]la mngon par dga' ba thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa dang /_skyo ba rnyed pa'i sems can rnams la byin gyis rlob pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi brtse bar dgongs pa'i rkyen brnyes pa dang /_lus gyes pa thams cad la de bzhin 
[\[180a.2\]]gshegs pa'i skus sems can rnams 'dzin pa dang /_'jig rten gyi sems can 'khrugs pa dang myos pa rnams sdom pa la 'jog par mdzad de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa dgu pa'o/_/kye de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 
[\[180a.3\]]'das nas 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams thams cad smre sngags 'don pa dang /_ngu ba dang /_mya ngan slos pa dang /_mchi ma byung bar 'gyur te/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang /_thugs rje chen po zhes bya ba dang /_ded dpon chen po zhes pa dang /_thugs brtse 
[\[180a.4\]]ba zhes pa dang /_lha dang /_'jig rten du bcas pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi mgon du gyur pa dang /_skyabs su gyur pa/_dpung gnyen du gyur pa/_bla na med pa'i bsod nams kyi zhing 'das par gyur ces pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'byung bar dga' ba zhes pa dang /_
[\[180a.5\]]rnam pa 'di lta bur smre sngags 'don/_mya ngan slos shing sangs rgyas mthong ba rjes su dran pa'i sems can rnams tshad med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug pa ste/_de dang de dag tu sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_yid la byed par yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas sangs 
[\[180a.6\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi'i 
[\[180a.7\]]gnas thams cad du ji ltar 'dul ba dang /_ji ltar dad pa bzhin du sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob ste/_rang gi sku bor nas tshad med grangs med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par sku gdung dang ring bsrel byin gyis rlob cing /_gang 'di'i 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]sems can rnams kyi sems dang ba'i dbang dang /_sems can rnams kyi dad pas mchod pa'i dbang dang /_sems can rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang dang /_sems can rnams yongs su smin pa'i dbang dang /_sems can rnams yongs su sbyangs pa'i 
[\[180b.2\]]dbang dang /_sems can rnams kyi 'dul ba'i dbang dang /_sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa'i dbang dang /_sems can rnams de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par rtsom pa'i dbang dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi rgyan sna tshogs 
[\[180b.3\]]yul dang /_ljongs sna tshogs kyi sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'i dbang dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku gdung bgos shing 'jig rten thams cad kyis mchod rten du byas shing yul dang phyogs der lha'i gnas sam/_klu'i gnas sam/_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha 
[\[180b.4\]]ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i gnas dang /_mi'i gnas dang /_'bar ba'i gnas su sku gdung dang ring bsrel mchod par 'gyur/_sku gdung dang /_ring bsrel dang /_dbu skra dang /_sen mo'i mchod rten dang /_sangs rgyas bzhugs 
[\[180b.5\]]par mchod rten brtsigs pa/_'gro ba thams cad nges par sangs rgyas rjes su dran par 'gyur/_chos kyi phyir 'brang bar 'gyur/_dge 'dun la dad pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/_yul dang phyogs de dang der gnas shing rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bsam pas gnas nas/_sbyin 
[\[180b.6\]]pa byin zhing bsod nams byed par 'gyur te/_de dang de dag mtho ris kyi yongs su dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/_rigs chen po so sor rnyed par 'gyur/_longs spyod chen po dang g.yog 'khor rnam par dag pa so sor rnyed par 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa so sor myong 
[\[180b.7\]]bar 'gyur/_ngan par mi lhung ba'i nan tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_de dag sangs rgyas byung ba na gti mug med pas sgrub par 'gyur/_dkar po'i chos la gnas pa so sor rdzogs par 'gyur/_khams gsum nas 'byung ba'i yon tan yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]ji ltar theg pa la dad pa dang /_smon lam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/_de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa shes shing byas pa gzo ba so sor rnyed par 'gyur te/_phyir 'brang ba dang /_gnas dang /_mgon dang /_skyabs dang /_dpung gnyen sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[181a.2\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas kyang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sbyin gnas sbyong ste/_bsod nams yongs su mi gnas pa'i sbyin gnas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du skye ba 'di lta bu'i rnam pa mang 
[\[181a.3\]]por sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bcu pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi 
[\[181a.4\]]sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yangs pa dpag tu med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par gzhan 'jig rten gyi yul thams cad kyi lha dang 'jig rten du bcas pa gang gis kyang tshad gzung bar mi nus/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs 
[\[181a.5\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas su bcas pas kyang 'jug par nus pa ma yin no//_//'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa/_bam po gsum pa/_kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[181a.6\]]rnams gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo chos kyi dbang po'i chos mi gnyis par 'gro ba bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad lung ston te/_mi gnyis par 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang ldan 
[\[181a.7\]]pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems dang bsam pa sna tshogs med bcu rdul yab brjod du med par gshegs pa mi gnyis pa dang /_chos kyi don ma lus pa thams cad las rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sku mi gnyis pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i ngo bo 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang /_'byung ba'i skad cig ma'i mtha'i ye shes mi gnyis shing thog ma'i mtha' dang /_tha ma'i mtha' dang /_da ltar byung ba gnyis su med pa dang /_dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[181b.2\]]gcig gi zhing gi rjes su 'gro ba bstan pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa dang /_sangs rgyas gcig gi gsung dang /_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gnyis su med pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dul ba dang /_rab tu phigs pa dang /_rnam par rig pa gnyis 
[\[181b.3\]]su med pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi chos nyid dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos nyid gnyis su med pa dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_gcig gi dge ba'i rtsa ba gnyis su med de/_kye rgyal 
[\[181b.4\]]ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbang po'i chos kyis mi gnyis par gshegs pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad la nan tan gyis gnas pa bcu ste/_
[\[181b.5\]]bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing ye shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas pa la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji ltar smon lam gyis 'byung ba la 
[\[181b.6\]]gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can yongs su mi gtong zhing 'dul ba la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ngo bo med pa la rab tu gnas pa'i chos nyid la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don med pa ma yin pa dang /_de 
[\[181b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams skal ba mnyam pa ma yin par gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtag tu sems mnyam pa la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ma nyams pa'i dbang po la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]sems chags pa med par spyod pa la gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug cing mi 'jigs pa yang dag pa'i mtha'i mtshan nyid la gnas pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[182a.2\]]gshegs pa rnams chos thams cad kyi nan tan la gnas pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi 'das pa'i 
[\[182a.3\]]grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_da ltar byung ba thams cad kyi grangs thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_ngag thams cad kyi lam thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_'jig rten 
[\[182a.4\]]thams cad kyi 'jug pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi ngo bo'i ye shes thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang /_'bring dang /_chen po dang /_sna tshogs rnam par gnas pa'i 
[\[182a.5\]]mtshan nyid dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang /_bsam pa tshad med pa rgyun mi gcod pa'i mtshams kyi skad cig ma'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_chos thams cad rkyen dang 'dus pa tshogs par khong du chud pa thams cad 
[\[182a.6\]]mngon par mkhyen pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rigs rab tu 'byed pa'i ye shes mthong ba thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings dbye ba mig 'phrul mkhan gyis rnam par phye ba ltar thams cad mngon par mkhyen pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni 
[\[182a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis chos thams cad ma lus par mngon par mkhyen pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi stobs chen po dang /_stobs dang /_stobs tshad med pa dang /_stobs kyi bdag nyid che ba dang /_bzod 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]par dka' ba'i stobs dang /_yongs su ma nyams pa'i stobs dang /_snying po'i stobs dang /_mi phyed pa'i stobs dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i stobs dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mthu 
[\[182b.2\]]chen po'i stobs kyi dpal gyi chos bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi sku pha rol rgol ba thams cad kyis mi phyed pa dang /_'tsho ba'i dbang po 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyis mi chod cing dug gis mi 'jigs pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 
[\[182b.3\]]'tshig pa'i me'i bskal pas mi tshig pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud pa dang 'dzin pa'i chu'i phung po'i chus mi 'chi ba dang /_bdud thams cad dang /_bdud kyi sde thams cad dang /_lha thams cad kyi stobs dang /_klu thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[182b.4\]]thams cad dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i stobs dang /_sha za dang /_'bar ba thams cad kyi stobs dang /_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi mig gi stobs kyis mi tshugs 
[\[182b.5\]]pa dang /_ri rab lhun po'i ri dang mnyam pa'i rdo rje'i char 'bebs pa dang /_gzhan yang 'khor yug chen po'i ri dang mnyam pa dang /_gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i tshad kyi rdo rje'i char babs te/_des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa 
[\[182b.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ba spu yang mi 'gul/_bag tsha bar yang mi 'gyur/_bzhud pa dang /_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal ba'i spyod lam spang ba'ang mi mnga' ste/_yul gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu ji 
[\[182b.7\]]tsam du bzhed pa kun tu de tsam du ma bab bo/_/sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa la yang gtses par ma gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi sems can la yang gtses par ma gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mi 'khrugs pa lta ci smos te/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos dang po'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhed na chos thams cad kyi dbyings mchog ma lus pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang /_ri rab 
[\[183a.2\]]lhun po'i ri dang bcas/_kho ra khor yug dang /_khor yug chen po'i ri dang bcas/_rgya mtsho'i ri dang nags stug por bcas pa dang /_sems can gnas pa'i gnas sna tshogs dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i ba spu'i 
[\[183a.3\]]bu ga gcig tu bcug ste tha ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mtha' bzung na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs ma gtogs par sems can gzhan gyis shes par mi nus so/_/'jig rten gyi khams du ma de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sku'i ba spu'i bu 
[\[183a.4\]]gar bcug nas mtha' ma'i mtha'i bskal par bzung ste/_bzhengs pa dang /_bzhud pa dang /_bzhugs pa dang /_mnal ba dang /_bskal par gshegs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs la skad cig kyang sdug bsngal du mi 'gyur/_skyo ba mi mnga' ste/_stobs 
[\[183a.5\]]dang mthu yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur/_spyod lam la rnam par rtog par mi 'gyur ro/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di lta ste/_dper na nam mkha' ni chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'dzin te/_'bying ba ma yin/_zhum pa ma 
[\[183a.6\]]yin/_'phel ba ma yin/_'bri ba ma yin/_'byung ba ma yin/_skye ba ma yin/_rnam pa ma yin no/_/de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kun 'dzin kyang de'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor ba'i 
[\[183a.7\]]sems skye ba gcig kyang mi mnga' ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos brnyes pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gom pa gcig gi spyod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dra'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gom pas spyod do/_/du ma'i sems skye zhing 'jug pa de ltar gshegs shing 
[\[183b.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par gshegs te/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du sems bskyed pa bzhin du bskal par gshegs shing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi 
[\[183b.3\]]khams kun gnas shing tshad med pa dang /_khor yug chen po'i ri brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med par 'gyur ba dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa 'das shing ba spu'i bu ga gcig 'gag par 'gyur te/_ji ltar ba spu'i bu ga 
[\[183b.4\]]gcig pa de ltar sku'i spu'i bu ga thams cad de sems can thams cad ji snyed pa ba spu'i bu gar gyur la/_de ltar sems can thams cad lci bar gyur la/_sems can de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sor mo gcig gi rtse mos tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par 
[\[183b.5\]]'dzin te/_ji ltar sor mo gcig gis dang por 'dzin pa de ltar sor mo thams cad kyi rtse mos 'dzin kyang de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bsnyel ba yang mi mnga'/_thugs la skyo bar yang mi 'gyur/_sdug bsngal gyi reg pa tshor ro snyam pa'i sems phra rab gcig tsam 
[\[183b.6\]]yang mi skye'o/_/de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams re rer gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /_nam mkha' la gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /_rgya mo'i phyogs thams cad du gshegs shing 'jug pa dang /_de ltar nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' ma lus pa thams cad dang /_chos kyi 
[\[183b.7\]]dbyings kyi mthar 'jug pa dang /_skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi khams thams cad du 'jug pa dang /_skra rtse re re'i mtha' tshad kyi grangs kyi nam mkha'i khams ma lus pa thams cad yongs su gsol ba'i skra'i rtse mo'i mtha'i tshad kyi nam mkha'i khams su 'jug pa 'dis de bzhin 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]gshegs pa'i spyod lam thog ma'i mtha' dang tha ma'i mtha'i bskal par zad cing 'das kyi bar du phyogs dang phyogs na skyil mo krung gcig gis bzhugs shing yongs su longs spyod de/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen 
[\[184a.2\]]po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bzhi pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sku dang dbu du mar gyur la/_dbu gcig la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i 
[\[184a.3\]]yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i ljags su gyur pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_sgra dang gsung 'jug ste/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams la 
[\[184a.4\]]go bar byed pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_sgra dang /_gsung re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i mdo sde dam pa rab tu bshad la/_mdo sde re re la yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod 
[\[184a.5\]]du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos ston pa'i rjes su 'brang la chos bstan pa re re la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa rnams kyi brjod pa 'gro ste/_ji ltar gang gi phyir chos 
[\[184a.6\]]ston pa de ltar chos thams cad ston te/_de dag la sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa rnams yongs 
[\[184a.7\]]su zad nas yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston te/_gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal par ston la/_gzhung 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]thams cad kyi rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i bskal pa zad pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa snyed kyi bskal pa zad cing 'das kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni de lta ma yin te/_chos thams cad mgal me'i 'khor lo ltar 'jug cing chos thams 
[\[184b.2\]]cad shes rab kyis ston te/_brda sprod cing the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_chos thams cad snang bar byed pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_chags pa med pa'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_sems can mtha' yas pa tshim par byed pa'i 
[\[184b.3\]]'dul ba'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad bsdus pa'i rgyan gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_ye shes kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyun gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad la ye shes kyi sgron ma chen po'i rgyun 
[\[184b.4\]]gyi 'khor lo skor ba dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_mi 'jigs pa chen po'i rgyan gyi chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing ji ltar sangs rgyas gcig gi sku'i byin gyi brlabs kyis chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'i sprin chen po yang dpe thams cad kyis dper bya ba ma yin te/_de ltar chos kyi 
[\[184b.5\]]dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar skra'i rtse mo'i mtha' nas rnam par phye ba chags pa med pa ma lus pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rab tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam pa'i sems kyi skad cig ma dang /_sems 
[\[184b.6\]]kyi skad cig ma re re de snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa sprul pa dang /_ji srid du mtha' ma'i bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re ba de snyed de snyed kyi dbur gyur pa'i bar du sngar kun tu brjod pa bzhin du dbu re re la de snyed de snyed 
[\[184b.7\]]kyi ljags su gyur pa'i ljags re re la de snyed de snyed kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_gsung dang /_sku dang /_gsung 'jug ste/_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can gyi khams na go bar byed pa dang /_dbyangs kyi yan lag dang /_sgra dang /_gsung re res de snyed de snyed kyi mdo 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]sde rnams 'chad de/_mdo sde re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos ston pa rjes su 'brang la chos ston pa re re la de snyed de snyed kyi chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa'i brjod pa 'gro ste/_chos kyi tshig dang 'byed pa re res chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sgra gsal bar byed cing sems 
[\[185a.2\]]can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la go bar byed kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung 'dzin pa'ang med/_nyams pa'ang med/_zad pa'ang med/_dmas pa'ang med de/_de ltar tha ma'i mthar bskal pa'i bar du gnas shing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_'di ni sangs rgyas 
[\[185a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos lnga pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs dpal gyi be'u'i rgyun dang ldan zhing /_rdo rje'i snying po chen pos bzung ba de dag byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs pa 
[\[185a.4\]]rnams la bzhag nas sems can thams cad snyed kyis bdud sdig can gyi sde gzugs sna tshogs bskrad cing mi sdug pa/_mchog tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs 'jig rten thams cad 'jigs pa'i gzugs mchog tu sems bskyed pa'i gzugs su 'phrul par byed do/_/byang chub kyi 
[\[185a.5\]]shing mchog gi drung du song nas chos thams cad kyi dbyings nam mkha'i mthar bdud kyi mi sdug pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/_skrag pa chen pos 'jigs pa chen por byed pa/_'gro ba thams cad 'joms pas/_'jig rten thams cad 'jig pa'o/_/de na de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub kyi 
[\[185a.6\]]shing drung du gshegs nas thams cad la gzigs te/_gzigs nas mi bsnyengs/_bag mi tsha/_spu 'ga' yang mi g.yo/_gzugs sna tshogs kyi mtshan ma sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang mi mnga'/_sems phra mo yang mi mnga' bar gnas te mi g.yo/_mi bskyod mi 'gyur rnam par mi 
[\[185a.7\]]rtog_/shin tu rab tu zhi/_bsnyengs shing ba spu ldang ba shin tu mi mnga'/_'dod pa dang khong khro ba shin tu mi mnga'/_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byams pa chen po chags pa med pa'i stobs kyis gtong ba/_dbang po sbed cing thugs rje chen po la gnas pa/_bag mi tsha ba'i thugs dbyer mi 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]phyed pa'i snying po thugs mi dang ngas shing zil gyis mi non pa'i thugs kyis bdud dang /_bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad dang /_bdud kyi sde mang po sna tshogs thams cad zil gyis gnon cing gzod nas zil gyis gnon/_bzung nas de bzhin gshegs pa la skyabs su dong ste/_de dag 
[\[185b.2\]]la bcom ldan 'das kyis cho 'phrul gsum dang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dul ba bstan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la 
[\[185b.3\]]gnas pa'i chos drug pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsung thogs pa med pas 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du 'jug cing de dang de dag tu 'jig rten thams cad kyis rnam par rig cing sems can rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[185b.4\]]pa'i sgra de ri la thogs pa med de/_ri rab lhun po la mi thogs rin po che'i ri la ma yin/_khor yug dang khor yug chen po la ma yin/_lha'i gnas la ma yin/_klu'i gnas la ma yin/_gnod sbyin gyi gnas la ma yin/_dri za'i gnas la ma yin/_lha ma yin gyi 
[\[185b.5\]]gnas la ma yin/_nam mkha' lding gi gnas la ma yin/_mi'am ci'i gnas la ma yin/_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas la lta zhing chags par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gshegs na'ang mi chags te/_'jig rten srid pa'i khams 
[\[185b.6\]]thams cad kyi sgra chen po dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi sgra sna tshogs rab tu rdzogs pa de la de bzhin gshegs pas brjod pa'i sgras bsgribs par 'gyur te/_ji ltar 'dul ba'i sems can rnams kyi rna bas rnam par rig ste/_gang 'di rna bas rnam par rig cing rnam par rig pa'i 
[\[185b.7\]]tshig dang 'byed pa nyams par mi 'gyur te/_de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra/_lham me/_lhan ne/_lhang nge'o/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs la gnas pa'i chos kyi sgra bdun pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas 
[\[186a\]]
