[\[186a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du shin tu yongs su sbyangs pas chags pa med/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyan dang zhing rnyog 
[\[186a.2\]]pa med pa/_bdag gi med pa'i chos thams cad la gnas pa/_nang dang phyi dang ldan pa ma yin/_ma skyes pa la brtsam pa thams cad rnam par phye ba/_zhi ba/_gnas med pa/_rtsom pa sna tshogs thams cad med pa/_ngo bo thams cad rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes la gnas 
[\[186a.3\]]pa 'gag pa/_rang bzhin 'od gsal ba/_shin tu yongs su dag pa/_rtsom pa dang yid la byed pa thams cad la ma chags pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi yul gyi rjes su song ba/_yang dag pa'i mtha' 'dod chags dang bral zhing dag pa/_chos kyi 
[\[186a.4\]]dbyings ston pa'i mthar song ba/_chos kyi dbyings kun tu mi zad pa'i rjes su song ba/_'du shes su gyur pa thams cad dang /_tshad dang /_tshad med pa dang /_'dus byas dang /_'dus ma byas dang /_mngon par smra ba thams cad 'gags pa dag gis lam brjod du med pa'i mtha'i 
[\[186a.5\]]yul mi zad cing chags pa med pa'i dbyings kyi mtha'i sngon du ye shes 'gro zhing 'jug pa dang /_stobs bcu'i rgyan dang chos thams cad rnam par dag pa/_thabs mkhas pa la zhugs pas chos sna tshogs dang /_chos du ma dang /_chos thams cad dang /_ston pa 'gal ba 
[\[186a.6\]]med pa/_dus gsum du dbyer med pa/_chos kyi dbyings thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dang /_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i dbang gi pha rol tu song ba/_chos thams cad kyi dbang gi 'byung gnas kyi mdzod kyi khyad par chos thams cad kyi tshul dran zhing kun nas gti 
[\[186a.7\]]mug pa zhing thams cad du 'gro ba'i dbang dang /_rgya mo'i phyogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi mdo med bcu rdul yab la mi gnas pa/_brtan par gnas shing mi 'pho ba/_ye shes kyi lta ba chos ma lus pa thams cad kyi mthar thug pa/_zag pa thams cad yongs su zad cing zag 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]pa med pa/_sems rnam par grol ba/_shes rab rnam par grol ba/_shin tu rnam par grol ba yang dag pa'i mtha' mi zad pa'i mchog chags pa med par gnas pa/_rtag tu mnyam pa dang rab tu ldan pa/_dus gsum la chags pa med par gnas pa/_sems kyi skad cig ma la 
[\[186b.2\]]dus gsum gyi sems kyi spyod pa thams cad ma lus par rab tu shes pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i stobs brgyad pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi sgra dang lus gcig 
[\[186b.3\]]tu 'dus pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang yul tshad med pa mtha' dang dbung med pa'i sku yongs su grub pa/_'jig rten thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i sku/_khams gsum gyis mi gos pa'i sku/_rkyen gyi sku rnam par rig cing lhag pa'i bsam pas rjes su dran pa la byin 
[\[186b.4\]]gyi brlabs kyi su'i tshogs ston pa/_mi bden mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhing mnyam pa nyid rnam par dag pa'i sku/_'ong ba dang /_'gro ba med pa'i chos kyi sku 'dus pa/_'dus ma byas shing 'jig pa med pa'i sku/_mtshan nyid gcig dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi sku/_yul na mi 
[\[186b.5\]]gnas phyogs na mi gnas pa'i sku/_tshogs ma lus pa thams cad kyi sku/_sangs rgyas khyu mchog rnam par sprul pa'i sku/_kha dog mtha' yas pa'i sku/_sku thams cad rjes su 'brang ba/_sku sna tshogs su rnam par rig pa/_chos kyi sku'i tshul gyi rjes su song ba/_mtha' yas par 
[\[186b.6\]]snang ba'i ye shes kyi snying po'i dkyil 'khor gyi mdzod kyi sku/_bya ba sna tshogs med pa/_chos thams cad kyi dbyings ston pa'i sku/_sems can gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad la khyab par gsol ba'i sku 'dus pa/_mi g.yo mi sems pa'i sku rnam par dag pa/_med pa dang med pa ma 
[\[186b.7\]]yin pa dang /_tshul dang tshul ma yin pas phye ba'i sku/_sems can thams cad kyi dad pa sna tshogs kyi rjes su song zhing 'dul ba'i sku/_'gags pa dang /_'gags pa ma yin pa 'dul ba la gzigs pa'i yon tan dkon mchog thams cad byung ba bsgreng ba'i sku/_chos thams cad sangs 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]rgyas kyi chos dang de bzhin nyid bsdus pa'i sku/_rang bzhin gyis shin tu zhi ba dang bsgribs pa med pa'i mtha'i sku/_thogs pa med pa'i chos thams cad las skyes pa'i sku/_thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/_chos kyi dbyings dag pa/_'jig rten thams cad 
[\[187a.2\]]du rnam par phye ba'i sku/_brtsam pa las mi ldog pa/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa'i ye shes thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/_kun 'brang ba'i rjes su song ba'i sku ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mthu chen po'i dpal gyi stobs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sku 'dus 
[\[187a.3\]]pa dgu pa'o/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i ye shes rnam par chud pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/_spyod pa las mngon par byung ba/_smon lam gyi khyad par 
[\[187a.4\]]dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ye shes bya ba sna tshogs med pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad las byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod 
[\[187a.5\]]pa rgya mtsho'i spyod pa thams cad kyi cho ga shes pa/_smon lam chen po dang /_spyod pa mi chung ba/_spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dga' ba ma yin pa/_spyod pa'i stobs bzod par dka' ba'i spyod pa thams cad las byung zhing spyod pa thams cad rnam par dag pa/_byang chub 
[\[187a.6\]]sems dpa'i spyod pa bzang po spyad pa mi 'bri bar spyod pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa thams cad la gnas pa/_spyod yul mtha' yas pa lam thams cad ston pa/_lam ma yin pa'i yul dang lam thams cad la zhugs pa/_ye shes mchog gi stobs 
[\[187a.7\]]kyi cho ga shes pa/_'dzem pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo 'bebs pa/_dge ba 'dri ba dang /_mi 'dri ba dang /_btsun pa'i chos kyi tshul ston pa'i ye shes mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes shin tu yongs su dag pa lus dang /_ngag dang /_yid kyi spyod pa gsum yongs su dag pa/_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi sgo ma rnyed pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi spyod pas song ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang /_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang /_mdzad pa thams cad la zhugs pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa/_tshad med par ston pa dag gnas pa/_rtsa ba med 
[\[187b.2\]]cing mtha' med pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_ye shes 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba/_'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad kyi thams cad chos thams cad kyi ye shes kyi mthong ba dang /_phra ba ma lus pa mtha' dang 
[\[187b.3\]]dbung med pa'i ye shes/_dus gsum thams cad la 'jug pa'i tshul dang phra ba'i ye shes rjes su rtogs pa/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad rnam par dag pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i don dang /_ye shes dang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad par brjod du med 
[\[187b.4\]]pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang ldan zhing phyir mi ldog pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku/_grangs la 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi chos yi ge med par rab tu rtog pa/_brjod du med pa'i ye shes sna tshogs rnam par phye ba dang /_yi ge thams cad brjod du med par shes 
[\[187b.5\]]par byed/_ye shes kyi dge bar spyod pa'i chos thams cad rnam par dag pa kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi rim pa/_sems skad cig ma gcig dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis chos thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes ji ltar 'os pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi lus dang /_ji ltar 
[\[187b.6\]]skye mched kyi chos gtong bar rab tu yid la byed pa'i ye shes chos thams cad kyi yul gyi mtshams ma yin pa/_'jig rten gyi yul khams ma lus pa thams cad dang /_'gro ba ma lus pa thams cad dang /_sems can ma lus pa thams cad dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa 
[\[187b.7\]]thams cad dang /_dus gsum gyi sems kyi skad cig ma gcig la chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi mthong ba'i yul de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i yul la 'jug cing thams cad 'dul ba'i yul ma lus pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba/_rnam 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]par dag par sangs rgyas kyi yid kyi mtshams su thob pa mngon par mkhyen cing yul thams cad las mngon par sangs rgyas pa/_sems can gyi sems dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma lus pa thams cad rtogs pa/_dus gsum gyis phye ba'i sems kyi skad cig ma la ye 
[\[188a.2\]]shes kyi rjes su sangs rgyas shing mtshams ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas pa/_sems can thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' med pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro ba mtha' yas pa dang /_dus gsum 
[\[188a.3\]]thams cad du 'gro ba dpag tu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas khyu mchog thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_khong du chud pa ma lus pa thams cad du 'gro ba dang /_de dag ma lus pa thams cad las mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa rnam par chud pa thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro 
[\[188a.4\]]zhing sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mi gtong ba/_sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa la bzhugs te/_de na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mtha' dang dbung med par gnas pa/_sangs rgyas khyu mchog gi sku mtha' dang dbung med par gnas pa/_sems chags pa med par 
[\[188a.5\]]gnas pa/_mtha' dang dbung med pa'i snying rje chen po sbyor ba la gnas pa/_dus thams cad du rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par chos ston par gnas pa ste/_'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i dpal dang /_ye shes chen po la gnas pa'i chos bcu 
[\[188a.6\]]pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi mthu chen po'i stobs kyi dpal la gnas pa'i chos bcu ste/_sems can thams cad dang /_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas 
[\[188a.7\]]thams cad kyis bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad mi zin pa'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams tshe ji tsam par dga' ldan na bzhugs shing tshe zad nas 'pho bar byed pa dang /_sangs 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams zla ba bcur bzhugs pa'i tshe ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon par 'byung zhing 'byung bar bzhed pa'i thugs kyis bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[188b.2\]]chos thams cad kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skad cig ma gcig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub nas bzhugs shing /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin 
[\[188b.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad rnam par sprul par ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 'dul ba'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor zhing bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa'i dus ji lta ba bzhin du ston te brda sprod cing 
[\[188b.4\]]bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dus ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la brda sprod cing bzhugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[188b.5\]]skad cig la sems can thams cad kyis dri ba dris pa rnams skad cig la brda sprod cing bzhugs te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i chos bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[188b.6\]]pa'i chos bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can ngan par 'gro ba'i sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu de dag myur du zlog pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsod nams yongs su rdzogs 
[\[188b.7\]]par lhag par 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du mtho ris su skye ba rnam par dag pa so sor thob par 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du nem nur dang /_yid gnyis 'joms par nye bar gshegs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i sems can gzigs ma thag tu 
[\[189a.2\]]phyir mi ldog par mdzad pa'i phyir myur du gshegs shing sems rgya chen po la dad pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i 'gro ba byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gsha' 
[\[189a.3\]]mar zhugs pa gzigs ma thag tu dmigs par lta ba dang /_gsha' mar 'jug pa'i rgyu rab tu 'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can rnams gzigs ma thag tu myur du sems can rnams kyi dbang po 'jig rten las 'das pa rnam par dag par mdzad pa 
[\[189a.4\]]dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du bsgribs pa thams cad zad par mdzad du gshegs pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sems can gzigs ma thag tu myur du snang ba so sor rnyed cing zhum pa med de/_mi 'jigs pa la 
[\[189a.5\]]spobs pa rtsom par mdzad pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzigs ma thag tu myur ba'i de bzhin du gzigs pa'i chos bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_
[\[189a.6\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems kyi spyod pa rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[189a.7\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsgrubs pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]rgyas kyi sngon gyi tshangs par spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i sgo'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[189b.2\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs kyi lus tshad med mtha' yas pa'ang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi yul dang rnam par sprul pa tshad med mtha' yas pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yang rjes su dgongs 
[\[189b.3\]]pa rnams yin/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems kyi stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa yang rjes su dgongs pa rnams yin te/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag rjes su dgongs pa rnam par dag pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i 
[\[189b.4\]]sras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_dus gsum gyi sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs dang /_sems gcig gi spyod pa dang /_rnam par g.yo 
[\[189b.5\]]ba ldog pa sems kyi skad cig ma la mkhyen pa dang /_sems can ma lus pa thams cad kyi dus gsum kun gyi las rnams dang /_las dang ldan pa sna tshogs dang /_rnam pa dang /_rim pa dang /_las rnams kyi 'phel zhing sog pa'ang phyi ma'i rnam par smin pa'i rim pa sems kyi 
[\[189b.6\]]skad cig ma gcig la mkhyen pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_sems can gyi ris sna tshogs dang /_sems can gyi ris gcig dang /_sems can ma lus pa thams cad dus ji lta ba bzhin du sems can rnams 'dul zhing ston pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su 
[\[189b.7\]]bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyis cho 'phrul gyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_rgya mo'i phyogs kyi ris thams cad dang /_'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du song ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi sems 
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]kyis mtshan mar bzung ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba lta ba rnam par phye ba mkhyen pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_dad pa ji lta ba dang /_'dul ba ji lta ba bzhin du skad cig la tshad med 
[\[190a.2\]]pa'i rim pas sangs rgyas la lta ba dang /_rnam par rig pa'i byin gyis brlabs mkhyen pa dang /_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can pha rol gyi bsam par sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs ston pa mkhyen pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams 
[\[190a.3\]]cad 'dzin pa med pas sangs rgyas nas sems can rnams ji lta bus 'dul ba bzhin du 'doms shing rjes su bstan pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba ston par mkhyen pa dang /_chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang sems can thams cad kyi thams cad du 'gro 
[\[190a.4\]]zhing sems kyi skad cig ma la de dang de dag tu 'gro ba'i nan tan mkhyen pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi phyogs thams cad la sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gtong zhing sbyor ba mkhyen pa dang /_sems kyi skad cig 
[\[190a.5\]]ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad kyi sems can rnams kyi dad pa tshad med pa ji lta ba bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi sku la lta ba dang /_gzugs kyi sku'i kha dog gi gnas mtha' yas pa ston pa mkhyen pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[190a.6\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa la gnas pa bcu'o/_/kye rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu ste/_bcu 
[\[190a.7\]]gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma la sems can gyi khams sna tshogs kyi rim pa bdag med pa'i mthar gyur pa kun nas snang bar mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_dus gsum la snyoms 
[\[190b.2\]]par 'jug cing sems kyi skad cig ma'i mtha' la snyoms par 'jug cing gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad kyi rgya mo thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi rigs dang zhing thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs 
[\[190b.3\]]shing zhing mi zad pa'i mthar gyur par gnas pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la 'jig rten thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi sku sna tshogs rnam par rig pa ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[190b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_lus dang /_ngag dang /_sems yongs su gsal ba la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing sems can thams cad kyi sems sna tshogs kyi gnas mdzod du gnas shing skad cig la dad pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa dang /_sangs rgyas 
[\[190b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs shing 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar gyur pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang /_'jig rten thams cad kyi rkyen la snyoms par 'jug cing 
[\[190b.6\]]skad cig la smra ba'i rkyen ston pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi dang 'jig rten las 'das pa med bcu rdul yab thams cad la rtag tu snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la mtha' yas pa'i rkyen gyi rjes su song ba ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[190b.7\]]la lta ba mi gcod cing sems can sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa la lta bar mdzad pa dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ma lus pa thams cad bsgrub pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs shing skad cig la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rtogs shing rig nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]mtha' yas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin tshad med bsam gyis mi khyab pa bcu'o/_/
[\[191a.2\]]kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang 
[\[191a.3\]]brjod du med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i sems can 'dul zhing yongs su smin par mdzad pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la brjod du med pa'i 
[\[191a.4\]]yang brjod du med pa'i zhing ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas 'byung bar ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[191a.5\]]byung zhing rje ba rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang /_rnam par sprul pa ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs 
[\[191a.6\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sems can rnams la chos ston pa rnam par thar pa dang /_rab tu phra ba'i rdul gcig la 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mtshan ston pa rnam par thar pa ste/_kye rgyal ba'i sras 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par thar 
[\[191a.7\]]pa bcu'o/_/snyan gyi gong rgyan rgyas pa chen po'i mdo le'u 'bum pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan pa'i le'u nyi shu dgu pa rdzogs so//_//
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]{D188}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dI paM ka ra byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[191b.2\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'khor brgya stong mang pos 
[\[191b.3\]]yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba la so sor brtag pa nyid kyis bsam pa shin tu yongs su dag par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[191b.4\]]kun dga' bo ngas sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la zhe sa dang bcas pas bsnyen bkur byas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis nga sngar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi/_gang gi tshe ngas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad mthong nas ud 
[\[191b.5\]]pal lnga phul ba de'i 'og tu nga chos bdag med pa nyid la mos par gyur cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i phyir ro/_/kun dga' bo de bas na khyod dge ba'i rtsa bas chog shes par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa'i 
[\[191b.6\]]yang ches grangs med pa yangs pa tshad med pa/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgyal po ma skyes dgra zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po/_rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/_kun dga' 
[\[191b.7\]]bo rgyal po ma skyes dgra de la grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod de thams cad kyang bkra ba/_blta na sdug pa/_skyed mos tshal phun sum tshogs pa/_rdzing bu phun sum tshogs pa/_me tog phun sum tshogs pa/_'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa/_bde ba lo legs pa/_nyams dga' ba/_
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]'byor pa/_rgyas pa/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang ba sha stag go/_/kun dga' bo rgyal po ma skyes dgra de la rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_rgyal po ma skyes dgra de de na gnas so/_/de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i mdun na 'don bram ze gling ldan zhes 
[\[192a.2\]]bya ba snying du sdug cing mthong na mi 'thun pa med pa dang ldan pa zhig yod do/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rigs bzhi'i mi thams cad bsdus nas bram ze gling ldan bkug ste/_cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te 'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/bram ze khyod rang gi 
[\[192a.3\]]yul du song ste/_rgyal po'i pho brang byos la ming yang pad ma can du thogs shig_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis rang gi yul du rgyal po'i pho brang byas te/_ming yang pad ma can du btags so/_/kun dga' bo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na rgyal po gnyis rgyal 
[\[192a.4\]]srid byed de/_gcig ni ma skyes dgra'o/_/cig shos ni gling ldan no/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi btsun mo dam pa khang [{]bzangs kyi [,]bzang gi [}]yang thog na bde bar nyal zhing 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad dga' ldan gyi gnas nas shi 'phos nas glang po 
[\[192a.5\]]che'i phru gu thal kar du bsgyur te/_'od zer rab tu 'gyed cing ma'i glo g.yas par zhugs par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe btsun mo dam pa des rgyal po gling ldan la skabs 'dir smras so/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis bram ze mtshan mkhan dang /_ltas mkhan dang /_mchod sbyin mkhan 
[\[192a.6\]]rnams bsdus te rmi lam gyi skabs 'di bsnyad pa dang /_bram ze mtshan mkhan rnams kyis smras pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed de/_khyod kyi sras sems can rin po che zhig bltam par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan rmi lam bstan pa 'di thos nas 
[\[192a.7\]]dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_rgyal po gling ldan de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/_'di lta ste/_zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]pa/_spos dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_byug pa dang /_gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_gang ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad byin no/_/kun dga' bo de nas zla ba bcu 'das pa dang /_rgyal po gling ldan gyi bu gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po 
[\[192b.2\]]rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig btsas te/_btsas ma thag tu lus las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/_'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/_gzhon nu gang na ba 
[\[192b.3\]]der song ste phyin nas gzhon nu de la shis par brjod pa byas te/_'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/'di btsas ma thag tu lus las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/_'od des rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur pas gzhon nu'i ming mar me mdzad du btags 
[\[192b.4\]]so/_/de nas gzhon nu'i ming mar me mdzad mar me mdzad ces bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te rab tu dga' nas/_dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/_yang de'i rgyal khams su gtogs pa thams cad la sbyin pa byin te/_'di lta ste/_
[\[192b.5\]]zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/_skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom/_bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa/_spos dang /_phreng ba rgyu dang /_byug pa dang /_gnas mal rung ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_gang ci dang ci 'dod pa thams cad byin no/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyis rgyal 
[\[192b.6\]]bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad bkug ste/_cod pan bcings nas rgyal srid phyed byin te/_'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/gzhon nu khyod song la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang na 'dug cing rtses shig_/dga' bar gyis shig_/dga' dgur spyod cig_/kun dga' bo de nas re zhig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me 
[\[192b.7\]]mdzad btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song nas bzhon pa chen po la zhon te/_bud med kyi tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su song ba dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag gcig gis bdag cag nyid rgas shing 'khogs pa dang /_nad kyis btab pa dang /_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]shi ba yang bstan te dge sbyong zhig kyang der bzhag pa dang /_rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad kyis mthong nas kha lo sgyur ba la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye kha lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba 'di dag ci yin/_kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di dag ni rgas 
[\[193a.2\]]pa zhes bgyi ba dang /_na ba zhes bgyi ba dang /_shi ba zhes bgyi ba lags te/_gzhon nu ji srid du chos nyid gdags pa mchis pa de srid du rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba'i chos rnams mchis te gzhon nu khyod dang 'o skol yang de lta bu lags te/_'khor ba na gnas pa kho na lags 
[\[193a.3\]]so/_/gzhon nus smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba mgo bregs te gos ngur smrig gyon la zhi zhing nye bar zhi ba gnya' shing gang tsam du blta ba 'di su zhig_/kha lo sgyur bas smras pa/_gzhon nu 'di ni dge slong ste/_sdig pa thams cad spangs pa thar pa la mngon par dga' ba'i 'du shes bskyed nas 
[\[193a.4\]]khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba lags so/_/gzhon nus smras pa/_kha lo sgyur ba legs so legs so/_/dge slong 'di'i lam 'di ni 'dod pa yin no zhes nas phyir log ste khyim du song ngo /_/kun dga' bo de nas re zhig na rgyal bu gzhon nu mar me mdzad yang skyed mos 
[\[193a.5\]]tshal gyi gnas su song ngo /_/de skyed mos tshal gyi gnas su phyin pa dang /_de na sangs rgyas brgya stong mang pos bstan pa'i byang chub kyi snying po mthong ngo /_/kun dga' bo de nas byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad kyis byang chub kyi snying po de mthong nas skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs 
[\[193a.6\]]thams cad ha cang thag mi ring bar bor nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_des byang chub kyi snying po mthong ba dang /_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas byang chub kyi snying po der skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' mar me mdzad 'dug ma thag tu de nas de'i 
[\[193a.7\]]tshe de nyid kyi mtshan mo'i skya rengs dang po shar ba'i dus na de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ma thag 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]tu de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od byung ste/_'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i dbang po brgya byin rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[193b.2\]]pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas sgra 'di skad ces kyang bsgrags so/_/kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'di 'jig rten du byung ste/_
[\[193b.3\]]'di ltar de'i 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad lo lnga bcu'i bar du byang chub kyi snying po de na bzhugs kyang tha na sems can gcig tsam yang blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 
[\[193b.4\]]'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang gi 'khor gyi mi rnams bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir blta ba dang /_phyag bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rgyal 
[\[193b.5\]]po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams bde ba dang ldan pas ha cang bag med par gyur gyi/_ngas de rnams cung zhig yid byung bar bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis de'i tshe 
[\[193b.6\]]'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/_rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyi nang du bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po blta na sdug pa/_skye bo dang mi mang 
[\[193b.7\]]pos gang la/_mi de dag kyang lhag par mdzes pa/_lhag par blta na sdug pa/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag cig mngon par sprul to/_/de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyis spa 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]gong bar ni gyur na gang yang skyo bar ni ma gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams ha cang bag 
[\[194a.2\]]med pa dang ldan par gyur pas ngas yang cung zhig skyo ba bskyed par bya gor ma chag snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis yang 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/_
[\[194a.3\]]rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po de la me chen po 'bar bar byin gyis brlabs so/_/byin gyis brlabs ma thag tu de la me 'bar bar gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe sems can de dag dang grong khyer chen po 
[\[194a.4\]]de yang yongs su zad cing mthar thug pa dang zhig par gyur nas sems can de dag kyang tshul ma yin pa mthong bas sdug bsngal bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams kyis bai dUr+ya las byas pa'i grong khyer chen po rgud par 
[\[194a.5\]]mthong nas dngangs skrag par gyur cing skyo bar gyur nas spu zing zhes byed de/_de dag 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/gang gi phyir grong khyer de yongs su zad cing mthar thug pa dang zhig par gyur pa las na ring po mi thogs par bdag cag kyang de lta bu'i mi rtag pa'i gnas skabs su gyur 
[\[194a.6\]]na su zhig bdag cag gi skyabs su 'gyur snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi 'di rnams yongs su smin pas ngas chos bstan pa 
[\[194a.7\]]kun shes par nus shing skal ba dang ldan pa dang mthu yod par gyur to snyam mo/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis mi de rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis byang chub kyi snying po de las bzhengs te/_phyi bzhin 'brang ba'i dge sbyong lha'i dbang po 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]brgya byin dang thabs cig tu rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der gshegs so/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad byon ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad kyis chos bstan pa dang po'i tshe srog chags nyi khri rab tu phyung ste/_de dag thams 
[\[194b.2\]]cad len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/chos bstan pa gnyis pa'i tshe srog chags sum khri rab tu phyung ste/_de dag thams cad kyang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/chos bstan pa gsum pa'i tshe srog chags bzhi khri rab 
[\[194b.3\]]tu phyung ste/_de dag thams cad kyang chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/chos bstan pa bzhi pa'i tshe srog chags lnga khri bar tu phyung ste/_de dag thams cad kyang len pa med pa zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin 
[\[194b.4\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad dge slong gi dge 'dun mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to/_/kun dga' bo de nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras rgyal po gling ldan gyi bu zhig skyes nas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[194b.5\]]byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes thos nas de la pho nya btang ste/_'di ltar bdag kyang mchod par 'tshal na bdag gi thad du gshegs par gsol zhes spring ngo /_/de nas pho nya des rgyal po ma skyes dgra las mnyan nas rgyal po gling ldan gyi rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba dang /_rgyal 
[\[194b.6\]]po gling ldan ga la ba der song ste phyin nas phrin de skad smras so/_/de nas rgyal po gling ldan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ga la ba der song ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 
[\[194b.7\]]'dug nas skabs de gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod snying las chung ngur gyis la slar song shig_/nga ni rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can du gshegs so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]me mdzad dge slong gi dge 'dun dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing /_
[\[195a.2\]]rgyal po gling ldan yang rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_rgyal po'i tshogs mang po dang /_rgyal po'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i bdog pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i 'byor pa chen po dang /_rgyal po'i rnam par rtse ba chen po dang chas te yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te 
[\[195a.3\]]thabs cig tu gshegs so/_/kun dga' bo de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad de rim gyis rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can ga la ba der gshegs so/_/de'i tshe na ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la bram ze rin po che zhes bya ba zhig 'dug ste/_bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam la bstan bcos 
[\[195a.4\]]dang rig byed dang /_gsang sngags thams cad slob tu 'jug go/_/de na bram ze'i khye'u lnga brgya tsam po de dag gi nang na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya ba gzhon nu dar la bab pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_gsang 
[\[195a.5\]]sngags dang /_bstan bcos dang /_chog shes pa ji snyed pa thams cad la mkhas pa zhig yod do/_/kun dga' bo de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bas mkhan po'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye mkhan po bdag grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs 
[\[195a.6\]]dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su mchi'o/_/mkhan pos smras pa/_kye bram ze'i khye'u bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'di yin te/_gang gis bstan bcos dang /_rig byed dang /_gsang sngags thams cad lobs pa des mkhan po la zong lnga brgya 
[\[195a.7\]]dang /_ras zung gcig dang /_khar ba dang /_ril ba rnams sbyin dgos so/_/bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis smras pa/_mkhan po bdag la pags pa dang /_khar ba dang /_ril ba ma gtogs par ci yang ma mchis pas mchi'o/_/lan gsum gyi bar du gsol nas de bzhin gyis shig 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]ces smras so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin rim gyis ri'i rgyal po gangs las babs nas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du zhugs so/_/de'i tshe na grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba na bram ze sa ga bzang po zhes bya ba zhig 
[\[195b.2\]]gnas te/_de la bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod pa de'i phyir nyi ma re re zhing bram ze bzhi khri la zan sbyin par byed cing /_de rnams kyi nang na thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa 
[\[195b.3\]]gang yin pa de la bdag gi bu mo sbyin no snyam pa dang /_gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu zhig gis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la grong khyer chen po bde bar pha rol tu 'gro ba'i lam bstan no/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mchod sbyin gyi gnas ga la ba der song ste phyin to/_/bram ze'i khye'u 
[\[195b.4\]]sprin mchod sbyin gyi gnas der phyin ma thag tu de'i tshe bu mo des rang gi pha ma la 'di skad ces smras so/_/yab bram ze'i khye'u 'di'i mtshan ma ji ltar gda' ba las na 'di bdag gi khyim thab tu 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin bram ze de dag thams cad dang lhan cig kun tu smra bar 
[\[195b.5\]]byed cing /_de na bram ze sprin nyid bstan bcos dang /_gsang sngags dag gis khyad par du 'phags so/_/de'i tshe na mchod sbyin gyi gnas der bram ze dum bu byin zhes bya ba zhig rgan gral du 'dug ste/_mchod sbyin byed do/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin bram ze dum bu byin ga la ba der song ste 
[\[195b.6\]]phyin nas/_bram ze dum bu byin dang lhan cig tu rig byed dang gsang sngags dag smra bar byed cing /_de na 'di lta ste/_sprin nyid rig byed dang /_gsang sngags dang /_bstan bcos dag gis khyad par du 'phags so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis bram ze dum bu byin la 'di skad ces 
[\[195b.7\]]smras so/_/kye bram ze bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi chos nyid ni gang gis bstan bcos thams cad rtogs shing khong du chud pa de stan mchog la 'dug pa yin no/_/de nas yang bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis bram ze dum bu byin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze chen po 'dir kho bo 'dug gis stan 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]'di las longs shig_/de nas bram ze dum bu byin gyis 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u nga stan 'di las ma bslang shig dang /_kho bos zong lnga brgya thob pa khyod la sbyin no smras pa/_kho bo la mi dgos so/_/de ma langs pa dang de'i mgrin pa nas bzung 
[\[196a.2\]]ste bslang ngo /_/de nas bram ze dum bu byin gyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la smras pa/_bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis kho bo stan 'di las bslangs nas tho btsams shing dngangs par byas pas khyod gang dang gang du skyes pa'i skye ba thams cad du sbyin pa'i bar chad bya'o zhes dam bcas so/_/
[\[196a.3\]]de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin seng ge'i khri de la 'dug go/_/de nas bram ze sa ga bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan lag g.yas pas bzung ste/_gser gyi khar ba dang /_ril ba dang /_ras zung gcig dang /_zong lnga brgya khyer nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bram ze'i 
[\[196a.4\]]khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag long shig_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis zong lnga brgya dang /_ras zung gcig dang /_khar ba dang /_ril ba rnams blangs te bu mo de ma blangs so/_/'di skad ces kyang smras so/_/bud med 'dis ci zhig bya/_bud med ni spre'u dang 
[\[196a.5\]]'dra ste/_rgod pa 'phyar ba dge ba'i bar chad byed pa yin la/_kho bo ni dgon pa dang rab tu dben pa rnams na gnas pas 'di kho bo la mi dgos so/_/rigs kyi bu bdag la snying brtse ba'i phyir long shig_/des ma blangs so/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mchod sbyin gyi gnas de nas 
[\[196a.6\]]song ste ri'i rgyal po gangs ga la ba der song ngo /_/de nas bram ze sa ga bzang pos bu mo bzang len ldan la smras pa/_bu mo khyod khyim thab kyi phyi bzhin ci'i phyir mi 'gro/_des de'i tshig mnyan te/_mnyan nas ri'i rgyal po gangs ga la ba de logs su 'phags so/_/de'i tshe na 
[\[196a.7\]]gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu zhig gis ri'i rgyal po gangs su 'gro ba'i lam mi snang bar byas nas rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can du gang nas 'gro ba'i lam bstan cing /_gang du bram ze'i khye'u sprin dro 'debs pa der bu mo bzang len ldan yang dgongs 'debs so/_/de nas bram 
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]ze'i khye'u des rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can dar gyi lda ldi bres pa/_me tog bkram pa/_bdug spos 'thul ba'i snod dngar ba mthong nas des dris pa/_grong khyer chen po 'di ci'i rgyus mngon par brgyan par gyur/_de nas rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams 
[\[196b.2\]]kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis ma thos sam/_'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de rgyal po ma skyes dgras spyan drangs nas de 'dir byon pa'i 
[\[196b.3\]]phyir grong khyer chen po mngon par brgyan to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag bram ze rnams kyi nang na gang bstan bcos thams cad la spyod pa gsal zhing mkhas pa yang dkon na/_sems can rin po che 'di ltar 'jig rten du byung ba lta smos kyang ci 
[\[196b.4\]]dgos kyis bdag gis zong lnga brgya po 'dis me tog nyos la de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa bya gor ma chag snyam nas des phan tshun me tog btsal na gang nas kyang ma rnyed pa dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi rnams na re bram ze'i khye'u khyod kyis ma 
[\[196b.5\]]thos sam/_rgyal po ma skyes dgras bka' stsal te/_me tog thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mchod pa bya dgos kyis/_'di ltar su yang me tog nyor yang mi gnang /_'tshong du yang mi gnang ngo /_/gang zhig gis nyos sam btsongs na ngas de chad pa chen pos 
[\[196b.6\]]gcad do zhe'o/_/de me tog tshol ba na bu mo bzang len ldan mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u ci tshol/_bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis smras pa/_bu mo me tog tshol lo/_/de nas bu mo bzang len ldan me tog phreng brgyud mkhan zhig gi khyim ga la ba der 
[\[196b.7\]]song ste phyin nas me tog phreng brgyud mkhan de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu kho mo la me tog byin cig_/kho mo'i khyim thab la dgos so/_/me tog phreng brgyud mkhan gyis smras pa/_bu mo khyod kyis ma thos sam/_'di ltar rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/_
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]me tog thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad la mchod pa bya dgos kyis/_'di ltar su yang me tog 'tshong du 'ang mi gnang /_nyor yang mi gnang ngo /_/gang zhig gis nyos sam btsongs na ngas de chad pa chen po gcad do zhe'o/_/lan gsum gyi bar du 
[\[197a.2\]]bslang ba dang de bzhin bya'o zhes zer ro/_/de nas bu mo bzang len ldan gyis bum pa blangs nas ud pa la bdun bcug ste/_grong khyer du song nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin mthong ba dang mdun du 'dug ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u ci tshol/_bu mo me tog tshol lo/_/smras 
[\[197a.3\]]pa/_bram ze'i khye'u ci bya/_smras pa/_bu mo bskyed par bya'o/_/bu mos smras pa/_ud pa la btogs zin pa gang dag yang skye bar 'gyur ba ni kho mos nam yang ma thos ma mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_bu mo gang la bskyed pa tsam gyis skye ba'i bsod nams kyi zhing de lta bu la bskyed 
[\[197a.4\]]do/_/des smras pa/_gal te kho mo gang dang gang du skyes pa'i skye ba thams cad du khyod kho mo'i khyim thab tu 'gyur ba dam 'cha' na de'i phyir ud pa la sbyin no/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag ni dgon pa dang rab tu dben pa na gnas pa yin la/_
[\[197a.5\]]bud med ni rgod pa/_'phyar ba/_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar chad byed pa yin pas bud med 'dis ci zhig bya snyam mo/_/lan bdun gyi bar du smras pa dang /_de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'di skad 
[\[197a.6\]]ngas thos sngon srid na/_/sangs rgyas mar me 'jig rten byung /_/'khor ni mang po bdun stong dang /_/pad ma can du de phyin to/_/de yi phyir ni rgyal mtshan bsgrengs/_/rnga ni brgya phrag de phyir brdungs/_/grong khyer thams cad kun sbyangs shing /_/lam srang bzhi ni de phyir brgyan/_/grong khyer 
[\[197a.7\]]brgyan pa de mthong nas/_/bram ze'i khye 'us dris pa ni/_/gang gi phyir ni rgyal mtshan bsgrengs/_/gang phyir rnga ni brgya phrag brdungs/_/grong khyer thams cad kun sbyangs shing /_/gang phyir lam srang bzhi brgyan pa'i/_/bsam pa de ni lung ston cig_/rig byed shes khyod ma thos sam/_/
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]sangs rgyas mar me 'jig rten byung /_/'khor ni mang po bdun stong dang /_/pad ma can du de byon te/_/de yi phyir ni rgyal mtshan bsgrengs/_/de phyir rnga ni brgya phrag brdungs/_/grong khyer thams cad kun sbyangs shing /_/de phyir lam srang bzhi brgyan to/_/sangs rgyas kyi ni sgra thos 
[\[197b.2\]]nas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan gyis mgu ste/_/rings par myur du song ba dang /_/rgyang nas bram ze'i bu mo mthong /_/pad ma ud pal g.yo ba'i mig_/chu skyes thogs shing sgo na 'dug_/de yis bram ze'i khye'u mthong nas/_/snyan pas smra bar bya ba'i phyir/_/ka la 
[\[197b.3\]]ping ka rma bya'i sgra/_/yid 'ong ngang mo khu byug sgra/_/sgra chen spangs nas tshangs pa'i sgras/_/bram ze'i khye'u la bu mos smras/_/khye'u ci nags kyi nang na de/_/sbyin sreg byed cing rig 'don la/_/rgyal po'i dmag gis ma gtses sam/_/'khrugs shing lam srang dag tu 
[\[197b.4\]]rgyu/_/bu mo nga khyim gnyen 'dun med/_/yongs su gzung ba'ang nga la med/_/'dod pa'i yon tan nga mi 'dod/_/bu mo rgyal dmag nga mi gnod/_/nga de dag las zan mi za/_/chos gos gos kyang mi len te/_/shes bzhin [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]ni mi smra na/_/bu mo rgyal dmag nga mi gnod/_/
[\[197b.5\]]'bras bu rtsa bas nags na gnas/_/bu mo rgyal dmag nga mi gnod/_/seng phrug dag gis ma gtses sam/_/'bras rtsa nags na med dam ci/_/ci'i phyir khyod ni brtan par 'ongs/_/seng ge'i phrug gus ma gtses te/_/nags na 'bras bu rtsa ba yod/_/bzang mo ud pal dgos 
[\[197b.6\]]pa'i phyir/_/de phyir nga 'dir grong khyer 'ongs/_/gal te shed bu lang tso yis/_/dregs lus brgyan phyir bram ze khye'u/_/bdag gi ud pal 'tsham pa yin/_/bdag gi phreng phyir mi nyo la/_/ud pal bsnams phyir 'dod pa min/_/brtse ldan mar me mdzad kyi phyir/_/bzang mo 
[\[197b.7\]]bdag ni ud pal slong /_/bde bar pha rol 'gro ba na/_/gang du pha las zan zos tshe/_/bslang ba'i tshig smras mi dran nas/_/'dzem med ci phyir me tog slong /_/bzang mo ud pal rin du dbyig_/lnga brgya 'di byin dge mas gnang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan tshol ba la/_/bzang 
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]mo bgegs ni ma byed cig_/bzang mo bdag gi gzhi byas nas/_/slong ba rnams kyi bgegs su 'gyur/_/gzhan lta zhog gi bram ze'i khye'u/_/gal te slong la bdag byin na/_/bdag ni khyod kyi bgegs mi byed/_/bdag smon 'dir gyur gzhan du min/_/de 
[\[198a.2\]]gnyis smon lam btab nas ni/_/bram ze'i khye 'us ud pal blangs/_/de dag ud pal thogs nas kyang /_/rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_/gal te bdag lus skams gyur cing /_/bdag gi rus pa dkar gyur kyang /_/byang chub lung ma bstan bar du/_/bdag ni de ring 
[\[198a.3\]]mi ldang ngo /_/bdag smon der gyur gzhan du min/_/de nas bu mo bzang len ldan gyis ud pal lnga blangs te bram ze'i khye'u sprin la byin nas bram ze'i khye'u ud pal 'di dag long la rang gi ming gis skrun cig_/bram ze'i khye'u ud pal 'di gnyis kyang kho mo'i ming gis skrun cig_/
[\[198a.4\]]de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin ud pa la de dag khyer nas/_grong khyer gyi phyi rol tu byung ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad mdzes pa dang bar bya ba/_dbang po dul ba/_thugs dul ba/_mchog tu dul ba/_dang zhing zhi ba'i pha 
[\[198a.5\]]rol tu phyin pa/_dul ba dang zhi ba'i dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/_glang po chen po dbang po bsrung zhing thul ba/_mtsho ltar dang zhing rnam par dang la rnyog pa med pa'i gser gyi mchod sdong ltar mngon par 'phags pa/_dpal gyis brjid pa/_gzi brjid kyis 'bar ba mthong ngo /_/sems 
[\[198a.6\]]can bye ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo brgya phrag du ma dang /_lha dang /_lha ma yin dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po dang /_rgyal po ma skyes dgra yang btsun mo'i 'khor dang lhan cig tu me 
[\[198a.7\]]tog dang /_me tog phreng dang /_spos dang byug pa thogs te/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir 'ong ba yang mthong nas/_yang 'di snyam du sems par gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad ni skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin par bdag gis thos na/_de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la ni mtshan sum cu zhig snang ste/_mtshan gnyis ni mi snang bas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin no snyam 
[\[198b.2\]]mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyi sems kyi kun tu rtog pa thugs su chud nas/_rdzu 'phrul ji lta bu mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas skyes bu chen po'i 
[\[198b.3\]]mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad de/_bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis de mthong nas yang bram ze'i khye'u sprin dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas pags pa de bting ba 
[\[198b.4\]]dang /_de nas rgyal po'i pho brang pad ma can gyi rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor ba'i mi de dag gis pags pa de blangs nas/_phan tshun du bor te bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bram ze'i khye'u ma smyos sam/_gang du rgyal po'i na bza' gding ba der khyod kyis pags pa btsog 
[\[198b.5\]]pa 'di gding bar byed/_de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gyis pags pa blangs nas/_lam las bzur te/_lam gol bar 'dug nas bden pa'i tshig 'di byas so/_/bden pa dang bden tshig gang gis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs pa/_
[\[198b.6\]]'jig rten la thugs brtse ba yin na/_shul las bzur te bdag gi ral pa la zhabs 'jog par gyur cig_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad zhal phyir gzigs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge 
[\[198b.7\]]slong dag gang du nga'i zhabs gnyis 'jog pa der khyod kyis gzhag par mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i ral pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]sangs rgyas mar me mdzad shul las bzur nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin gang na bar gshegs te byon pa dang /_zhabs gnyis ral pa'i steng der bzhag go/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin zhing sa'i steng de nas langs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[199a.2\]]rgyas mar me mdzad la ud pa la de dag gtor to/_/gtor ma thag tu de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbu'i gtsug gi steng gi drang thad du ud pa la'i khang pa brtsegs pa grwa bzhir ka ba bzhi zug pa/_cha mnyam pa shin tu rnam par phye ba/_nyams dga' ba/_yid du 'ong ba zhig 
[\[199a.3\]]gnas par gyur te/_khang pa brtsegs pa de na yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku snang ngo /_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyis bram ze'i khye'u sprin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bram ze'i khye'u khyod dge 
[\[199a.4\]]ba'i rtsa ba 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo 
[\[199a.5\]]sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin bdag nyid lung bstan pa thos nas dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs te/_rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas/_de'i tshe mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab 
[\[199a.6\]]tu thob bo/_/de bzod pa thob nas steng gi nam mkha' bar snang la ta la bdun srid du 'phags nas ting nge 'dzin drug stong mngon du gyur cing /_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag kyang mngon du gyur to/_/de nas bram ze'i khye'u sprin bar snang las babs te/_bcom ldan 
[\[199a.7\]]'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das las rab tu byung ba dang dge slong gi dngos po gsol to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za na kun dga' bo de de ltar 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i khye'u sprin ces bya ba der gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze'i bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za na kun dga' bo de de ltar mi 
[\[199b.2\]]blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na bu mo bzang len ldan zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dum bu byin zhes bya bar gyur pa gang rgan gral du 'dug ste sbyin sreg byed pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du som nyi'am/_yid gnyis 
[\[199b.3\]]sam/_the tsom za na kun dga' bo de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi gti mug can lhas byin 'di de'i tshe de'i dus na bram ze dum bu byin du gyur to/_/kun dga' bo de lta bas na de'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa bas chog shes par mi bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[199b.4\]]nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa mar me mdzad kyis lung bstan pa zhes 
[\[199b.5\]]bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sing ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban de dge dpal gyis bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de klu'i rgyal mtshan gyis zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[199b.6\]{D189}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya brah+ma shrI byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig 
[\[199b.7\]]na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das snga dro sham thabs dang chos gos gsol te lhung bzed bsnams nas mnyan yod kyi grong khyer du bsod 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]snyoms la gshegs so/_/yang de'i tshe mnyan yod kyi grong khyer gyi phyi rol na byis pa phal po che dag sa rdul gyi khyim dang /_sa rdul gyi ra ba dang /_sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing 'khod pa las byis pa phal po che de dag gis thag ring po zhig nas bcom 
[\[200a.2\]]ldan 'das gshegs pa mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang lhag par dga' ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te rtse dga' zhing 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das khye'u de dag la thugs brtse ba'i phyir gang na khye'u de dag rtse zhing 'khod pa'i sa phyogs der gshegs so/_/
[\[200a.3\]]de nas byis pa de dag gi nang nas khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal zhes bya ba zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen bzhin du byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byis pa khyed 'di na 
[\[200a.4\]]ci byed/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la khye'u de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag 'di nas rdul gyi khyim dag dang /_sa rdul gyi ra ba dag dang /_sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa dag gis rtse zhing mchis lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[200a.5\]]ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa 'di bzhes su gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_dga' ba'i sems thugs 
[\[200a.6\]]su chud nas thugs brtse ba'i phyir sa rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de bzhes so/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus skad cig de dang /_yud tsam de las rdul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa zhig tu gyur nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 
[\[200a.7\]]'dug par gyur te/_de'i shar phyogs kyi ngos su ni gser gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/_lho phyogs kyi ngos su ni dngul gyi ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/_nub phyogs kyi ngos su ni bai dUr+ya'i ka ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur/_byang phyogs kyi ngos su ni shel gyi ka 
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]ba brgyad khri bzhi stong zug par gyur to/_/de nas de'i tshe khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de mthong nas lhag par yang ches dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal gyis tshigs su bcad 
[\[200b.2\]]pa 'di dag gsol to/_/kye ma 'jig rten mgon po yis/_/rdzu 'phrul shin tu rgya chen bstan/_/bdag nyid la ni thugs brtse'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni rdzu 'phrul bstan/_/drang srong che la bdag gis ni/_/sa rdul khang brtsegs phul ba de/_/rin po che las grub par gyur/_/kye ma 
[\[200b.3\]]sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/kye kye zhing ni 'di 'dra ba/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni bla med pa/_/mig med mig ni nyams pa dang /_/shes rab chung ngus mi shes so/_/rkang gnyis dam pa 'gro ba'i zhing /_/'di ni bdag gis rnyed pa dang /_/dal ba rab dkon thob pas na/_/byang chub tu ni smon lam 
[\[200b.4\]]gdab/_/bdag kyang 'dren pa khyod kyi ni/_/yon tan rjes su slob par 'tshal/_/bla med byang chub thob nas ni/_/rdzu 'phrul 'di 'dra bdag gis bgyi/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_
[\[200b.5\]]sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel gyi kha dog dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ngo /_/de dag byung nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/_yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi 
[\[200b.6\]]dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgyal mchog 'dren pa 'gro ba'i gtso bo rnams/_/rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_/thugs rje ldan pa 'jig rten sman slad du/_/deng 'dir ci phyir 'dzum 
[\[200b.7\]]mdzad bdag la gsungs/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal 'di mthong ngam/_gsol pa bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khye'u 'di dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dang /_sems kyi smon pa 'dis ni bskal pa sum stong nyis brgya'i bar du nams kyang sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/des byang chub bsgrubs nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[201a.2\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad pa yis/_/bsod nams chung ngu skye mi 'gyur/_/chos 
[\[201a.3\]]mchog thos dang dge 'dun la/_/gus par byas pa'ang de bzhin no/_/sangs rgyas la ni dad pa la/_/byang chub thob par dka' ba med/_/de phyir byang chub 'dod pas 'dir/_/'jig rten 'dren rnams mchod par bya/_/kun dga' khye'u 'di rkang gnyis kyi/_/mchog ste dpal dang ldan pa 
[\[201a.4\]]yi/_/mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba/_/'jig rten gyi ni 'dren par 'gyur/_/de ltar sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/sangs rgyas chos kyang de bzhin te/_/bsam mi khyab la dad pa yi/_/rnam par smin pa'ang de bzhin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang 
[\[201a.5\]]ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_khye'u tshangs pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa tshangs pa'i dpal lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha sid+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba 
[\[201a.6\]]ban de dge ba dpal gyis bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid+yA ka ra sid+ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de de ba tsan+d+ras zhus te gtan la phab pa//[ {D190}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya s+t+rI bi brta byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags 
[\[201a.7\]]pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga stong gi dge slong 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong mngon par grags pa/_mngon par shes pa thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_mi 'jigs pa thob pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_theg pa chen 
[\[201b.2\]]po'i rjes su song ba sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mu khyud 'dzin dang /_sa 'dzin dang /_bang rim 'dzin dang /_mchod sbyin rus 'dzin dang /_snang ba'i blo gros dang /_rnam par dag pa'i blo gros dang /_sbyangs pa'i blo gros dang /_khyad par blo gros 
[\[201b.3\]]dang /_mtha' yas blo gros dang /_'phel ba'i blo gros dang /_mthong dga' dang /_legs mthong dang /_cher snang dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don kun mthong la sogs pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byams pa la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang 
[\[201b.4\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na rten cing bzhugs te/_rgyal po dang /_rgyal po'i bu rnams dang /_tshong dpon rnams dang /_khyim bdag rnams dang /_
[\[201b.5\]]blon po rnams dang /_'khor rnams dang /_grong rdal pa dang /_yul gyi mi rnams kyis bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor snga dro'i dus kyi tshe smad g.yogs dang /_chos gos bgos/_lhung bzed thogs nas bcom ldan 
[\[201b.6\]]'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mdang sum bdag gi rmi lam na de bzhin 
[\[201b.7\]]gshegs pa byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs pa zhig mthong ste/_des phyag g.yas pa gser gyi mdog can brkyang nas bdag gi spyi bor bzhag ste/_rab 'byor sang khyod kyi sngon ma thos pa'i chos ston pa thos par 'gyur ro zhes de skad ces bka' stsal na/_bcom ldan 'das de 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]gang gi snga ltas lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de ni rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos 'dod pa rnams kyi sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par 'gyur ba'i snga ltas yin no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di 
[\[202a.2\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la mchi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor de'i dus la dbab par shes na song shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nas/_bcom 
[\[202a.3\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms la zhugs so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen por mthar chags su bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing song ba las/_khyim bdag cig gi gnas ga la ba 
[\[202a.4\]]der song ste phyin nas sgo khang gi nang logs su cang mi smra bar sdod do/_/de nas khyim de'i nang nas bud med mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/_blta na sdug pa/_rgyan gyis legs par bklubs te/_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_byi ru dang /_gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_dpal shin tu 
[\[202a.5\]]'bar ba/_kha dog rgyas shing mdzes pa dang ldan pa zhig byung ngo /_/de nas bud med des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci zhig bzhed pa'i slad du sgo khang 'di na gzhes/_rab 'byor 
[\[202a.6\]]gyis smras pa/_che zhe bdag ni bsod snyoms 'dod pa'i phyir sgo gang 'di na sdod do/_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la da dung yang bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes 'byung lags sam/_btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la da dung yang bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes thugs 
[\[202a.7\]]su ma chud dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_che zhe bdag gis bsod snyoms kyi 'du shes ni khong du chud mod kyi/_'on kyang pha ma las skyes pa'i lus 'bras chan dang zan dron gyis bskyed pa 'di zas med kyi bar du 'tsho bar mi nus so/_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/reg pa 'gags 
[\[202b.2\]]pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[202b.3\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa 'gag pa mngon sum du ma mdzad dam/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_che zhe bdag gis 'gog pa mngon sum du byas so/_/smras pa btsun pa rab 'byor ci zhig ni 'gog par 'gyur/_chos gang ni rab tu bsgom par bgyi/_smras pa che zhe 'gog pa ni 
[\[202b.4\]]chos gang gi rab tu bsgom par bya ba yang ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te 'gog pa chos gang gi rab tu bsgom pa yang ma lags na btsun pa rab 'byor gyi lus bsod snyoms kyis ji ltar 'tsho bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_che zhe 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs te 
[\[202b.5\]]tshor ba thams cad bkag pa las langs pa'i lus 'tsho bar byed do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te gtan du mya ngan las 'das na khyod kyi lus ji ltar 'tsho ba la 'jug par 'gyur/_smras pa/_che zhe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni lus 'tsho bar bya ba'i phyir bsod 
[\[202b.6\]]snyoms la rgyu'o/_/smras pa/_des na bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu ma bstan tam/_smras pa/_che zhe de yin no/_/smras pa/_ci nyon mongs pa med pa de rgyu ba'am rab tu rgyu ba lags sam/_smras pa/_che zhe ma 
[\[202b.7\]]yin no/_/smras pa/_'o na ci'i slad du btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad/_smras pa/_che zhe bdag ni lus cha ba'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ma yin gyi/_srog gi phyir tshor ba dgag pa'i don du bsod snyoms la rgyu'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor da dung yang tshor 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]bas 'phrogs sam/_smras pa/_che zhe bdag ni tshor bas mi 'phrogs mod kyi/_tshor ba dgag pa'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshungs pa med pa ste/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa ni 
[\[203a.2\]]lus dang sems kyi tshor ba myong ba ma mchis so/_/nyon mongs pa med pa ni lus dang sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa ma lags so/_/nyon mongs pa med pa ni dga' ba'am/_yid mi dga' ba skyed pa mi bgyid do/_/nyon mongs pa med pa ni su la yang nyon mongs pas nye bar gnas 
[\[203a.3\]]pa ma mchis so/_/gzhan yang gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis btsun pa rab 'byor nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan na/_ci'i slad du ni nyon mongs pa med pa nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bgyi/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_che zhe dmigs pa med 
[\[203a.4\]]pa'i nyon mongs pa med pa ni 'dod chags kyi rdul dang bral ba yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_che zhe ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'o na nyon mongs pa med pa de ji ltar 'dod 
[\[203a.5\]]chags kyi rdul dang bral bar gyur/_smras pa/_che zhe nyon mongs pa med par bstan pa 'di ni bshad pa tsam du zad do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci nyon mongs pa med pa la bshad pa mchis sam/_smras pa/_che zhe med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te 
[\[203a.6\]]nyon mongs pa med pa la bshad pa ma mchis na ci zhig 'chad cing bzhugs/_smras pa/_che zhe bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos rnams ni tha snyad tsam gyis tha snyad du 'dogs par zad do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ji tsam du brjod pa mchis pa de tsam du tha snyad 'dogs so/_/ji tsam 
[\[203a.7\]]du tha snyad 'dogs pa de tsam du phyin ci log go/_/ji tsam du phyin ci log pa de tsam du rtsod par 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam du rtsod pa de tsam du dge sbyong gi chos ma lags so/_/smras pa/_che zhe 'o na dge sbyong gi chos gang yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor dge sbyong gi chos ni tha snyad ma mchis 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]pa/_phyin ci ma log pa rtsod pa ma mchis pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni chos dang chos ma lags pa dang bral ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni chags pa dang ma chags pa dang bral ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni yul ma mchis pa dang /_yul ma lags pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni 
[\[203b.2\]]chags pa ma mchis pa dang /_ma bcings ma grol ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni sems ma mchis pa ste/_sems dang /_yid dang /_rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni chog shes pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni phrag dog dang chags pa spangs pa'o/_/dge 
[\[203b.3\]]sbyong gi chos ni 'dod pa chung zhing chog shes pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni 'dod pa thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni yul thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa dang zhen pa ma mchis pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni phung po'i bdud las nges par grol ba'o/_/dge 
[\[203b.4\]]sbyong gi chos ni nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa ste/_nyon mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'das pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni ma skyes pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni 'chi bdag gi bdud dang bral ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni g.yo ba ma mchis pa dang /_rlom sems ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[203b.5\]]rtog pa ma mchis pa dang /_rnam par ma bsgribs pa dang /_spyad pa ma lags pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni bdud kyi yul las yang dag par 'das pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni blang ba ma mchis pa dang /_dor ba ma mchis pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni skye ba dang /_'jig pa dang bral 
[\[203b.6\]]ba'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni lha'i bu'i bdud dang ma 'bags pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni yid la byed pa ma mchis pa dang /_thams cad du gos pa ma mchis pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma ma mchis pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba'o/_/
[\[203b.7\]]dge sbyong gi chos ni khams dang khams ma lags pa'i tshul thams cad kyis bcos pa ma lags pa dang /_bgrang ba dang /_bral ba dang /_gnas ma mchis pa dang /_nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'o/_/dge sbyong gi chos bstan pa 'di bshad pa na sgo gang der lha'i bu gang dag chos mnyan pa'i phyir 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]'dus pa de dag las lha'i bu bzhi stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/rgya chen po la mos pa'i lha'i bu lnga brgya ni bud med de'i spobs pa thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[204a.2\]]rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/_che zhe 'di 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de ni ngo mtshar te/_che zhe 'di'i spobs pa 'di 'dra ba las na 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tsom med do snyam mo/_/de nas bud med de'i sems kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi 
[\[204a.3\]]sems shes nas gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ltar 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa yin par the tsom med do snyam du dgongs pa de ni ji ltar dgongs pa de bzhin te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas de bzhin nyid thugs 
[\[204a.4\]]su chud pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang de bzhin nyid khong du chud de/_des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de bdag 
[\[204a.5\]]gi de bzhin nyid kyang de nyid de/_des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni nams kyang /_de bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi de 
[\[204a.6\]]bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni nams kyang de bzhin nyid ma lags par mi 'gyur te/_des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags la/_bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang 
[\[204a.7\]]lags pa de yang res 'ga' de bzhin nyid du 'gyur ba ma lags kyi/_rtag tu de bzhin nyid de kho na lags so/_/des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o/_/bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa dang /_chos thams 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang lags pa de ni yang dag pa ji lta ba dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid de/_des na bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe ci khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[204b.2\]]mthus bdag gi sems shes sam/_'on te rang gi shes pas shes smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor nyan thos rnams sam/_rang sangs rgyas rnams sam/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams sam/_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa gang yang rung ste/_sems can gzhan gyi sems shes 
[\[204b.3\]]pa de dag thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi mthus gzhan gyi sems shes pa lags so/_/de ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor gzhan gyi sems mkhyen pa gang lags pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi mthus mkhyen pa lags so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dper na zla ba dang /_nyi ma dang /_me dang /_nor bu 
[\[204b.4\]]dang /_mar me dang /_skar ma la brten nas skyes bu mig dang ldan pa rnams kyis gzugs rnams mthong ba de bzhin du btsun pa rab 'byor ma rig pa'i mun pa ni 'jig rten gnas pa las gang su dag pha rol gyi sems shes pa de dag thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa la brten nas shes 
[\[204b.5\]]pa lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod 'di lta bu'i spobs pa dang ldan pa khyod su yin pa dang /_ga las 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la 
[\[204b.6\]]'dri ste/_rigs kyi bu khyod su yin pa dang /_ga las 'ongs pa bdag la ston cig ces de skad smras na/_ji skad du lan 'debs par 'gyur/_smras pa/_che zhe cung zad kyang lan gdab tu med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid 
[\[204b.7\]]du shes na bdag gis ci zhig zhes su mchis/_gzhan yang gang zhig btsun pa rab 'byor la 'dri ste/_ci khyod so so'i skye bo yin nam/_'on te slob pa'am/_dgra bcom pa yin zhes de skad smras na/_lan ji skad gdab/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor sems pa la zhugs te/_che zhe 'di'i 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]lan ji skad gdab par bya snyam mo/_/de nas bar snang las btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis cung zad cig thob pa'am/_rtogs pa'am/_mngon sum du byas pa'am/_mngon par rtogs pa gang gis dgra bcom pa yin par shes pa de che zhe 'di la ston cig ces sgra byung 
[\[205a.2\]]ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bar snang de las sgra byung ba de thos nas bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe bdag ni so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/_slob pa yang ma yin/_dgra bcom pa yang ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar 
[\[205a.3\]]bgyi/_smras pa/_che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i gdags pa ji lta ba de bzhin du bdag la zung shig_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ni dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon gnas zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/
[\[205a.4\]]smras pa/_che zhe bdag ni dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang yon gnas ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na shes bzhin gyis [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]gsung bar mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_che zhe gal te bdag zag pa 
[\[205a.5\]]zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog dang /_yon gnas yin par 'dzin par gyur na ni de ltar na bdag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra bar 'gyur na/_gang gi phyir ba dag de ltar mi 'dzin pa de'i phyir ba dag ni yang dag par smra ba yin gyi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba zhes mi bya'o/_/smras 
[\[205a.6\]]pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor sgo gang 'dir lha bden pa mthong ba chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'dus pa rnams la slu bar mi 'gyur ram/_smras pa/_che zhe bden pa mthong ba gang dag yin pa de dag ni slu bar mi nus so/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gyis bden pa rnams gzigs sam/_
[\[205a.7\]]smras pa/_mthong ngo /_/smras pa/_gal te bden pa rnams mthong du rung na ni de dag bden pa ma lags par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bden pa rnams ni sus kyang mthong bar mi nus pa'i slad du'o/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_che zhe bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba de gang gi tshig 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bden pa mthong ba zhes bgyi ba de ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/bden pa mthong zhes bgyi ba de ni phyin ci log yang dag par mthong ba'i tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/smras pa/_che zhe khyod kyis 
[\[205b.2\]]gang las bsams te de skad smras/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor phyin ci log gis nyon mongs pa kun nas bslang ba gang lags pa de ni bden pa mthong bas skye bar 'gyur te/_des na phyin ci log yang dag par mthong bas bden pa mthong zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas sgo gang der 
[\[205b.3\]]chos mnyan pa'i phyir lha 'dus pa de dag gis gnas brtan rab 'byor la rags pa'i lus bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis che zhe 'di'i spobs pa thos pa de ni khyod kyis rnyed pa legs pa rnyed do/_/sems can gang dag gis bstan pa 'di thos 
[\[205b.4\]]nas mos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/_/gang dag mos pa de dag ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mos pa mang ba rnams ni gang las kyang rnam par grol ba med do/_/mos pa mang ba la ni 'ching ba med pas na de ni gang las kyang rnam 
[\[205b.5\]]par grol ba med do/_/de nas bud med des yang tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms la rgyur mi bzhud dam/_bshos bcad de ci bgyi/_smras pa/_che zhe bdag gi zas ni 'di nyid yin te/_chos mnyan pa 'di lta bus chog go/_/che zhe 
[\[205b.6\]]gang chos gos dang bsod snyoms kyi phyir yid mi bde ba skye ba de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no/_/gang rnyed pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_tshigs su bcad pa 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no/_/gang lus dang /_srog dang /_bsod snyoms 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa ma yin no/_/gang tha na
