[\[205b.7\]]legs so zhes bya ba 'dod pa de yang chos 'dod pa ma yin no/_/smras pa/_che zhe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag chos 'dod pa ji lta bu yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa la mi sred pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/_/gang mig dang gzugs mi 'dod pa dang /_rna ba dang /_
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]sgra dang /_sna dang /_dri dang /_lce dang /_ro dang /_lus dang /_reg bya dang /_yid dang /_chos mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/_/gang chos ci la yang mi rten pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang gang dag phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched mi 'dod pa 
[\[206a.2\]]de ni chos 'dod pa'o/_/gang 'dod pa dang /_gzugs dang /_gzugs med pa mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/_/gang dmigs pa'i mtshan ma la dmigs pa mi 'dod pa de ni chos 'dod pa'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe bzod 
[\[206a.3\]]par gyis shig_/bdag sgo gang 'di nas 'gro'o/_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor dper na sa'i khams la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi sems sa dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor chu la 
[\[206a.4\]]bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du gang gi sems chu dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du gang gi sems me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol 
[\[206a.5\]]mi 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gru dang /_stegs dang /_zam pa dang /_lam po che la bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du btsun pa rab 'byor gang gi sems gru dang /_stegs dang /_zam pa dang /_lam po che dang 'dra ba de la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa 
[\[206a.6\]]rab 'byor byis pa rnams la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi 'phags pa rnams la ni bzod pa gsol mi 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag la gnod sems dang /_khro ba dang /_bag la nyal skye ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/_gang dag la mi skye ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol 
[\[206a.7\]]mi 'tshal lo/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dper na me 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi 'tshal gyi/_me mi 'bar ba ni zhi bar bgyi mi 'tshal ba de bzhin du btsun pa rab 'byor gang dag gi nyon mongs pa 'bar ba de dag la ni bzod pa gsol 'tshal gyi/_gang dag nyon mongs pa med pa de dag la ni bzod pa 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]gsol mi 'tshal lo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod ci zhig 'dod na 'di ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrogs/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gang 'dod pa mchis pa des ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par mi nus so/_/gang dag ci yang mi 'dod pa 
[\[206b.2\]]de dag ni seng ge'i sgra sgrogs par bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_dmigs pa mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la/_gang la dmigs pa ma mchis pa de la ni seng ge'i sgra ci yang ma mchis so/_/'jig tshogs la lta ba mchis pa la ni 'dod pa mchis la/_gang la lta ba'i rnam pa ma mchis 
[\[206b.3\]]pa de la ni seng ge'i sgra ci yang ma mchis so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang ci zhig bzhed pa las len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_che zhe 'dod pa yod pa la ni rnam par grol ba ci yang med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 
[\[206b.4\]]gang bzhed pas len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol ba de bzhin du bdag kyang de lta bu'i 'jug pas zhugs so/_/bdag kyang de lta bu'i rnam par grol ba'i 'jug pas zhugs so/_/bdag kyang de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi 'jug pas zhugs so/_/de 
[\[206b.5\]]nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe theg pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa rnams dang /_rtags gang yin pa rnams dang /_mtshan ma gang dag yin pa 'di lta bu dag bdag la ston pa las na/_khyod ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin 
[\[206b.6\]]par the tsom med do/_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang /_mtshan ma rnams mkhyen tam/_smras pa/_che zhe nyan thos kyis ni ma thos par theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[206b.7\]]rnams shes par mi nus kyi/_che zhe theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang /_mtshan ma rnams shod cig_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba de ni chags pa ma mchis pa'i theg pa dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i ye shes dang /_tha dad pa ma mchis 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa'i ye shes kyi tshig [{]bla dgas [,]bla dwags [}]so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dper na las su 'gro ba'i lha'i bu rnams dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma'i gzhal med khang rnams ni sems can rnams la snang bar bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis pa dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang /_
[\[207a.2\]]rgyun mi 'chad par nam mkha' la shugs kyis mchi ba de bzhin du/_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams ni sems can thams cad la chos kyi snang ba bgyi ba'i slad du chags pa ma mchis pa dang /_sgrib pa ma mchis pa dang /_rgyun mi 
[\[207a.3\]]'chad par pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi shugs kyis mchi'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dper na gling bzhi ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i lags te/_de gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der gling bzhi pa'i mi rnams kyis bsten pa'i 'os su 'gyur ba lags la/_'khor los sgyur ba'i 
[\[207a.4\]]rgyal po yang sems can de dag la bsam pa mi mnyam pa'i rnam pa ma mchis te byams par bgyid pa de bzhin du/_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor 
[\[207a.5\]]dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang thams cad du gang dang gang du mchi ba de dang der sems can thams cad kyis bsten pa'i 'os su gyur pa lags la/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms shing tha dad du spyod pa ma mchis so/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsdu ba rnams bzhis sdud pa 
[\[207a.6\]]na sems can rnams la byams pa tha dad pa ma mchis te des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po zhes bgyi ba ni theg pa de che ba lags la/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci 
[\[207a.7\]]dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams dang /_mkhas pa rnams dang /_skyes bu dam pa rnams dang /_shes pa rnams dang /_yang dag par song ba rnams dang /_yang dag par zhugs pa rnams 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]kyis mchod pa lags te/_des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/theg pa de ni ma skyes pa'i phyir mi zad pa'o/_/theg pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad pa'o/_/theg pa de ni chos kyi rigs sdud pa'o/_/theg pa de ni dge 'dun gyi rigs yongs su 'dzin pa'o/_/theg pa de ni sems can 
[\[207b.2\]]thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing sgrib pa med pa'i phyir yangs pa'o/_/theg pa de ni phan ma mchis pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas pa'o/_/theg pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis shin tu sbyang ba byas pa'o/_/theg pa de ni bsdu ba rnam bzhis legs par bsdus pa'o/_/theg 
[\[207b.3\]]pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir shin tu yang dag par song ba'o/_/theg pa de ni zhi gnas dang /_lhag mthong bsgoms pas bzhon pa bzang po ldan pa'o/_/theg pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i phyir kha lo 
[\[207b.4\]]sgyur ba bzang po'i gnas so/_/theg pa de ni snying rje chen pos shin tu brtan pa'o/_/theg pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis legs par gnas pa'o/_/theg pa de ni bdud thams cad pham par byas pas 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o/_/theg pa de ni shes rab kyi snang ba yang 
[\[207b.5\]]dag par ston pa'i phyir mun pa dang bral ba'o/_/theg pa de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sdud cing sogs pas shin tu 'byor ba'o/_/theg pa de ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bgyis pa'o/_theg pa de ni phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mi rdzi ba'o/_/theg pa de ni 
[\[207b.6\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba'o/_/theg pa de ni ma dad pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni sdang ba rnams byams par bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni ser sna can rnams kyi gtong ba bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni tshul khrims 'chal 
[\[207b.7\]]pa rnams kyi tshul khrims bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa rnams kyi bzod pa bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni le lo can rnams kyi brtson 'grus bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni brjed ngas pa rnams dran par bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni sems rnam par g.yengs 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]pa rnams nye bar zhi bar bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams kyi shes rab bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni dbul po rnams kyi nor bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni sdug bsngal ba rnams bde bar bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni mkhas pa rnams mchog 
[\[208a.2\]]tu dga' bar bgyid pa'o/_/theg pa de ni shes pa rnams dang bar bgyid pa ste/_des na theg pa chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod kyis theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang /_mtshan 
[\[208a.3\]]ma rnams legs par smras so/_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor theg pa chen po'i rnam pa rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang /_mtshan ma rnams ni bskal pa'am/_de bas ches lhag par bdag gis bshad du lags kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[208a.4\]]rab 'byor theg pa chen po ji ltar tshad ma mchis pa de bzhin du rnam pa rnams dang /_rtags rnams dang /_mtshan ma rnams kyang tshad ma mchis so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod kyis bdag la khyod ci zhig 'dod 
[\[208a.5\]]de bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed ces glags btsal ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi mnga' bdag nyid kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad na khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la yang de'i glags btsal lam/_bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs 
[\[208a.6\]]pa thabs gang gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad pa mkhyen pa lta na de spobs par mdzod cig_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_che zhe de bzhin gshegs pa thabs ji lta bu zhig gis bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad/_bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa ni don 
[\[208a.7\]]gyi dbang nyi shu rtsa gcig gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad de/_nyi shu rtsa gcig po gang zhe na/_gzugs kyi sku bzang po bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad de/_der sems can gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyes bu chen po'i mtshan 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan pa rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa mthong ba de dag_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan 'thob par bgyi ba'i phyir/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[208b.2\]]gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du bsod snyoms la gshegs na sems can long ba rnams kyis ni gzugs rnams mthong bar 'gyur/_sems can 'on 
[\[208b.3\]]pa rnams kyis ni sgra thos par 'gyur/_sems can smyon pa rnams kyis ni dran pa rnyed par 'gyur/_sems can gcer bu rnams kyis ni gos rnyed par 'gyur/_sems can bkres pa rnams kyis ni zas rnyed par 'gyur/_sems can skom pa rnams kyis ni btung ba rnyed par 'gyur la/_
[\[208b.4\]]sems can su la yang 'dod chags sam/_zhe sdang ngam/_gti mug dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna dang /_khro ba dang /_rgyags pa dang /_'chab pa dang /_yongs su gdung ba'i gnod pa ma mchis so/_/sems can thams cad byams pa'i sems dang ldan te gcig la gcig 
[\[208b.5\]]pha ma'i 'du shes skyed par 'gyur te/_der sems can mang pos de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du gshegs pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[208b.6\]]gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal du gshegs na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' 
[\[208b.7\]]lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams mchod pa'i las bgyi ba'i slad du phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/_der sangs rgyas kyi mthus mi rnams kyis lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bgyid pa mthong nas de dag de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa skye ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni ngo mtshar 
[\[209a.2\]]che ba nas rmad du byung ba'i bar gyi chos dang ldan no snyam ste/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la 'dod pa bskyed nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod 
[\[209a.3\]]snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mthong na sems can dpag tu med pa longs spyod dang dbang phyug gis rgyags shing myos pa dang /_gzugs dang /_rigs dang /_'tsho ba dang /_nad med pas rgyags shing myos 
[\[209a.4\]]pa 'di rnams 'di snyam du sems te/_'di 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid bor nas rab tu byung zhing bsod snyoms la rgyu zhes grags te/_des kyang 'di ltar nga rgyal bcom na/_kye ma bdag cag gis kyang nga rgyal gzhom par bya'o snyam ste/_de dag gis de lta bu mthong nas bla na med pa yang 
[\[209a.5\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba na/_lha gzi 
[\[209a.6\]]byin che ba gzi byin che ba rnams kyis dgongs pa la bltas nas 'di skad du 'di la ni bkres pa dang /_skom pa'i gnod pa yang med la/_lus nyam chung ba yang med kyi/_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba ched cher byas nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad kyis/_bdag cag kyang de bzhin 
[\[209a.7\]]du sems can rnams la snying brtse ba ched cher bya ba'i sems kyis bsod snyoms la rgyu bar bya'o zhes smra zhing de dag gis de lta bu mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang sems can le lo can snyom las can de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /_phyag 'tshal ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mi mchi ba de dag de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du gshegs 
[\[209b.2\]]na 'bad mi 'tshal bar mthong bar 'gyur la/_mthong nas kyang dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba chen po 'thob par 'gyur te/_dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[209b.3\]]gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong na don yod pa ste/_tha na sems can gang dag gis sems kyi skad cig gcig tsam la zhi ba'i mig gis de bzhin gshegs 
[\[209b.4\]]pa mthong na yang de 'ba' zhig gis kyang de dag thams cad kyi yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar gyi rgyur 'gyur te/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin 
[\[209b.5\]]gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du gshegs na sems can bcing pas bcings pa rnams bcing ba las grol bar 'gyur la/_de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus bdag cag bcing ba 'di dag las grol bar gyur to/_/zhes shes te de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo 
[\[209b.6\]]ba dang /_byas pa tshor bar gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[209b.7\]]kyi bu mo de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa thos na/_kye ma ma la bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms dbul bar bya'o/_/chos gos dbul ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur stir bya ba ci yang rung bas mchod pa bya'o snyam du sems pa de lta bu dag mchis 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]la de dag las kyang mas bsrungs pa'am/_phas bsrungs pa'am/_ming pos bsrungs pa'am/_phu nu mos bsrungs pa'am/_khyim thab kyis bsrungs pa'am/_mdza' bos bsrungs pa rnams de dang de'i rkyen gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du mchi mi nus te/_de 
[\[210a.2\]]dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du gshegs pa mthong na tshim zhing mgu la rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa la bsod snyoms dbul bar bgyid do/_/phul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[210a.3\]]tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis lhung bzed phul nas de bzhin gshegs 
[\[210a.4\]]pas bzhes pa mchis te/_der sems can longs spyod chung ba dang /_chung ngu sbyin par 'tshal ba gang dag lags pa de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed gang bar mthong ngo /_/sems can longs spyod che zhing mang du sbyin par 'tshal ba gang dag lags pa de dag 
[\[210a.5\]]gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed ma gang bar mthong nas de dag gis ji tsam dgos pa phul te/_lhung bzed gang bar bgyis nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas 
[\[210a.6\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi nang du bca' ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_myang bar bya ba ro brgya dang ldan pa blugs na/_bca' ba dang /_bza' ba dang /_myang bar bya ba de dag 'dre bar mi 'gyur te/_ji ltar snod 
[\[210a.7\]]tha dad pa'i nang na mchis pa de kho na bzhin du mchis te/_der lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi cho 'phrul de lta bu mthong nas bla na 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi nang du dge slong thams cad kyi 
[\[210b.2\]]zas blugs kyang des lhung bzed de ma gang ba 'am/_gang bar yang mi 'gyur te/_der lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po mang po dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i lhung bzed kyi cho 'phrul de lta 
[\[210b.3\]]bu mthong ste ngo mtshar du gyur nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni gcig tu 
[\[210b.4\]]mkhregs shing khong stong ma lags la rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la pho ba 'am/_long ka yang mi mnga'/_phyis yang mi mnga'/_gcin yang mi mnga' mod kyi/_'on kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba dang /_bshos gsol ba de ltar yang gda' la khong du 
[\[210b.5\]]mid pa yang mi mnga' ste/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa mang po dag gis de mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed 
[\[210b.6\]]par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad de/_btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer du gshegs na sems can mang po dag gis bsod snyoms mang po 'am/_
[\[210b.7\]]nyung ngu'am/_bzang po 'am/_ngan pa yang rung ste/_dbul bar bgyid la/_sems can de dag gis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan rnams mthar thug par bgyid mi nus te/_lha dang mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa mang po dag kyang nyams su myong bar 'gyur 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]la yon tan de yang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du bas par mi 'gyur te/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag tu mnyam par 
[\[211a.2\]]bzhag pa ste ting nge 'dzin las nyams pa mi mnga' la/_der tshangs pa 'am/_de ma yin pa'i gzugs na spyod pa'i lha gzi byin che ba gzi byin che ba rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi g.yo ba mthong na de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_'di 
[\[211a.3\]]ni sems can gyi don la brtson pa yin gyi/_zas 'dod pa ma yin par the tsom med do snyam nas de dag dga' ba thob nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par bgyid de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad 
[\[211a.4\]]do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gal te de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mi mdzad de/_zhal zas kyang mi gsol bar gyur na ni de lta na rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de dag kyang zas mi 
[\[211a.5\]]za ba la zhugs te/_bdag cag kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu bar mi bya/_zas kyang bza' bar mi bya'o snyam nas de dag kyang bkres shing nyam chung bar gyur pas khyad par thob par rtogs par mi nus te/_de dag gis ma 'ongs pa na khyad par 'thob pa'i bsam pa rdzogs par mdzad pa'i 
[\[211a.6\]]phyir yang de bzhin gshegs pa bsod snyoms la rgyu zhing gsol bar mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'phags pa'i rigs rnams 
[\[211a.7\]]yang dag par yongs su gzung ba'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ni skye bo phyi ma rnams la thugs brtse ba'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu ste/_phyi ma'i dus na bram ze dang /_khyim bdag ma dad pa rnams 'di skad du gal te 'di dag 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]gi ston pa nyid kyis kyang bsod snyoms la rgyu ba ma byas na 'di dag ci'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byed ces de dag dge slong dang /_dge slong ma rnams la shas cher mi dga' bar mi 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir ro/_/de bas na de dag kyang 'di snyam du sems te/_'di dag gi ston pas kyang 
[\[211b.2\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu bar byas na 'di dag ci'i phyir bsod snyoms la rgyu bar mi byed snyam ste/_de dag gis bsngags pa yang rjod par bgyid la/_bsod snyoms yang ster bar 'gyur te/_'di skad du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba 'di ni gtsug lag las 'byung ba'i bsod snyoms yin no/_/
[\[211b.3\]]spyod pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas bsngags pa yin no zhes kyang smra bar 'gyur te/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_khyim 
[\[211b.4\]]bdag dang /_blon po'i bu rnams las legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ba de dag_/bdag cag ni 'di ltar rigs chen por skyes pa yin na/_zas kyi phyir khyim nas khyim du bsod snyoms la ci'i phyir rgyu bar bya snyam ste/_ngo tsha nas 
[\[211b.5\]]bsod snyoms la rgyu bar mi bgyid pa de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsod snyoms dang /_gzi byin dang ldan pa'i sku'i rjes su slob cing bsod snyoms la rgyu bar 'gyur te/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/
[\[211b.6\]]btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis ni 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad 'tshal te/_ji lta ji ltar sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar 'thun par mdzad de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod 
[\[211b.7\]]snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa la ni sgrib pa'am/_skyems pa yang mi mnga'/_nyam chung ba yang mi mnga'/_chags pa yang mi mnga'/_chags par 'gyur ba yang mi mnga'/_sdig pa bzhed pa yang ma lags/_sogs pa yang 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]mi mnga' mod kyi/_'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i slad du bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad de/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin 
[\[212a.2\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis don gyi dbang de gzigs nas bsod snyoms la rgyu ba mdzad na/_btsun pa rab 'byor de lta bu'i thabs dang de lta bu'i snying rje chen po dang /_de lta bu'i don yongs su dag pa su bsod snyoms la rgyu bar spyod dam/_smras 
[\[212a.3\]]pa/_che zhe bdag gis ni 'di mi nus te/_che zhe dper na khyi dang byi la thams cad kyis ri'i rgyal po ri rab gzhig par mi nus pa dang /_wa thams cad kyis [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge la bskal pa'i bar du yang mthu rtsal lam sgra bsgrags pa bstan par mi nus pa de bzhin du/_che zhe nyan 
[\[212a.4\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la spyod pa'am/_thabs sam/_snying rje chen po bstan par mi nus so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs la mkhas pa dang /_bsod snyoms la rgyu ba'i gtam bstan pa 'di bshad pa na khyim bdag de'i nang 
[\[212a.5\]]mi de dag dang /_khyim gzhan dag nas chos mnyan du 'ongs pa rnams kyi nang nas mi nyis stong brgyad brgyas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod kyi khyim thab 
[\[212a.6\]]da lta ga la 'dug_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gi khyim thab ni gcig pur ma bas so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor sems can ji snyed dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni bdag gi khyim thab lags 
[\[212a.7\]]so/_/smras pa/_che zhe de bzhin gshegs pas ni su la yang 'dod pa'i dga' ba gnang ba med do/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pas ni dge slong gang rkyen du 'tshal ba'i chos gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]sman zong dang /_mdza' bshes kyi khyim dang /_bsod snyoms ster ba'i khyim bsten cing bsnyen pa dang /_grogs po dga' bar bya ba dang /_mkhan po dang slob dpon bsten pa dang /_bsnyen pa dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba kun tu bsten par byed pa de la yang dge ba'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[212b.2\]]mi dge ba'i chos 'grib par 'gyur ba gsungs so/_/smras pa/_che zhe de ni khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bas na de bzhin gshegs pas ni thabs de lta bus sems can rnams la 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad gnang ngo /_/smras pa/_che zhe khyod kyis dga' ba 
[\[212b.3\]]bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can ji snyed btul smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi skar ma'i gzugs rnams ni bgrang ba'i tshul gyis mtha' rtogs par nus kyi/_bdag gis dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems 
[\[212b.4\]]can btul te/_btul nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa gang dag lags pa de dag la ni de ltar mi nus so/_/smras pa/_che zhe khyod sems can de dag la dga' ba ji lta bu dag stobs par byed/_bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor sems can tshangs 
[\[212b.5\]]pa'i dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis te/_btsun pa rab 'byor de dag la ni bdag tshangs par 'gyur ba thob par bgyi ba'i slad du tshad med pa'i bsam gtan gyi dga' ba stobs par bgyid de/_bstabs nas kyang de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud par bgyid do/_/btsun 
[\[212b.6\]]pa rab 'byor sems can brgya byin gyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis te/_de dag la ni bdag brgya byin gyi dga' ba stobs par bgyid de/_bstabs nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud par bgyid do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor sems can lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin 
[\[212b.7\]]dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis te/_de dag la ni bdag lto 'phye chen po'i bar gyi dga' ba stobs par bgyid de bstabs nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud par bgyid do/_/
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]btsun pa rab 'byor sems can 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid kyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis so/_/blon po dang /_grong rdal gyi mi dang /_yul gyi mi dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs kyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis so/_/
[\[213a.2\]]sems can gzugs dang /_sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg pa'i dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis so/_/sems can me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog_/phreng ba dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_rnga yab kyi dga' ba 
[\[213a.3\]]la mos pa dag kyang mchis so/_/sems can gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai dUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_shel dang /_mu tig dmar po dang /_byi ru dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_spug dang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang 
[\[213a.4\]]mchis so/_/sems can rnga bo che dang /_rdza rnga dang /_dung dang /_khar rnga dang /_pi bang dang /_gling bu dang /_rol mo'i sgra rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dga' ba la mos pa dag kyang mchis te/_btsun pa rab 'byor sems can de dag la yang bdag gis bsam pa thams cad dang /_dga' ba dang /_rtsed mo 
[\[213a.5\]]thams cad stobs par bgyid de/_bstabs nas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la 'dzud par bgyid do/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_che zhe 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi bar du gcod pa yin na/_ji ltar de dag bstabs pas 'dul bar 'gyur te/_
[\[213a.6\]]gnas 'di phan tshun mi 'thun pa yin no/_/che zhe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'phags pa'i lam la bar du gcod par byed pa'i chos gang kho na yin pa de dag nyid kyis sems can rnams 'dul bar byed pa ni dka' bar byed pa ste ngo mtshar to//_//bam po 
[\[213a.7\]]gnyis pa ste tha ma/_de nas bud med des dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas pa'i tshong dpon gyi bu gnyis chos mnyan pa'i phyir sgo gang der 'dus par gyur te/_de gnyis kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor rang gi shes rab kyis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab sad par ma mdzad cig_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du dgongs/_'bru mar gyi mar me chung ngu gang lags pa de kha'i dbugs sam/_lag pas g.yabs pa'am/_
[\[213b.2\]]gos kyis g.yabs pa'i rlung gis zhi bar mdzad spyod dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag 'bru mar gyi mar me chung ngu gang yin pa de ni kha'i dbugs sam/_lag pas g.yabs pa'am/_gos kyis g.yabs pa'i rlung gis zhi bar byed nus so/_/de gnyis kyis smras pa/_btsun pa 
[\[213b.3\]]rab 'byor de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo'i shes rab kyi snang ba dang /_bsod nams kyi snang ba chung ngu de ni 'dod pa'i rtog pa gcig gis kyang ma mchis par bgyid do/_/btsun pa rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du dgongs/_sreg pa'i bskal pa'i me'i 
[\[213b.4\]]phung po gang lags pa de gang gA'i klung chus gang bas zhi bar mdzad spyod dam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu dag de ni rgya mtsho 'bum gyis kyang zhi bar mi nus na gang gA'i klung chus yongs su gang bas lta ci smos/_de gnyis kyis smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub 
[\[213b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi snang ba dang /_bsod nams kyi snang ba yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas rtse zhing dga' la dga' 
[\[213b.6\]]dgur spyod kyang /_de dag gis byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi snang ba dang /_bsod nams kyi snang ba zad par mi nus so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dper na mi dbul po nad pa gso zhing nad zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du sman pas sman mngar ba dang /_skyur ba dang /_lan tshwa'i ro dang /_tsha ba dang /_kha ba 
[\[213b.7\]]dang /_bska ba las mod pa dang /_rin chung ba gang lags pa de dag stsol bar bgyid do/_/des kyang bdag bde ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du de dag bsten par bgyid do/_/de dag bsten pas nad chung ba'i slad du nad de las thar bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_btsun pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyi 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]theg pa pa sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa dang /_'dod pa nyung ba dang /_dgon pa na gnas pa dang /_chog shes pa dang /_longs spyod chung ba dang /_bya ba nyung bas sdug bsngal thams cad nyams su myong nas/_de'i 'og tu len pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 
[\[214a.2\]]'da' bar 'gyur te/_btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bgyi ste/_ji ltar mi dbul po gso ba de bzhin du nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rnam par grol ba yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dper na rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po spyi bo nas dbang 
[\[214a.3\]]bskur ba nad pa gso ba'i phyir sman pas rgyal po la 'os pa'i sman kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dri phun sum tshogs pa dang /_ro phun sum tshogs pa dang khar bcug na yang zhim la ltor song na yang bde ba de lta bu legs par sbyar nas sbyin par bgyid de rgyal po la 'os pa'i khu bcud do cog kyang 
[\[214a.4\]]de la sbyin par bgyid do/_/rgyal po de yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du yang me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams de la 'bul bar bgyid do/_/sil snyan dang /_pheg rdob pa rnams kyang de dang 'thun par sbyor zhing glu len par bgyid do/_/de ji 
[\[214a.5\]]tsam du dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag gis dga' bar gyur pa de tsam du nad de las thar bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_btsun pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' kha cig dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dga' ba thams cad kyang myong la/_bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i theg 
[\[214a.6\]]pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bu dag kyang mchis te/_btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bgyi ste/_ji ltar rgyal po gso ba de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes mngon par 
[\[214a.7\]]rtogs pa yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang rtsa ba ma mchis pa dang /_gnas ma mchis pa lags la/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rtsa ba ma mchis pa dang /_gnas ma mchis pa lags te/_de lta bur bzod pa gang 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]lags pa des ni bdag gis bya ba ni gang yin/_mi bya ba ni gang yin snyam du rang gis 'tshal to/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga mi dmigs pa lags te gang gis de lta bur bzod pa des ni lam ni gang yin lam ngan pa ni gang yin snyam du rang gis 'tshal to/_/'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yang stong 
[\[214b.2\]]la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang stong ste/_gang gis de lta bur bzod pa des ni 'dod pa rnams las bzlog mi 'tshal te de ni rang nyid kyis 'dod pa rnams la smod par bgyid de ston par mi bgyid do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshong dpon gyi bu de gnyis la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[214b.3\]]so/_/che zhe 'di rigs kyi bu khyed gnyis kyi cir 'ong /_de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de gnyis kyis de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/'di ni pha lags ma yang lags/_/'di ni mdza' bo grogs mchog 'di/_/'di ni khyo lags 
[\[214b.4\]]'khra sa lags/_/'di ni ston pa bla na med/_/'di ni nyid kyi mthu stobs kyi/_/'di ni yongs su grol bar bgyis/_/'di ni de bzhin nyid ldan pas/_/sdug bsngal 'ching las bdag cag bkrol/_/'di ni chos kun ston pa ste/_/rigs pa kun gyis rnam par rtogs/_/
[\[214b.5\]]bdag cag gnyis ni dga' byin nas/_/'chi ba med la legs par btsud/_/ji ltar nya ni shas g.yogs pa'i/_/mchil pa yis ni bzung ba ltar/_/'dis ni thabs kyis bdag cag gnyis/_/bsod nams brgyas ni bcus par gyur/_/gdug pa'i sbrul gyis 
[\[214b.6\]]zin pa yi/_/dug ni dug gis zhi bgyid ltar/_/de bzhin 'dis ni bdag cag gi/_/'dod chags dug ni dug gis bcom/_/ji ltar mi ni mes tshig pa/_/me yis bsros na zhi ba ltar/_/de bzhin rang gi nyon mongs gdung /_/nyon mongs rnams kyis yongs su bkrol/_/
[\[214b.7\]]bdag cag gnyis kyis dam chos rtogs/_/'dod pa bdag cag gnyis mi 'tshal/_/byis pa gang dag 'dod pa 'tshal/_/de dag byang chub 'dod ma lags/_/'jig rten 'dod par gsungs pa rnams/_/de dag 'jigs chen gshed ma ste/_/de dag nyid ni yongs rtogs 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]pa/_/mkhas pa rnams kyi rnam grol lags/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe ci khyod kyis rigs kyi bu rnams kho na dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa 'dis 'dul bar byed dam/_'on te rigs kyi 
[\[215a.2\]]bu mo dag kyang 'dul bar byed/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis ni dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can thams cad gang yang 'dul bar mi bgyid pa ma mchis te/_btsun pa rab 'byor bud med kyi sems ni lhag par yang dga' ba la sred pas na bdag gis ni 
[\[215a.3\]]bud med chos mang du dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas btul gyi skyes pa dag ni de lta ma lags so/_/smras pa/_che zhe khyod kyis ji ltar bud med kyi gzugs kyis bud med 'dul bar byed/_de nas bud med des de'i tshe skyes pa lo nyi shu rtsa gnyis lon pa/_gos gtsang ma srab 
[\[215a.4\]]mo bgos pa/_skyes pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/_mdzes shing blta na sdug la kha dog rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa ci 'dra ba de lta bur snang bar byas nas des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor bud med ni gzugs kyi lus 'di lta bus 'dul bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 
[\[215a.5\]]gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci khyod bud med yin nam/_'on te skyes pa yin/_des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ci khyod so so'i skye bo'am/_'on te slob pa lags/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag ni so so'i skye bo yang ma yin/_slob pa yang ma yin no/_/smras 
[\[215a.6\]]pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor ba dag kyang de bzhin te/_bud med kyang ma lags/_skyes pa yang ma lags so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_gal te khyod skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin na bdag gis khyod ji ltar gzung bar bya/_smras pa/_gal te btsun pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[215a.7\]]yang ma lags/_slob pa yang ma lags na bdag gis khyod ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni shes rab zab mo dang ldan te gal te bdag gis brtsams na ni yang bdag la 'dri bar 'ong ngo snyam 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]mo/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis brtags nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ni brtan po ma lags te 'dri bas skrag gis/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'dri bas skrag par ma mdzad cig_/smras 
[\[215b.2\]]pa/_bdag ni dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa'o/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor zag pa zad pa de dag gang lags/_ci 'das pa rnams lags sam/_ma 'ongs pa rnams lags sam/_da ltar byung ba rnams lags sam/_'das pa gang lags pa de dag zad ces bgyir ni 
[\[215b.3\]]'das pa la zad pa ma mchis so/_/ma 'ongs pa gang lags pa de dag kyang da dung ma phyin pa ste/_de dag kyang zad par bgyir mi nus so/_/da ltar byung ba gang lags pa de dag ni mi gnas pa ste/_de dag kyang zad par bgyir mi nus so/_/rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag gis 
[\[215b.4\]]ni 'dri ba thams cad kyi lan gdab par mi nus pa'i steng du bsod snyoms kyi dus la bab ste bdag gi dus yol du 'ong gis bsod snyoms la 'gro'o/_/de nas de'i tshe rigs kyi bu de byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs 
[\[215b.5\]]so/_/rigs kyi bu de snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med grangs med pa dag mthong ste/_la lar ni nyi ma 'char ka tsam/_la lar ni nyi ma bag dros tsam/_la lar ni dros bu chung tsam/_la lar ni snga dro phyed tsam/_la lar ni dro la 
[\[215b.6\]]bab tu nye ba'i dus tsam/_la lar ni gaN+DI rdung ba'i dus tsam/_la lar ni snga ma bkad pa tsam/_la lar ni bkad zin pa tsam/_la lar ni zan za zhing 'dug pa tsam/_la lar ni ldang ba tsam/_la lar ni lhung bzed 'khru ba tsam/_la lar ni phyed yol gyi dus tsam/_la lar ni 
[\[215b.7\]]phyem red kyi dus tsam/_la lar ni srod tsam/_la lar ni nam phyed tsam/_la lar ni nam chung 'khor tsam/_la lar ni zla ba dang nyi ma med de rang gi 'od dang ldan par mthong ngo /_/de nas rigs kyi bu des gnas brtan rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]'byor khyod dus tshod gang gi tshe bshos gsol/_dus tshod ni ji tsam du gda'/_rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag ni 'di nyid kyi dus tshod la zan za'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gyi dus tshod la ma yin no/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des de'i tshe nyi ma'i dkyil 
[\[216a.2\]]'khor nub phyogs su song ba de snga dro'i phyed tsam du bzhag ste/_ci nas snga dro'i phyed tsam du 'dzin par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'dus byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor dus tshod 
[\[216a.3\]]ji tsam la bab pa gzigs shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis mthong nas yid ches te mi ring bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi ming ci yin bdag la ston cig_/rigs kyi bu des smras pa/_
[\[216a.4\]]btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la bdag gi ming gis ci zhig bgyi/_/yang na de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la zhus shig dang de khyod la lan 'debs so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor gzhan yang ming thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_ming thams cad ni kun brtags pa dang /_
[\[216a.5\]]yang dag pa ma lags pa ste/_gang kun brtags pa dang /_yang dag pa ma lags pa de la ming 'di zhes ji skad bgyi/_btsun pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/_ci thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming gang yin pa de yang kun brtags pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa yin nam/_smras pa/_
[\[216a.6\]]btsun pa rab 'byor de ni de bzhin te/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming phan tshun tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ming tha dad pa ji lta bu yin/_smras 
[\[216a.7\]]pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sangs rgyas kyi zhing la lar ni mthu zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni sdud pa zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni thams cad du snang ba zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni dri ma med pa zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni don thams cad ston pa zhes bgyi'o/_/
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]la lar ni nyams pa med pa zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni mchod pa po zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni mngon sum pa zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni byi ru 'dzin ces bgyi'o/_/la lar ni rnam par rgyal ba chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni sgra chen po zhes bgyi'o/_/la lar ni dpag tu ma 
[\[216b.2\]]mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ltar na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming tha dad pa dpag tu ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du gzugs dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i 
[\[216b.3\]]ming tha dad pa yang dpag tu ma mchis so/_/de bzhin du phung po rnams dang /_khams rnams dang /_skye mched rnams dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang /_yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang /_dbang po rnams dang /_stobs rnams dang /_byang chub 
[\[216b.4\]]kyi yan lag rnams dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan dag na ming tha dad pa dpag tu ma mchis te/_de bas na btsun pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang ming thams cad ni ming ma mchis pa dang /_kun brtags pa 
[\[216b.5\]]dang /_yang dag pa ma lags pa de ltar rig par bgyi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i khab kyi bram ze dang khyim bdag rnams ni de na yon gnas 'di lta bu dag 'khod pa las na rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no/_/
[\[216b.6\]]rigs kyi bu des smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor 'jig rten na yon gnas gang lags pa mkhyen tam/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ji ltar bdag gis spobs pa de bzhin du bstan par bya ste/_tshul khrims dang ldan pa/_dge ba'i chos la zhugs pa/_sems 'khrul pa med pa gang yin pa de 
[\[216b.7\]]dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ji skad bstan pa de dag ni yon gnas yongs su rdzogs pa ma lags so/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu yon gnas yongs su rdzogs pa ji lta bu yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor sems can 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]thams cad la byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po yang skye la sems can gang yang mi dmigs pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi tshul mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 
[\[217a.2\]]'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/_/sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba la brtson pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/_/ye shes mi zad pa dang /_shes rab mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams mi zad pa dang /_spobs pa mi 
[\[217a.3\]]zad pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/_/so so'i skye bo'i grogs mi bgyid la 'phags pa'i grogs bgyid pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/_/gang dag mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi ye shes mthong ba 
[\[217a.4\]]rnam par dag par 'gyur ba gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'jig rten na yon gnas lags so/_/de nas gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang ba'i lha nges pa la ma zhugs pa gang yin pa des yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[217a.5\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol te/_btsun pa rab 'byor ba dag khyod kyi slad bzhin du 'brang bar mi bgyid do zhes byas so/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des lha de la 'di skad ces smras 
[\[217a.6\]]so/_/lha khyod ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol/_smras pa/_rigs kyi bu bdag lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du btsun pa rab 'byor gyi phyi bzhin 'brangs kyang /_bdag gis yon gnas kyis bstan pa 'di lta bu sngon chad ma thos te/_de bas na da ltar yon gnas 
[\[217a.7\]]kyis bstan pa 'di thos nas bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas bdag 'di snyam du sems te/_gang dang gang na yon gnas kyis yongs su dag par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sdud par byed pa'i chos 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]'di lta bu dag thos par 'gyur ba de dang der 'gro'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor lha de'i sems bskyed pa de la rjes su yi rangs nas lha de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha khyod kyi sems sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po dag la btud pa de ni rnyed pa legs par rnyed do/_/lha 
[\[217b.2\]]bdag ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la sems snad par gyur te/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi snod du ma gyur pas ci byar yang med do/_/lha gal te bdag sems rnam par grol bar ma gyur na ni bdag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa zhig 
[\[217b.3\]]mod/_lha gzhan yang khyod kyis ni sngon ma thos pa'i chos rnams thos par byed pa dang /_thos pa rnams kyang chud mi za bar byed pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsten par bya'o/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des lha de la 'di 
[\[217b.4\]]skad ces smras so/_/lha bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ni 'grub par dka' ste/_de ni go cha ngan ngon tsam gyis mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so/_/lhas smras pa/_skyes bu dam pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'grub par dka' ba yin mod 
[\[217b.5\]]kyi/_'on kyang ci nas bdag gis btsal ba don yod par 'gyur bar bdag gis bsgrub par bya'o/_/smras pa/_lha khyod kyis ji ltar bsgrub par bya/_smras pa/_sems can thams cad la sems snyoms par bya ba dang /_sems can thams cad nyon mongs pa las rab tu grol bar bya ba 
[\[217b.6\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer ba dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad rtogs par bya ba'i phyir de ltar bsgrub par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu des smras pa/_lha sems can du 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad la sems 
[\[217b.7\]]snyoms pa med do/_/nyon mongs par 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad rab tu grol bar byed pa med do/_/phung por 'du shes pa la ni sems can thams cad kyi phung po'i khur khyer ba med do/_/kun brtags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba can la ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]med do/_/bdag dang gzhan du 'du shes pa la ni sdug bsngal thams cad rtogs par byed pa med do/_/de nas lha de gdams ngag 'di bstan pas 'thun pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob bo/_/de nas lha des rigs kyi bu de la mchod pa'i las bya ba'i phyir 
[\[218a.2\]]sgo gang der lha'i me tog sil mas gtor to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lha de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gis khyod kyi bsam pa ma shes nas nyan thos kyi chos rnams kyi gtam byas te dga' ba skyed pa de khyod kyis kyang bzod pa gyis shig_/de nas lha 
[\[218a.3\]]des 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal gyis sems can su'i tshod kyang ma 'dzin cig_/sems can su la yang rung ste bsam pa ma brtags par chos ma 'chad cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa rab 'byor ma thos pa ni sla'i byang chub 
[\[218a.4\]]'dod pas nyan thos kyi theg pa thos pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/btsun pa rab 'byor yun ring du bkres pa ni sla'i kha zas dug dang 'dres pa zos pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/btsun pa rab 'byor de bzhin du ma thos pa ni sla'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pas nyan thos kyi theg pa thos pa ni de lta 
[\[218a.5\]]ma yin no/_/de nas rigs kyi bu des yang bud med kyi gzugs dang /_kha dog snga ma ji lta ba de bzhin du bstan nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bdag gis bsod snyoms ma phul gyi bar du re zhig gzhes shig_/de nas bud med de rang 
[\[218a.6\]]gi khyim du song ste/_ro brgya dang ldan pa'i zas blangs nas phyir byung ste/_'ongs nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms 'di bzhes la 'dod chags dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig_/'dod chags dang bral bar yang ma mdzad 
[\[218a.7\]]cig_/zhe sdang dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig_/zhe sdang dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig_/gti mug dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig_/gti mug dang bral bar yang ma mdzad cig_/nyon mongs pa dang bcas par yang ma mdzad cig_/nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]yang ma mdzad cig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sdug bsngal yongs su ma mkhyen/_kun 'byung ba ma spangs/_'gog pa mngon sum du ma bgyis/_lam ma bsgoms na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa 
[\[218b.2\]]bzhi ma bsgoms/_yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /_dbang po lnga dang /_stobs lnga dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma bsgoms na/_de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun 
[\[218b.3\]]pa rab 'byor gyis 'jig tshogs kyang ma dkrugs la bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam yang thob na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis ma rig pa ma bshig par rig pas rnam par grol ba mngon sum du mdzad pa dang /_'du byed zad par 
[\[218b.4\]]ma mdzad par 'dus ma byas mngon sum du mdzad pa dang /_rnam par shes pa'i rgyu ba la ma brten par rnam par grol bar gyur pa dang /_ming dang gzugs su sgro ma btags par khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa dang /_skye mched drug la ma brten par rnam par 
[\[218b.5\]]thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid bsgoms pa dang /_mig gi 'dus te reg pa la ma brten par rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa bsgoms pa dang /_tshor ba ma dmigs par rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa mngon sum du mdzad pa dang /_sred pa mi dmigs par de 
[\[218b.6\]]bzhin nyid yongs su mkhyen pa dang /_len pa rlom sems su ma mdzad par len pa med pa kun mkhyen pa dang /_srid pa mi 'byung ba'i tshul du yongs su mkhyen pa dang /_skye ba mi skye bar yongs su mkhyen pa dang /_rga shi brjod du med pa'i tshul du yongs su mkhyen pa 
[\[218b.7\]]de lta bur srid pa'i yan lag rnams kun mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis sangs rgyas kyang ma gzigs/_chos kyang ma gsan/_dge 'dun la yang mi rton na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]pa rab 'byor gyis 'phags pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis so so'i skye bo mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor nyid 'di nas kyang med par gyur la pha rol tu yang mi skye na de lta na bsod 
[\[219a.2\]]snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug mnyam pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen la/_nyon mongs pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis kyang 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti 
[\[219a.3\]]mug mnyam pa nyid du yongs su mkhyen na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor so so'i skye bo'i sa las kyang ma 'das la 'phags pa'i sa la yang ma zhugs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor snang ba yang 
[\[219a.4\]]ma lags/_snang bar 'gro ba yang ma lags/_'khor ba la yang ma zhugs/_mya ngan las 'das pa yang mi 'thob/[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba yang ma lags/_bden par smra ba yang ma lags na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/gal te btsun pa rab 'byor gyis zag 
[\[219a.5\]]pa yang zad par mi mdzad la mi zad pa yang 'khrug par mi mdzad/_phung po dang /_khams dang /_skye mched rnams las kyang mi g.yo la rten pa ma mchis par yang nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa bsam gtan du mdzad/_thams cad la yang rtag tu smon pa mi mnga' la chos 
[\[219a.6\]]rnams kyang sems kyis shin tu thugs su chud na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/btsun pa rab 'byor gal te khyod kyis gang gi phyir rab tu byung ba'i chos de ma rtogs na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/btsun pa rab 'byor gyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags 
[\[219a.7\]]pa dang /_sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi nyon mongs pa med pa gang lags pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor gal te nyon mongs pa med pa 'di gnyis la yon gnas ches lhag pa ma mchis na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/'phags pa rab 'byor la yon gnas 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]yin par 'du shes skyed pa gang lags pa de dag ni btsun pa rab 'byor la med pa dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pas skur pa 'debs pa ste/_gal te btsun pa rab 'byor khyod chos de lta bu dang ldan na de lta na bsod snyoms 'di bzhes shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis sgo gang de g.yos 
[\[219b.2\]]par byas nas lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe gang dag yang dag par smra ba na 'di lta bu'i chos ldan par smra ba de dag ni bdag la yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no/_/de skad ces smras nas bsod snyoms de blangs so/_/de nas bud med des tshe dang 
[\[219b.3\]]ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te 'di skad ces smras so/_/gang dag mnyam pa nyid kyis bsod snyoms len pa'i yon gnas de dag ni dkon no/_/smras pa/_mngon pa'i nga rgyal can rnams ni mnyam pa nyid 'di sun phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro 
[\[219b.4\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha des tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis ci las bsams te gang dag chos 'di sun phyung ste smad nas phal cher sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad smra/_smras pa/_lha 'di ji snyam du 
[\[219b.5\]]sems/_sgyu ma'i chos 'ga' zhig la 'di ni rgyu dang bcas pa'o/_/'di ni rgyu med pa'o zhes sun 'byin pa'am/_smod par byed dam/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor de ni ma yin no/_/smras pa/_lha de bzhin du chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur rtogs na bdag gis 
[\[219b.6\]]sun dbyung ba'am smad du ci zhig yod/_lha gzhan yang bdag ni sems can thams cad kyis yang dag pa'am/_yang dag pa ma yin pa brjod pa'i sgra de dag thams cad dang mnyam mo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_brjod pa thams cad ni sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid kyis brjod du med do/_/bsod 
[\[219b.7\]]snyoms len pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha'i bu brgya chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/de nas bud med des 'phags pa rab 'byor la bzod pa gsol nas 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bshos gsol nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]ga la ba der bzhud cig dang /_bdag kyang chos mnyan pa'i slad du der mchi'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bsod snyoms de blangs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas byung nas de chos thos pa'i dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' bas zas la 
[\[220a.2\]]sems mi 'jug par gyur nas de 'di snyam du sems te bdag gis bsod snyoms blangs na gang la log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ba su zhig la sbyin par bya snyam mo/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi sems sems kyis shes 
[\[220a.3\]]nas/_tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ga la ba der song ste phyin nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa rab 'byor bsod snyoms 'di bdag la byin cig dang /_bdag la byin na log par ltung bar 
[\[220a.4\]]mi 'gyur ro/_/smras pa/_rigs kyi bu ci khyod tshul khrims blangs pa'am/_tshul khrims la gnas pa yin nam/_smras pa/_btsun pa rab 'byor chos thams cad ni blang du med pa ste/_de la ni tshul khrims kyang med/_'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyang med do/_/btsun pa 
[\[220a.5\]]rab 'byor gzhan yang bdag ni srog gcod par byed pa dang /_ma byin par len pa byed pa dang /_'dod pa la log par g.yem pa byed pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba byed pa dang /_phra ma byed pa dang /_tshig rtsub po smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa smra ba dang /_brnab sems can dang /_gnod 
[\[220a.6\]]sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /_log par lta ba can yin no/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di snyam du sems te/_rigs kyi bu 'di'i bstan pa 'di 'dra ba las na 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa yin par the tsom med kyis ldem po ngag 'di bdag gis dri bar 
[\[220a.7\]]bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ci las bsams te/_'di skad du bdag ni srog gcod pa byed pa dang /_ma byin par len pa byed pa dang /_'dod pas log par g.yem pa byed pa dang /[ {]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]smra ba byed pa dang /_phra ma byed pa dang /_tshig rtsub po smra ba dang /_tshig kyal pa smra ba dang /_brnab sems can dang /_gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa dang /_log par lta ba can yin no zhes smra/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad mi len pas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la tshigs su 
[\[220b.2\]]bcad de smras pa/_byang chub lam ni bla med pa'i/_/lam ni bdag gis rnam par sbyangs/_/srog chags bye ba phrag stong yang /_/lam de la ni yongs su bkod/_/srog ni bdag gi shin tu gtugs/_/de phyir bdag ni de skad smra/_/gang dag lam ni rnam par sbyangs/_/de dag srog 
[\[220b.3\]]gcod pa zhes bya/_/lhas ni byang chub byin ma yin/_/brgya byin tshangs pas ma byin te/_/ma byin par ni bdag gis blangs/_/de phyir bdag ni ma byin len/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/'thun pa'i theg pa blangs pas na/_/de phyir theg pa chen po 'di/_/ma byin blangs 
[\[220b.4\]]zhes bya ba yin/_/'dod pas log par yongs shes pa/_/chos 'dod yin zhes de dag shes/_/'dod pa 'di dag 'dod ma yin/_/de phyir log ces spyod par byed/_/sgrar ni ji snyed gdags pa rnams/_/de dag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]zhes yang dag gsungs/_/med pa'i phyir na de [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]te/_/
[\[220b.5\]{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]du smra ba zhes kyang bya/_/theg pa dman pa 'dod pa yi/_/sems can gang dag su yang rung /_/sems can de dag dbye ba'i phyir/_/theg pa che la dgod par byed/_/phra ma'i tshig ni smra byed cing /_/mu stegs can gzhan 'byed par byed/_/sems can lam ngan lhung ba rnams/_/
[\[220b.6\]]yang dag lam la 'dzud par byed/_/rgol ba de dag tshar bcad de/_/de dag shin tu dga' ba med/_/rtsub pa'i tshig ni smras nas kyang /_/bdud rnams thams cad pham par byas/_/rtsub pa'i tshig ni smra mod kyi/_/'on kyang sems la khro ba med/_/sems can smin par bya ba 
[\[220b.7\]]la/_/dpa' bo rnams kyis thabs la ltos/_/gang las dgongs te gsungs pa yi/_/dgongs pa'i tshig ni rab tu shes/_/des na bsams te rab smra zhing /_/sems can bye ba 'dul bar byed/_/kha cig la ni bsams te smras/_/kha cig de dag [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par shes/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]de phyir bsams te smra ba yin/_/chos kyi mngon sum rtogs par byed/_/sems can ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/re re la yang de dag ni/_/mi min lha yi bde ba dag_/'jig rten na ni brnab sems byed/_/bde ba gang dag ldan gyur na/_/'jig rten mgon po phan 
[\[221a.2\]]byed 'gyur/_/bde ba de ni sems can kun/_/ldan par mkhas rnams brnab sems byed/_/sems can thams cad rgyal gyur ces/_/rtag tu de dag brnab sems byed/_/brnab sems de 'dra yin pas na/_/de phyir brnab sems can zhes smras/_/dam pa'i chos ni 
[\[221a.3\]]'jig pa'i tshe/_/stobs chen rnams kyis tshar bcad de/_/de dag rang gi bde ba spong /_/chos dang srog chags spong mi byed/_/'jig rten kun gyi rgol ba dang /_sems can kun dang mi 'thun te/_/thams cad 'thun par bya ba'i phyir/_/de dag gnod sems ston par byed/_/
[\[221a.4\]]de dag bskal par rtsod byed dam/_/bskal pa bye bar rtsod kyang rung /_/dam pa'i chos ni spong mi byed/_/slar yang ldog par yongs mi byed/_/log par lta la dpa' ba rnams/_/de dag 'dus byas kun la snyoms/_/log par lta ba rab tu shes/_/yang dag lta ba'i rnam par 
[\[221a.5\]]rtog_/gang dag de 'dra'i chos dang ldan/_/de dang de dag khrims la gnas/_/gnas med la ni gnas bcas nas/_/mkhas rnams byang chub rtogs par 'gyur/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis rigs kyi bu de la bsod snyoms de byin nas 'di skad du skyes bu dam pa 'di lta bu 
[\[221a.6\]]dag gis ni dad pas byin pa'i bsod snyoms log par ltung bar mi byed do zhes smras so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor zan ma zos te phyem red kyi dus na nang du yang dag 'jog las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos 
[\[221a.7\]]phyag 'tshal te/_ji ltar gyur pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de su yin pa shes sam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma 'tshal lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ste dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas sems can rnams 'dul bar byed do/_/rab 'byor dper na yungs 'brus shing rta bkang ba la yul ma ga d+hA'i khal bcu tshad nyi shu 
[\[221b.2\]]yod pa las lo brgya zhing yungs 'bru re re bor ba ni bgrang ba de lta bu'i tshul gyis shing rta de'i yungs 'bru'i mtha' ches myur du rtogs par nus kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can bla na med pa 
[\[221b.3\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_sems can mang po lha dang mir skye ba la bkod pa rnams ni de lta ma yin no/_/de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du bdar te rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung nas bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri 
[\[221b.4\]]ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bud med de 'ong ba thag ring po nas gzigs te/_gzigs nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la bka' stsal pa/_rab 'byor bud med lnga brgya tsam 'ong ba 'di dag mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom 
[\[221b.5\]]ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_'di dag thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas dga' ba bkod pa'i thabs la mkhas pas yongs su smin par byas nas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa sha stag go/_/
[\[221b.6\]]de nas bud med de bud med lnga brgyas bskor cing bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bud med de bsu nas thal mo sbyar te phyag byas so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[221b.7\]]pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'phags pa'i chos ma thob pa dang /_'phags pa'i lus su mi gnas pa'i bud med la ci'i phyir phyag 'tshal/_bud med des smras pa/_gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gal te 'jig rten na 'phags pa ni gang 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]dag lags/_'phags pa ma lags pa ni gang dag lags pa mkhyen na khyod kyis spobs pa mdzod cig_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/_che zhe khyod kyis 'jig rten na 'phags pa gang dag yin pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa gang dag yin pa shes sam/_
[\[222a.2\]]smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag gis 'tshal to/_/smras pa de dag gang yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'phags pa'i rigs mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o/_/sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun gyi rigs mi gcod pa gang dag lags pa 
[\[222a.3\]]de dag ni 'phags pa'o/_/'phags pa rnams la byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang /_'phags pa ma yin pa rnams la thar ba 'dod pa gang dag lags pa de dag ni 'phags pa'o/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bud med rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa/_gos gtsang ma srab mo 
[\[222a.4\]]gyon pa/_phye ma dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa rnams la sten pa/_'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni ches sla'i dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben pa na gnas pa ni de lta ma lags so/_/
[\[222a.5\]]btsun pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang don 'di nyid brda sprad pa'i phyir khyod la dpe bstan par bgyi na btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du dgongs/_mching bu'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i snod du bcug pa 'dam mam/_'on te nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab tu bcug pa 'dam/_gnas brtan shA ri'i 
[\[222a.6\]]bus smras pa/_che zhe nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa 'dam rdzab tu bcug pa 'dam gyi mching bu'i nor bu bai dUr+ya'i snod du bcug pa ni de lta ma yin no/_/smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du bud med 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems dang ma bral ba ni 
[\[222a.7\]]ches 'phags kyi/_dgra bcom pa rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa dben pa na gnas pa de ni de lta ma lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus smras pa/_che zhe khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin nam/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po ni 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]gang la yang mi gnas la ldog pa yang ma mchis so/_/smras pa/_che zhe gal te khyod theg pa chen po gang la yang mi gnas la ldog pa yang med na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag yin pa de dag ci la zhugs/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu theg pa chen po pa rnams ni 
[\[222b.2\]]ci la yang mi gnas te/_ma rig pa zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag mi gnas pa nas rga shi'i bar du zad par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag mi gnas so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu ma rig pa nas rga shi'i bar du mi zad pa'i slad du'o/_/des na de dag ni skye ba'i chos can 
[\[222b.3\]]yang ma lags/_'gag pa'i chos can ma lags so/_/gal te skye bar gyur na ni de las zad par 'gyur na gang gi phyir mi skye ba de'i phyir mi zad do/_/de bas na zad pa yang ma mchis/_skye ba yang ma mchis so/_/dge sbyong gi chos ni mi skye ba'i chos can no/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu de 
[\[222b.4\]]ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa lags so/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bud med de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/che zhe khyod ni lhar bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang bcas pas phyag bya ba'i 'os yin na tshe dang 
[\[222b.5\]]ldan pa rab 'byor gyis lta ci smos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang zag gis gang zag la tshod 'dzin pa su zhig mchis te/_che zhe 'di ni 'di ltar rgyan gyis legs par brgyan la 'di ltar spobs pa phun sum 
[\[222b.6\]]tshogs pa dang ldan pa lags so/_/bud med des smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni rgyan gyi spobs pa ma lags so/_/smras pa/_'o na gang gi spobs pa yin/_smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rgyan lags te/_brgyad gang zhe na/_'di 
[\[222b.7\]]lta ste/_byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang /_snying rje chen po'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la gnas pa'i rgyan dang /_sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems kyi rgyan dang /_thos pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol ba la chog mi shes pa'i rgyan dang /_ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams dang 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]ji ltar kun chub par byas pa rnams la tshul bzhin du so sor rtog cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang /_sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang /_chos zab mo rnam par nges pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang /_sems can gyi dbang po 
[\[223a.2\]]mchog dang /_mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i ye shes kyi rgyan dang /_rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang /_thabs la mkhas pa'i rgyan te/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu brgyad po de dag ni rgyan dag lags te/_rgyan de dag gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa 
[\[223a.3\]]dang ldan no/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das che zhe 'di gang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes lags/_de nas bud med des bdag nyid kyi lus ci 'dra ba de kho na 'dra ba'i bud med dag gcig tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i mdun du 
[\[223a.4\]]sprul to/_/sprul nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyis bud med 'di la ga las shi 'phos te 'dir skyes zhes dris shig_/gnas brtan shA ri'i bus smras pa/_bud med 'di ni sprul pa yin te/_sprul pa la ni 'chi 'pho dang skye ba med do/_/
[\[223a.5\]]smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/chos thams cad sprul pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid du shes pa gang yin pa de dag la ni 'chi 'pho'am skye ba 'dri bar mi bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[223a.6\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba zhes bya ba yin te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mngon par dga' ba nas shi 'phos nas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir 
[\[223a.7\]]'dir 'ongs so/_/shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba 'dis mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur bas 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]bud med kyi gzugs nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan pa'i bar dang /_bdag gi bud med kyi lus ma mchis par gyur te/_skyes pa'i lus su ma gyur gyi bar 
[\[223b.2\]]du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs las mi ldang lags so/_/bud med lnga brgya po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bud med kyi rang bzhin las gyur te/_skyes pa'i rang bzhin du ma gyur gyi bar dang /_bla na med 
[\[223b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan gyi bar du bdag cag mi ldang lags so/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'dzum pa mdzad do/_/'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/_de nas de'i mod la bcom ldan 'das 
[\[223b.4\]]kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer du ma sna tshogs 'di lta ste/_sngon po dang /_ser po dang /_dmar po dang /_dkar po dang /_btsod ka dang /_shel dang /_dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung ste/_'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa 'od kyis khyab par byas nas tshangs 
[\[223b.5\]]pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du thug ste/_phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyi bo'i gtsug tu mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 
[\[223b.6\]]'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rgyu ma mchis rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/_bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni gang lags/_rkyen ni gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun 
[\[223b.7\]]dga' bo khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba bud med lnga brgyas bskor ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la gtugs pa mthong ngam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bud med 'gyur ba 'di bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan gyi rgyal po'i spobs 
[\[224a.2\]]pa can zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_des byang chub thob pa na bud med lnga brgya po 'di dag gzungs thob pa dang /_thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 'gyur ba 'dis yon tan gyi rgyan bstan pa gang dag yin pa'i rgyan brgyad po de dag 
[\[224a.3\]]gis brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyar 'gyur te/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan gyi rgyal po spobs pa can des bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur ro/_/kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 
[\[224a.4\]]gyi rgyal po spobs pa can de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang 'byor cing rgyas la/_bde ba dang /_lo legs pa dang /_mi dang /_skye bo mang pos gang bar 'gyur te/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i longs spyod dang mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ni ming tsam yang med par 
[\[224a.5\]]'gyur te/_sems can de dag thams cad pad ma'i snying po las rdzus te skyes nas skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la gtsang zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang /_rgyan brgyad po de dag gis brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' bud med 'gyur ba de dang /_bud med lnga brgya po 
[\[224a.6\]]de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon sum du lung bstan pa thos nas dga' ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba de kho nas ta la bdun srid tsam gyi nam mkha' la 'phags nas/_de'i mod kho na la khye'u lo bcu drug lon pa tsam du snang bar gyur to/_/de dag bar snang de las babs te 
[\[224a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/_de bzhin gshegs pas de dag thams cad kyi spyi bor phyag gis byugs so/_/de nas de dag thams cad kyis de'i tshe gzungs dang kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung la gzhan dag la yang rgyas par yang dag par ston cig_/gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_
[\[224b.2\]]kun dga' bo de'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod kyis spobs pa bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya bar zung shig_/bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bud med 
[\[224b.3\]]'gyur ba 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_nyan thos chen po de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par 
[\[224b.4\]]bstod do//_//'phags pa bud med 'gyur ba lung bstan pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_shI len+d+ra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la [{]stsogs [,]sogs [}]pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_sh+lau ka drug 
[\[224b.5\]]brgya/_bam po gnyis pa'o//[ {D191}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya tsan drot+ta rA dA ri kA byA ka ra Na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bu mo zla mchog lung bstan pa 
[\[224b.6\]]zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das yangs pa can na tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/_dgra bcom pa lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong 
[\[224b.7\]]gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/_bya ba byas pa/_byed pa byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/_yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_sems can thams cad 
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa/_gzungs thob pa/_spobs pa thogs pa med pa/_ting nge 'dzin thob pa/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod 
[\[225a.2\]]pa thob pa/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa/_tshig thogs pa med pa/_tshul 'chos pa med pa/_kha gsag med pa/_shes kyi khe 'dod pa'i sems dang bral ba/_zang zing med par chos ston pa/_chos zab mo la bzod pa dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa/_mi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/_
[\[225a.3\]]bdud kyi las las yang dag par 'das pa/_las kyi sgrib pa spangs pa/_chos kyi rang bzhin la the tsom med pa/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med par smon lam shin tu brtsams pa bzhin 'dzum pa/_khro gnyer med pa tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis smra ba la mkhas pa/_
[\[225a.4\]]sems yongs su ma gtugs pa/_spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa/_chos mnyam pa nyid la bzod pa thob pa/_mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'khor mtha' yas pa zil gyis gnon pa/_tshig gcig gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag gcig tu ston pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/_'das 
[\[225a.5\]]pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad sgyu ma dang /_smig rgyu dang /_chu zla dang /_rmi lam dang /_mig yor dang /_brag ca dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_dben pa dang /_g.yo ba med pa/_gzung ba med pa/_nam 
[\[225a.6\]]mkha'i ngo bo nyid lta bur mos pa/_shes rab dang ye shes tshad med pa la mkhas pa/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos ston pa/_sems thogs pa med pa chos la sred pa dang bral ba/_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa 
[\[225a.7\]]med pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/_chos ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa la mkhas pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin pa/_sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag par rgyun du mngon du gyur pa/_sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]pa shes pa la mkhas pa/_kun nas ldang ba dang /_lta ba dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_bag la nyal sna tshogs spong ba la mkhas pa/_ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtse ba'i mngon par shes pa'i shes pa la mkhas pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_byang chub 
[\[225b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_mthu chen thob dang /_'byung dka' dang /_spos kyi glang po dang /_brtson pa mi gtong dang /_nyi ma'i snying po dang /_gzungs kyi dbang phyug rgyal po dang /_
[\[225b.3\]]spos kyi 'od zer rab tu gtong ba dang /_'brug sgra dang /_gser 'od rnam par nges pa'i rgyal po dang /_sred med kyi bu dang /_lag na rin po che dang /_lag na phyag rgya rin po che dang /_nam mkha' mdzod dang /_snang ba'i rgyal po dang /_mthong dga' dang /_sems can sgrol dang /_rtag 
[\[225b.4\]]tu brtson dang /_rtag tu rgod dga' dbang po dang /_ngan song spong dang /_rdo rje'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang /_'jig rten gsum gyi gnas rnam par gnon pa dang /_mi g.yo ba'i gnas rnam par gnon pa dang /_mthong ba don yod dang /_dpal gyi snying po dang /_pad ma'i dpal dang /_
[\[225b.5\]]bal glang spos kyi glang po che dang /_spobs pa zab mo dang /_spobs pa chen po dang /_chos 'phags dang /_chos kyi rang bzhin the tsom med pa dang /_seng ge'i stabs su 'gro ba dang /_'jigs pa kun sel dang /_sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /_seng ge chen po mngon par 
[\[225b.6\]]sgrogs pa'i sgra dang /_brjod med dang /_spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang /_de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong dang yang thabs cig go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po rnams dang /_sna chen po la 
[\[225b.7\]]gtogs pa rnams dang /_grong khyer dang /_ljongs kyi mi rnams dang /_zhabs 'bring gnyug ma rnams dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_khyim bdag rnams kyis bkur stir byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas te/_yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na tshal chen po'i 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe yangs pa can gyi grong khyer chen po na lits+tsha bI dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba phyug pa/_nor mang ba/_longs spyod che ba/_longs spyod mang ba/_mdzod dang bang ba mang ba zhig gnas te/_de la chung ma dri med ma
