[\[247a.3\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_bram ze'am/_rgyal rigs sam/_rje'u rigs sam/_dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i bstod pa 'di 'chang na/_rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po 
[\[247a.4\]]de'i yul dang /_sems can de dag gi 'jigs pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing /_chom rkun dang /_g.yon can dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_mdzod dang /_
[\[247a.5\]]bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du yang dpal nges par gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das tshig 'di legs 
[\[247a.6\]]par bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/gang dag lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang /_thos nas nyams su len pa gang lags pa de dag gi yon tan dang phan yon ni de dag tu 'gyur lags so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[247a.7\]]po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha mo chen mo dpal gyis ni de bzhin 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]gshegs pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya dang gser gyi 
[\[247b.2\]]ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_de dang de bzhin gshegs pa mang po gzhan dag la yang lha mo chen mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge 
[\[247b.3\]]ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang /_'grub par byed pa dang /_rtag tu rjes su 'brang ba yin te/_de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang /_sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang /_nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa dang /_lus thams cad 
[\[247b.4\]]dri ma med par byed pa dang /_nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang /_dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 
[\[247b.5\]]'gugs par byed pa dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_'khrug pa dang /_'gyed pa dang /_rtsod pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug rdzogs par byed pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug pa po la 
[\[247b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho bai dUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 
[\[247b.7\]]'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skar ma'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtsho snang ba'i 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi cho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa skar 'od zhi ba'i spos snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[248a.2\]]sems can gyi bsam pa zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu yongs su brjod pa mtshan gsol dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin 
[\[248a.3\]]gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'phags dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus grangs med pa la rab tu zhugs pa'i 
[\[248a.4\]]dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa'i gser mdog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab 
[\[248a.5\]]sgron ma grangs med pa'i 'od kyi me tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi go cha ri rab kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang 
[\[248a.6\]]phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma'i 'od bzang dpal la 
[\[248a.7\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgron ma'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]sprul pa'i 'brug sgra snyan pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[248b.2\]]'od 'phro ri bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro rgya mtsho'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam chen po'i shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i dpal la 
[\[248b.3\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog gi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la 
[\[248b.4\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'dren pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag rim gror byas te/_bcang bar bya'o/_/
[\[248b.5\]]bklag par bya'o/_/de ltar byas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de la bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo dpal yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang lung bstan to/_/lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig 
[\[248b.6\]]rten gyi khams dpal rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal nor bu rin po che las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_'jig rten gyi khams de yang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 
[\[248b.7\]]'gyur ro/_/'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang bar mdzad par 'gyur la 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro/_/nam mkha' las kyang sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang pad ma'i snying po dag las skye bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes 
[\[249a.2\]]bya ba'i bstod pa brgyad cu gnyis pa gang zhe na/_'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming rnams nyon cig_/'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/_lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/_de bzhin 
[\[249a.3\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/_lha thams cad kyi ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dpal/_'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dpal/_tshangs pa dang /_khyab 'jug dang /_dbang phyug 
[\[249a.4\]]chen po thams cad kyi dpal/_lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/_gnas thams cad na yod pa'i dpal/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/_rig sngags 
[\[249a.5\]]'chang dang /_lag na rdo rje dang /_rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyi dpal/_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang lnga'i dpal/_gza' brgyad dang /_rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi dpal lo/_/oM nyi ma'i bu mo/_ma ma yum/_rig byed bzhi'i dpal/_bkra shis ma/_sems can rnams 
[\[249a.6\]]kyi ma/_rgyal ma/_rnam rgyal ma/_gang gA ma/_mu stegs kyi sgo thams cad kyi bkra shis ma/_dri ma med pa/_dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/_sdig pa thams cad 'phrog ma/_rgyags pa med pa/_zla ba'i dpal/_nyi ma'i dpal/_zla thams cad kyi dpal/_seng ge la zhon 
[\[249a.7\]]ma/_pad ma'i mchog 'bum gyis bkab ma/_pad ma pad ma la gnas pa/_pad ma 'dzin pa/_pad ma las byung ma/_pad ma dang ldan pa/_'od zer 'bar ba du mas 'khor ba/_nor sbyin ma/_dkar mo/_dkar mo chen mo/_lag dkar ma/_bkra shis thams cad 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]'dzin ma/_bsod nams kyi phung po thams cad kyi lus can/_shes nyen can gyi bu mo/_lag pa 'bum dang ldan ma/_mig 'bum dang ldan ma/_mgo 'bum dang ldan ma/_nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa'i cod pan thogs pa/_gzugs bzang ba/_
[\[249b.2\]]gzugs sna tshogs can/_rab grags ma/_shin tu grags ma/_zhi ba ma/_sprin ma/_skra gtsang ma/_zla ba ltar mdzes ma/_nyi ma ltar mdzes ma/_dge ma/_dge byed ma/_sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs ma'i dpal/_'phags ma/_me tog la gnas 
[\[249b.3\]]ma/_me tog gi dbang phyug ma/_ri bo'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad kyi dpal/_chu klung dang /_mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/_chu thams cad kyi rgya mtsho'i dpal/_mu stegs thams cad du mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/_sman dang /_rtsi tog dang /_shing dang /_nor dang /_
[\[249b.4\]]'bru thams cad kyi dpal/_gser sbyin ma/_zas dang gos sbyin ma/_'od gsal ma/_snang ba ma/_lus gtsang ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang sgyur ma/_lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/_gshin rje dang /_chu lha dang /_
[\[249b.5\]]ku be ra dang /_brgya byin la sogs pa'i dpal/_sbyin pa ma/_longs spyod ma/_gzi brjid ldan ma/_phun sum tshogs ma/_'byor pa ma/_rnam par skye ba ma/_mthong ma/_chos kyi dpal/_khyab 'jug la brten ma/_ku mu da la gnas ma/_bzod ldan ma/_mthu rtsal gyi 
[\[249b.6\]]gnas/_dag byed dang bkra shis thams cad kyi lag pa dang ldan pa/_bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dpal/_sa thams cad dang /_rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/_rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/_'byung 
[\[249b.7\]]po thams cad dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_srin po dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_sha za dang /_grul bum dang /_lto 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/_lha'i gnas dang /_lha thams cad kyi dpal/_bzlas brjod dang /_bzlas brjod du bya ba dang /_sbyin sreg dang /_sbyin sreg 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]tu bya ba dang /_bkra shis thams cad kyi dpal/_'od la dga' ba/_skal ba dang ldan par 'dod pa/_drang srong thams cad dag par byed pa'i dpal/_bud med kyi gnas thams cad kyi gtso mo dang /_dpal gyi mchog mi'am ci mo thams cad 
[\[250a.2\]]dang lha ma yin mo thams cad kyi dpal gyi mchog_/kha na ma tho ba med pa'i gnas na 'dug ma/_yid du 'ong ma/_sim par byed ma/_ku be ra'i snying du sdug ma/_chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/_oM sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shig_/sgrol cig 
[\[250a.3\]]thar bar mdzod cig_/bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mdzod cig swA hA/_oM gaM ga sarba tir+tha mu khi swA hA/_oM sarba bi tri swA hA/_oM sarba maM ga la d+hA ra Nai swA hA/_tsa turbe da sarba na k+Sha tra gra hA ba Na ga Na a d+hi mU r+t+yai swA hA/_brah+mA ya swA hA/_biSh+Na 
[\[250a.4\]]be swA hA/_ru drA ya swA hA/_bi shwa mu khA ya swA hA/_oM gli ni kli ni sarba kAr+ya sA d+ha ni/_sa ni sa ni/_A ba ha de bi shrI/_bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_su bar+Na d+ha na d+ha n+ya/_A kar+Sha N+yai swA hA/_sarba pUr+Na A kar+Sha N+yai swA hA/_shrI he ma ba tI A kar+Sha N+yai swA hA/_sarba pA pa nA sha n+yai swA hA/_
[\[250a.5\]]sarba a kA la mr-i t+yu pra sha ma n+yai swA hA/_sarba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka tA yai swA hA/_sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha shrI yai swA hA/_A yurba la bar+d+ha ka rA yai swA hA/_sarba bi dwa maM ga la ha stA yai swA hA/_saM haM ba hi nA yai swA hA/_pad+ma sam+b+had+hA yai swA hA/_sarba kr-i t+ya ka khorda bi nA sha n+yai swA hA/_
[\[250a.6\]]'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming nyes sdig thams cad med par byed pa/_sdig pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa/_bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/_bkra mi shis pa thams cad med par byed pa/_dpal dang /_
[\[250a.7\]]bde ba dang /_skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag 'chang ba dang /_klog par byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang mar byas la/_sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang bdug pa gsol nas lha mo chen mo 
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]dpal la yang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul te/_bklags na des dpal thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing bde ba dang /_yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur te/_lha thams cad kyang bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur la de'i don thams cad kyang 'grub par 
[\[250b.2\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal de dang /_'khor de dag thams cad dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas 
[\[250b.3\]]pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa lha mo chen mo dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so//[ {D194}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya dza ya ma 
[\[250b.4\]]ti nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu 
[\[250b.5\]]rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rab tu mang po dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rgyal ba'i blo gros la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[250b.6\]]rgyal ba'i blo gros rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod par bya'o/_/shes rab 'dod pas thos pa la brtson par bya'o/_/mtho ris 'dod pas tshul khrims bsrung bar bya'o/_/longs spyod 'dod pas 
[\[250b.7\]]gtong ba sbel bar bya'o/_/gzugs bzang ba 'dod pas bzod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/spobs pa 'dod pas bla ma la gus par bya'o/_/gzungs 'dod pas mngon pa'i nga rgyal med par bya'o/_/ye shes 'dod pas tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la gnas par bya'o/_/
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]thar pa 'dod pas sdig pa thams cad spang bar bya'o/_/sems can thams cad bde bar bya bar 'dod pas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/skad snyan pa 'dod pas bden par smra bar bya'o/_/yon tan 'dod pas rab tu dben pa la dga' bar 
[\[251a.2\]]bya'o/_/chos 'dod pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsten par bya'o/_/zhi gnas 'dod pas 'du 'dzi med pa mang du bya'o/_/lhag mthong 'dod pas chos stong par so sor brtag pa mang du bya'o/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dod pas byams pa dang /_snying rje dang /_
[\[251a.3\]]dga' ba dang /_btang snyoms bsgom par bya'o/_/lha dang mi'i longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'dod pas dge bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te gnas par bya'o/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar 'dod pas stong pa'i chos la mngon par dga' bar bya'o/_/yon tan 
[\[251a.4\]]thams cad thob par 'dod pas dkon mchog gsum la mchod par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal ba'i blo gros dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_
[\[251a.5\]]lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//
[\[251a.6\]{D195}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a ba lo ki nI nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus 
[\[251a.7\]]gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa/_blo gros rnam par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa ting nge 'dzin yongs su dag pa dang /_bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang /_phan pa'i 
[\[251b.2\]]dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byams pa yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag 
[\[251b.3\]]go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa dga' ba yongs su dag pa dang /_btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam par grol ba yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ye shes yongs su dag pas 
[\[251b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pa dang /_rnam pa 
[\[251b.5\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang /_phreng ba dang /_spos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 
[\[251b.6\]]dang /_rol mo'i sgra dang /_byug pa rnams kyis bsti stang byed pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' rtogs par mi nus te/_de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mthar thug pa ma gtogs par bsod nams kyi phung po de 
[\[251b.7\]]phyi ma'i mthar yang zad par mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyis tshad med pa de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do/_/mtha' yas so/_/bsam 
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]gyis mi khyab bo/_/mtshungs pa med do/_/dpag tu med do/_/grangs med do/_/dpag gis mi lang ngo /_/brjod du med do/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa da ltar bzhugs te/_'tsho zhing gzhes pa la bsti stang byed pa dang /_bla 
[\[252a.2\]]mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_phyi ma'i tshe phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya tha ma la su zhig de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la bsti stang byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_
[\[252a.3\]]mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_yang dag par sems nye bar gzhag ste byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang /_phyag byed pa dang /_bsti stang byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_ri mor byed pa dang /_mchod pa dang /_rjed pa dang /_gsol ba dang /_bsngags pa dang /_
[\[252a.4\]]skor ba byed pa des phan yon lnga yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_rtogs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 
[\[252a.5\]]'gyur ba dang /_mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste phan yon lnga po de dag yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/de chos bzhi dang ldan par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'dzin pa dang /_de yang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa 
[\[252a.6\]]dang /_bsgrubs nas kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang /_myur du sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba ste/_chos bzhi po de dag go/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na bdud dam 
[\[252a.7\]]bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rigs mtho zhing rigs che ba dang /_btsas ma thag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yid la byed pa dang /_phyi ma'i dus na dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa dang /_rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ba ste/_blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[252b.2\]]'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas/_/'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/_/su zhig skor ba byed pa ni/_/tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/_/byang chub spyad pa 
[\[252b.3\]]spyod pa'i tshe/_/dran dang ldan zhing blo gros ldan/_/bsod nams ldan zhing 'jigs med 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/_/tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/srin po rnams kyis mchod par 'gyur/_/ngas ni gang 
[\[252b.4\]]dag bstan pa yi/_/mi khom brgyad po de dag spong /_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab mdzes pa/_/mnyes par byed 'di dal ba gcig_/mdog ldan gzugs ni phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan gyis legs par brgyan pa dang /_/mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/
[\[252b.5\]]le lo can du de mi 'gyur/_/de ni phyug cing nor cher 'gyur/_/bsod nams ldan zhing rdzi ba med/_/'jig rten sgron ma mnyes byas nas/_/yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/_/bdag med stong pa'i chos thos nas/_/de ni chos la rmongs mi 'gyur/_/myur du dad 
[\[252b.6\]]pa 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/chos don ji bzhin mkhas par 'gyur/_/tshong dpon khyim dang rgyas pa dang /_/phyug po rnams su skye bar 'gyur/_/dpa' zhing sbyin pa'i bdag por 'gyur/_/gtong ba btang zhing ser sna med/_/'dzam bu'i gling na gang yang rung /_/khyad 
[\[252b.7\]]par can gyi rigs mdzes pa/_/der ni brtan pa de skye ste/_/dma' ba dag ni rnam par spangs/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/_/skye ba thams cad kun tu yang /_/dbang cher grags pa'i khyim bdag dang /_/dpal dang gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/_/bram ze sA la 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]che 'dra dang /_/tshul khrims ldan zhing mang thos dang /_/rgyal rigs sA la che 'dra dang /_/phyug cing nor chen ldan par 'gyur/_/ris bskor rgya mtsho tshun chad kyi/_/sa kun la ni gang smon pa/_/gling bzhi dag gi dbang phyug bla/_/rgyal po chos dang ldan par 
[\[253a.2\]]'gyur/_/'khor los sgyur ba rdzu 'phrul che/_/rin chen bdun dang ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal srid gnas nas sangs rgyas la/_/yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/_/'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris su/_/song nas sangs rgyas bstan la dad/_/lhun po'i zom gyi dbang 
[\[253a.3\]]phyug po/_/lha yi dbang po brgya byin 'gyur/_/lha dbang shin tu 'thab bral dang /_/de bzhin du ni dga' ldan dang /_/lha dbang shin tu 'phrul dga' dang /_/dbang sgyur 'jigs pa med par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/_/de ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du/_/
[\[253a.4\]]tshangs pa'i dbang phyug mkhas 'gyur zhing /_/lha rnams bye bas mchod par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/_/mi gang skor ba byed pa yi/_/bsngags pa bskal pa bye bar yang /_/brjod pas zad par bya mi nus/_/su zhig byang chub sems 
[\[253a.5\]]bskyed nas/_/ston pa'i mchod rten phyag 'tshal ba/_/de ni bskal pa bye bar yang /_/nams kyang long zhing 'theng mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon gyi mchod rten la/_/mngon du skor ba byed pa ni/_/bung ba sngon po mdzes 'dra yi/_/rnam par dag pa'i mig 'thob 
[\[253a.6\]]'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/_/de ni nges par rtag tu yang /_/'thun pa'i don kun 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/don min rnams ni spang bar 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/_/mthu dang stobs dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de ni le lo med 'gyur zhing /_/
[\[253a.7\]]rtag tu bag yod ldan par 'gyur/_/mchod rten bskor bar byas na ni/_/brtson 'grus brtan zhing mthu brtan la/_/brtan zhing rnam par gnon brtan dang /_/de ni myur du mkhas par 'gyur/_/me dang dug dang mtshon gyis de/_/nams kyang 'chi dus byed mi 'gyur/_
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]mkhas pa tshe ni rdzogs rdzogs su/_/zad par byas nas 'chi dus byed/_/mchod rten bskor ba byas na ni/_/pho brang 'khor dang yul 'khor dang /_/grong rdal rnams su longs spyod dang /_/gzugs kyis khyad par 'phags par 'gyur/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod 
[\[253b.2\]]pa'i tshe/_/de ni 'dod pa mi sten cing /_/lus kyang gtsang la gos gtsang zhing /_/gtsang ma'i chos la gnas par 'gyur/_/blo gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod 
[\[253b.3\]]rten mthong nas dad pa skyed de/_pus mo gnyi ga'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal zhing phyag byed de/_de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan pa de ci 'dra bar bdag gi lus kyang de 'dra bar gyur cig ces de la 
[\[253b.4\]]mos pa skyed na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa bsod nams kyi phung po de'i mtha' brjod par mi nus te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro/_/bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/_brgya byin nyid dam/_tshangs pa nyid 
[\[253b.5\]]dam/_rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa bla na med pas kyang zad par bya bar mi nus so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu des bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ba'i 
[\[253b.6\]]phyir te/_blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste/_dper na de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer ram/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_grong du 'jug kyang rung /_'chag kyang rung /_'greng yang 
[\[253b.7\]]rung /_'dug kyang rung /_chos ston kyang rung /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can lha'am/_klu'am/_gnod sbyin nam/_dri za'am/_lha ma yin nam/_nam mkha' lding ngam/_mi'am ci'am/_lto 'phye chen po'am/_mi'am/_mi ma 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]yin pa'am/_sems can gyi grangs su ma gtogs pa shing ngam/_ri'am/_khung bu'am/_bu ga'am/_bya skyibs kyang rung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa ga la ba de logs su 'dud pa dang rab tu 'dud pa dang /_kun tu 'dud pa mi phyed pa de gang yang 
[\[254a.2\]]med de/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang ldan pa la byed pa de bzhin du/_rigs kyi bu de dag grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/_rab tu 'dud/_kun tu 'dud 
[\[254a.3\]]par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes mos skyed de/_sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni pus mo gnyis 'dzugs dang /_/su zhig byang chub gzhol nas phyogs 
[\[254a.4\]]rnams kun 'gro ba/_/de 'gro tshe na 'jig rten gsum po 'dud pa byed/_/mi rnams gtso bo rang byung gang du 'gro byed pa/_/de logs su ni rtswa dang shing dang sdong dum dang /_/sman dang shing lo rnams dang 'bras bu 'dab ma dang /_/yid 'ong dri ldan me tog rnams ni 'dud par 
[\[254a.5\]]'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus mo btsugs pa ni/_/de la mi yi dbang po kun kyang 'dud par 'gyur/_/gnod sbyin dbang dang klu dang lha yi rgyal po dang /_/tshangs pa'i dbang po thams cad rkang par gtugs par byed/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus 
[\[254a.6\]]btsugs phyag byas na/_/dpa' zhing stobs dang ldan pa'i 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan rnams kyis ni go char 'gyur/_/mthu che bla mar bya zhing thub par dka' bar 'gyur/_/de yi yul na sems can gang dag gnas gyur pa/_/de dag 
[\[254a.7\]]thams cad byams pa'i sems dang dga' bar 'gyur/_/de la sems can gang yang sdig pa mi skyed de/_/skye bo tshogs chen dga' zhing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/_/de la 'jig rten kun gyi rgyal po rab tu 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]'dud/_/lha dang klu dang mi dang lto 'phye chen po 'dud/_/bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten dag la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/_/gang tshe rgyal ba dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang 
[\[254b.2\]]nye bar 'gyur ba 'thob/_/'dren pa gzhal yas rnams la mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas gyur ces mos pa bskyed nas ni/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la pus btsugs phyag 'tshal ba/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya bgrangs zad 'gyur 
[\[254b.3\]]na/_/de ni ring por mi thogs byang chub mtshungs med 'thob/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la/_/bskal pa bye ba gzhal yas bsti stang byed pa bas/_/gang zhig phyi dus mi bzad bskal pa 'di la ni/_/mchod rten phyag 'tshal de yi bsod nams ches 
[\[254b.4\]]mang ngo /_/sangs rgyas dam pa sbyin gnas mtshungs pa med gyur pa/_/spyod pa dam pa spyad nas khyad par brnyes gyur pa/_/mi yi khyu mchog de la 'dir ni mchod byas na/_/rnam par smin pa dam pa mtshungs med rang bzhin 'gyur/_/byang chub tu ni sems bsngos te/_/
[\[254b.5\]]me tog phreng ba byas nas su/_/mchod rten dag la su 'bul ba/_/de ni nams kyang phongs mi 'gyur/_/mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/_/sum cu rtsa gsum 'gro bar 'gyur/_/der ni rin chen sna tshogs kyi/_/gzhal med khang pa 'thob par 'gyur/_/mchod rten 
[\[254b.6\]]phreng ba 'dir phul na/_/khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag dang khang brtsegs pa/_/lha yi bu mos bsten pa rnams/_/sum cu gsum du spyod par 'gyur/_/yan lag brgyad ldan chus gang zhing /_/gser gyi bye ma bdal gyur pa/_/bai dUr+ya dang shel dag gi/_/lha yi rdzing bu 'thob 
[\[254b.7\]]par 'gyur/_/der ni lha yi dga' spyad nas/_/mkhas pa tshe tshad rdzogs par 'gyur/_/lha yi 'jig rten shi 'phos nas/_/mi nang longs spyod ldan par 'gyur/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis/_/mkhas pa bag yod gyur nas ni/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]byas te/_/rkang gnyis mchog la mchod pa byed/_/mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/_/de ni 'dod chags mi 'phrogs shing /_/zhe sdang gis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/_/de ni nams kyang rmongs mi 'gyur/_/rkang gnyis mchog la mchod byas na/_/de ni 
[\[255a.2\]]tshe rabs thams cad du/_/chags pa med cing zhe sdang med/_/brkam pa med cing dbang po bsdams/_/mchod rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/_/tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs pa/_/kun tu bkur sti byas par 'gyur/_/mchod 
[\[255a.3\]]rten phreng ba 'bul byed pa/_/de ni 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/brgya byin lha yi dbang phyug 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tshangs par 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/_/dar gyi dbul ba phul byas nas/_/lha yi dag dang mi rnams kyi/_/
[\[255a.4\]]don rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/dma' ba'i rigs ni rnam spangs te/_/der ni de skye 'gyur ma yin/_/phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang /_/'jig rten dbang phyug de 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas na/_/gzugs dang don 
[\[255a.5\]]dang longs spyod dang /_/kha dog dang ni 'byor pa dang /_/kun tu grags dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de ni tshe rabs dran 'gyur zhing /_/'dod chags kyis kyang 'phrogs mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa rnams kyi skyon shes shing /_/tshangs par spyad pa spyod par 'gyur/_/
[\[255a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mchod byas na/_/gzugs rnams dang ni sgra dag dang /_/ro rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing /_/sdig pa'i las ni byed mi 'gyur/_/rnam par 'dren pa mchod byed na/_/de ni spos dang me tog gis/_/nams kyang phongs par mi 
[\[255a.7\]]'gyur zhing /_/dran ldan shes rab ldan par 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs la su mchod pa/_/de yi nor gyi phung po la/_/rgyal po dang ni chom rkun dang /_/me dang chus kyang reg mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten mgon po'i mchod rten la/_/dar gyi 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]dbul ba su 'bul ba/_/de ni skam dang mya ngan dang /_/nad bu can du gzhar mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten sgron ma mchod byed pa/_/tshe rabs dag ni thams cad du/_/mya ngan med cing gnod med dang /_/'khor los sgyur ba 'byor chen 'gyur/_/'dren la mchod pa byas na 
[\[255b.2\]]ni/_/rkang pa lag pa mnyen 'gyur zhing /_/yan lag rnam par dga' gyur la/_/gzugs dang kha dog ldan par 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las ni rnam spangs te/_/byang chub spyad pa spyod par byed/_/gang dag 'jig rten rab dkon pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog rnams 
[\[255b.3\]]mthong bar 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/_/mchod cing bde la shes rab ldan/_/byang chub dam pa 'tshang yang rgya/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa la/_/phreng ba'i khang pa byas na ni/_/de ni g.yog 'khor 
[\[255b.4\]]mi phyed cing /_/rgyal po 'byor pa chen por 'gyur/_/'phags pa rnams kyis gang spangs pa/_/sdig pa'i las ni spong bar byed/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bshad pa yi/_/dge ba'i las la sten par byed/_/lha 'am 'on te klu rnams sam/_/'jig rten dag na 
[\[255b.5\]]gang mkhas pa/_/de dag dga' zhing mgu ba dang /_/bsti stang byas shing bsngags par 'gyur/_/brtan pa de ni gar skyes pa/_/bsod nams gzi brjid rab tu brjid/_/yul 'khor dag dang grong khyer dang /_/rigs der bsti stang byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[255b.6\]]sangs rgyas gzhan gyis mi thub pa/_/rkang gnyis mchog la su mchod pa/_/de dag mthu stobs che ba dang /_/g.yog 'khor chen pos mdzes par 'gyur/_/byang chub tu ni yongs bsngos te/_/phreng ba'i gtsug lag khang byas na/_/sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[255b.7\]]kyis gang bsngags pa'i/_/'byor pa dag ni des 'thob bo/_/de ni 'theng dang zhar ba dang /_/dman dang ma rungs mi 'gyur gnas/_/gang dang gang du skyes par yang /_/mtshan rnams kyis ni brgyan par 'gyur/_/sems can dbul po rnams mthong na/_/
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]de ni nor gyis sdud par byed/_/de ni nor dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/de ni byang chub spyad pa spyod/_/blo gros chen pos sa 'di kun/_/yongs su btang ba byas nas kyang /_/dman pa'i sems su mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni nams kyang phongs mi 
[\[256a.2\]]'gyur/_/gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa/_/de dag bu dang bu mo dang /_/chung ma dge zhing bzang mo dag_/btang nas mya ngan byed mi 'gyur/_/de ni sngon du 'gro 'gyur zhing /_/bkri ba med la mthong na dga'/_/phrag dog dang ni nga rgyal gyis/_/
[\[256a.3\]]nams kyang de la gnod mi 'gyur/_/gang dag byang chub rab zhugs pa/_/de dag phrag dog med cing des/_/bzod pa'i pha rol phyin par 'gyur/_/phan pa 'dod cing yon tan ldan/_/gang dag byang chub mngon zhugs pa/_/'jig rten kun na de rin chen/_/
[\[256a.4\]]de dag 'byung ba shin tu dkon/_/dmad pa med pa'i sbyin gnas 'gyur/_/sa 'di dag ni rim gyis su/_/bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/_/de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'/_/tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/_/
[\[256a.5\]]dus gsum sems ni shes par nus/_/de dag rnams kyi yon tan mtha'/_/tshig gis bstan par mi nus so/_/rgya mtsho chen po bzhi po dag_/skra ni bye ba stong gshegs pa'i/_/skra yis zad par bya bar nus/_/de dag yon tan zad mi nus/_/sa rnams 
[\[256a.6\]]thams cad phyer brlags pa/_/rab tu phra rdul shes par nus/_/sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/_/yon tan mtha' ni brjod mi nus/_/chu klung thams cad rab 'bab pa/_/rgyun las ldog ste 'gro yang srid/_/sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/_/yon tan 
[\[256a.7\]]mtha' brjod de lta min/_/sems can dag ni thams cad kyi/_/sngon gyi lus rnams ji snyed pa/_/bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/_/de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/_/sngon gyi lus rnams thams cad la/_/spu phreng ji snyed yod pa rnams/_/bgrang 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]bar bya zhing dpag par nus/_/de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/_/'gro ba lnga por 'khor ba yi/_/sems can kun gyi spu rnams ni/_/bgrang bar bya zhing dpag par nus/_/de dag yon tan zad mi 'gyur/_/sa 'di ji snyed thams cad pa/_/chu yi phung por 
[\[256b.2\]]gnas gyur kyang /_/de ni bgrang zhing dpag par nus/_/de dag yon tan brjod mi nus/_/mar me mdzad nas bzung nas ni/_/ma 'ongs bskal pa ji snyed pa/_/de yi bar du shing ljon rnams/_/ji snyed ma 'ongs 'byung 'gyur ba/_/de dag 'bras bu me tog 
[\[256b.3\]]rnams/_/de dag zad par shes par nus/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/_/brtson pa zhig gis de dag gis/_/bsngags phreng yid du 'ong brjod kyang /_/sangs rgyas sras po de dag gi/_/yon tan mtha' 
[\[256b.4\]]ni brjod mi nus/_/sangs rgyas sras po de dag la/_/mi gang mi dga' byed pa de/_/lha dang mi ni spangs nas su/_/de dag dmyal ba spyod yul 'gyur/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/_/mi gang la la gnod byed pa/_/mig med pa'am long ba dang /_/
[\[256b.5\]]sdug bsngal dpung gnyen med par 'gyur/_/shi 'phos nas ni mnar med 'gro/_/de ni 'bar zhing 'jigs skrag 'gyur/_/lus ni chen por gyur nas kyang /_/sdug bsngal tshor ba myong bar 'gyur/_/tshe rabs de dang de dag tu/_/de lus dpag tshad tsam 
[\[256b.6\]]'gyur te/_/de ltar phrum ltar zlum gyur la/_/kun nas yongs su bza' bar 'gyur/_/de tshe lus la mgo bo ni/_/lnga stong yod par 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mgo bo de dag re re la'ang /_/lce ni lnga brgya tham pa yod/_/gcig la'ang thong gshol brgya dag 
[\[256b.7\]]gis/_/lce ni rab tu rmo bar 'gyur/_/sdig pa'i las kyi rnam smin gyis/_/mi bzad chen por gshegs par 'gyur/_/mnar med de nas shi 'phos nas/_/de ni tsha dang rab tsha bar/_/blo gros ngan pa tshor ba myong /_/de sngon nyes byas 'bras bu yin/_
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/_/ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa/_/de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_/dmyal ba'i sa ni dkon ma yin/_/tshe rabs bye ba stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig dag ni brgya bgrangs par/_/sdug bsngal tshor 
[\[257a.2\]]ba myong 'gyur zhing /_/de ni bzang po rnams mi mthong /_/sangs rgyas sras po skyobs rnams la/_/gnod pa dag ni byas gyur na/_/a la gar rta 'jigs pa yi/_/shin tu gdug pa'i sbrul du skye/_/de ni bkres dang skom pas nyen/_/sdig pa'i las rnams byed 
[\[257a.3\]]par 'gyur/_/de ni zas kyang mi rnyed de/_/nams kyang 'grangs par za mi myong /_/shi 'phos gshin rje'i 'jig rten du/_/de ni rtag par gtun du brdung /_/dge slong dag la gnod byas pas/_/nams kyang skabs ni rnyed mi 'gyur/_/de nas shi 'phos dus 
[\[257a.4\]]byas te/_/mi yi lus ni thob gyur na/_/blo ngan de ni dmus long 'gyur/_/gnod sems ldan zhing sdom pa med/_/de ni nyes par smras byas te/_/'phags pa rnams la skur btab pas/_/mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/_/ngan song dag tu myur du 'gro/_/byang 
[\[257a.5\]]chub sems dpa' rnams la ni/_/ma bsdams gang zhig gnod byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong dag tu/_/nams kyang sangs rgyas mthong mi 'gyur/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi sras rnams la/_/gang zhig chos bzhin srung byed pa/_/des ni ngan 'gro kun spangs te/_/myur 
[\[257a.6\]]du bzang 'gror 'gro bar 'gyur/_/phyug cing nor chen ldan pa dang /_/stobs dang ldan zhing 'jigs pa med/_/dran dang ldan zhing shes rab ldan/_/bde zhing ngo tsha khrel ltas ldan/_/gang du 'jig rten rnams kyi sgron/_/yongs su mya ngan 'das gyur pa/_/sangs 
[\[257a.7\]]rgyas mchod rten mthong nas ni/_/yang dang yang du bsti stang byed/_/rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi/_/'di 'dra'i chos 'di thos gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas sras po rnams la ni/_/su zhig phyi phyir dad mi byed/_/gang gis sangs rgyas stong rnams dang /_/brgya dang 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]bye ba bgrang dag la/_/bskal pa gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/de snyed bskal par bkur ba bas/_/'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa yi/_/dam chos 'jig tshe gang zhig gis/_/nyin dang mtshan du 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni bsod nams khyad par 'phags/_/
[\[257b.2\]]chos 'jig dus na chos 'dzin pa/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_/sangs rgyas ye shes rab gnas pa/_/nga la des ni mchod pa byed/_/dam pa'i chos ni 'jig pa'i tshe/_/ston pa'i bstan pa srung byed pa/_/bskal pa bye ba stong rnams su/_/de ni 
[\[257b.3\]]nams kyang rgud mi 'gyur/_/lus kyis bde ba myong 'gyur zhing /_/de ni nad kyis btab mi 'gyur/_/de ni yid du mi 'ong bas/_/nams kyang 'phrogs par mi 'gyur ro/_/ston pa'i bstan pa bsrung byas na/_/bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang /_/des 
[\[257b.4\]]dang gsal dang mnyen pa dang /_/sems can rnams la byams sems 'gyur/_/'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/_/bde dang dga' 'thob mdzod ni mang por 'gyur/_/sngon gyi rim gro bya ba 'thob 'gyur zhing /_/mi khom brgyad po ma lus zad par 
[\[257b.5\]]spong /_/'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/_/dper na nam mkha' skar mas yongs gang ltar/_/rtag tu mtshan gyis go char byas pa dang /_/rab tu tshig snyan yid 'ong dbyangs ldan 'gyur/_/'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/_/gang 
[\[257b.6\]]na yid bde med cing rab sdug pa/_/rigs dman de ni de yis spangs par 'gyur/_/phyug cing shin tu bde la longs spyod ldan/_/'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/_/mthu dang stobs dang ldan zhing brtson 'grus ldan/_/mi dman pa rnams kun tu 
[\[257b.7\]]rnam par rgyu/_/sangs rgyas brgya stong dag la bsnyen bkur byed/_/'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/_/mchog tu rab mdzes gzugs ldan shes rab ldan/_/mi yi 'jig rten mchog tu bsnyen bkur 'gyur/_/rgyal po mkhas pa mdzangs pa rnams 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]kyis bsngags/_/'jig tshe rgyal ba mchog gi chos bzung bas/_/mchog tu gzugs mdzes blta na sdug pa dang /_/skyes pa bud med lha rnams dga' ba dang /_/bde zhing mkhas pas bsngags shing shes rab ldan/_/ston pa stobs bcu mnga' ba 
[\[258a.2\]]lha yi lhas/_/gang gi mdun du mdo 'di rab bshad pa/_/mi de lag tu mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di/_/phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig ston pa mi mchog gzugs byed pa/_/ras 'dri rtsig ngos 'dri 'am gser las byas/_/de yi chos kyi khyad par gang 
[\[258a.3\]]yin pa/_/de dag ma lus rab tu bstan gyis nyon/_/de ni blta min long bar gzhar mi 'gyur/_/sgur por mi 'gyur yan lag mi sdug min/_/de ni gzugs dang ldan zhing kha dog ldan/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/_/lus ni rnam par dag 
[\[258a.4\]]cing khyad par 'thob/_/spobs pa 'thob cing sgra snyan yid du 'ong /_/shes bzhin ldan zhing 'jig rten kun gyi gtso/_/de mthong sems can bde zhing dga' bar 'gyur/_/sdig byed mi 'gyur zhe sdang med sems ldan/_/g.yo med mi rku rgyal po 'khrug mi byed/_/
[\[258a.5\]]mthu dang ldan zhing dbang cher grag par 'gyur/_/byams la gnas shing mi dman sems dang ldan/_/'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/_/de ni mchog 'gyur skye bo mang mchod 'os/_/blo ldan phyug cing de nyid rgya cher ldan/_/dbang ldan 'khor los sgyur 
[\[258a.6\]]ba'i rgyal por 'gyur/_/'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/_/lha yi dbang po dbang phyug dbang thob pa/_/lhun po'i zom na dbang thob brgya byin 'gyur/_/bdag po lhun po'i zom na rgyal srid ston/_/de ni dran dang blo gros mi ldan min/_/de ni rtogs 
[\[258a.7\]]mos shes rab tshang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun na dbugs phyin thob 'gyur te/_/'di ni ye shes ldan zhing dmyal ba spangs/_/sems can snying po mtshungs med mchod byas na/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas gshin rje'i yul mi 'gro/_/ngan 'gro gsum po 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]des ni rnam spangs te/_/bdag der phyis mi skye bar shes par 'gyur/_/'dren pa'i sku gzugs rab tu mdzes byas na/_/dbang ldan dbang phyug nyid kyi lhar 'gyur te/_/mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sangs rgyas mchod/_/rgyal ba mchog gi bstan la dad 
[\[258b.2\]]par 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten dbang thob tshangs par 'gyur/_/yid 'ong shin tu mdzes pa'i spos ngad ldan/_/'dzam bu'i klung gser 'od byed dga' 'gyur ba'i/_/gzhal med khang mchog blta sdug thob par 'gyur/_/de ni ded dpon stobs bcu 
[\[258b.3\]]ldan pa po/_/sems can snying po mtshungs 'dra med pa 'thob/_/kha dog mtha' yas 'jig rten kun na gsal/_/gser steng rin chen bai dUr+ya dang mtshungs/_/su zhig dga' ba'i yid kyis me tog blangs/_/dad skyes 'jig rten mgon la char du gtor/_/
[\[258b.4\]]de ni mi yi 'jig rten bsod nams ldan/_/rgyal srid gnas nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/_/mya ngan bskams shing tha ba drir ldan lus/_/yan lag legs gnas mtshungs med thob par 'gyur/_/skye bo mang pos blta ba'i 'os yin te/_/dmyal ba dgra 
[\[258b.5\]]rtsa 'dod pa spong bar 'gyur/_/spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe 'dod pa la/_/ngan skyugs khung ltar smad par shes par 'gyur/_/tshangs spyod dge ba khyad par 'phags la spyod/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis rtag tu spyod par 'gyur/_/bskal pa mtha' yas mang du de kha 
[\[258b.6\]]nas/_/rab mdzes ud pal bsung ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'dra zhing /_/tsan dan lta bur dri zhim ngad kyang 'byung /_/spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe khro ba dang /_/tha ba dri skyon gti mug gnod mi byed/_/dman pa med pa'i sems kyis 
[\[258b.7\]]dbugs phyin rnyed/_/bag yod lha yi nang na rgyal po 'thob/_/gang tshe rgyal ba mya ngan 'das pa na/_/de ni gus pas de dag chos kyang 'dzin/_/mi dman dga' ba'i sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel mchod/_/rgyal ba 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]mchog gi bstan pa 'jig dus tshe/_/rab tu dga' bas ston pa'i chos tshul 'dzin/_/des ni chos mchog mdzad pa de spyad pas/_/gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed gzhar mi 'gyur/_/gal te sems can thams cad sangs rgyas shing /_/nyon mongs med 
[\[259a.2\]]pa gser mdog stobs bcur gyur/_/de dag bskal bye khrag khrig brgya stong du/_/rgyal ba mchog la mchod pa'i bsngags brjod nus/_/'jig rten kun tu sdig pa'i las spangs te/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis mchog gi las byas shing /_/rlabs chen spyod tshe 
[\[259a.3\]]don ni legs byas nas/_/'jig rten mthu chen rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/gang gis spos chu yungs 'bru tsam blangs te/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la bdug byed pa/_/de yi phan yon brjod kyis sems dang zhing /_/rdul dang dri ma spongs la mnyan par 
[\[259a.4\]]gyis/_/de ni bsod nams ldan zhing phyogs kun rgyu/_/nad med gyur cing blo brtan bag yod la/_/spyad pa rnam par spyod tshe mya ngan 'dul/_/skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid du 'ong /_/rgyal po thob nas rgyal ba mchog bkur 'gyur/_/mthu chen rab mkhas 'khor 
[\[259a.5\]]los sgyur 'gyur te/_/gser gyi mdog ldan mtshan gyi go cha can/_/'jig rten kun na yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob/_/de la yid mi bde dang sdug bsngal med/_/spyad pa spyod tshe longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/_/phyug cing nor ldan mdzod ni rab tu mang /_/mya ngan med 
[\[259a.6\]]'gyur 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/skye bo mang po lhags te de la 'dri/_/rgyal ba mchog gi bstan pa khyad 'phags chos/_/tshig rab rjod cing the tsom sel bar byed/_/chos thos yid bde slar yang smra bar byed/_/sdig pa'i las med blo rgya che dang ldan/_/rgyal bas gsungs 
[\[259a.7\]]pa'i chos mchog khyad 'phags pa/_/dga' bar 'gyur la rtag tu mkhas byas te/_/mig kyang sbyong zhing mun pa sel bar byed/_/'dod chags mi che zhe sdang che ma yin/_/mi yi 'jig rten gti mug che ma yin/_/de ni tshangs spyod dag pa mchog 'di spyod/_/
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]mi yi don ni dpag tu med pa byed/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la spos bdugs na/_/de la gnod par sems pa su yang med/_/de ni nams kyang longs spyod nyams mi 'gyur/_/blta bar 'os shing nor chen ldan par 'gyur/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya 
[\[259b.2\]]rnams su/_/sems ni rnam dag sdig pa rnam dag cing /_/zhi zhing rab zhi zhi dul ldan gyur nas/_/mi dman sems kyis byang chub mtshungs med 'thob/_/sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/_/mya ngan med bde zhi ba mchog bkod cing /_/'khor 
[\[259b.3\]]lo mtshungs med 'jig rten kun bskor nas/_/phyi nas nyon mongs rdul med mya ngan 'das/_/su zhig dga' mgu sems kyi gos kyis ni/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la mchod byas pa/_/de ni gos mdzes bye ba stong rnams dang /_/khrag khrig brgya bgrangs 
[\[259b.4\]]mtha' yas rtag tu rnyed/_/bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/_/de ni btsas ma thag tu gos mchog 'thob/_/lha yi khyad 'phags dar gos rab bzang rnyed/_/btsas ma thag tu de lus shin tu bde/_/gang zhig gos kyis bcom ldan mchod 
[\[259b.5\]]rten dang /_/'dren pa mtshungs med rnams la mchod byed pa/_/de 'dir mtshungs pa med pa'i lus thob ste/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyi me tog rgyas/_/bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/_/lag mthil nas ni mu tig phreng mdzes pa/_/sna tshogs 
[\[259b.6\]]dag dang seng ge'i phreng ba dang /_/gser skud rab mdzes bskal pa mtha' yas 'byung /_/bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/_/lha 'am klu 'am mi'am lto 'phye che/_/su yang de la ma dad skyed mi byed/_/rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa mchog 'di spyod/_/
[\[259b.7\]]bcom ldan mchod rten gos kyis dkris byas na/_/stong gi 'jig rten khams kun zil gnon te/_/'dzam klung gser gyis gser ni zil mnan bzhin/_/skye dgu don ni dpag tu med pa byed/_/gal te rin chen rab mchog sna bdun gyis/_/stong gi zhing kun 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]rab tu bkang ba yi/_/de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i min/_/nor bu rin chen zla ba'i 'od rnams kyis/_/bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong zhing bkang ba/_/de 'dra'i dpal 'di zad par bya nus kyi/_/
[\[260a.2\]]rgyal ba'i mchod rten gos gcig phul ba'i min/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes mos bskyed de/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba dan phul byas na/_/de ni skye bo mang po'i mchod 'os 'gyur/_/byang chub mchog spyad dam pa zhi ba spyod/_/bcom ldan mchod rten 
[\[260a.3\]]ba dan phul byas na/_/dag cing mchog gi lus ni 'thob 'gyur te/_/dper na gser ltar shin tu dgar 'gyur zhing /_/lha yis bsngags la mchod cing bla mar byed/_/de yi lus ni gser gyi mdog 'drar 'gyur/_/ras kyi gos dang la ba bzang rab dang /_/
[\[260a.4\]]du gu la dang ka shi ka rnams dang /_/shin tu mdzes pa'i gos kyang rnyed par 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling na rigs mchog dam pa gang /_/phyug cing che nyid bdag dbang nor mang ba/_/de dag tu ni rtag tu de skye ste/_/dman zhing mchog tu dbul ba rnam par spangs/_/de la sems 
[\[260a.5\]]can su yang phrag dog med/_/sems can gnod par sems pa gzhar mi 'byung /_/gzhan gyi sdig pa'i las la de smod de/_/rtag tu bag yod tshul khrims rnam dag 'gyur/_/'dzin pa med cing ser sna med par 'ong /_/gtong ba rab btang mya ngan med pa 'thob/_/de ni 
[\[260a.6\]]srog phyir gzhan la sbyin mi byed/_/phongs pa med byed rtag tu bag yod 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon mthong nas ni/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis gdugs dang ba dan dang /_/mar me rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod/_/byang chub spyod mchog 'di ni 
[\[260a.7\]]rtag par spyod/_/mi yi 'jig rten bla mar bsnyen bkur byed/_/lha nang lha yi dag dang mi yi gtso/_/yid 'ong spos mdzes blta na sdug pa dang /_/nor bu shel 'dra sna tshogs ldan pa 'thob/_/ri rab rtse mor lha nang rab tu gsal/_/lha kun slob mar gyur nas mngon 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]du 'dud/_/chos kyis de dag yid bde skyed par byed/_/de la dad mchog gzha' gsang 'thob par 'gyur/_/de nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten du/_/rgyal po dam pa stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur/_/de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed/_/skye bo mang po dga' zhing yid 
[\[260b.2\]]'ong 'gyur/_/rdul bsal sems can mchog la rgyal mtshan phul/_/ring por mi thogs nor mang rnyed par 'gyur/_/shes rab mtha' yas mdzod ni mang ldan 'ong /_/sems chung mi 'gyur dman pa'i sems mi 'gyur/_/longs spyod rnyed nas bged cing bdag 
[\[260b.3\]]kyang spyod/_/de ni 'jigs med yid mi bde ba med/_/rgyal po dga' nas grong dang yul 'khor bged/_/de la sems can su yang sdig mi skyed/_/gtso bo khyad par 'phags pa mdzod mang zhing /_/khyim bdag rin chen sna tshogs lus brgyan 'gyur/_/rgyal po'i 
[\[260b.4\]]bu 'am de bzhin blon por 'ong /_/rgyal por gyur nas stobs ldan rdzi ba med/_/brnyas pa'i rigs dma' thams cad yongs su spong /_/longs spyod khyad 'phags rigs mchog rnyed nas ni/_/rtag tu bag yod sems ni zhum mi 'gyur/_/'dod pa rnams ni ngan skyugs 
[\[260b.5\]]khung ltar spong /_/khyad 'phags gzugs dang mtshan rnams rab tu 'thob/_/khyad 'phags rigs dang de bzhin dbang phyug nyid/_/de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu mi phyed 'gyur/_/skye bo mang pos mdun du bdar bar 'ong /_/de ni gzhan la gnod pa'i sems mi skyed/_/
[\[260b.6\]]sems ni rab dang rtag tu bag yod ldan/_/de la me dang dug dang mtshon mi tshugs/_/skye bo tshogs chen gyis ni blta bar 'gyur/_/rab tu dga' zhing thub pa'i chos la spyod/_/shes bzhin ldan nas yid bde skyed par byed/_/'dzin pa med cing chags med sems 
[\[260b.7\]]dang ldan/_/chags med gyur nas de la mi 'thun med/_/de yi lus gtsang kun nas nyon mongs med/_/rnam dag sems ldan de ni bden par smra/_/'jigs pas nyen pa rnams la yid bde skyed/_/sems can rnams kyi skyabs dang dpung gnyen 'gyur/_/de ni bdag 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]don rgya chen byas nas su/_/gzhan yang sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god/_/shing dbang shing mchog dam pa'i drung song nas/_/mtshungs med mchog zhi byang chub 'tshang yang rgya/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig phul na/_/'di nas bzung 
[\[261a.2\]]ste srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar/_/sangs rgyas zhing ni 'dzam klung gser gyis gang /_/de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/_/bcom ldan mchod rten mar me phul byas na/_/de yi lus ni mdog ngan yong mi 'gyur/_/gzugs mchog sra zhing lag pa gzu ba 'dra/_/
[\[261a.3\]]snang ba thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/gal te rgyal ba dam pa byung gyur na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang nye bar 'gyur/_/nye dur 'gyur ram yang na bur yang 'gyur/_/de ni ye shes phung po myur du 'thob/_/gal te khrag khrig brgya stong sangs rgyas 
[\[261a.4\]]zhing /_/yungs 'bru dag gis byur bur gang gyur pa/_/bgrang ba dang ni gzhal zhing brjod par nus/_/bde gshegs mar me gcig phul de lta min/_/sangs rgyas dam pa mtshungs med sbyin pa'i gnas/_/spyod pa mchog spyad khyad par brnyes gyur pa/_/mi mchog 
[\[261a.5\]]de la mchod pa 'dir byas pa/_/rnam par smin pa dam pa gzhal yas 'gyur/_/gal te mi mjed 'jig rten khams 'di kun/_/nor bu rin chen bai dUr+yas gang ba/_/zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/_/
[\[261a.6\]]kAr ShA pa Nas mi mjed 'jig rten khams/_/'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gang ba/_/zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas zhing stong de dag tsan dan gyis/_/'og nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gang ba/_/
[\[261a.7\]]zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/_/tshangs pa'i 'jig rten yod pa'i lha ris kyi/_/gos kyis sangs rgyas zhing stong gang gyur pa/_/zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/mar me gcig phul 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]dpal de zad mi 'gyur/_/klu dang lha min mi dang lto 'phye che/_/lha yi lha rdzas nor bu rin chen mang /_/zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/_/lha yi 'jig rten yod pa'i lha yi spos/_/de dag mi mjed 'di kun 
[\[261b.2\]]gang gyur pa/_/zad par bya nus sangs rgyas mchod rten la/_/mar me gcig phul dpal de zad mi 'gyur/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams tshad ni shes par nus/_/nam mkha'i khams 'di'i tshad kyang shes par nus/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten mar me gcig 
[\[261b.3\]]phul ba'i/_/de 'dra'i dpal de zad par bya mi nus/_/sangs rgyas dam pa mi mchog bzhud pa'i tshe/_/'dren pa mtshungs pa med la dad byas te/_/ston pa'i sku la nyi zer mi 'bab par/_/me tog ma li ka gdugs bcom ldan phul/_/de ni las mdzes dam 
[\[261b.4\]]pa gus byas pas/_/lha dbang brgya byin du ni lan 'bum gyur/_/'jig rten kun tu tshangs pa'i bdag por gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten la ni 'bum phul nas/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po stobs ldan gyur/_/stong phrag bcu la dbang bar nga gyur te/_/nor chen rab 
[\[261b.5\]]tu mdzod mang tshong dpon gyur/_/khyim bdag blo ldan bsod nams ldan par gyur/_/bde gshegs mi mchog bye ba nyi shu dag_/ngas ni mnyes byas gzims cha na bza' yis/_/mi mchog dag la bla mar bsti stang byas/_/de dag gtsug lag khang la spos kyis bskus/_/
[\[261b.6\]]nga yi kha dog ngan pa kun med 'gyur/_/ngas ni tsha dang grang dang ngal ba spong /_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar dman med sems gyur cing /_/de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod/_/rgyan gyis brgyan pa'i gdugs mdzes blta sdug pa/_/su zhig bcom ldan 
[\[261b.7\]]mchod rten 'bul byed pa/_/de 'dir lus ni mtshungs pa med 'gyur te/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/_/gang gis rgyal ba'i sku ni rab 'bar zhing /_/khyad par 'phags pa'i gzugs dang sems 'dra dang /_/'dzam klung gser ltar rab 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]mdzes blta na sdug_/mtshan gyi me tog rgyas pas mngon du gang /_/mngon par shes pa 'thob cing dbang cher grags/_/byang chub spyod mchog dam pa zhi ba spyod/_/de ni nams kyang longs spyod 'grib mi 'gyur/_/lhas kyang bsti stang bya zhing mchod par 
[\[262a.2\]]'ong /_/brtan pa 'dod pa'i longs spyod gzhar mi dka'/_/tshul khrims rnam dag rab mkhas tshangs par spyod/_/yi dam bcas nas nags dang nags 'dab song /_/mngon shes 'thob cing khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rnams la 
[\[262a.3\]]gdugs 'bul ba/_/ji lta bu yang byang chub sems mi 'dor/_/byams la gnas shing mi dman sems su 'gyur/_/de yi shes pa nams kyang nyams pa med/_/rol mo'i sgra yis mi mchog mchod byas na/_/mya ngan med cing dbang ldan rgyal por 'ong /_/mi yi 'jig rten yid 
[\[262a.4\]]'ong sgra ldan 'gyur/_/de sgra yan lag tshang zhing dag par 'ong /_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/shes bzhin ldan zhing mig ni rnam dag 'gyur/_/rna ba rnam par dag cing sems kyang dga'/_/sna yi dbang po mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_/de yi lce ni 
[\[262a.5\]]rab mdzes blta na sdug_/thog mar rab mnyen mdzes shing sgra yid 'ong /_/dper na lha yi rin chen bye ru 'dra/_/sgra skad yan lag bye ba dpag med 'byin/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/nams kyang sbrul du mi 'gyur lce med min/_/zhar ba sgur po ya yo 
[\[262a.6\]]can mi 'gyur/_/lus ni khyad par 'phags shing shin tu mdzes/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/lha 'am klu 'am mi 'am lto 'phye che/_/su yang de la ma dad skyed mi 'gyur/_/dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/bcom ldan 
[\[262a.7\]]mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/de ni ma ning za mar gzhar mi 'gyur/_/nams kyang mdze dang sha bkra mi 'byung zhing /_/bsngags par 'os pa'i lus ni thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/lce ring 'gyur zhing lus kyang che bar 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]'gyur/_/gser gyi gzugs ltar kha dog 'bar bar 'ong /_/ting 'dzin brtan zhing shin tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/lha nang bdag por 'gyur zhing dbang phyug 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten skyes na dga' bar 'ong /_/
[\[262b.2\]]brtson 'grus ldan zhing bag yod 'bar bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten rol mo'i sgra byas na/_/de la su yang yid mi bde mi skyed/_/de la su yang tshig rtsub smra ba med/_/phra ma thams cad spangs shing yang dag smra/_/bsod nams 'dod pa su zhig phyags thogs te/_/
[\[262b.3\]]bcom ldan mchod rten gus par 'phyag byed pa/_/de ni smad cing mi gtsang lus mi 'gyur/_/ba spu khung nas tsan dan dri ngad 'byung /_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du/_/yan lag ma smad khyad 'phags 
[\[262b.4\]]lus 'thob cing /_/mdzes la mtshan gyis go char byas par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/lha yi tsan dan khyad 'phags rab mdzes pa'i/_/gzhal med khang mchog yid 'ong dri ldan 'thob/_/de ni de la gzhar yang sred mi skyed/_/bcom 
[\[262b.5\]]ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/yid 'ong dri ldan mchog tu blta sdug pa'i/_/lha yi bu mo bye ba stong 'thob cing /_/de ni de la nams kyang chags mi skyed/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/skyed mos tshal mchog yod pa'i rdzing 
[\[262b.6\]]bu ni/_/yan lag brgyan ldan chu gtsang mdzes gyur pa/_/me tog ud pal las ni rgyas pa 'thob/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/de yi g.yog 'khor rtag tu 'thun 'gyur zhing /_/mi dman sems can lha yi sgra yang thos/_/lha mo rnams 
[\[262b.7\]]kyi glu dbyangs snyan sgra thos/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/'jig rten kun tu skyes tshe bdag nyid kyis/_/'di nas shi 'phos ngan 'gror mi 'gro zhing /_/mi yi 'jig rten sangs rgyas mthong bar shes/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]mchod rten phyags/_/de ni lha la snyan pa'i gtam byas te/_/sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la lha bkod nas/_/shi ba'i dus byas 'dzam bu'i gling du skye/_/bcom ldan mya ngan 'das pa'i mchod rten phyags/_/btsas ma thag tu bskal pa mtha' yas 
[\[263a.2\]]dran/_/sngon gyi sangs rgyas gtso rnams bkur ba dang /_/de dag mtshan dang yon tan chos kyang dran/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas ji ltar 'gyur zhes te/_/mos pa bskyed nas mchod rten rtswa skyes sel/_/de yi phan yon de dag ngas bshad kyis/_/tha ba dri sol dang ba'i 
[\[263a.3\]]sems kyis nyon/_/mthu chen skyes bu dam pa khyad 'phags pa/_/rgyal ba dam pa ma 'ongs dus na mthong /_/de dag mchod pa dam pa mchog gis mchod/_/de ni gzhar yang dad pa dam pa 'thob/_/sangs rgyas stobs bcu ded dpon des mthong nas/_/'dren pa 
[\[263a.4\]]mtshungs pa med la mchod pa byas/_/mtshan gyis go char byas pa'i sangs rgyas su/_/'gyur zhes thugs dgyes de dag lung yang ston/_/grong khyer yangs pa nyams dga' mchog gnas shing /_/nga ni chos ston gang gis mthong gyur pa/_/de dag phyi dus rab tu 
[\[263a.5\]]'jig pa'i tshe/_/rgyal mchog mya ngan 'das pa'i chos 'dzin 'gyur/_/mchod rten rtswa skyes sel bar byed pa ni/_/rgyal ba dam pa mi thul mthong 'dod pa'i/_/rgyu dang sa bon 'gyur ba 'di yin no/_/'dod dang dmyal dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas spong /_/byang chub 
[\[263a.6\]]sems dpa' gang gis mdo mchog 'di/_/phyi ma rab 'jig dus na 'dzin byed pa/_/de ni 'jig rten sangs rgyas lha yi lha/_/bsod nams khyad 'phags mtshungs med zhing du 'gyur/_/'di bshad tshe na gang dag 'dir mchod dang /_/tshul 'di bshad pa gang dag thos pa dang /_/
[\[263a.7\]]gang dag mdo mchog 'di ni 'dir bzung ba/_/de dag phyi ma'i dus na 'dir 'di 'dzin/_/gang dag phyin chad mdo mchog 'di 'dzin pa/_/de dag rtag tu nga dang 'thun pa'i sras/_/sangs rgyas bye bas de dag bsngags brjod kyang /_/de dag bsngags pa mthar ni phyin mi 'gyur/_/gang 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]dag phyi dus rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin pa/_/sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya mtha' yas/_/bskal pa bye bar bzhugs te de dag gi/_/bsngags pa brjod kyang mtha' mar phyin mi nus/_/dri zhim yid 'ong spos kyi cho ga bzhin/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten la ni su skud pa/_/
[\[263b.2\]]de ni thob rnyed 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/de ni sa 'dir snying po blangs par 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'jig 'gyur tshe/_/'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/de ni de tshe mtho ris bdag por 'gyur/_/
[\[263b.3\]]rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/dri mi zhim dang mi gtsang smad pa rnams/_/rtag tu spong zhing tshul khrims phung por gnas/_/de ni rtag tu tshangs spyod mchog 'dir spyod/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris lha 
[\[263b.4\]]dbang 'gyur/_/ring por mi thogs don stong rnams la rtog_/lha rnams la ni rgya chen don kyang byed/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/gang gi tshe na mi yi 'jig rten na/_/zhe sdang med sems 'jam zhing mnyen gyur pa/_/de tshe de na 'dzam bu'i gling du 
[\[263b.5\]]gnas/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/khyad 'phags tshig ldan sgra dbyangs yid 'ong 'gyur/_/skye bo mang po yid 'ong dga' zhing bkur/_/de yi kha bzhin rtag tu gsal bar 'gyur/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/de ni ngan song 
[\[263b.6\]]sa rnams ma lus spong /_/de bzhin gshegs dang nye ba thob par 'gyur/_/dad pa thob cing rtag tu bde la dga'/_/rgyal ba'i mchod rten spos byug phul byas na/_/rgyal po stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/blon po tshong dpon khyim bdag bsod nams ldan/_/
[\[263b.7\]]chos rje 'od mdzad sangs rgyas su yang 'gyur/_/dga' ba'i sems kyis mgu ba'i shugs skyed de/_/bcom ldan mchod rten nor bu'i dra ba 'bul/_/de ni rgyal po mtshan gyi go cha can/_/mthu chen bla ma 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/blta 'os mtshan gyi go cha ldan 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]gyur nas/_/gzhal med khang chen rab mdzes blta sdug pa/_/kha dog sna tshogs dpag med ldan pa dang /_/rin chen khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]che 'os dag pa 'thob/_/rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par 'phags gyur pa/_/skyes pa bud med dag gis gang ba dang /_/mnyam 
[\[264a.2\]]zhing legs byas rab mdzes blta sdug pa/_/dra ba sna tshogs bde byed bde 'jug 'thob/_/rgyal mtshan ba dan gsal bar mdzes byas shing /_/gdugs bres shin tu mdzes la blta sdug dang /_/mu tig dra ba phreng ba de 'dra ba'i/_/rgyal srid yon tan khyad 'phags 
[\[264a.3\]]gzhan yang 'thob/_/de yi yul na gzhan nor 'jig byed pa/_/chom rkun g.yo ldan g.yon can gnas mi 'gyur/_/sems can rgya chen blo mchog ldan pa dang /_/phan byed byams sems ldan pa de na gnas/_/shi 'phos bag yod de ni lhar 'gro ste/_/dkar gnag 
[\[264a.4\]]gang yin bdag cag ji ltar gnas/_/'di nas shi 'phos ji ltar mir skye zhes/_/blo ldan de ni mtho ris 'di gnas 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas sbyin gnas myur du mthong 'gyur te/_/mthong nas mchod cing mtshungs med bsti stang byed/_/sangs rgyas mthong nas byang chub 
[\[264a.5\]]mos skyed cing /_/rdul bral rnams la phyir zhing bsti stang byed/_/ye shes mtha' yas ldan dang mthu chen 'gyur/_/khyad par sa gnas 'phags pa'i sems can 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das la dad pa'i sems bskyed nas/_/'di 'dra'i dpal 'di phyir zhing myong 
[\[264a.6\]]bar 'gyur/_/nga yi bya ba 'di ni brjod par bya/_/ngas brjod 'di la the tsom ma skyed cig_/sangs rgyas bka' spangs mnar med 'gror 'gyur zhing /_/phyin chad sdug bsngal nyon mongs gyur ta re/_/'jig rten sgron ma mtshungs med bsod nams zhing /_/de yi mchod 
[\[264a.7\]]rten ba rgya su sel ba/_/bag yod gyur nas de ni bdud rgya 'dral/_/dus rnams kun tu ngan song sa yang spong /_/rtag tu sangs rgyas rdul bral bsti stang byed/_/rtag tu stobs ldan 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten skyes nas bsod nams ldan/_/rgyal po 
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]kun gyis mchod pa'i gnas su 'gyur/_/lha nang lha yi dbang po mchod gnas 'gyur/_/der ni myur du lha yi tshe yang 'thob/_/dpal ldan gser gyi gzhal med khang pa rnyed/_/lha yi bde ba mtshungs med dbang phyug nyid/_/gzugs dang sgra dang dri rab ro mchog dang /_/reg 
[\[264b.2\]]bya dpal ldan lha yi 'jig rten 'thob/_/mthu chen ldan zhing blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur/_/lha mo rnams la 'dod pa'i sred mi skyed/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/'di nas shi 'phos mi yi 'jig rten 'gro/_/yan lag legs gnas khyad par 'gro bar 
[\[264b.3\]]'gyur/_/nam yang bstan bcos mi nyung mang po 'thob/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/de ni mi khom brgyad po kun spong zhing /_/de ni dal 'gyur de bzhin khyad par 'phags/_/de ni sangs rgyas mtshungs med mchod pa byed/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba 
[\[264b.4\]]rgya bsal byas na/_/bag yod blo gros brtan la dpa' bor 'gyur/_/'dod pa'i yon tan dag la dga' mi skyed/_/mi dman sems kyis mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/de ni nams kyang byang chub sems mi 'dor/_/
[\[264b.5\]]tshul khrims skyon med shin tu bsdams par 'gyur/_/rnam dag 'dod chags bral ba'i chos kyang 'thob/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/de yi mdog ngan lus rnams kun tu spong /_/'chal pa'i shes rab ma lus rnam par spong /_/shes rab rgya chen gyur 
[\[264b.6\]]nas spyod la gnas/_/bcom ldan mchod rten ba rgya bsal byas na/_/kha zas gtsang ma dag kyang rnyed 'gyur la/_/khyad 'phags kha dog ldan zhing blta sdug la/_/reg dang ldan zhing rab mdzes gos rnams 'thob/_/dad pa'i shugs bskyed bcom ldan mchod rten 
[\[264b.7\]]la/_/me tog skam po nyal nyil phyags byas na/_/'dod pa smad pa sdug bsngal byed pa spong /_/stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ded dpon mnyes par byed/_/mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/_/de ni mdzes shing rnam dag lus su 'gyur/_/skye bo mang pos 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]mchod 'os blta 'os 'gyur/_/de la rgyal po gnod par sems mi 'gyur/_/bcom ldan mchod rten dag la snga rabs mis/_/me tog phul ba skam po phyags byas na/_/ngan song sa yi lam ngan thams cad gcod/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims 
[\[265a.2\]]phung por gnas/_/mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/_/bag yod mya ngan rnams dang skyon rnams spong /_/nad rnams du ma ma lus rnam par spong /_/bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su dbugs phyin thob/_/mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/_/sbyin 
[\[265a.3\]]gnas mtshungs med sangs rgyas thob par 'ong /_/mtshungs med thob cing lha mis mchod 'os 'gyur/_/rnam dag lus ldan rgyan gyis brgyan par 'gyur/_/lha yi me tog rab mdzes man dA ra/_/mtshungs med pa ta la yang su 'bul dang /_/mchod rten me tog nyal 
[\[265a.4\]]nyil su 'phyag pa/_/de dag rnam smin 'dra ste mchog tu 'gyur/_/mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/_/de lus dug gis mi tshugs mtshon mi tshugs/_/me 'bar 'od 'phro phung po ches mi tshugs/_/nor gyi phung po rkun pos brku mi 'gyur/_/mgu zhing rab tu dga' 
[\[265a.5\]]ba'i shugs skyed de/_/bcom ldan mchod rten me tog skam 'phyag na/_/de yi bsod nams bzung bar gang gyur pa/_/grangs sam cha yang brjod par sla ma yin/_/mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis go char 'gyur/_/mi 
[\[265a.6\]]yi 'jig rten na ni rtag tu dga'/_/mthu dang ldan zhing yid 'ong sgra skad 'byung /_/mchod rten me tog rnyis pa su 'phyag pa/_/chos mchog rab mdzes yang dag sbyor byed cing /_/de lus rnam par dag la chen por 'ong /_/ring por mi thogs 'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur/_/
[\[265a.7\]]'jig rten sangs rgyas 'gyur byar mos skyed de/_/ston pa'i mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/'jig rten dag na bla mar bkur sti bya/_/de ni mdzes shing blta na sdug par 'gyur/_/de 'dis rgyal srid thob nas lha klu mi/_/lto 'phye che dang 'jig rten thams cad 'dud/_
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]stong gi 'jig rten khams kun rgyas par 'gyur/_/dbang phyug nyid du dbang thob rgyal srid ston/_/de yi yul na sems can gang gnas pa/_/de kun sangs rgyas ye shes rdzogs la 'god/_/des ni ngan song sa yang rnam par spong /_/de dag rnams kyi don mchog dam pa 
[\[265b.2\]]byed/_/bsod nams blo gros dran ldan mchod 'os 'gyur/_/dbugs phyin thob nas 'jig rten kun tu rgyu/_/de yi g.yog 'khor yid 'ong sgra skad ldan/_/bsam pa ji bzhin de dag dga' ba skyed/_/sems can rnams la mi lhod zhi tshig ston/_/de la su yang 
[\[265b.3\]]dbang phyug med mi byed/_/skye bo tshogs chen dag gis blta 'os 'gyur/_/de yi g.yog kyang sgra dbyangs yan lag dag_/sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/sbyin dang snyan par smra dang don spyod dang /_/don 'thun pa dag skye bo mang la byed/_/spyos shing 
[\[265b.4\]]brgyad kyang khro ba'i dngos mi skyed/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten thal sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/mtho ris 'jig rten gnas shing lha dbang 'gyur/_/mir gyur na yang mi yi rgyal por 'ong /_/de ni gzhar yang yongs su nyams mi 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mchod rten thal 
[\[265b.5\]]sbyar phyag 'tshal ba/_/de ni gzhar yang ngan song phyis mi ltung /_/'jig rten 'dir de rtag tu 'dod pa spong /_/nor can nang na phyug cing mdzod mang 'gyur/_/yon tan ldan la tshig gcig su smra ba/_/de ni mi rigs sngags la gzhar mi spyod/_/mi yi 'jig rten 
[\[265b.6\]]gnas min spyod mi 'gyur/_/de la sems can mi ngoms dga' bar 'gyur/_/yid 'ong dbyangs ldan pho brang 'khor gshegs shing /_/'jig rten mgon po sgo gtan bzhugs pa'i tshe/_/su zhig shugs bskyed me tog blangs te gtor/_/de ni brgyan nas 
[\[265b.7\]]rgyal ba dam pa mthong /_/rang gi khyim du stobs bcu bsnyen bkur byed/_/de yi bshos gsol chos bzang ston pa mdzad/_/dad pa skyes nas mi mchog bsnyen bkur byed/_/gos kyang thogs te rnam par 'dren la 'bul/_/sangs rgyas byang chub mtshungs med mchog 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]thob nas/_/stobs bcu ldan zhing g.yo ba med gyur la/_/byang chub sangs rgyas sdug bsngal skye bo 'grol/_/'jig rten kun tu mtshungs med sangs rgyas shog_/de yi smon lam 'di 'dra 'di dang ni/_/sangs rgyas ye shes de sems dga' mkhyen 
[\[266a.2\]]nas/_/stobs bcu 'dzum mdzad 'jig rten thams cad du/_/mtshungs med sangs rgyas 'gyur zhes lung ston to/_/skyes bu dam pa mchog gi gsung thos nas/_/bde gshegs mchog gsung gzhan du mi 'gyur te/_/bdag ni rgyal ba mchog 'gyur dogs med 
[\[266a.3\]]ces/_/dga' zhing mgu nas bar snang kun tu rgyu/_/'jig rten lha yi lhar gyur sangs rgyas su/_/khyad 'phags mtshungs med sbyin gnas 'gyur ba dang /_/de sems spyod dang dga' bar gnas mkhyen nas/_/de la stobs bcu mnga' bas bzhes par 'gyur/_/bde 
[\[266a.4\]]gshegs mchog gis gos ni bzhes rig nas/_/de ni shugs skyes rab dga' sems mgu ste/_/mtshungs med 'jig rten mgon la bltas nas ni/_/'jig rten sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur mos pa bskyed/_/skye shi pha rol sems can bsgral bar bya/_/grol nas skye 
[\[266a.5\]]bo mang po 'dus byas dgrol/_/'jig rten kun na long ba'i mig bdag 'gyur/_/snang ba thob nas mun pa rab rib bsal/_/de ltas phan yon dam pa 'di thos nas/_/me tog phreng ba rgyal mtshan gos mchog dang /_/rol mo sgra dang gdugs dang byug bdug gis/_/
[\[266a.6\]]mgon po mchod la sangs rgyas 'gyur bar gyis/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_blo gros rnam par dag pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom 
[\[266a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa spyan ras gzigs zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]{D196}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI bi ha ra nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag 
[\[266b.2\]]gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das phyem red 
[\[266b.3\]]kyi dus kyi tshe nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas 'khor mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston to/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'chag cing dge slong lnga brgya po thams cad kyi gnas khang nas gnas khang du byung ste/_gnas brtan 
[\[266b.4\]]shA ri'i bu'i gnas khang ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas brtan shA ri'i bu gcig pu dben par 'dug ste nang du yang dag bzhag nas bsam gtan byed par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[266b.5\]]btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod bsam gtan byed dam/_smras pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin no/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nyon mongs pa spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te ma spangs pa rnams spang ba'i phyir bsam gtan byed 
[\[266b.6\]]dam/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'das pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te ma 'ongs pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te da ltar byung ba la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te 
[\[266b.7\]]tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod mig la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]bu khyod gzugs la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te sgra dang /_dri dang /_ro dang /_reg bya dang /_chos rnams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te gzugs kyi khams 
[\[267a.2\]]dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te phyi rol la gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te phyi nang la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_ci btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod lus la 
[\[267a.3\]]gnas te bsam gtan byed dam/_'on te sems la gnas te bsam gtan byed/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di ltar tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba dang /_brjed pa med par gnas par bya ba'i phyir te de lta bu'i phyir bsam gtan byed do/_/'jam dpal gyis 
[\[267a.4\]]smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'am/_tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'am/_brjed pa med pa'i chos de dag dmigs sam/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal bdag gis chos gang dag tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'am/_
[\[267a.5\]]tshe 'di ma yin pa la bde bar gnas pa'i chos de dag yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing mi dmigs mod kyi/_'on kyang 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin pa de la bdag rten cing gnas so/_/'jam dpal 
[\[267a.6\]]gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben pa'i chos su gsungs pa gang yin/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang la rten cing gnas/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di la dge slong ni 'das pa la rten cing gnas so/_/
[\[267a.7\]]ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas so/_/da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas so/_/de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems kyi bar la rten cing gnas par khong du chud par bya ste/_'jam dpal chos de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas nyan thos rnams la rab tu dben par gsungs pa yin te/_bdag 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]chos de dag la rten cing gnas so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir 'di skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/_ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/_da ltar byung ba la rten cing rab tu dben pa la gnas pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems kyi bar la rten 
[\[267b.2\]]cing rab tu dben pa la gnas zhes smra/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/_gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin/_gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin/_gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang yod pa ma yin te/_de ltar chos de dag ni yod pa 
[\[267b.3\]]ma yin na/_ji ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bu de 'di skad ces 'das pa la rten cing gnas/_ma 'ongs pa la rten cing gnas/_da ltar byung ba la rten cing gnas zhes smra/_yod pa ma yin pa'i chos la ni gnas pa med do/_/yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_
[\[267b.4\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni ci yang ma yin/_gang gis kyang ma yin/_gang gi yang ma yin/_gang la yang mi gnas te/_gang mi gnas pa de'i gnas dmigs su med do/_/yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa 
[\[267b.5\]]dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid ces brjod cing kun tu gnas nas smra ba de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa la skur ba 'debs pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni g.yo ba med pa rlom sems med pa'o/_/'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni nyams pa med pa'o/_/'di ltar 
[\[267b.6\]]de bzhin nyid ni stong pa'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'o/_/smon pa med pa'o/_/yang btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'das pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med/_gang ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med/_gang da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs 
[\[267b.7\]]su med pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te/_sems kyi bar gyi de bzhin nyid de yang dmigs su med do/_/'on kyang btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ma gtogs par gang bstan pa'am/_rab tu bshad par nus pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so/_/shA ri'i bus smras 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]pa/_'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs nas chos ston tam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid yod pa ma yin na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/_btsun 
[\[268a.2\]]pa shA ri'i bu chos kyang yod pa ma yin na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin nyid la bzhugs te chos ston/_chos thams cad kyang yod pa ma yin te 
[\[268a.3\]]dmigs su med/_de bzhin gshegs pa yang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/_/de'i chos bstan pa na 'di 'dra ste/_'di la dmigs pa'am mi dmigs pa gnyis kyis rab tu phye ba med do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa'am mi brjod pas rab tu phye ba ma yin 
[\[268a.4\]]no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa ni brjod pa yang dag par chad pa/_btags pa med pa/_gdags par bya ba ma yin pa'o/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal su zhig chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur/_'jam 
[\[268a.5\]]dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'dus byas kyi khams rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'dod par yang mi 'gyur ba de ni chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/_/gang 'das pa'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing 'das pa'i chos 
[\[268a.6\]]rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams mi dmigs shing 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos rnams kun shes par mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[268a.7\]]kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba mi mthong zhing de nye bar len par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur ro/_/gang bdag dang bdag med par yang spyod par mi 'gyur ba dang /_gang len pa dang /_'dor bar yang spyod par yang mi 'gyur ba de chos 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]bstan pa 'di lta bu 'di'i snod du 'gyur te/_de ni bshad pa 'di'i don kun shes par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal 'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu bshad pa 'di'i don shes par 'gyur ba ci zhig yod na/_
[\[268b.2\]]'di la ci zhig kun shes par 'gyur zhes de skad 'dri/_shA ri'i bus smras pa/_'jam dpal chos zab mo bstan pa 'di mngon sum du 'gyur ba nyung /_'di ni yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba nyung ngo /_/'jam dpal dgra bcom pa dang /_slob pa dang /_mi slob pa rnams kyang sa phyogs 
[\[268b.3\]]'di la sgyid lug par 'gyur na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams lta ci smos/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa rnams la ni sa med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dgra bcom pa yang med na sa gang la dgra bcom pa gnas par 'gyur/_dgra bcom pa dag ni 
[\[268b.4\]]gnas med pas rab tu phye ba'o/_/dgra bcom pa dag ni dmigs su med pas rab tu phye ba'o/_/dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang /_mi brjod pa shin tu chad pas rab tu phye ba'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar dgra bcom pa dag ni brjod pa dang /_mi brjod pa yang dag par chad pa 
[\[268b.5\]]ste btags pa med pa'o/_/dgra bcom pa dag ni sar dbye ba dag dang bral ba/_'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba/_'jug pa med pa/_'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba ste/_dgra bcom pa dag ni 'dus ma byas pa gnas pa med pa yin na ci zhig dgra bcom pa dag gi sar
