[\[268b.6\]]'gyur/_dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/_/byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni ming dang gzugs la rnam par rtog go/_/ming dang gzugs de yang rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med par dgra bcom pa rnams kyis shes te/_de'i phyir 
[\[268b.7\]]dgra bcom pa dag ni ming dang gzugs kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin no/_/byis pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/_byis pa'i chos dang /_dgra bcom pa dang /_dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams kyang mi dmigs so/_/nam mi dmigs pa de'i tshe na mi rtog go/_/kun tu mi spyod 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]do/_/de spyod pa med/_spros pa med cing nye bar zhi ba ste/_yod do zhes khas mi len/_med do zhes khas mi len/_yod kyang yod la med kyang med do zhes khas mi len/_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin zhes de skad kyang khas mi len to/_/nam 
[\[269a.2\]]khas mi len pa de na dmigs pa med do/_/de dmigs pa thams cad dang bral bas sems med cing sems dang bral te gnas med pa'i tshul gyis dge sbyong gi chos la gnas pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na 'khor 
[\[269a.3\]]de'i dge slong lnga brgya po stan las langs nas 'di skad ces 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi blta'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di 
[\[269a.4\]]ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ston pa mngon sum du gyur bzhin du kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /_rnam par byang ba mtshan nyid gcig tu ston pas chos ma yin pa smra'o zhes brjod nas de dag yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par 
[\[269a.5\]]gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la tshangs par spyod pa spyad snyam nas dong ngo /_/de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal khyod 'di ltar sems can rnams kyis chos kun shes par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir chos mi ston 
[\[269a.6\]]tam/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin no/_/shA ri'i bus smras pa/_dge slong lnga brgya po de dag stan las langs te 'phya smod/_mi snyan par zer zhing dong ngo /_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang gi phyir dge slong lnga brgya po 
[\[269a.7\]]de dag 'di skad ces/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi blta'o/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mi mnyan to/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o zhes zer ba de ni legs so legs so/_/shA ri'i bu dge 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]slong de dag gi tshig de ni legs par smras pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/_/gang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pa de la blta ba dang mnyan par mi nus so/_/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 
[\[269b.2\]]phyogs gang na gnas pa'i phyogs de yang spang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pas gang de'i gnas kyang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med do/_/gang yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med pa de ni bsten par 
[\[269b.3\]]bya ba ma yin no/_/de nas dge slong lnga brgya po de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di thos pa dang /_slar sa phyogs der log nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal bdag cag ni ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar 
[\[269b.4\]]mi shes so/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_dge slong dag legs so legs so/_/de lta bu ni ston pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi bya ba ste/_dge slong dag 'di la ni kun shes par bya ba med/_rnam par shes par bya ba med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas med pa'i tshul gyis gnas pa 
[\[269b.5\]]nyid do/_/chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de dbyings ma yin no/_/de ni yod pa ma yin te dmigs su med cing g.yo ba med la 'chi 'pho med do/_/gang g.yo ba med cing 'chi 'pho med pa de kun shes par bya ba ma yin/_rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin no/_/gang 
[\[269b.6\]]kun shes par bya ba dang /_rnam par shes par bya ba'i rlom sems med pa de ni ston pa'i nyan thos zhes bya/_mchog thob pa zhes bya/_gtso bo zhes bya/_sbyin gnas zhes bya'o/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga brgya po de dag las dge slong bzhi brgya ni len pa med 
[\[269b.7\]]par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/dge slong brgya ni sems cher 'khrugs nas lus de nyid dang sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du lhung ngo /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]dpal khyod sems can rjes su bsrung ba'i chos mi ston pas dge slong brgya po de dag chud zos te ngo mtshar byas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu khyod de skad ma zer cig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[270a.2\]]shA ri'i bu dge slong brgya po de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod du reg pa thang cig reg nas dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu gal te dge slong de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ma thos su zin na de dag gdon mi za bar 
[\[270a.3\]]sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur te/_las de zad nas mir skye bar 'gyur ba zhig na de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten pas bskal par sems can dmyal ba myong bar 'gyur ba'i las de yang cung zad cig myong bar byas so/_/shA ri'i bu de'i phyir dge slong brgya 
[\[270a.4\]]po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa'i nyan thos thog ma 'dus par dgra bcom pa zag pa zad par 'gyur ro/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di som nyi dang bcas pas thos pa ni dam pa yin gyi/_bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par zhugs pas ni de lta 
[\[270a.5\]]ma yin/_tshad med pa bzhis ni de lta ma yin/_gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgoms pas ni de lta ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu de ma thos par 'khor ba las yongs su ma grol/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi 
[\[270a.6\]]ba dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrugs pa rnams las yongs su ma grol zhes bshad do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal 'di 
[\[270a.7\]]ltar sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad pa ngo mtshar to/_/'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid ni 'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang 'bri ba ma yin/_'phel 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]ba yang ma yin no/_/sems can gyi khams kyang 'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin no/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar de dag ni yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/_gang 
[\[270b.2\]]gis kyang ma yin/_gang gi yang ma yin/_gang la yang mi gnas te gnas pa med do/_/btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang 'di lta bu'i mi 'gag pa de ni byang chub po/_/byang chub gang yin pa de ni thar pa'o/_/thar pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o/_/gang rnam par mi rtog pa 
[\[270b.3\]]de ni mi byed cing 'gyur ba med do/_/gang mi byed cing 'gyur ba med pa de ni yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ji skad bstan pa de bzhin te/_de 
[\[270b.4\]]bzhin nyid ni 'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin no/_/chos kyi dbyings kyang 'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin no/_/sems can gyi khams kyang 'bri ba ma yin/_'phel ba ma yin no/_/kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[270b.5\]]'di ltar de dag yod pa ma yin zhing dmigs su med de tha snyad tsam du zad pas ci yang ma yin/_gang gis kyang ma yin/_gang la'ang mi gnas te gnas pa med do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs 
[\[270b.6\]]dang /_/da ltar byung chos brjod pa ni/_/don gyis ma yin tha snyad tsam/_/gcig dang sna tshogs mtshan nyid min/_/mtshan nyid med par gang rtog pa/_/de dag nyid ni mtshan nyid 'gyur/_/mtshan nyid med la rtog pa med/_/rtog pa nyid kyang mtshan nyid min/_/'dus 
[\[270b.7\]]ma byas la gang rtog dang /_/mya ngan 'das la gang rtog pa/_/gnyi ga bdud kyi las yin zhes/_/de ni mkhas pa rnams kyis bshad/_/phung po skye mched khams kyi rnams/_/de dag ming gis brjod pa ste/_/ming dang skye mched gang yin pa/_/de gnyis mtshan nyid gcig 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]pa yin/_/tshul bzhin la ni gang rtog pa/_/de nyid tshul bzhin ma yin no/_/mkhas pa cung zad mi rtog ste/_/stong pa ji bzhin spyod yul lo/_/gang dag rtog pa de dag g.yo/_/rtog pa med pa g.yo ba med/_/rtog pa rnams ni g.yo bar 'gyur/_/
[\[271a.2\]]rtog pa med pa mya ngan 'da'/_/gang gis rang bzhin 'di shes pa/_/de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya/_/de phyir zag pa rjes su thob/_/de ni rtog med ye shes so/_/ye shes kyis ni ye shes brjod/_/ye shes brjod pa rnams kyang gsog_/ye shes 'di ltar gang bzod pa/_/
[\[271a.3\]]de ni ye shes ldan zhes bya/_/gang gis stong gsum 'di dag rnams/_/rin chen bkang ste byin pa bas/_/gang gis dam chos 'di 'dra la/_/bzod pa de ni bzod pa mchog_/bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su/_/sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa dang /_/brtson 'grus 
[\[271a.4\]]bsam gtan bsnyen pas ni/_/mdo sde 'di dang mtshungs ma yin/_/chos 'di dang ni theg pa 'di/_/yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsungs/_/mdo sde 'di la brten byas na/_/thams cad de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na srog 
[\[271a.5\]]chags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go/_/dge slong lnga brgya ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 
[\[271a.6\]]sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad bskal pa skar ma lta bu zhes bya ba la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de dag thams cad kyang 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog 
[\[271a.7\]]ces bya bar ming 'thun par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa 'jam dpal gnas pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la 
[\[271b.2\]]phab pa//[ {D197}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya a mr-i ta byA ha ran+nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_
[\[271b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na 'od ma'i tshal bya ka lan da ka gnas pa na dge slong lnga brgya tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs cig go/_/
[\[271b.4\]]de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[271b.5\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[271b.6\]]sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu bar 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa de bzhin gshegs pas khyod la rtag tu skabs phyes/_byams pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[271b.7\]]rgyas la dris shig dang /_dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos du dag dang ldan na bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar bgyid par ma lags pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i slad du tshe ring 
[\[272a.2\]]du skyong bar bgyid pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_byams pa legs 
[\[272a.3\]]so legs so/_/byams pa khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir bzhugs te/_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[272a.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni khyod yang legs so/_/de'i phyir byams pa khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad do/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol te/_bcom ldan 
[\[272a.5\]]'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga dang ldan na bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 'da' bar 
[\[272a.6\]]bya ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du skyong bar byed pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/lnga po dag gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rgyun mi 'chad par chos sbyin pa dang /_
[\[272a.7\]]rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_dga' ba chen po dang /_btang snyoms chen po bsgom pa dang /_rgyun mi 'chad par mchod rten rnyis pa gsos pa dang /_rgyun mi 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]'chad par sems can thams cad byang chub kyi sems la mos par bya ba ste/_byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na bdud kyi ris thams cad kyis bgegs bya bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_bdud kyi 'khor thams cad kyis 
[\[272b.2\]]'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa dang /_sems can rnams la snying brtse ba'i phyir tshe ring du skyong bar byed pa dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis chos lnga bstan pa 'di bshad 
[\[272b.3\]]pa na dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba nyon 
[\[272b.4\]]mongs pa med pa rnam par dag go/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag spobs lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa bdag spobs lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[272b.5\]]kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu da de'i dus la bab par shes na'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas/_de'i tshe stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs 
[\[272b.6\]]te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/sems can 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug thams cad kyi bro nad can/_lta ba thams cad kyi rab rib dang ling tog gi mun pas bsgribs pa 
[\[272b.7\]]thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bro nad gso ba dang /_chos kyi mig bla na med pa yongs su sbyang ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni a la la rmad du byung ba chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni a 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]la la bdud rtsi chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa 'di ni a la la sman pa'i rgyal po chen po lta bu lags so/_/tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes pa yang rung ste/_gang dag gi rna lam du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag par gyur pa 
[\[273a.2\]]de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba chen po'i tshogs bsags pa dag ste/_sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa lags/_sangs rgyas thams cad la lta ba dang ldan pa lags/_skye bo mang po la lhag par bgyi ba bgyis pa lags/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun pa lags so/_/
[\[273a.3\]]de dag las kyi sgrib pa de yongs su dag nas dud 'gro'i yul de las yongs su thar te mi'i lus thob par 'gyur zhing /_thob nas kyang tshe rabs snga ma dran te/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa la dad pa rnyed nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du skye bar 'tshal ba de dang der 
[\[273a.4\]]skye bar 'gyur na/_mir gyur nas thos pa rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni de ltar sems can rnams kyi don chen po lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa'i sems can de dag 
[\[273a.5\]]ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la nges pa'i tshogs la gnas par 'gyur ba lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung bas myur du bla na med pa 
[\[273a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa legs so legs so/_/byams pa khyod kyis ji skad smras pa de ni de bzhin no/_/de ni bden no/_/de ni kho na'o/_/de ni ma 
[\[273a.7\]]nor ba'o/_/gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di the tsom dang bcas pas thos pa'i sems can de dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ngu dang ldan pa ma yin na/_gang dag the tsom med par nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_rgya 
[\[273b\]]
[\[273b.1\]]cher yang dag par ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_mdo sde 'dzin pa de lta bu de dag la bdud kyi las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de dag la 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug dang /_nga rgyal dang /_ser sna dang /_khro ba dang /_gnod sems kyis gnod par mi 'gyur 
[\[273b.2\]]ro/_/de'i lus la rims nad dang /_nad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/yul gang na mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang /_chos smra ba gnas pa'am/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di glegs bam du bris te yod pa'i yul der nad dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'go ba'i nad 
[\[273b.3\]]dang /_'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig par 'gyur ba'i dus 
[\[273b.4\]]la bab cing /_sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig par 'gyur ba 'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i dus la bab pa na bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skyes bu dam pa de dag la rab tu bstan par bgyi'o/_/de dag la gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o/_/yul gang na mdo sde 'di 'dzin 
[\[273b.5\]]pa de lta bu dag gnas pa'i yul der bdag gis dus ma lags pa'i bser ma dang /_dgung char dang /_mu ge dang /_bro nad ya nga ba dang /_mi ngas dang /_yams kyi nad dang /_'go ba'i nad dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/yul 
[\[273b.6\]]gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ba dang /_glegs bam du bgyis pa'am/_rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mor btags pa la mchod pa bgyid pa'i yul der bdag gi byin gyi rlabs kyis pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad dang /_chom rkun dang /_srin po dang /_mkha' 'gro ma'i 
[\[273b.7\]]ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gang dag na chos smra ba 'di lta bu dag dang /_mdo sde 'di 'chang ba'i yul der bdag gis lo tog dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_me tog dang /_lo ma dang /_'bras bu thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bde ba thams cad 'byung 
[\[274a\]]
[\[274a.1\]]bar byin gyis brlab par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_byams pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul 
[\[274a.2\]]yongs su bskyed pa'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa legs so legs so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyod la yongs su gtad kyis phyi ma'i tshe/_phyi ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha ma la dam pa'i chos nub pa'i dus la bab cing sangs rgyas kyi byang chub 'jig 
[\[274a.3\]]par 'gyur la/_'jigs pa chen pos 'jig pa'i dus la bab pa'i tshe khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sems can thams cad la bstan par bya'o/_/rab tu bsgrags par bya'o/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag gi mos pa bskyed par bya'o/_/don dam pa'i chos nyid tshad mar 
[\[274a.4\]]byas la mngon par brtson pas las gzhan mi bya bar rab tu bsgrags par bya'o/_/don dam pa'i chos nyid kho na las brtsams te dbang du byas la bstan par bya'o/_/ci nas kyang skyes bu dam pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta ba bzhin du phyin ci ma log par don rtogs 
[\[274a.5\]]par 'gyur ba de ltar bstan par bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo/_/de nas dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang /_skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams 
[\[274a.6\]]kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mjug tu phyin pa'i dus la bab par shes nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la lha'i me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos dang /_me tog phreng dang /_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_
[\[274a.7\]]gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dag gis mchod nas 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das gang gis sems can dpag tu ma mchis pa rnams kyi don bgyis pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni a la la bdud rtsi brjod pa lags so zhes smras so/_/de 
[\[274b\]]
[\[274b.1\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu thos par dkas/_khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung shig_/yi ger bris shig_/chongs shig_/lhogs shig_/kun chub par gyis shig_/
[\[274b.2\]]tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos gsol pa/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung lags na/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo 
[\[274b.3\]]de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/byams pas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[274b.4\]]po byams pa dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//
[\[274b.5\]]'phags pa bdud rtsi brjod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA barma dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[274b.6\]{D198}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya mai trI ya pra s+thA na nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis 
[\[274b.7\]]thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na dge slong lnga stong tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' khri'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang 
[\[275a\]]
[\[275a.1\]]mngon par shes pas mngon par shes pa yin zhing /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyang phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur 
[\[275a.2\]]te 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa brtsegs pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' zla 'od gzhon nur gyur 
[\[275a.3\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa yang 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[275a.4\]]btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[275a.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas zhus nas/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do/_/de nas 'jam dpal gzhon 
[\[275a.6\]]nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byams pa 'di ltar byas pa dang /_zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa skabs 'byed par mdzad do/_/gal te de bzhin gshegs pa la 
[\[275a.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/_nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/_phung po dang khams dang skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/_'dod chags dang /_
[\[275b\]]
[\[275b.1\]]zhe sdang dang /_gti mug zad par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed/_pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te zhu bar mi byed/_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed na/_de ltar na zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa skabs 
[\[275b.2\]]'byed par mdzad do/_/gal te khyod 'du byed rnams las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/_gal te khyod bden pa khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/_lam dang /_lam bsgom par bya ba'i 
[\[275b.3\]]phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/_gal te khyod 'bras bu thob par bya ba dang /_mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir zhu bar mi byed dam/_gal te khyod mi gnas pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed dam/_yi ge rnams mi brjod par zhu bar byed na/_de lta na zhus nas zhu ba lung 
[\[275b.4\]]bstan pa'i phyir khyod la de bzhin gshegs pas skabs 'byed par mdzad de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byams pa ji tsam du sgro 'dogs pa de tsam du chags pa yod la/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos bstan pa ni chags pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas tshe dang ldan 
[\[275b.5\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal sgro btags pa sgro btags pa zhes bya ba/_'jam dpal ji tsam gyis na sgro btags par 'gyur/_'jam dpal gyis smras pa/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu chos thams cad ni 
[\[275b.6\]]stong pa nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_mtshan ma med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_smon pa med pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_ji lta ba bzhin mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_de bzhin nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_chos kyi 
[\[275b.7\]]dbyings mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_mi skye mi 'gag mi gnas pa mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_ma skyes ma byung ba mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin/_chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 
[\[276a\]]
[\[276a.1\]]mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa yin na/_btsun pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag 'di ltar chos thams cad mnyam pa la mi mnyam par brtags nas med bzhin du sgro 'dogs pas sgro 'dogs par byed de/_'di ni sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni chos so/_/'di ni dge 'dun 
[\[276a.2\]]no/_/'di ni bdag go/_/'di ni sems can no/_/'di ni gang zag go/_/'di ni shed las skyes pa'o/_/'di ni shed bu'o/_/'di ni byed pa po'o/_/'di ni tshor ba po'o/_/'di ni chad pa'o/_/'di ni rtag pa'o/_/'di ni so so'i skye bo'o/_/'di ni nyan thos 
[\[276a.3\]]so/_/'di ni rang sangs rgyas so/_/'di ni byang chub sems dpa'o/_/'di ni kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o/_/'di ni kha na ma tho ba med pa'o/_/'di ni zag pa dang bcas pa'o/_/'di ni zag pa med pa'o/_/'di ni 'dus byas so/_/'di ni 'dus ma byas so/_/
[\[276a.4\]]'di ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'o/_/'di ni rnam par byang ba'o/_/'di ni dge ba'o/_/'di ni mi dge ba'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten pa'o/_/'di ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'o/_/'di ni 'khor ba'o/_/'di ni mya ngan las 'das pa'o/_/'di ni dngos po'o/_/'di ni 
[\[276a.5\]]dngos po ma yin pa'o/_/'di ni yod pa'o/_/'di ni med pa'o/_/'di ni thob pa'o/_/'di ni mngon par rtogs pa'o/_/'di ni mngon sum du bya ba'o/_/'di ni lam mo/_/'di ni lam gyi 'bras bu'o zhes bya ba 'di ni sgro btags pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_btsun 
[\[276a.6\]]pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu mnyam pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med cing gang dag 'di ltar rnam par rtog pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid du sgro 'dogs pa yin te/_mi mnyam par sgro 'dogs pa ni ma yin la/_gang dag mthong ba med par mnyam pa nyid mthong ba de dag ni mnyam pa nyid 
[\[276a.7\]]mthong ba yin/_sgro 'dogs pa la spyod pa ni mi mnyam par mthong ba yin zhing /_gang dag mnyam pa nyid la sgro mi 'dogs pa de dag ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba yin la/_sgro 'dogs pa la spyod pa ni mnyam pa nyid mthong ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na dge slong 
[\[276b\]]
[\[276b.1\]]nyis brgya len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol te/_dge slong de dag 'dul ba la dbang mdzad pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar dus yol bar mdzad do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 
[\[276b.2\]]'di skad ces smras so/_/'jam dpal kho bo ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las brtsams te de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed do/_/rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams/_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las brtsams te/_de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed 
[\[276b.3\]]pa nas kho bo ni mi gnas pa'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar mi byed do/_/'jam dpal kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa la ci nas de bzhin nyid dang mi 'gal ba de ltar zhu bar byed do/_/'jam dpal kho bo ni gang dag de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang /_gang 
[\[276b.4\]]dag chos thams cad dben pa nyid kyi phyir chos ci yang mi dmigs pa dang /_gang dag chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug rnams kyis mi gos pa dang /_gang dag 'khor ba mi dmigs pa nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba las 'da' bar 
[\[276b.5\]]mi byed pa dang /_gang dag gang nas kyang 'ong ba med pa nyid dang /_gang du'ang 'gro ba med pa nyid kyi phyir mya ngan las 'das pa thob par mi byed pa de dag gi phyir de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do/_/'jam dpal kho bo ni ci nas kyang yi ge rnams kyang mi brjod tshig gi lam la yang 
[\[276b.6\]]mi dpyod la/_shes rab kyis kyang bye brag phyed par 'gyur ba dang /_shes pa yang gang yang med la/_'di la rnam par grol ba yang gang yang med pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yi ge stong pa nyid kyi phyir dang /_thams cad skye ba med pa nyid kyi 
[\[276b.7\]]phyir ro/_/de nas 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' gang dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni de kho na ltar ldem po ngag snrel zhir 'dug pa'i tshig 'di dag kyang ston la brjod pa thams cad kyang 
[\[277a\]]
[\[277a.1\]]chos nyid dang 'thun par sbyor ba las na zab mo'i shes rab dang ldan no snyam mo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[277a.2\]]po byams pa 'di de tsam du zab mo'i bzod pa la nges shing shes rab dang /_spobs pa ston pa la mkhas pa ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas yun ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[277a.3\]]chub tu sems bskyed pa de bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/_de ltar bgyis na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i 
[\[277a.4\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyis gnas de dag kyang thos la/_'jug pa de yang thos nas slar zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la brtson par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[277a.5\]]sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni yun ring po nas tshangs par spyad pa spyod do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas ni sngon gyi 
[\[277a.6\]]rgyal ba rnams la bya ba byas so/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do/_/zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la yang dag par zhugs te/_bskal pa brgyad khri bzhi stong lon nas de'i 'og tu gdod ngas bla na med pa 
[\[277a.7\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[277b\]]
[\[277b.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi thad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mtshan ci lags pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par 
[\[277b.2\]]bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas khyod la bshad do/_/bcom 
[\[277b.3\]]ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rnam par rtse ba sngon byung ba 
[\[277b.4\]]'das pa'i dus na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa/_yun ring zhing tshad med/_bsam gyis mi khyab/_dpag tu med pa'i snga rol de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs 
[\[277b.5\]]pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od kyi spu'i khung bu re re nas 'od zer bye ba 
[\[277b.6\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag kyang gser gyi 'od ltar bzang la 'od zer re res kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re 'od kyis snang bar byed do/_/'od zer re res kyang pad ma bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang po dag 
[\[277b.7\]]gis shar phyogs 'gengs par byed do/_/lho phyogs dang /_nub phyogs dang /_byang phyogs dang /_phyogs mtshams dang /_steng dang /_'og kyang de dang 'dra'o/_/phyogs re rer yang de bzhin gshegs pa re res sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'gengs par 
[\[278a\]]
[\[278a.1\]]mdzad do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re res kyang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma sangs rgyas dang /_chos rnams la 'dul bar mdzad de/_phyir mi ldog pa la 'god de/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[278a.2\]]sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de'i gser gyi 'od kyis 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu snang bar byed do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyi ma dang zla ba gnyis kyi ming med do/_/rgyu skar dang /_gza' dang /_skar ma dang /_me'i 'od kyi ming yang mi grag go/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[278a.3\]]bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ji ltar gdugs mtshan rnam par gzhag par 'gyur lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[278a.4\]]kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sa gzhi chen po de rin po che sna bdun las grub pa yin te/_
[\[278a.5\]]lag mthil ltar mnyam par 'gyur la rin po che sna bdun gyi sa gzhi chen po de las kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi pad ma shing rta'i phang lo tsam la mdzes shing blta na sdug pa dang /_dri zhim po'i ngad ldang la yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'phags te/_pad ma re re las dri bsung gi ngad ldang ba'i dri des 
[\[278a.6\]]kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab ste/_sems can gang dag gis dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges so/_/pad ma de dag kyang snga dro'i dus kyi tshe na me tog rgyas la/_phyem red kyi dus kyi tshe ni rnyis par 'gyur te/_
[\[278a.7\]]des na sems can de dag 'di snyam du sems te/_phyem red kyi dus la bab po snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyin mtshan rnam par gzhag par 
[\[278b\]]
[\[278b.1\]]mngon pa yod do/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na/_mi khom pa brgyad ni tha na ming tsam yang med do/_/sdug bsngal ba'i ming tsam dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyang ming tsam yang med do/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khrig pa'i chos 
[\[278b.2\]]dang bral ba/_dri nga ba med pa 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang bar gyur to/_/'dus pa re re la 'ang byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis yod de/_de'i mjug tu bcom ldan 'das de'i byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med grangs med pa 'dus par gyur to/_/de 
[\[278b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de yang chos gzhan mi ston te/_byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'ba' zhig ston par mdzad do/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 
[\[278b.4\]]'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos gang yang de bzhin nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_chos gang yang yang dag pa'i mtha' las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_'dod chags 'dod chags kyi 
[\[278b.5\]]ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_zhe sdang zhe sdang gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_gti mug gti mug gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_gzugs gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed rnams dang /_
[\[278b.6\]]rnam par shes pa rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_mig mig gi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_rna ba dang /_sna dang /_lce dang /_lus dang /_yid yid kyi ngo bo nyid las phyir mi ldog pa dang /_ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med la/_dngos 
[\[278b.7\]]po med pa gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang phyir mi ldog la/_gang du yang mi 'jug pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byang 
[\[279a\]]
[\[279a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i sde snod phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par ston to/_/de'i tshe chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan pa gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po gser mdog ces bya ba zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po gser 
[\[279a.2\]]mdog des bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang bcas pa la lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur 
[\[279a.3\]]byas/_bla mar byas/_ri mor byas/_mchod pa byas so/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pas kyang rgyal po gser mdog gi bsam pa rig nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[279a.4\]]gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de la bsnyen bkur bya bar spro bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu rgyal po gser mdog des 'khor gyi khyams dpag tshad brgyad cu rtsa bzhi pa zhig byas te/_'khor gyi khyams der dar gyi lda ldi ni bres/_me tog gis ni pus mo nub pa tsam du khyab par byas/_
[\[279a.5\]]steng gi bar snang la ni mu tig dmar po'i dra ba bres/_snying po'i spos kyi mchog gis ni bdugs te/_'khor gyi khyams der de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bting ba khri'i rkang pa rin po che du mas 
[\[279a.6\]]spras pa zhig bshams so/_/byang chub sems dpa' re re'i stan yang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba dag bshams so/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de dpag tshad nyis stong na bzhugs te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog gis gshegs shul dpag tshad 
[\[279a.7\]]nyis stong legs par brgyan nas/_'di lta ste/_lam de'i ngos g.yas g.yon du stegs bu rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa dag byas so/_/lam de yang pus mo nub pa tsam du me tog gis khebs par byas so/_/steng gi bar snang la ni rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra ba'i 
[\[279b\]]
[\[279b.1\]]bla re bres so/_/stegs bu de dag la yang rin po che'i shing ljon pa 'phang du mda' rgyang gang tsam yod pa dag btsugs so/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig nas rin po che'i shing ljon pa gcig tu rin po che'i thag gu bres so/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa gnyis gnyis kyi bar 
[\[279b.2\]]du rdzing rin po che'i stegs bus bskor ba gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/_bai dUr+ya'i them skas kyi rim pa dang bcas pa/_me tog ud pal dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar pos gang ba/_ngur pa skad 'byin pa dang ldan pa dag byas so/_/de bzhin du rin po che'i shing 
[\[279b.3\]]ljon pa'i bar thams cad du yang rdzing dag byas te bkod pa de kho na dang 'dra bar bkod do/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du me tog sil ma thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/rin po che'i spos kyi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/rnga bo che dang /_rdza 
[\[279b.4\]]rnga dang /_khar rnga dang /_kim pa la dang /_pi bang dang /_khar dkrol la sogs pa rol mo'i cha spyad rnam pa sna tshogs thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do/_/de ltar rin po che'i shing 
[\[279b.5\]]ljon pa re re'i drung thams cad du mi brgya phrag de snyed de snyed bkod nas/_gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis me tog sil ma 'di dag gis gtor cig_/tsan dan gyi phye ma 'di dag gis gtor cig_/pog 
[\[279b.6\]]por 'di dag gis bdugs par gyis shig_/sil snyan 'di dag kyang dkrol cig_/gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan 'di dag kyang sgrengs shig ces bsgo'o/_/rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyi drung du rin po che'i me tog gi snod thogs pa'i mi lnga brgya lnga brgya 
[\[279b.7\]]yang bkod do/_/lhag ma rnams kyang de bzhin du sbyar te/_gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de lam 'di nas phan tshun du gshegs pa de'i tshe khyod kyis rin po che'i me tog 'di dag gis gtor cig ces bsgo'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[280a\]]
[\[280a.1\]]gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de/_gtsug lag khang de nas byung ma thag tu 'khor gyi khyams su gshegs te de'i bar du gtsug lag khang nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang ba byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lam dpag tshad nyis stong po de dag byang chub sems 
[\[280a.2\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po re re phan tshun du 'dom re re tsam na 'greng ngo /_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de phan tshun du gshegs pa na/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi mthus byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[280a.3\]]re re'i mgo bo'i drang thad kyi steng na dngul gyi gdugs dkar po gser gyi rtsa ba can/_mu tig dmar po'i dra bas g.yogs pa gser gyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bskor ba/_ma bzung bar nam mkha' la phan tshun du 'gro'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang de dang 
[\[280a.4\]]'dra'o/_/rin po che'i gdugs de dag la dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba btags pa gang yin pa de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/_rin po che'i gdugs de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sgra ji lta bu 'byung ba de 'dra ba ni sil snyan yan lag 'bum dang ldan pa 
[\[280a.5\]]las kyang mi 'byung ngo /_/rin po che'i gdugs dang dril bu g.yer ka de dag dang /_rin po che'i shing ljon pa'i lo ma de dag dang /_rin po che'i thag gu de dag dang /_rin po che'i stegs bu de dag dang /_sil snyan dang glu dbyangs de dag las kyang sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos kyi sgo rnam pa sna 
[\[280a.6\]]tshogs kyi sgra 'byung ste/_de na sems can gang dag sbyin pa la mos pa de dag gis ni sbyin pa'i sgra thos so/_/gang dag tshul khrims la mos pa de dag gis ni tshul khrims kyi sgra thos so/_/de bzhin du gang dag bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_bsam gtan la mos pa dang /_
[\[280a.7\]]gang dag shes rab la mos pa de dag gis ni shes rab kyi sgra thos so/_/de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa dang /_smon pa med pa dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa'i sgra dang /_de bzhin du dbang po dang /_stobs dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag dang /_
[\[280b\]]
[\[280b.1\]]lam gyi sgra dang /_de bzhin du mngon par shes pa dang /_stobs dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dag gi sgra 'byung ste/_sems can rnams ji lta bur mos pa de lta bu'i sgra 'byung zhing thos so/_/chos kyi sgra de thos nas kyang 
[\[280b.2\]]sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de lam de nas phan tshun du gshegs pa na/_dbu'i drang thad kyi 
[\[280b.3\]]steng gi bar snang la rin po che 'bum phrag du mas spras pa'i lha'i rin po che'i gdugs ma bzung bar 'phags te phan tshun du 'gro'o/_/rin po che'i gdugs de dang /_dril bu g.yer ka de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las kyang sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 
[\[280b.4\]]phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos bstan pa byung ngo /_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de'i rin po che'i 
[\[280b.5\]]gdugs de las byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya zhes bgyi ba'i chos bstan pa gang lags pa de/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas legs par bka' stsal du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[280b.6\]]dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya'i brtsam pa tsam ngas bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /_mtshan ma 
[\[280b.7\]]med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_gnas pa med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_dngos po med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya dang /_ji lta ba 
[\[281a\]]
[\[281a.1\]]bzhin gyi phyag rgya dang /_'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang /_dben pa'i phyag rgya dang /_rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgya dang /_mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_byed pa med pa dang 'gro ba med pa'i phyag rgya dang /_gzung du med pa dang gnas med pa'i phyag rgyas 
[\[281a.2\]]btab pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na nam mkha' la ni phyag rgya brko bar sla ba yang ma yin la phyag rgyar yang 'dug pa dang /_phyag rgya'i 'bur yang gdags su med de/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gnas kyang med/_rkyen yang 
[\[281a.3\]]med/_rgyu yang med/_skyed pa yang med/_rten yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /_nam mkha'i rnam pa can dang /_nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid dang /_nam mkha' ston par yang 
[\[281a.4\]]dag par shes pa dang /_nam mkha' la ni chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad do/_/ji ltar nam mkha'i chos thams cad gdags su med par gnas te gdags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin du chos thams cad la yang gdags su med par gnas 
[\[281a.5\]]te/_gdags pa tsam du zad par yang dag par shes pa dang /_gang chos rnams gdags pa tsam du shes pa de ni de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa'o/_/gang de bzhin nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya shes pa'o/_/'di ni de bzhin 
[\[281a.6\]]gshegs pa'i phyag rgya ste/_des na de bzhin nyid la rmongs par mi 'gyur ro/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgyas mi skye ba'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam 
[\[281a.7\]]par rtse ba la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par 'khor gyi khyams der gshegs te der byon pa na lha 'bum dag mchod pa'i 
[\[281b\]]
[\[281b.1\]]las bya ba la spro bar gyur te/_me tog ud pa la dang /_pad ma dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad ma dkar po rnams 'thor bar byed do/_/lha'i me tog man dA ra ba'i char yang 'bebs so/_/sil snyan bye ba phrag 'bum dag kyang dkrol bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs 
[\[281b.2\]]pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de 'khor gyi khyams der bzhugs pa na rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa mchod pa'i las bya ba dang /_bsnyen bkur bya ba dang /_bla mar bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas par gyur to/_/mchod pa ji lta bu dag gi 
[\[281b.3\]]phyir spro bar gyur ce na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas par bzhugs pa la/_byang chub sems dpa' re re'i rgyab na glang po che dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa nye bar gnas la/_glang po che'i rgyal po de'i sna la yang 'di lta ste/_
[\[281b.4\]]rlung dang nyi ma bskyab pa'i phyir rin po che'i gdugs gsal zhing blta na sdug pa thogs pa dang /_glang po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi sna la yang mu tig sngon po gsal ba'i mu tig gi do shal 'phyang ba dang /_mu tig gi do shal de las kyang chu bsil zhing bai dUr+ya sngon po 'dra la yan 
[\[281b.5\]]lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/_chu des chu'i bya ba byed pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' dag 'khod ma thag tu 'di lta ste/_lha'i mthus lag pa g.yas pa la rin po che'i lhung bzed byung bar gyur to/_/lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lhung bzed 'dzin par 
[\[281b.6\]]byed do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de la ni tshangs pa nyid rin po che'i gdugs thogs te snam logs na 'dug go/_/rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang mu tig gi do shal dag 'phyang ngo /_/mu tig gi do shal de dag las kyang chu bsil zhing bai dUr+ya sngon po 'dra la 
[\[281b.7\]]yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa 'bab ste/_chu des de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chu'i bya ba mdzad do/_/lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni bcom ldan 'das de'i lhung bzed 'dzin to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas par bzhugs 
[\[282a\]]
[\[282a.1\]]ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' de dag la lha mo re re mdun na 'dug ste/_lha'i spos dri zhim po sna du ma mchig la 'thag par byed do/_/spos de 'thag pa na yang rdzi phyogs dang rdzi phyogs ma yin par ser bu ldang ste/_ser bu des byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi lus la 
[\[282a.2\]]spos kyis phog par byed do/_/skyes bu dam pa de dag ni dri nga ba med pa ste/_de dag ni lha mo'i 'du shes kyang 'jug par mi byed la de dag ni spos kyi mtshan ma yang mi skyed na chags par lta ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin 
[\[282a.3\]]gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od bzhugs par rig nas bu stong dang /_bud med brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_tshong dpon brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_blon po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_bu mo brgyad khri bzhi stong dang /_
[\[282a.4\]]gzhan yang skye bo'i tshogs mang po dag dang lhan cig tu rang gi lag nas bca' ba dang bza' ba bsod pa mang po mchog tu gtsang bas tshim par byas te ci bzhed pa bstabs so/_/tshim par byas shing ci bzhed pa bstabs te bshos gsol nas bstsang lder gyu ste phyag bcabs par rig 
[\[282a.5\]]nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la bye ba 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i ras bcos bu phrugs cig phul lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' re re la yang bye ba phrag 'bum ri ba'i ras bcos bu phrugs re re phul lo/_/phul nas kyang skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang /_yul mi gtso bo 
[\[282a.6\]]rnams dang lhan cig tu thal mo sbyar nas 'di lta ste/_chos mnyan pa la gus pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar 'khod do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od des skye bo'i tshogs chen po gus par 'khod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[282a.7\]]chos 'dod par thugs su chud nas sgo so so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang bcom ldan 
[\[282b\]]
[\[282b.1\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od des bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba zhes bgyi ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs de legs par bka' stsal du gsol/_de ltar bgyis na byang chub 
[\[282b.2\]]sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo rnams kyang sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de la slob par 'gyur lags so/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[282b.3\]]kyi bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs de las brtsam pa tsam zhig bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo so so ba ni gzhan ma yin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho nar zad de/_'di lta ste/_sbyin 
[\[282b.4\]]pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sgo 
[\[282b.5\]]so so ba ni de yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di nyid la sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo yang bskor/_sems can rnams kyang yongs su 
[\[282b.6\]]smin par mdzad nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das la/_ma 'ongs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang sgo so so ba 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing /_da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi de 
[\[282b.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i de dag kyang sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la bslabs nas bla na med pa yang 
[\[283a\]]
[\[283a.1\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mdzad pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu gang byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag nyid yang dag par smra bas 
[\[283a.2\]]smra ba'o/_/de la sgo so so ba de'i bye brag ni gang yin/_nyes pa ni gang yin/_rnam par gnon pa ni gang yin/_nges par 'byung ba ni gang yin zhe na/_ser sna'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/
[\[283a.3\]]yongs su 'dzin pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/nor kun tu srung la bgo bsha' mi byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa' gang ser sna'i sems rnam par gnon cing bcom nas sbyin pa yid la byed pa skyed pa de ni de'i rnam par 
[\[283a.4\]]gnon pa yin no/_/de longs spyod ji ltar chung yang rung /_longs spyod rgya chen po dag yod kyang rung ste/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_slong ba rnams la bgo bsha' byed la de dga' ba'i sems dang /_kun tu 'dzin pa med pa'i sems dang /_mgu ba'i sems dang /_
[\[283a.5\]]rnam par smin pa la re ba med par sems can thams cad la snying rje bas phan pa'i dngos po sngon du btang ba'i sems bskyed pas lag pa brkyang ste sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni sgo so so ba la slob pa yin te/_'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges par 'byung ba'o/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[283a.6\]]'chal pa'i tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang /_zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ral ba'i tshul khrims dang /_nag nog gi tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/byang chub sems 
[\[283a.7\]]dpa'i 'chal pa'i tshul khrims dang /_nyams pa'i tshul khrims dang /_'dres pa'i tshul khrims dang /_zhig pa'i tshul khrims dang /_ral ba'i tshul khrims dang /_nag nog gi tshul khrims gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' gang nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs 
[\[283b\]]
[\[283b.1\]]rgyas kyi sems sam/_dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am/_dmigs pa'i lta ba 'dod pa dang /_nyan thos kyi gtam mam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi gtam mam/_dmigs pa can gyi gtam la dga' bar 'dzin pa 'di ni 
[\[283b.2\]]byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims 'chal ba dang /_tshul khrims nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims 'dres pa dang /_tshul khrims zhig pa dang /_tshul khrims ral ba dang /_tshul khrims nag nog can zhes bya'o/_/byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la mi spyod pa dang /_mi slob 
[\[283b.3\]]pa ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rab yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 
[\[283b.4\]]de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal ba bgyis na ni tshul khrims 'chal bar mi 'gyur la/_gang gi tshe nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/_dmigs pa can gyi sems bskyed pa de'i tshe ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'i rab tu 'gyur 
[\[283b.5\]]lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa gzhan las 'gal bar byas sam/_
[\[283b.6\]]ngas ltung bar 'gyur ba'i chos bzhi gang dag gsungs pa de dag gi nyes pa byas sam/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs te 'dug gam/_mtshams med pa lnga byas su zin kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' de byang chub kyi sems kyang ma btang ma spangs 
[\[283b.7\]]te/_byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral la/_dmigs pa can gyi sems dang /_mngon par zhen pa'i sems kyang mi skyed na byang chub sems dpa' de ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa kho na yin pa dang /_tshul khrims ma nyams pa dang /_tshul khrims ma 'dres pa dang /_tshul khrims 
[\[284a\]]
[\[284a.1\]]ma zhig pa dang /_tshul khrims ma ral ba dang /_tshul khrims nag nog can ma yin par gzung bar bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yang yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la bar du gcod 
[\[284a.2\]]par byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' sdig pa'i las byas pas srid par 'gro ba skyed du zin kyang 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' ni ji tsam du srid par 'gro ba skyed pa de tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' de 
[\[284a.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa la bslabs su zin kyang de nyan thos kyi sems sam/_rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/_dmigs par lta ba dang lhan cig sten par byed na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims las nyams par 
[\[284a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub kyi sems mi gtong la/_dmigs par lta ba'i sems kyang mi skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang 
[\[284a.5\]]gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa'i sems ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/sems can rnams la mi snyoms pa'i yid la byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/sems can rnams dang chos rnams la tha dad par 'du shes pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/
[\[284a.6\]]sems can rnams la dmigs pa la rten pa'i byams pa phyogs gcig pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/stong pa nyid la mi bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni sbyin no/_/'di la ni mi sbyin no snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di 
[\[284a.7\]]la ni yon dbul lo/_/'di la ni mi dbul lo snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni chos bshad par bya'o/_/'di la ni chos bshad par mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di la ni bsnyen bkur bya'o/_/'di la ni bsnyen bkur mi bya'o 
[\[284b\]]
[\[284b.1\]]snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du so sor 'gyed par byed de/_'di ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o/_/'di ni tshul khrims 'chal ba'o snyam du so sor phye nas tshul khrims 'chal ba la brnyas par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[284b.2\]]nyes pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang /_chos thams cad la sems mnyam par bya dgos shing nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba dang /_sa dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_rlung dang /_nam mkha' lta bur 
[\[284b.3\]]snyoms pa'i sems dang /_stong pa nyid la bzod pa dang ldan par bya dgos pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang sems can gang yang yongs su mi gtong la/_mi gnas pa'i sems dang /_tshad nges par mi byed pas sems can thams cad kyi phyir snying rje bskyed cing 
[\[284b.4\]]byams pas mos par byas te/_khyab par byas nas bsgrubs te gnas la/_chos rnams la yang stong ngo snyam du bzod pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang 'khor ba la tshad 
[\[284b.5\]]nges par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa ste/_bskal pa 'di tsam gyi bar du ni bdag 'khor bar bya'o/_/bskal pa 'di tsam gyi bar du ni 'khor bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/sems can 'di snyed cig ni bdag gis grol bar bya'o/_/
[\[284b.6\]]sems can 'di snyed cig ni bdag gis grol bar mi bya'o snyam pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/'di ni brtson 'grus so/_/bdag ni brtson 'grus can no/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pa de ni byang 
[\[284b.7\]]chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/de la byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gang zhe na/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar go cha bgo bar bya ste/_'khor ba'i sngon gyi mtha' mi mngon no zhes ji skad du 'byung ba de srid du bdag 'khor ba na 'khor 'khor te/_
[\[285a\]]
[\[285a.1\]]gal te bdag sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa de kho na snyed du 'khor ba na 'khor bar bya dgos par gyur na yang bdag gis spro bar bya'o/_/rnam grangs 'di bzhin du sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa de ji srid pa de srid du 'khor ba 
[\[285a.2\]]na 'khor dgos na yang bdag gis spro ste/_de yang brtson 'grus dang /_nga rgyal dang /_byang chub la mngon par zhen pa spangs la mi dmigs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi go chas spro bar bya'o snyam ste/_de ltar byang chub sems dpa' go cha bgos pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so 
[\[285a.3\]]so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grol rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang dag tu song na sems can rnams kyi don nus shing lcogs la/_'os yin bzhin du de dgon 
[\[285a.4\]]pa'i phyogs dben pa zhig tu 'dug nas dben pa na spyod cing bsam gtan gyi ro'i dga' ba dang /_bde ba la rten cing gnas pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i nyes pa'o/_/byang chub sems dpa' gang sbyin pa yang sbyin par byed la skyo ba yang med/_sems kyi dmigs pa la yang mi sten/_
[\[285a.5\]]nang du yang dag 'jog kyang 'phel bar byed/_bsam gtan gyi ro myong ba yang med mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yang yin na byang chub sems dpa' de ni byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang shes rab 
[\[285a.6\]]kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par shes nas 'di la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gang zag gang yang med do snyam du de ltar shes nas bdag nyid dul bar bya ba dang /_zhi gnas la rnal 'byor du brtson par gnas la/_
[\[285a.7\]]sems can gzhan phyin ci log tu dmigs pa'i 'dzin 'khris zin pa de dag la stong pa nyid bdag med pa'i tshul de mi rjod mi ston/_brda sprod par mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i thabs la mi mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/_nyes pa byed pa yang ma yin no/_/byang 
[\[285b\]]
[\[285b.1\]]chub sems dpa' gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med par shes shing chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong par shes nas/_'di la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gang zag gang yang med do snyam ste/_'di ltar ngo bo 
[\[285b.2\]]nyid kyis stong pa'i chos 'di dag lus kyis mngon sum du byas te/_thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i sems dang ldan la/_sems can phyin ci log tu sems shing dmigs pa can gang yin pa de dag kyang phyin ci log gis zin cing dmigs pa'i sems su gyur pa de las rab 
[\[285b.3\]]tu grol bar byas nas/_de dag la yang chos thams cad ngo bo nyid med do zhes chos ston cing de dag kyang chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya ba la 'dzud par byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de ni thabs la mkhas pa yin par rig par bya ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so 
[\[285b.4\]]so ba la spyod pa dang slob pa yang yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od bshos gsol nas/_'khor gyi khyams der 'khor de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so 
[\[285b.5\]]so ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgyas par bshad do/_/bcom ldan 'das des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sems can tshad med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu ngas bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las 
[\[285b.6\]]lhag par byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs las brtsams te/_chos bstan du zin kyang spobs pa'am/_chos kyi sgo rnams zad par mi 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang de'i brtsams pa tsam bstan pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na rgyal po gser mdog des 
[\[285b.7\]]de bzhin gshegs pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang thabs cig tu lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi tham par bkod pa de lta bu dang /_bsnyen bkur dang /_phu dud du bya ba de lta bus bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas/_rim gro byas/_mchod pa byas so//_//
[\[286a\]]
[\[286a.1\]]bam po gnyis pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyal po gser mdog des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag 
[\[286a.2\]]gi gtsug lag khang ma bgyis lags sam/_de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na bzhugs bzhugs lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad 
[\[286a.3\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi rang rang gis sprul pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na gnas gnas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 
[\[286a.4\]]bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de ltar lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po de dag 'das pa'i tha ma'i nyin par rgyal po gser mdog gis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bshos gsol/_yon phul te/_slar gshegs par rig nas bsam pa 'di lta bu zhig bsams te/_ci bdag gi dge 
[\[286a.5\]]ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du 'gyur bar yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/_'on te tshangs par 'gyur ba yongs su bsngo bar bya'am/_'on te 'khor los sgyur ba thob par bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngo bar bya snyam mo/_/de nas de'i sems bskyed pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[286a.6\]]gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od des thugs su chud do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po de'i sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas rgyal po dang /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gi mdun du steng gi bar snang la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku de kho na bzhin du rnam pa thams 
[\[286a.7\]]cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i lus shig sprul te/_de steng gi bar snang de la 'dug nas rgyal po gser mdog la tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so/_/dper na mi ni shes rab 'chal/_/byis pa'i rang bzhin gyur pa zhig_/rgyal po bsnyen bkur byas nas ni/_/bya dga' chung ngu 
[\[286b\]]
[\[286b.1\]]gsol bar byed/_/de bzhin la las sangs rgyas la/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mchod byas nas/_/tshangs pa brgya byin rgyal po'i srid/_/dma' ba'i gnas la 'dod par byed/_/rgyal por gyur dang brgya byin dang /_/de bzhin tshangs par 'gyur ba rnams/_/'di dag mi rtag brtan ma yin/_/
[\[286b.2\]]brnyan ma yin te 'jig tshul can/_/srog chags kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/byang chub sems ni bskyed par gyis/_/sangs rgyas 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyis/_/de 'dra'i sems ni bsngags pa yin/_/rgyal po khyod ni yul 'khor bcas/_/mchod pa rgya chen byas zin 
[\[286b.3\]]gyis/_/byang chub sems ni bla na med/_/rgya chen sems ni khyod kyis bskyed/_/dma' ba'i smon lam ma 'debs shig_/de ni byis pa'i spyod yul yin/_/shes rab bzang po mkhas par gyis/_/byang chub mchog la 'jug par gyis/_/mya ngan 'das pa 'dod pa'i phyir/_/
[\[286b.4\]]sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rnams la/_/gang gis stong gsum thams cad kyang /_/rin chen bkang ste phul ba bas/_/gang gis thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/sems kyi byang chub bsngo byas la/_/tshig tu brjod pa ma byas kyang /_/de ni de bas shin tu che/_/gang gis 
[\[286b.5\]]sems can thams cad la/_/bskal pa bye ba brjod med du/_/sems can kun la bsnyen byas kyang /_/de yi bcu drug char mi phod/_/gang zhig thal sbyar byang chub sems bskyed dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na 'jig rten don mdzad pa/_/rnam 'dren sangs rgyas gang dag 
[\[286b.6\]]bzhugs rnams la/_/bsod nams 'dod pa'i mi 'gas sngon chad kyi/_/'khor bar bskal pa bye bar mchod pa bas/_/mi gang mkhas shing mdzangs pa'i rang bzhin can/_/bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan la yid ches shing /_/byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed nas 
[\[286b.7\]]kyang /_/bde gshegs mchod rten la ni me tog 'bul/_/'di ni de bas bsod nams khyad par brjod/_/byang chub sems kyis me tog 'bul byed la/_/bsod nams snga ma de ni dper mi rung /_/rgya mtsho dang ni chu yi thigs pa bzhin/_/sangs rgyas zhing 'dir sems can 
[\[287a\]]
[\[287a.1\]]ji snyed pa/_/bskal pa re re la ni sangs rgyas gyur/_/bskal pa mang por las gzhan mi byed par/_/bsod nams bshad kyang mtha' ni thug pa med/_/de dag byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan/_/bskal pa mtha' yas bar du bshad na yang /_/chung 
[\[287a.2\]]zad tsam yang yongs su brjod mi 'gyur/_/sa gzhi dag las rdul ni blangs pa bzhin/_/de ltar rgyal po skyes mchog khyod kyis kyang /_/byang chub sems kyi phan yon 'di thos nas/_/myur du blo gros dma' ba kun spongs la/_/byang chub phyir ni rgya chen sems skyed cig_/'jig 
[\[287a.3\]]rten 'dren pa gser gyi mchod sdong 'od/_/bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan kun ldan pa/_/de yis byang chub sems kyi rnam par smin/_/'di 'dra zhes ni phan yon 'di dag bstan/_/byang chub sems kyi rnam smin bstan pa yi/_/bsod nams de la gal te gzugs yod na/_/zhing 
[\[287a.4\]]rnams gang gA'i bye snyed gang byas kyang /_/de dag bkang bas cha tsam zad pa med/_/rjes su bstan pa 'di 'dra thos nas kyang /_/rgyal po'i gtso bo sems ni dga' gyur te/_/sor mo bcu yi thal mo sbyar byas nas/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal zhes ni tshig tu smras/_/byang 
[\[287a.5\]]chub phyir ni bdag gis sems bskyed do/_/bdag ni chos rje sangs rgyas grub par shog_/byang chub rdul bral 'dus ma byas rtogs nas/_/sems can gang gA'i bye snyed dgrol bar bgyi/_/sangs rgyas sku des tshigs bcad 'di brjod nas/_/de tshe rgyal po'i gtso bo 
[\[287a.6\]]dga' gyur pa/_/shes nas stong gsum thams cad rab g.yos te/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po bzhin du mkha' las song /_/rgyal po gser mdog sems ni dang gyur nas/_/bu dang bu mo de bzhin chung ma dang /_/rgyal po dang ni tshong dpon khyim bdag rnams/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[287a.7\]]la ni phyag 'tshal 'dong zhes bos/_/bye ba brgya phrag drug cus yongs bskor zhing /_/me tog rnams dang phreng dang bdug pa thogs/_/sangs rgyas ga la bar ni gnyi rgyud song /_/zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas ni phyogs gcig 'dug_/de bzhin bu dang bu mo chung ma dang /_/blon po dang ni tshong 
[\[287b\]]
[\[287b.1\]]dpon khyim bdag dang /_/rgyal po gzhan dang de bzhin 'khor gyi rnams/_/de dag kyang ni phyag 'tshal gus par 'khod/_/lha rnams kyis kyang de bzhin bar snang thams cad khyab/_/sil snyan dkrol zhing me tog char pa phab/_/gser gyi mdog de yul gyi mis bskor nas/_/
[\[287b.2\]]thal mo sbyar byas sangs rgyas zhu bar byed/_/stobs bcu ldan pa dpag med lha yi lha/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba khyod la zhu/_/gang gis byang chub sems ni brtan por bskyed/_/de yi bsod nams ji tsam bskyed 'gyur lags/_/bcom ldan ji ltar spyod pa spyad bgyis 
[\[287b.3\]]na/_/bskal pa mang por sdug bsngal mi mthong bar/_/nges par bde dang bde blag tshim gyur pas/_/byang chub bdud rtsi mya ngan med pa rtogs/_/bdag gzhar rkang lag btang yang mi 'tshal zhing /_/mgo dang rang sha stsal bar mi 'tshal bar/_/bdag ni nges 
[\[287b.4\]]par bde gnas spyod pa yi/_/thabs 'dir thub pas bdag la bstan du gsol/_/rtag tu bde dang bde blag ldan par shog_/nams kyang bdag lus sdug bsngal ma gyur cig_/byams dang bzod dang dul dang sdom pa la/_/gnas nas bdag gis byang chub mchog 
[\[287b.5\]]reg shog_/le lo ma mchis rtag tu bslab la slob/_/bdag gis bslab pa nams kyang gzhig mi bgyi/_/'dren pa bdag ni dam bcas brtan par bgyi/_/nams kyang tshig tsam lhur len yong mi bgyid/_/rang byung bsod nams 'bras bu bdag la gsungs/_/
[\[287b.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa theg pa bde ba gsungs/_/ji ltar spyod pa'i bslab pa bka' stsal gsol/_/thos nas ji ltar bstan bzhin gnas par bgyi/_/gser 'od gser bkod 'od [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]des gsungs pa/_/kye kye sa yi bdag po mnyan par gyis/_/bde ba'i rgyu 
[\[287b.7\]]yi bsod nams khyod la bshad/_/bslab pa'ang bshad kyis de phyir nga las nyon/_/gang gis stong gsum rin chen gang byas la/_/stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la 'bul byed pa/_/de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/_/bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 
[\[288a\]]
[\[288a.1\]]'gyur/_/gang gis zhing rnams gang gA'i bye ma snyed/_/rin chen gang bar byas nas sbyin pa byin/_/de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/_/bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gang gis bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tu/_/sems can thams 
[\[288a.2\]]cad la ni mchod pa byed/_/de bas byang chub tu ni smon byed pa/_/bsod nams shin tu mang po 'phel bar 'gyur/_/gal te sems can thams cad dgra bcom gyur/_/ye shes dbang thob gyur pa de dag la/_/bsod nams 'dod pa'i gang zag la la zhig_/bskal 
[\[288a.3\]]pa khrag khrig bar du mchod pa byed/_/gang gis snying rje bskyed nas byang chub tu/_/rgya chen sems ni skyed par byed gyur te/_/sems can la la gang gis byang chub tu/_/sems kyi gtso bo bskyed pa byas nas kyang /_/gom pa bdun ni bor ba'i bsod nams ni/_/de bas khyad par 
[\[288a.4\]]'phags par 'gyur ba yin/_/gal te sems can mtha' dag sangs rgyas te/_/spobs pa mtha' yas ldan pa nyid gyur la/_/ji ltar sngon gyi 'khor ba'i bskal pa'i bar/_/sems can gcig pus mchod pa byas pa dang /_/mkhas pa'i mi ni gang yang rung ba yis/_/
[\[288a.5\]]byang chub mchog tu sems ni bskyed nas kyang /_/me tog gcig pu phul ba'i bsod nams 'di/_/de bas khyad par 'phags par 'gyur ba yin/_/bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig mang por ni/_/bsod nams de yi bshad pa brtsams byas kyang /_/bsod nams 'bras 
[\[288a.6\]]bu de yi bshad pa ni/_/nams kyang zad par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od des rgyal po gser mdog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/_byang chub sems 
[\[288a.7\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du theg pa bde bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur la/_sdug bsngal ba dang /_yid mi bde ba yang mi 'gyur ro/_/chos gcig po gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bag yod pa ste/_rgyal po chen 
[\[288b\]]
[\[288b.1\]]po byang chub sems dpa' bag yod pa ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de la bag yod pa gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_bslab pa yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_dam bcas pa las mi nyams pa dang /_
[\[288b.2\]]sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub la 'dun pa brtan pa dang /_brtson 'grus mi gtong ba dang /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la sten cing bsnyen bkur byed pa dang /_chos la gus pa dang /_
[\[288b.3\]]thos pa mang pos chog mi shes pa dang /_gzhan dag la chos kyi bgo bsha' byed pa dang /_zang zing med par chos ston pa dang /_sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang /_yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams mi gtong ba dang /_'dod pa nyung ba dang /_chog shes pa dang /_nga rgyal bcom pa dang /_
[\[288b.4\]]chos mnyan pa la rna blags te nyan pa dang /_bla ma la gus pa dang /_bzod pa la gnas pa dang /_gnod sems kyi tha ba'i nyes pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_zab mo stong pa nyid kyi chos la mos pa dang /_dmigs par lta ba thams cad rnam par spangs pa dang /_nang du yang dag 
[\[288b.5\]]'jog la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi g.yel ba dang /_'du shes zlog pa dang /_bre mo'i gtam rnam par spong ba dang /_lus dang sems dben par gnas pa dang /_dgon par gnas pa dang /_sems mnyen pa dang /_tshul 
[\[288b.6\]]khrims mchog tu mi 'dzin pa dang /_bdag la mi stod pa dang /_gzhan la mi smod pa dang /_'gyod pa thams cad las nges par 'byung bar byed pa dang /_mngon par 'byung ba dang /_dge sbyong gi tshul la rgyun du dga' ba dang /_gsong por smra ba dang /_bzhin khro gnyer 
[\[288b.7\]]med pa dang /_chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang /_'gag pa med pa la 'dzud pa dang /_chos thams cad nam mkha' dang 'dra bar rtogs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa zhes bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa ni 'di lta ste/_nyan thos 
[\[289a\]]
[\[289a.1\]]dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang /_dmigs par lta ba'i sems tha na rmi lam du yang yid la mi byed pa ste/_rgyal po chen po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i bag yod pa'o/_/rgyal po chen po chos bzhi dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[289a.2\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_mgo bo dang /_rkang lag dang /_mig dang /_yan lag dang /_sha dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang dang /_tshil dang /_mdog dang /_pags pa dang /_lus thams cad yongs su gtang ba yang yongs su gtang 
[\[289a.3\]]mi dgos par bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar yang 'gyur la/_theg pa bde bas kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_rgyal po chen po 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni dge ba'i chos yongs su 
[\[289a.4\]]btsal ba la yid ma brtan pa yin te/_de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba gang ci bskyed kyang rung ste/_de la brtan por gnas shing zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan la theg pa chen po la shin tu brtan no/_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni tshul khrims kyi phung po shin tu yongs 
[\[289a.5\]]su dag pa/_'phags pa dang mkhas pas bsngags pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis yongs su zin pa dang ldan pa yin te/_des ni bdag nyid tshul khrims la gnas par rig nas chos kyi dga' ba nyams su myong ngo /_/rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang 
[\[289a.6\]]chub sems dpa' ni byams pas gnas pa dang /_bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa dang /_mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa yin te/_rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing mi gnas pa yid la byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad la snyoms 
[\[289a.7\]]pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i bde bar gnas pa ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i bde ba'i rnam pa gzhan med de/_rgyal po chen po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni ji lta ba bzhin du chos la rtog pa yin te/_de ni 'di ltar ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rtog ste/_'du byed kyi rnam pa 'di dag 
[\[289b\]]
