[\[289b.1\]]thams cad ni stong pa ste/_'di la bdag gam/_sems can nam/_srog gam/_gang zag gam/_yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'am/_yongs su btang ba gang yin pa'am/_len pa gang yin pa'am/_bzod par byed pa gang yin pa'am/_gang la bzod par bya ba'am/_bzod par bya ba gang yin 
[\[289b.2\]]pa'am/_rtsom pa gang yin pa'am/_gang gi phyir rtsom pa'am/_bsam gtan byed pa gang yin pa'am/_bsam gtan du bya ba gang yin pa'am/_sgom par byed pa gang yin pa'am/_bsgom par bya ba gang yin pa gang yang med do snyam mo/_/de de ltar ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa na 'dus 
[\[289b.3\]]byas kyi chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par rig nas dmigs par lta ba gang la yang mngon par zhen pa med la bde bar yang gnas te/_rgyal po chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bde ba thams cad dang ldan par myur 
[\[289b.4\]]du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser mdog des bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu ri ba'i gos kyi sbyin pa de bzhin gshegs pa de la phul nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin 
[\[289b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la glo ba rje ba'i slad du bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes gsol 
[\[289b.6\]]nas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to/_/bdag ni zhum pa ma mchis sems kyis su/_/mi mchog spyan sngar tshig ni gsol bar bgyi/_/sems can kun la snying rje bskyed nas kyang /_/'dren pa sems ni byang chub gzhol bar bgyi/_/bdag la nams 
[\[289b.7\]]kyang g.yo sgyu ma mchis te/_/stobs bcu ldan pas bdag gi bsam pa mkhyen/_/yon tan mnga' ba grags chen 'dra ba ni/_/lha mi gzhan la bdag gis dbang ma mchis/_/bdag ni sdug rnams skyabs dang skyob pa dang /_/dpung gnyen gyur te sdug bsngal chos 
[\[290a\]]
[\[290a.1\]]rnams dgrol/_/khyu mchog bdag nyid bde la gnas nas kyang /_/srog chags rnams ni bdag gis bde la dgod/_/'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa'i chos gang dag_/de la bdag ni spyad phyir gnas par bgyi/_/'dren pa ji ltar khyod ni lha mis 
[\[290a.2\]]mchod/_/de ltar bdag kyang mi rnams mchod rten shog_/byang chub thams cad mchog ni tshol bgyid cing /_/bskal pa mang por sbyin pa sbyin par bgyi/_/zas skom gos dang shing rta bzhon pa dang /_/gser dngul rin chen du ma'i sbyin pa bgyi/_/'dren pa bdag 
[\[290a.3\]]ni bslab la gus par bgyid/_/de ni ji bzhin yongs su bsrung bar bgyi/_/nyams par mi bgyid gang la'ang gnas mi bgyid/_/'dren pa bdag ni tshul khrims dag par bgyid/_/sems can kun la snyoms pa'i bsam pa yis/_/srog chags rnams la byams pa'i 
[\[290a.4\]]sems su bgyi/_/bkur sti bgyis dang bkur sti ma bgyis la/_/mtho bar 'gyur dang dma' bar 'gyur ma mchis/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po bsam yas par/_/bdag ni ji srid sngan chad 'khor bar gyur/_/mi dpa' khyod la brten nas de srid du/_/sems 
[\[290a.5\]]can gcig gi phyir yang spro bar bgyi/_/lha mi'i 'dren pa bde gshegs gsungs pa yi/_/bsam gtan bde ba de la gnas par bgyi/_/'dren pa bsam gtan bde la reg gnas shing /_/rtag tu dgon pa'i gnas su gnas par bgyi/_/bdag ni stong pa nyid 
[\[290a.6\]]la nges par bgyi/_/lta ba la ni rten par yong mi bgyid/_/dma' ba'i spyod pa rtag tu rnam par spang /_/mchog gi spyod pa dri med spyad par bgyi/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po gser mdog gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed ma thag pa de'i mod 
[\[290a.7\]]la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so/_/rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag gis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/khyim bdag brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /_tshong dpon 
[\[290b\]]
[\[290b.1\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_chung ma de dag dang /_gzhan skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang /_lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams rgyal po gser mdog de'i rjes su slob cing thams cad kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems 
[\[290b.2\]]bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po gser mdog des/_bu thu bo rgyal por bcug go/_/bcug nas kyang bu rnams dang /_bu mo rnams dang /_chung ma rnams dang /_tshong dpon dang /_khyim bdag dang /_blon po dang /_rgyal phran rnams dang lhan cig tu srog chags 
[\[290b.3\]]bye bas bskor te dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/de dag de ltar rab tu byung nas lo khri'i bar du tshangs par spyod pa yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba spyad do/_/rgyal po gser mdog gis kyang mngon par shes pa bsgrubs nas mang du thos pa'i mthar phyin 
[\[290b.4\]]par gyur to/_/byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin kyang bsgrubs so/_/de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa yang dag par zhugs pa des 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur pas sangs rgyas nyi khri mnyes par byas te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 
[\[290b.5\]]la yang na bza' dang /_zhal zas dang /_gzims cha dang /_gdan dang /_snyun gyi gsos sman dang /_yo byad kyis bsnyen bkur byas/_bla mar byas nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi thad du dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo /_/rigs kyi 
[\[290b.6\]]bu de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po gser mdog tu gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di de'i tshe de'i dus 
[\[290b.7\]]na rgyal po gser mdog tu gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs par gyur pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de la mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin 
[\[291a\]]
[\[291a.1\]]pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnam par rtse ba khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na tshangs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i dbang po brgya byin bcom 
[\[291a.2\]]ldan 'das gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byed par spro bar gyur pa gang yin pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na lha'i 
[\[291a.3\]]dbang po brgya byin du gyur te/_byang chub tu sems ma bskyed par mi gnas pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa de la bsnyen bkur byas so/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can ji snyed kyis rgyal po gser mdog dang lhan cig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[291a.4\]]pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag gi nang na tha na sems can gcig kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog pa ngas ma mthong ste/_de dag thams cad ni shes rab che ba dang /_brtson 'grus che ba sha stag ste/_byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos 
[\[291a.5\]]rnams yang dag par bsgrubs shing /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad pa dag tu mtshan tha dad pa'i de bzhin gshegs par gyur te/_'jig rten du byung nas thams cad kyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor 
[\[291a.6\]]nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyang nga dang /_khyod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_'khor 'dir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus pa gang yin 
[\[291a.7\]]pa 'di dag gis kyang mthong ngo /_/mchod pa byas so/_/bsnyen bkur byas so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang bzung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[291b\]]
[\[291b.1\]]ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de tsam du yun ring du thogs pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang de tsam du dka' ba ni ngo mtshar lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_der srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[291b.2\]]'bum phrag de snyed kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]'od de'i gsung rab la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed la/_bcom ldan 'das kyis ni ma bskyed pa'i 
[\[291b.3\]]slad du'o/_/de skad ces gsol nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin te/_khyod ji skad zer ba bzhin du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[291b.4\]]chub 'di ni yun ring du thogs so/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa yang dka'o/_/rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par shes pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]
[\[291b.5\]]'od de'i sngon rol dang de'i 'og tu yang sangs rgyas mang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag la ngas ri mo byas/_mchod pa byas/_bkur sti byas/_bla mar byas mod kyi/_de srid du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems ma bskyed de gzhan du nang 'di 
[\[291b.6\]]snyam du sems te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag de tsam du mdzes shing de tsam du blta na sdug la/_de tsam du snying du sdug pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam ste/_de dag la nga'i sdug pa'i sems dang /_dga' ba dang /_gus pa skyed par zad de/_ngas bla na med pa yang 
[\[291b.7\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ni sems ma bskyed do/_/rigs kyi bu de bas na rnam grangs 'dis khyod kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag dang /_rang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu 
[\[292a\]]
[\[292a.1\]]med grangs med pa dag dang /_nyan thos bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag dpag tu med grangs med pa dag la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar mchod pa byas su zin kyang de srid du yang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi 
[\[292a.2\]]skyed de/_gzhan du na phyis gang gi tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su 'dus par gyur pa de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par zad do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/dang por 
[\[292a.3\]]nga ni don dam gzigs pa dang /_/grags pa chen po shes rab pha rol son/_/mi mchog sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang /_/bsam yas rnams la gus pas mchod pa byed/_/dang por yon tan 'byung gnas rnams mchod kyang /_/bdag ni mkhas pa chos 
[\[292a.4\]]kun shes pa'i mchog_/'jig rten mchod rten sangs rgyas gyur cig ces/_/de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed/_/de dag rang rgyal bye ba snyed la yang /_/gus pa bskyed nas mchod pa byed mod kyi/_/mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba rdzogs sangs rgyas/_/gyur ces sems 
[\[292a.5\]]ni de srid skyed mi byed/_/gus pa rgya chen yang dag bskyed nas kyang /_/dbang du gyur pa bye snyed mchod mod kyi/_/ye shes rgya mtsho mi mchog 'dra bar ni/_/de srid du yang sems ni skyed mi byed/_/don dam gzigs pa rnams kyi gzugs mthong nas/_/dga' ba'i 
[\[292a.6\]]shugs ni rgya chen bsam mi khyab/_/mkhas pa mi 'dul rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su/_/gyur ces sems ni de srid skyed mi byed/_/gang tshe de dag bsod nams rgya chen bsag_/lus dang yid kyi bden pa bsgoms pa na/_/'dren pa mi rnams mchog tu gyur cig 
[\[292a.7\]]ces/_/byang chub don du sems ni skyed par byed/_/de dag gis ni bskal pa bye ba snyed/_/bsnyen bkur byas pas bsod nams tshogs bsags nas/_/sems dge ba dang 'jam zhing mnyen pa yis/_/de tshe byang chub tu yang sems bskyed de/_/bdag gis dge 
[\[292b\]]
[\[292b.1\]]ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa/_/des ni bdag kyang thams cad gzigs gyur cig_/nams kyang bdag gi smon lam nyams ma gyur/_/de dag de skad smon lam 'jug par 'gyur/_/bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang bsags pa/_/des ni srog chags thams 
[\[292b.2\]]cad rgal gyur cig_/mi dge'i las ni bdag gis gang byas pa/_/de yi 'bras bu mi bzad bdag gis spang /_/mthu dang brtson 'grus brtan po bskyed nas ni/_/phyi nas byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed/_/sems ni nams kyang zhum par ma gyur cig_/
[\[292b.3\]]dga' ba rgya chen bsam yas thob gyur cig_/mkhas pa sems la dmigs par mi byed de/_/byang chub mi dmigs bdag nyid kun mi dmigs/_/chos 'di mtha' dag stong par shes na ni/_/des na byang chub sems ni brjed mi 'gyur/_/de skad ces bka' 
[\[292b.4\]]stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse bas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la/_byams pa zhes bgyi/_byang chub sems 
[\[292b.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'dis ming 'di ga las rnyed lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rtse ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus 
[\[292b.6\]]na bskal pa grangs med pa bas kyang ches grangs med pa yun ring po tshad med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[292b.7\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gdugs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de btsas ma thag tu gom pa bdun bor ba na gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha 
[\[293a\]]
[\[293a.1\]]rnams kyis steng gi bar snang la rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs bzung ngo /_/rin po che'i gdugs des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas so/_/der lha rnams kyis kye ma 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[293a.2\]]gdugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes sgra bsgrags te/_des na de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs de'i gsung rab la 
[\[293a.3\]]dge slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya ba tshong dpon gyi rigs las rab tu byung ba zhig yod de/_rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po de bsod snyoms par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gdugs de'i bstan pa la bab pa na 'dzam bu'i gling de 
[\[293a.4\]]na grong brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/yul 'khor brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/tshong 'dus brgyad khri bzhi stong yod do/_/dge slong blo gros brtan po de yang grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 
[\[293a.5\]]rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_tshong 'dus de dag thams cad du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu bar gyur la/_de 'di snyam du sems te/_nam srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du bdag gis zan mi bza'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge 
[\[293a.6\]]slong blo gros brtan po des de lta bu'i yi dam de bcas nas grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_tshong 'dus gang dang gang du bsod snyoms kyi phyir rgyu ba de dang der nam srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la ma bkod kyi bar du zan mi za'o/_/
[\[293a.7\]]rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des gang gi tshe nyi ma gcig gis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do/_/gang gi tshe nyi ma gnyis kyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang 
[\[293b\]]
[\[293b.1\]]yod do/_/des zan bcad nas nyi ma gsum pa'i tshe zan za'o/_/gang gi tshe nyi ma gsum gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod do/_/nyi ma bzhis srog chags brgya tshang bar bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang 
[\[293b.2\]]de'i skabs kyang yod do/_/rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe nyi ma lnga dang /_drug dang /_bdun gyis srog chags brgya bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa de'i dus dang de'i skabs kyang yod de/_de zhag bdun gyi bar du zan chad kyang sems can rnams la snying rje ba'i phyir sems 
[\[293b.3\]]yongs su mi skyo ste zhag brgyad pa'i tshe zan za'o/_/rigs kyi bu rnam grangs de lta bus dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems kyis grong khyer chen po de dag tu song zhing grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_
[\[293b.4\]]yul 'khor dang /_tshong 'dus de dag tu song nas sems can de dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do/_/rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag 'das nas srog chags skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[293b.5\]]'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can mang po 'di dag bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod zin gyis/_bdag gis 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[293b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gzud gor ma chag go snyam ste/_de de dag gi thad du song nas lo bzhi khri nyis stong gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/chos kyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa brjod do/_/theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa 
[\[293b.7\]]brjod do/_/sems can bslab pa'i gzhi lnga la bkod pa gang yin pa'i sems can de dag gi nang nas lo brgyad khri bzhi stong po gzhan 'das nas srog chags bye ba phrag sum cu tshang ba gang dag sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rgya chen po la mos pa de 
[\[294a\]]
[\[294a.1\]]dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud do/_/lhag ma dman pa la mos pa rkyen gyi mthu dang ldan pa de dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la sems bskyed du bcug go/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 
[\[294a.2\]]dge slong blo gros brtan po de 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag gis sems can 'di dag theg pa gsum po la mos par byas zin gyis/_bdag gis sems can 'di dag bag yod par gnas par bya ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzud pa bstan to snyam mo/_/rigs 
[\[294a.3\]]kyi bu de ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po des yang lo nyi khri chig stong gi bar du srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la ting nge 'dzin la dmigs pa'i lung phog go/_/rigs kyi bu dge slong blo gros brtan po des srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[294a.4\]]'bum phrag sum cu rtsa drug po'i sems can de dag thams cad ci nas byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'gyur ba de lta de lta bur gdams ngag bstan cing /_de lta de lta bur rjes su ston to/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ltar dge slong blo gros brtan po de gang gi tshe grong du 'gro ba 
[\[294a.5\]]de'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'gro'o/_/de byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_tshong 'dus su bsod snyoms kyi phyir 'gro ste/_de 'gro ba na de na sems 
[\[294a.6\]]can byams pa la gnas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba la yid ches pa 
[\[294a.7\]]dang /_stong pa nyid la mos pa'i khyad par la ltos/_de'i phyir dge slong blo gros brtan po'i rkang pa sgo'i them pa la bzhag pa'i tshe sems can de dag thams cad byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ji ltar 'dzud pa bzhin du byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/_/de nas 
[\[294b\]]
[\[294b.1\]]de'i tshe dge slong blo gros brtan po de'i byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de lta bu mthong nas sa bla pa'i lha rnams kyis a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/_'di ltar 'di grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_
[\[294b.2\]]yul 'khor dang /_tshong 'dus su 'gro ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra sgrogs shing skad 'byin par byed do/_/sa bla pa'i lha rnams kyi sgra thos nas bar snang gi lha rnams kyis sgra bsgrags shing skad phyung ngo /_/de dag 
[\[294b.3\]]gi sgra thos nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang /_'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha rnams kyi bar du gcig nas gcig tu sgra thos nas 
[\[294b.4\]]a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byams par 'gyur te/_'di ltar 'di grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_yul 'khor dang /_tshong 'dus su song ba na sems can rnams byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i phyir ro zhes sgra bsgrags 
[\[294b.5\]]shing skad phyung ngo /_/de'i ming de la yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gdugs des rjes su yi rang bar mdzad de/_'di skad du byang chub sems dpa' dge slong blo gros brtan po 'di ni srid par 'gro 
[\[294b.6\]]ba'i 'chi 'pho dang skye ba thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur te/_mngon par grags par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub thob pa'i tshe yang 'di'i ming de nyid du 'gyur te 'jig rten du nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dpag tu med pa dang /_rin po 
[\[294b.7\]]che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi bde ba thams cad dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams 'dus pa'i nang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na dge 
[\[295a\]]
[\[295a.1\]]slong blo gros brtan po zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod som nyi 'am/_yid gnyis sam/_the tsom za srid de/_de tshun chad tshe rabs thams cad du ming 'di lta ste/_byams pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig tu gyur to/_/byang chub 
[\[295a.2\]]thob pa'i tshe yang 'di'i ming 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa zhes bya ba de kho nar 'gyur te/_rigs kyi bu rgyu ni de yin no/_/rkyen ni de yin te/_de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams 
[\[295a.3\]]pa la byams pa zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i sngon byung ba 'di bshad ma thag pa de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/steng gi bar 
[\[295a.4\]]snang la yang lha'i glu dbyangs grag go/_/me tog gi char yang bab po/_/de nas de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_gzhan yang lha'i bu 'bum phrag du ma dag gis lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag khyer 
[\[295a.5\]]nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa ga la ba der gtor te/_tshig 'di skad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa 'di ni skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs te/_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la 
[\[295a.6\]]snying brtse ba dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi skye bo phal po che'i don dang /_phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir go cha chen po bgos te/_'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob par yang sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag de snyed kyi don byas pa'i phyir ro/_/sems can 
[\[295a.7\]]gang dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa'i mchog legs par rnyed pa yin na sha'i mig gis mngon sum du mthong nas dga' ba thob pa de dag lta ci smos/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems 
[\[295b\]]
[\[295b.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bdag cag phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/_/de nas lha'i bu de dag gis tshig de skad ces smras ma thag pa de'i mod la skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang bcas lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis tshig 'thun par tshig 'di skad du byang chub 
[\[295b.2\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras so/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na srog chags khri nyis stong chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med 
[\[295b.3\]]cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/_/dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo/_/srog chags stong phrag du ma ni dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/_de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[295b.4\]]rgyas byams pa'i 'khor 'dus pa gnyis pa la dgra bcom pa mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro zhes de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis lung bstan to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[295b.5\]]btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/_'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[295b.6\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming byams pa'i dang po sems bskyed pa zhes bya bar zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse bas zhus pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub 
[\[295b.7\]]sems dpa' lung bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/byang chub sems dpa'i sgo so so ba zhes bya bar yang zung shig_/kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba'i phyir dang /_gzhan dag la yang 
[\[296a\]]
[\[296a.1\]]rgyas par yang dag par bstan par bya ba'i bar gyi phyir khyod la gtad do/_/kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis gang bar byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la phul ba bas ni 
[\[296a.2\]]gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i dang po 'jug pa 'di thos nas sems kyi rgyud byang chub tu gzhol ba dang /_byang chub tu smon pas mos par byed dam/_'dzin tam/_'chang ngam/_kun chub par byed dam/_sgom mam/_gzhan dag la rgyas par yang dag par ston 
[\[296a.3\]]par byed na 'di ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/mi lus 'thob pa rnyed par dka'/_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang rnyed par dka'/_/sangs rgyas dad pa rnyed par dka'/_/byang chub 
[\[296a.4\]]sems kyang rnyed par dka'/_/gnas skabs bzhi po 'di dag ni/_/bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ste/_/de phyir thob nas ma spangs shig_/mthu rtsal dag kyang chud ma gzan/_/mi lus thob pa rnyed pa dang /_/sangs rgyas 'byung ba rnyed pa dang /_/sangs rgyas dad pa'ang rnyed pa dang /_/byang chub sems ni bskyed 
[\[296a.5\]]gyur na/_/de phyir brtson 'grus bskyed nas kyang /_/rtag tu bag ni yod par gyis/_/drang srong chen po de dag gis/_/bag yod pas ni byang chub brnyes/_/sangs rgyas chos rnams thams cad kyi/_/rtsa ba'i sgo dang tshul gyi lam/_/bag yod pa dang brtson 'grus yin/_/mkhas pa rnams kyang 'di la slob/_/
[\[296a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rtse ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod 
[\[296a.7\]]do/_/'phags pa byams pa 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA warma dang /_dzi na mi tra dang /_su ren dra bo d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sde la sogs pas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[296b\]]
[\[296b.1\]{D199}]@#/_/rgya'i skad du/_kwan ji [{]li'u [,]le'u [}]phu sa zhang sh+yan te'u shis th+yan kyin/_bod skad du/_'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[296b.2\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod kyi yul rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal/_mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_
[\[296b.3\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das mtshan mo'i thun dang po la/_sku las 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bu byung nas/_rgyal byed kyi tshal lan bdun bskor te/_khyim bdag su ta sha la sogs pa 'od kyis reg par byas nas/_'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu nam mkha' la sprin bzhin du 
[\[296b.4\]]khyab par byas nas mnyan du yod pa'i yul kun tu gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i me tog char rab tu phab bo/_/'od gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i nang nas sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa brgya stong snang ba thams cad kyis gsung 'thun par bskal pa 'di nyid du/_byang chub 
[\[296b.5\]]sems dpa' stong gi dang po log par dad sel sangs rgyas pa nas/_tha mar snang mdzad sangs rgyas pa'i don bka' stsal to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya ting nge 'dzin las langs nas 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[296b.6\]]pa 'od srung chen po 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'khor nyis brgya lnga bcu dang /_ma ha pa sha pa ti la sogs pa dge slong ma stong dang /_khyim bdag su ta sha la sogs pa dge bsnyen pha sum stong 
[\[296b.7\]]dang /_byi shwa khra 'pho ta la sogs pa dge bsnyen ma nyis stong dang /_kun tu bzang po la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug dang /_chos kyi rgyal bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya dang /_lha dang /_klu 
[\[297a\]]
[\[297a.1\]]dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa 'khor thams cad/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis bskul nas sprin bzhin du 'dus so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_ljags kyi dbang po las 'od zer stong phyung nas/_'od zer re re kha dog 
[\[297a.2\]]stong stong /_kha dog re re'i nang nas/_sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa snyed snang ngo /_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung 'thun par/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad kyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa zab mo'i 
[\[297a.3\]]gzungs bstan pa 'di lta ste/_a nan ta mu dra zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_stong pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_sgrib pa med pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba'i gzungs dang /_mtshan ma med par rnam par grol ba chen po zhes bya ba'i gzungs la sogs pa/_sgra skad gcig 
[\[297a.4\]]gis brgya phrag bye ba'i gzungs kyi sgo bka' stsal to/_/gzungs kyi sgo bka' stsal ma thag tu/_'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa thos nas/_de ma thag tu bye ba brgya phrag khri'i gzungs kyi 
[\[297a.5\]]sgo thob nas/_stan las langs te gos tshags bcos nas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa u pA li stan las langs te/_gdong dang spyi bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[297a.6\]]ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon du yang mdzod kyi chos thams cad las/_ma pham pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas par gsungs na/_ma pham pa so so'i skye bo'i lus dang ma bral/_zag pa yang ma zad/_ma pham pa 'di nyid du rab tu byung yang /_ting nge 'dzin 
[\[297a.7\]]mi bsgom/_nyon mongs pa ma spangs na/_bcom ldan 'das kyis nges par sangs rgyas par bka' stsal na/_ma pham pa de tshe'i dus byas nas/_khams gang du skye ba len par 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/_u pA li gcig tu 
[\[297b\]]
[\[297b.1\]]gyis la nyon cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pas 'khor 'di'i nang du/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyas par 'gyur bar lung bstan gyis/_dus 'di nas lo bcu 
[\[297b.2\]]gnyis kyi 'og tu tshe'i dus byas nas/_nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba len par 'gyur ro/_/de nas dga' ldan gyi gnam gyi steng na/_lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga brgya yod pa/_lha'i bu re res kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyod pas/_skye ba gcig gis 
[\[297b.3\]]thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa'i don du/_lha'i bsod nams kyi mthus/_gzhal med khang byas te/_rang rang gi lus kyi gos dang /_tsan dan dang /_rin po che'i dbu rgyan phud de/_pus mo btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te/_smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/
[\[297b.4\]]bdag gi rin thang med pa'i rin po che dang /_lha'i dbu rgyan gyis/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po la mchod pa'i don du/_ma pham pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus su ring po mi thogs par/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas/_bdag cag gi rin 
[\[297b.5\]]po che'i dbu rgyan 'di/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i mchod pa'i rdzas su gyur cig ces lha'i bu thams cad rang rang pus mo btsugs te/_smon lam de skad ces btab pa dang /_de nas lha thams cad kyis smon lam btab ma thag tu/_rin po che'i 
[\[297b.6\]]dbu rgyan thams cad bye ba khrag khrig phrag lnga brgya'i gzhal med khang du gyur te/_rin po che'i gzhal med khang re re la yang skyed mos tshal bdun bdun/_skyed mos tshal re re yang /_rin po che sna bdun bdun las grub pa/_rin po che re re las kyang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i 
[\[297b.7\]]'od kyi 'od zer re re las bye ba phrag brgya'i pad ma pad ma re re las bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi phreng ba/_shing re re'i lo ma las bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog_/rin po che'i kha dog re re las kyang /_bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 
[\[298a\]]
[\[298a.1\]]'od 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od re re'i nang nas kyang /_bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i lha'i bu mo/_lha'i bu mo re re yang shing gi drung na 'dug nas/_lag na bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che grangs med pa'i do shal thogs/_ngo mtshar che ba'i glu dbyangs snyan 
[\[298a.2\]]pa len/_glu dbyangs snyan pa'i nang nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo spyod/_shing de dag las 'bras bu skyes pa'i kha dog bai dUr+ya bzhin du 'dug_/kha dog de dag thams cad bai dUr+ya'i nang du 'dug pa/_'od zer de dag thams cad g.yas phyogs su 'khor ba/_sgra snyan 
[\[298a.3\]]pa sna tshogs 'byung ba/_sgra thams cad las/_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po'i chos 'chad pa/_re re'i pho brang mtho khyad ni dpag tshad drug cu rtsa gnyis/_rngams su dpag tshad bcu bzhi/_klu'i rgyal po bye ba phrag lnga brgyas ni pho brang bskor/_klu'i rgyal po re 
[\[298a.4\]]re yang bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che sna bdun gyi shing gi char phab pas pho brang gi steng brgyan/_rang bzhin rlung byung bas shing de dag bskyod pa dang /_shing de las mi rtag pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 
[\[298a.5\]]sgra byung bar gyur to/_/de nas pho brang de'i nang na/_rgyal po chen po le'u du pa ti zhes bya ba/_stan la 'dug pa las langs te/_phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/_smon lam 'di skad ces btab bo/_/bdag gi bsod nams 
[\[298a.6\]]kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i chos kyi pho brang byed pa'i bsod nams dang ldan na/_bdag gi smin mtshams bar nas nor bu rin po che rang byung bar gyur cig_/ces smon lam btab pa dang /_de ma thag tu bye ba phrag brgya'i rin po che byung nas/_rin po che 
[\[298a.7\]]bai dUr+ya la sogs pa'i kha dog thams cad rdzogs par grub pa/_shel gyi kha dog bzhin phyi nang gsal ba/_rin po che de dag nam mkha' stong pa la 'khor zhing /_ngo mtshar che ba'i rin po che'i pho brang rim pa bzhi bcu rtsa dgu sprul par gyur to/_/re re'i lan zhun re re 
[\[298b\]]
[\[298b.1\]]las kyang /_bye ba 'bum phrag gi rin po che pad ma 'dis spras pa la grub pa/_lan zhun gyi bar thams cad na/_rdzu sa te skyes pa'i lha'i bu bye ba phrag dgu dang /_lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag lnga brgya la/_lha'i bu re re'i lag nas rin po che sna bdun bdun las grub pa'i pad ma 
[\[298b.2\]]dpag tu med pa bye ba phrag bcu/_pad ma re re'i steng du 'od bye ba phrag dpag tu med pa 'od de dag gi nang na/_lha'i rol mo'i cha spyad ma dkrol bar sgra rang byung ba/_sgra de dag byung ba dang /_bu mo thams cad langs nas/_rol mo'i cha spyad thogs te/_gar dang /_
[\[298b.3\]]glu dbyangs snyan pa len pa'i sgra las/_dge ba bcu dang /_smon lam bzhi la sogs pa'i sgra/_lha thams cad kyis thos pas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas skyed mos tshal thams cad kyi nang na/_skyed mos tshal kha dog brgyad kyi bai dUr+ya'i rdzing bu 
[\[298b.4\]]rdzing bu re re'i nang na/_bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che las grub pa/_rdzing bu re re'i nang na/_yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/_chu de dag kyang gyen du 'bab pa/_sgo bzhi'i phyi rol na rdzus te skyes pa'i pad ma bzhi/_pad ma de dag las chu byung ba rin po che'i pad 
[\[298b.5\]]ma'i kha dog bzhin du 'bab pa/_pad ma re re'i steng du lha'i bu mo nyi shu rtsa bzhi bzhi/_lus kyi kha dog ngo mtshar che ba/_byang chub sems dpa' bzhin du brgyan pa/_lus mtshan dang ldan pa/_lag na rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi snod bye ba phrag lnga brgya sprul/_snod re re'i 
[\[298b.6\]]nang na/_lha'i bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis gang ba/_phrag pa g.yon la thogs pa/_do shal dpag tu med pa/_phrag pa g.yas la thogs pa/_rol mo'i cha byad dpag tu med pa sprin bzhin du nam mkha' la 'dug pa/_chu las byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' pha 
[\[298b.7\]]rol tu phyin pa drug brjod pa/_dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes pa'i lha'i bu gang la la zhig_/rang bzhin gyis lha'i bu mo rnams kyis g.yog byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi seng ge'i khri 'phang du dpag tshad bzhi yod pa/_'dzam bu'i gser dang /_rin po che dpag tu 
[\[299a\]]
[\[299a.1\]]med pas brgyan pa zur bzhi la 'dug pa/_pad ma bzhi las skyes pa/_pad ma re re la yang rin po che phrag brgya las grub pa/_rin po che re re la yang bye ba phrag brgya'i 'od zer/_'od zer de dag las/_ngo mtshar che ba sprul pa'i rin po che sna tshogs kyi me 
[\[299a.2\]]tog sprul pas brgyan pa/_rin po che'i yol ba bres pa de'i phyogs na tshangs pa'i rgyal po bye ba phrag stong gis/_rang rang gi tshangs pa'i lha'i ngo mtshar che ba'i dril bu khyer nas/_yol ba'i steng du spyangs pa/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po chung ngus kyang /_rin po che sna tshogs pa'i 
[\[299a.3\]]dra bas yol ba'i steng du bres pa/_de nas lha'i bu dang /_lha'i bu mo brgya stong grangs med pa'i 'khor gyis/_rin po che'i me tog pad ma thams cad khyer nas khri'i steng du bdal ba/_pad ma de dag thams cad rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi bu mo bye ba phrag lnga brgya byung 
[\[299a.4\]]ba de dag gi lag na rnga yab dkar po thogs pa/_yol ba'i nang na 'dug pa/_pho brang zur bzhi la rin po che'i ka ba bzhi yod pa/_rin po che'i ka ba re re la yang brgya phrag stong gi khang pa brtsegs pa/_bu mo 'di'i nor bu ni bres/_lan kan bar kun tu lha'i bu mo brgya stong 
[\[299a.5\]]yod/_kha dog ngo mtshar che ba/_dpag tu med pa'i rol mo'i cha spyad lag na thogs pa/_rol mo'i sgra'i nang nas sdug bsngal ba dang /_stong pa dang /_mi rtag pa dang /_bdag med pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi sgra 'byung ba/_lha'i pho brang de dag nas rin po che'i kha dog 
[\[299a.6\]]dpag tu med pa bye ba phrag brgya yod pa/_bu mo re re kun kyang rin po che'i kha dog dang 'thun par sprul to/_/de nas phyogs bcu'i lha dpag tu med pa thams cad/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i pho brang du skye ba len par smon lam btab bo/_/de nas dga' ldan gyi pho brang na/_rgyal po 
[\[299a.7\]]chen po lnga po la/_rgyal po chen po dang po ni/_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/_lus la rin po che sna bdun gyi char 'bebs pas pho brang gi nang du 'thor ba/_rin po che'i nor bu re re yang /_rol mo'i cha spyad dpag tu med par sprul pa/_nam mkha' la kun tu 
[\[299b\]]
[\[299b.1\]]'phyang ba/_ma brdungs par sgra snyan pa dpag tu med pa rang 'byung ba/_sems can gyi yid rtog pa/_rgyal po gnyis pa me tog 'thor ba zhes bya ba/_lus la me tog sna tshogs kyi char 'bebs pa/_pho brang thams cad khyab par me tog gi gdugs sprul/_gdugs re re yang 
[\[299b.2\]]brgya phrag stong gi rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan gyis lam drangs pa/_rgyal po gsum pa ni/_spos kyi dbyangs zhes bya ba/_lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu'i nang nas/_ngo mtshar che ba'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi tsan dan gyi spos kyi char 'bebs pa/_spos de dag sprin bzhin du 
[\[299b.3\]]chags pa/_kha dog brgya phrag gis pho brang lan bdun du bskor ba/_rgyal po chen po bzhi pa/_dga' ba bde ba zhes bya ba/_lus la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i char 'bebs pa/_rin po che re re yang rang bzhin gyis rgyal mtshan dang /_'phan gyi steng du 'dug nas sangs 
[\[299b.4\]]rgyas la skyabs su 'gro ba dang /_chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su 'gro bar 'chad pa dang /_yan lag lnga'i tshul khrims kyi sgra dang /_dge ba'i chos dpag tu med pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /_byams pa byang chub kyi yan lag gi sgra la 'dzud pa/_
[\[299b.5\]]rgyal po chen po lnga pa/_sgra dbyangs drag po zhes bya ba/_lus kyi ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas chu 'bebs pa/_chu re re'i steng du me tog pad ma bye ba phrag lnga brgya yod pa/_pad ma re re'i steng du shel gyi bu mo nyi shu rtsa lnga lnga/_shel gyi bu mo re re'i lus thams 
[\[299b.6\]]cad kyi ba spu'i bu ga re re'i nang nas/_lha'i bdud las rgyal ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byung ba sprul lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/_dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas zhes bya bar/_dge ba bcu dang /_rgyal ba la drin bsab pa dang /_ngo mtshar che 
[\[299b.7\]]ba bskyed pa'i bsod nams ni/_ngas bskal pa chung ngu gcig gi bar du 'dug nas/_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' drin bsab pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i 'bras bu bshad kyang rdzogs pa'i mtha' med de/_'dir ngas khyed la sogs pa la mdo tsam zhig 
[\[300a\]]
[\[300a.1\]]bshad cing bstan par bya'o/_/u pA li dge slong ngam/_'khor thams cad kyang rung ste/_gang la la zhig skye shi la mi skyo bar/_lha'i gnas su skye bar 'dod na/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/_byams pa'i zhabs 'bring byed 'dod 
[\[300a.2\]]par lta ba ni/_yan lag lnga'i khrims brgyad rdzogs pa/_lus sems kyi brtson 'grus rgyun mi 'chad pa/_dge ba bcu'i chos la spyod pa/_bde skyid phun sum tshogs par 'dod pa/_sems rtse gcig tu dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye bar 'dod pa de dag ni yang dag par 
[\[300a.3\]]lta ba zhes bya ste/_gzhan du lta ba ni/_log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas u pA li stan las langs te/_gos tshags bcos nas/_gdong dang spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das/_dga' ldan gyi gnam du de lta 
[\[300a.4\]]bu'i bde skyid phun sum tshogs pa der/_skyes bu chen po 'di dus ci tsam du 'dzam bu'i gling nas/_lha'i gnas de lta bur skye bar 'gyur/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_dus 'di nas lo bcu gnyis lon nas/_dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshes bco lnga'i nyi ma la/_yul ba 
[\[300a.5\]]ra ni kra pa li'i grong khyer na bram ze chen po pa pa li zhes bya ba'i khyim nas skye ba blangs pa'i sa nas/_skyil mo krung bcas nas/_ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag pa bzhin du/_lus gser gyi kha dog dang /_'od zer dmar po nyi ma brgya stong bas lhag_/steng gi 
[\[300a.6\]]dga' ldan gyi gnam du/_lus kyi sku gdung yang dper na/_gser gyi gzugs bzhin du/_mi g.yo mi 'gul bar/_lus kyi 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang nas/_rnam par thar pa gsum dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yi ge gsal bar ston te/_
[\[300a.7\]]de nas lha mi thams cad rjes su 'brang nas/_rin po che sku gdung gi mchod rten la mchod nas/_de nas dga' ldan gyi gnam du/_rin po che sna bdun gyi pho brang na 'di gzhal med khang seng ge'i pad ma'i steng du skyil mo krung bcas nas/_lus 'dzam bu 
[\[300b\]]
[\[300b.1\]]gser gyi kha dog bzhin du rdzus te skyes nas/_sku chur dpag tshad bcu drug_/mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus rdzogs par brgyan pa/_dbu'i thor tshugs dang ldan/_dbu skra bai dUr+ya'i kha dog dang 'dra ba/_shi kra bi li kra dang /_ma 'di dang /_
[\[300b.2\]]gyen shugs kyi rin po che sa lha'i dbu rgyan brgyan pa/_rin po che lha'i dbu rgyan de dag la/_bye ba phrag brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog re re'i nang nas/_sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dpag tu med pa brgya stong phrag khri'i sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mang pos zhabs 'bring 
[\[300b.3\]]byas pa/_de nas zhing khams gzhan gyi byang chub sems dpa' thams cad/_cho 'phrul bco brgyad ston cing /_lha'i dbu rgyan gyi nang na yid la smon pa'i rjes su 'thun par lha'i dbu rgyan gyi nang na gnas so/_/byams pa'i smin mtshams nas 'od zer dkar po byung ste/_'od zer 
[\[300b.4\]]de dag las/_brgya phrag gi rin po che'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis/_mtshan re re'i nang nas bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i kha dog dpe byad bzang po/_dpe byad re re la yang /_bye ba phrag lnga brgya'i rin po che'i mtshan dang /_dpe byad kyi kha dog 'bar ba'i lha'i bu 
[\[300b.5\]]re re'i 'od zer brgya khri bzhi stong gi sprin thams cad pad ma las rang rang 'dug nas/_nyin mtshan rtag par phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo spyod pa/_bgrod pa gcig cing don grub par byed pa phrag lnga brgya'i lha'i bu de dag phyir mi ldog pa'i/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[300b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di dag tu/_dga' ldan gyi gnam du nyin mtshan rtag tu phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la/_lha'i bu thams cad 'khod pa/_'dzam bu'i gling gi tshe lo'i grangs bye ba 'bum phrag lnga bcu rtsa drug lon nas/_byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnam nas 
[\[300b.7\]]'dzam bu'i gling du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo bshad par 'gyur ro/_/u pA li/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba/_'dzam bu'i gling nas tshe 'phos nas/_dga' ldan gnam du skyes pa'i yon tan ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das nas/_nga'i 'khor 
[\[301a\]]
[\[301a.1\]]nye gnas las gang la la zhig_/brtson 'grus su bsod nams bsags pa/_sdom pa ma zhig cing mchod rten la phyag dar dang /_maN+Dal byed pa dang /_spos dri zhim pa dang /_me tog gi mchod pa dang /_rnam par thar pa gsum la spyod cing /_zab cing 
[\[301a.2\]]drang ba'i chos la spyod pa dang /_mdo sde klog cing /_sems rtse gcig tu rgyun mi 'chad par yid la zlos pa dang /_mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs byed pa dang /_byams pa'i mtshan brjod pa de lta bu la sogs pa'i mi 
[\[301a.3\]]de dag ni 'di skad cig tsam du khrims brgyad mnos nas/_sdig pa thams cad byang bar byed cing /_smon lam btab nas/_tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/_dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa lag pa brkyang ba tsam du dga' ldan du skyes nas pad ma'i steng du skyil mo krung 
[\[301a.4\]]bcas nas/_brgya phrag stong gi lha'i bus/_lha'i rol mo byed cing /_me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po 'thor zhing /_legs so legs so/_/zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_rigs kyi bu khyod ni 'dzam bu'i gling du bsod nams rgya chen po bsags nas/_'chi 
[\[301a.5\]]'pho ba'i 'og tu/_'di ni dga' ldan gyi gnas zhes bya ba yin te/_'dir lha'i rgyal po byams pa zhes bya ba la/_khyod skyabs su gsol/_phyag 'tshol cig dang /_phyag 'tshal na/_smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/_'od zer dkar po reg par byas nas/_bskal 
[\[301a.6\]]pa dgu bcu'i skye shi las grol zhing sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su 'thun pa'i yon tan gyis/_ngo mtshar gyi chos bshad nas/_brtson pa mi 'dor ba phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang /_bla na med pa'i lam yid la sems pa de 
[\[301a.7\]]lta bu la sogs pa'i sems can sdig pa thams cad byang zhing /_chos drug la spyod na/_the tsom med par nges par dga' ldan gyi gnam du skyes nas/_'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong /_byams pa'i zhabs 'bring byas nas/_'dzam bu'i gling du dang por chos thos 
[\[301b\]]
[\[301b.1\]]nas/_ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa 'di nyid kyi sangs rgyas dang /_bskal pa skar ma lta bu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yang zhal mthong nas/_sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyi drung du byang chub tu lung ston pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/u pA li/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das 
[\[301b.2\]]pa'i 'og tu/_dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa 'khor thams cad las/_gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[301b.3\]]chen po byams pa'i mtshan thos nas dga' ba dang /_gus par phyag 'tshal ba'i mi de dag_/tshe'i dus byas nas/_se gol gtogs pa tsam du gong ma ci lta ba bzhin du/_byams pa'i mtshan thos nas tshe'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu/_mun pa'i khams su mi ltung /_mtha' 
[\[301b.4\]]'khob kyi yul dang /_log par lta ba dang /_mi dge ba thams cad spyod par mi skye/_skye ba thams cad du drang por lta ba dang /_'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la mi smod par skye'o/_/u pA li/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo gang 
[\[301b.5\]]la la zhig_/sdom pa bshig pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i las byas pas/_byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan thos pas/_mtshan nas brjod cing /_yan lag lnga gtugs te/_sems rtse gcig tu bshags na/_sdig pa thams cad myur du 
[\[301b.6\]]byang nas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad/_byang chub sems dpa' thugs rje chen po'i mtshan brjod pa dang /_sku gzugs bris nas/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_gos dang /_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_phyag 'tshal zhing /_yid 
[\[301b.7\]]la zlos na/_mi de dag tshe'i dus byas pa'i tshe na/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/_mi chen po'i mtshan smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas/_'od dang /_lha'i bu thams cad kyis/_man dA ra ba'i char phab nas/_mi de dag bsus nas/_skad cig yud tsam 
[\[302a\]]
[\[302a.1\]]gyis lha'i gnas su skyes/_'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong nas/_gdong dang spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_de ma thag tu chos thos pa dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam thob pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa gang gA'i klung 
[\[302a.2\]]gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/u pA li/_khyod rtse gcig tu nyon la yid la gyis shig_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa zhes bya ba la/_ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad skyabs su 'gro ba na/_gang la la zhig skyabs su 'gro ba'i 
[\[302a.3\]]mi de dag ni/_bla na med pa'i lam dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo 'thob nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i dus kyi tshe/_mi de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer 
[\[302a.4\]]mthong nas/_lung bstan pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/u pA li/_de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu 'khor bzhi po dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa gang la la zhig dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i dus kyi tshe/_'di ltar 
[\[302a.5\]]blta bar bya ste/_dga' ldan yid la byed pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sdom pa blangs nas/_nyi ma gcig gam/_nyi ma bdun gyi bar du/_dge ba bcu yid la byed pa dang /_dge ba bcu'i lam la spyod pa'i bsod nams de dag_/byams pa'i mdun du bsngo zhing 
[\[302a.6\]]smon lam btab pa de dag ni/_lta ba de dag gi lha'i bu mthong ba dang /_pad ma mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig skad cig tsam byams pa'i ming nas brjod pa'i mi de dag ni/_bskal pa stong nyis brgya'i skye shi las grol zhing /_sdig pa 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/byams pa'i 
[\[302a.7\]]mtshan thos pas thal mo sbyar ba'i mi de dag ni/_bskal pa lnga bcu'i skye shi las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig byams pa la gus par phyag 'tshal bas/_bskal pa bye ba brgya'i skye shi las grol thar zhing sdig pa byang bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i gnas la mi chags shing /_
[\[302b\]]
[\[302b.1\]]ma 'ongs pa'i dus su klu'i sdong po byang chub kyi shing drung du/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi lam du sems bskyed pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_'khor mang po dpag tu med pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 
[\[302b.2\]]'tshal nas/_byams pa'i zhabs la yang phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das dang /_byams pa la lan brgya stong du bskor nas/_lam ma thob pa dag rang rang gi smon lam btab pa/_bdag cag la sogs pas/_lha dang /_mi dang /_sde brgyad 
[\[302b.3\]]po 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mos pas smon lam btab pas/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus su lus spangs nas/_'phags pa byams pa'i zhal mthong ba dang /_thams cad dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba thob par gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[302b.4\]]stsal pa/_khyed la sogs pa ma 'ongs pa'i dus su bsod nams byed pa dang /_tshul khrims bsrung ba dang /_thams cad byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i drung du skye ba blangs nas/_byang chub sems dpa' byams pas byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro/_/bcom 
[\[302b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis u pA li la bka' stsal pa/_u pA li de lta bur lta ba ni/_yang dag par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/gzhan du lta ba ni/_log par lta ba zhes bya'o/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo stan la 'dug pa las langs te/_pus mo btsugs nas thal mo 
[\[302b.6\]]sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/legs so/_/bcom ldan 'das/_byams pa'i yon tan legs par bshad do/_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe/_bsod nams byed pa'i sems can 'bras bu thob pa bdag cag gis thob par 'tshal bas/_bcom 
[\[302b.7\]]ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mtshan ci lags/_bdag cag gis ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/_bcom ldan 'das kyis/_kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo/_/khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma brjed par zung la/_ma 'ongs 
[\[303a\]]
[\[303a.1\]]pa'i don du lha'i gnas su skye ba'i lam 'byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi mtshan dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi gcod pas/_mdo sde'i ming /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa mya ngan las 'das pa zhes kyang bya/_byang chub 
[\[303a.2\]]sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gyi gnam du skye ba blangs nas/_byang chub kyi snying po la bskul ba zhes bya bar zung shig_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_zhing khams gzhan nas 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag 
[\[303a.3\]]bcu bzhi'i le'u brgyan pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu 'bum phrag brgyad kyis bla na med pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_thams cad kyis byams pa'i rjes su 'brang nas/_'dzam bu'i gling du skye bar smon lam btab bo/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[303a.4\]]kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_'khor bzhi po dang /_lha dang /_klu la sogs pa/_sde brgyad po/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal nas/_thams cad mngon par dga' ste/_bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas phyir dong ngo /_/'phags pa byang chub 
[\[303a.5\]]sems dpa' byams pa dga' ldan gnam du skye ba blangs pa'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu ba'i lots+tsha ba ban de pa ba tong dang /_ban de shes rab seng ges rgya'i dpe las bsgyur//_//
[\[303a.6\]{D200}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya lo kA nu brtan nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa 'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad 
[\[303a.7\]]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_thub pa'i rgyal po ri la bzhugs/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems chen dang /_/nyan thos rnams kyis mdun gyis bltas/_/de nas mkhas pa 'jam dbyangs kyis/_/btud de rgyal la 'di skad gsol/_/slad ma'i skye bo rnams 
[\[303b\]]
[\[303b.1\]]slad du/_/dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol/_/sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan 'byung /_/zab cing rgya chen phun sum tshogs/_/mdo sde dam pa blo rab kyis/_/smra ba'i mchog gis bshad du gsol/_/'jig rten mgon po'i thugs skyes sras/_/gces 'dzin 
[\[303b.2\]]mchog la bka' stsal pa/_/rtse gcig sems su yid byos la/_/nyon cig da ni bshad par bya/_/blo dang ldan pas yon tan zhus/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa/_/chos smra sems can mchog rnams kyis/_/chos nyid de ni mnyan par gyis/_/de bzhin 
[\[303b.3\]]gshegs rnams dpag med las/_/rang sangs rgyas ni thams cad dang /_/nyan thos dag gis rnam kun tu/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bsags pa na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa spros med la/_/byis pa spros pa spyod pa yi/_/sems can kun gyis rgyal ba rnams/_/rig 
[\[303b.4\]]par mi nus smos ci dgos/_/sangs rgyas kyis ni sangs rgyas dang /_/sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang /_/rang byung sku thugs ci 'dra dang /_/shes rab ci 'dra rab tu mkhyen/_/'jig rten du ni 'jig rten sgron/_/rnam par 'dren pa rnams byung yang /_/'jig 
[\[303b.5\]]rten dang ni 'dres med la/_/'jig rten du yang snang ba ston/_/sku dang sku yi phrin las dang /_/gsung gis gang dag brjod pa dang /_/yid dang yid kyi rnam rtog rnams/_/rgyal ba'i thams cad 'jig rten 'das/_/'jig rten na ni thugs brtse bas/_/'jig rten mgon 
[\[303b.6\]]po 'od mdzad pa/_/'jig rten ji ltar rtogs pa bzhin/_/sems can rnams la chos ston to/_/'jig rten 'das pa'i spyod rnams kyis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags/_/de dag phrin las 'jig rten 'das/_/rnam par smin pa bla na med/_/gal te 
[\[303b.7\]]'jig rten rnam 'dren rnams/_/'jig rten 'thun par mi 'jug na/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang /_/sangs rgyas sus kyang shes mi 'gyur/_/'jig rten kun la phan bzhed pa/_/skyob pa rdzu 'phrul ldan pa po/_/rang byung sdig pa mi mnga' ba/_/de dag g.yo 
[\[304a\]]
[\[304a.1\]]ba bsam mi khyab/_/bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyi sku/_/'khrig pa las ni byung min la/_/yab dang yum yang ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/bskal pa bye ba grangs med nas/_/shes rab pha rol phyin 
[\[304a.2\]]las byung /_/'on kyang byis pa nyid ston pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag med de/_/phyogs bcu dag tu snang mdzad kyang /_/'dom gang 'od du ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/
[\[304a.3\]]mi yi dam pa nam du yang /_/zhabs gnyis sa la mi reg ste/_/'on kyang lam srang de ston pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'dod pa de dag rnams smad de/_/'dod pa'i rdzab las yang dag 'phags/_/'on kyang sras la sogs 
[\[304a.4\]]ston pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mar me mdzad nas bzung nas su/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dod chags bral/_/sgra gcan zin la sras zhes gsungs/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/lha dang 'jig rten bcas 
[\[304a.5\]]pa yi/_/nga ni mchog ces bka' stsal pa/_/phyin nas chos ni tshol mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/thub chen 'dzam shing grib ma la/_/bzhugs te bsam gtan mdzad bstan dang /_/lo drug bar du dka' spyad 
[\[304a.6\]]pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/gnyis su med par zhing 'di na/_/byang chub snying por bzhugs nas ni/_/bdud 'dul rnam par ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/byang chub mtshungs med sangs 
[\[304a.7\]]rgyas te/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten ston yin yang /_/thugs las chung ngu nyid ston pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/dpa' bo thugs rje che ldan pa/_/bstan pa'i phyir ni 'dir gshegs la/_/gsol ba 'debs la gzhes 
[\[304b\]]
[\[304b.1\]]mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rang byung rnams kyi mkhyen pa ni/_/phyir zhing 'jug pa mi mnga' yang /_/de dag dran pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la ni/_/
[\[304b.2\]]byon dang bzhud pa mi mnga' yang /_/'on kyang bzhud par rnam snang ba/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rgyal ba rnams ni mkha' 'dra ste/_/chos rnams kun la mi gnas kyang /_/ldang ba ltar yang snang ba ni/_/'di ni 'jig 
[\[304b.3\]]rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/zhabs ni pad ma'i 'dab 'dra ste/_/de dag rdul gyis mi gos la/_/zhabs kyang 'khru ba mdzad pa ni/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de dag dri ma mi mnga' ste/_/sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra yang /_/
[\[304b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas khrus mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/zhal ni pad ma'i dri ldan zhing /_/tshems ni dri med mu tig 'dra/_/'on kyang tshems shing gsol mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de dag 
[\[304b.5\]]sgrims pa mi mnga' yang /_/de dag zhal zas gsol mdzad cing /_/sbyin pa po la 'bras bu che/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sku mkhregs rdo rje 'dra ba'i phyir/_/zag pa dag ni mi mnga' yang /_/bshad pa'i sar ni gshegs 
[\[304b.6\]]mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de dag snyun ni mi mnga' yang /_/dge 'dun bsdu ba mdzad pa'i phyir/_/sman kyang bsten par mdzad pa ni/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas yon tan kun ldan te/_/sku la 
[\[304b.7\]]'gyur ba mi mnga' yang /_/de dag rga ba ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'jig rten khams ni dpag tu med/_/zhabs kyi mthe bos g.yo mdzad la/_/'on kyang nyam chung ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/
[\[305a\]]
[\[305a.1\]]yid kyi sku dang rab ldan pas/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku yang /_/rnag can sku ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas rnam rtog mi mnga' yang /_/sems can spyod yul ji bzhin du/_/de 
[\[305a.2\]]dag spyod pa rnam par rtog_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de dag rtag tu mnyam bzhag la/_/'greng dang bzhugs dang bzhud pa dang /_/de bzhin mnal bar snang ba yang /_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[305a.3\]]sangs rgyas thub dka' la/_/grang dang tsha dang grib ma dang /_/de bzhin nyi ma sten mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/tshangs pa'i khyim na tshangs pa ltar/_/rgyal ba rtag par na bza' gsol/_/'on kyang na bza' len mdzad pa/_/'di 
[\[305a.4\]]ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/spyi gtsug bltar ni mi mthong phyir/_/spu gris gcad du yong med kyang /_/dbu 'breg par ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rdzu 'phrul rkang pa rab bsgoms te/_/de dag rdzu 'phrul rnam ston 
[\[305a.5\]]la/_/bsam gtan mdzad pa snang ba yang /_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa kun/_/ro bro mchog rnams brnyes gyur kyang /_/ngan ngon dag ni bsten mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/bsod 
[\[305a.6\]]nams mi zad thams cad kyis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'phags/_/'on kyang ma brnyes ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/dga' ba'i zas ni mngon bsgrubs te/_/bskal pa bye ba bzhugs mdzad kyang /_/
[\[305a.7\]]rtag tu zhal zas gsol mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/bsod nams pha rol phyin pas 'phags/_/lha yi na bza' brnyes gyur kyang /_/phyag dar khrod pa gsol mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'og 
[\[305b\]]
[\[305b.1\]]min gzhal med khang pa rnams/_/rnam 'dren rnams kyis yongs spangs te/_/rtswa khyim rnams ni sten mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'dren pa rnams ni zhal dbugs kyis/_/rgya mtsho chen po skams mdzad kyang /_/char pa'i skyabs kyang 
[\[305b.2\]]rab 'dzin pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/bdud rnams bye ba dpag med pa/_/thugs bskyed tsam gyis 'dul mdzad kyang /_/bdud kyi bgegs rnams ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/nga dang nga zhes lta ba gang /_/
[\[305b.3\]]de ni rang byung rnams la med/_/'on kyang nga dang nga'i zhes gsungs/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas chos kun la/_/mi mkhyen pa ni mi mnga' yang /_/gzhan la yongs su 'dri mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/
[\[305b.4\]]sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir/_/rnam par 'dren pa 'byung mdzad kyang /_/rab tu dben par snang ba ste/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de dag sna tshogs sku med kyang /_/sems can mos pa ji bzhin du/_/sku lus sprul pa mdzad pa ni/_/'di ni 
[\[305b.5\]]'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'jig rten kun gyi sgra skad kyis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo la/_/'on kyang sgra chung sten mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spros mi mnga'/_/chos rnams kun la gsal 
[\[305b.6\]]gyur kyang /_/spros dang bcas par gsung mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/ming med pa yi chos kyi rnams/_/bsam du med pa'i ming dag gis/_/sems can rnams la yongs brjod pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug 
[\[305b.7\]]yin/_/chos rnams sems can med pa dang /_/shin tu dngos po med mkhyen la/_/sems can mang po 'dul mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/gang gis las byas 'di nyid kyis/_/myong bar gyur pa ma yin yang /_/
[\[306a\]]
[\[306a.1\]]gang gis byas pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos rnams thams cad stong pa la/_/skyes bu mchog rnams mngon sum yang /_/'chi 'pho skye ba ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 
[\[306a.2\]]'jug yin/_/'jig rten 'di nas srid gzhan du/_/su yang 'khor bar yong min la/_/'khor ba yang ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/phung po dag dang khams rnams dang /_/skye mched rang bzhin 
[\[306a.3\]]gcig bzhed la/_/khams gsum po dag ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/dus gsum dag tu sems can gyi/_/rang bzhin dmigs pa ma yin la/_/sems can khams kyang ston mdzad pa/_/'di 
[\[306a.4\]]ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/kun la mi mkhyen rnam bral te/_/thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs/_/'on kyang sngon mtha' mi gsung ba/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/yang dag ji bzhin gzhan 
[\[306a.5\]]min par/_/chos rnams rtogs par thugs chud la/_/'on kyang gzhag pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/dam pa'i don du chos rnams kun/_/zab par rab tu mkhyen gyur la/_/sna tshogs su ni ston mdzad 
[\[306a.6\]]pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du/_/'phags pa'i bden pa ston mdzad cing /_/[{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]par yang ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/bdud ni bye ba phrag brgya 
[\[306a.7\]]yis/_/dge 'dun dbye bar mi nus kyang /_/dge 'dun dbyen ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos gang yang ni ma bslabs la/_/ma bslabs pa yang gang yang med/_/slob dang mi slob ston mdzad pa/_/
[\[306b\]]
[\[306b.1\]]'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'dus byas rnams ni ngo bo nyid/_/ngo bo nyid kyis grol bcings med/_/'on kyang rnam par grol ba ston/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mya ngan 'das la 'gro med kyang /_/dgra bcom 
[\[306b.2\]]de ni 'gro 'ong zhes/_/sems can rnams la de bstan pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/don dang don min mi gzigs la/_/'gog pa dang ni dam pa'i don/_/smra ba rnams kyi mchog gsung ba/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 
[\[306b.3\]]'jug yin/_/dngos po med pa gsal ba'i dngos/_/rnyog ma med pa rab ston kyang /_/chos rnams chud za med ces pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos rnams thams cad brjod med par/_/de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[306b.4\]]rab mkhyen kyang /_/brjod pa dag ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas mkhyen pa chags mi mnga'/_/dus rnams kun tu mnyam bzhag kyang /_/dbang po rnams ni sbed mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 
[\[306b.5\]]'jug yin/_de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i sku/_/sangs rgyas cung zad mi bsnyun yang /_/dge slong byang chub yan lag smros/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sdig pa thams cad yongs zad de/_/bsod nams kun gyis mngon 
[\[306b.6\]]'phags kyang /_/las kyi rgyud ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/skyob pa sangs rgyas dus gsum la/_/mthar thug 'gyur ba yod min yang /_/mtshams gcod pa yang ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 
[\[306b.7\]]'jug yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos sku ste/_/gcig ci 'dra bar de bzhin kun/_/'on kyang tha dad ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/nyan thos so so'i skye bo dang /_/'khor 
[\[307a\]]
[\[307a.1\]]ba dang ni mya ngan 'das/_/tshig gi lam gyis rab tu phye/_/sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yas te/_/chos kyi dbyings las byung yin yang /_/sangs rgyas zhing ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rdzogs pa'i 
[\[307a.2\]]sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam mi khyab/_/sems can 'dul ba'i don gyi phyir/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/zag med yod pa ma yin yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyan thos la/_/zag pa med pa nyid gsung 
[\[307a.3\]]ba/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mkhyen pas de dag gnyis min yang /_/dus gsum dag ni rnams gzigs shing /_/gnyis kyi 'du shes ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas chos nyid gang yin dang /_/
[\[307a.4\]]sangs rgyas rig par su 'dod pa/_/de ni chos dbyings zhus shig pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/skye ba med pa bzod bsten pa/_/rtag tu yang dag rab tu mkhyen/_/mkhyen nas rab tu ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug 
[\[307a.5\]]yin/_/rtag tu chos kyi dbyings mtshungs te/_/'jug pa med cing 'byung med kyang /_/'gro ba gnas pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mi skye ba la gcig pa 'am/_/mang po yod pa ma yin yang /_/sna tshogs 
[\[307a.6\]]rim pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de dag tha dad sku med kyang /_/sangs rgyas zhing rnams dpag med du/_/sku lus dag ni sprul mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/stong gsum bye ba brgya bgrangs 
[\[307a.7\]]pa/_/sangs rgyas zhing du brjod bya ba/_/der ni skye ba ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/de bzhin gshegs pas dus kun tu/_/chos ni gnas par rab mkhyen kyang /_/chos kyi 'khor lo rab skor ba/_/'di ni 'jig rten 
[\[307b\]]
[\[307b.1\]]'thun 'jug yin/_/sangs rgyas 'od ni dpag med cing /_/sku lus dpag tu med min yang /_/dpag tu yod par ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos kyi dbyings la mchog med de/_/dus gsum dag tu stong nyid kyang /_/
[\[307b.2\]]mchog gis chos rnams ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/zhig pa med cing skye med la/_/chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam gyur kyang /_/sreg pa'i bskal pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos kyi 
[\[307b.3\]]dbyings ni grub med de/_/de la ngo bo nyid med kyang /_/'on kyang nges par 'byung ston pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/gzigs pa ci yang mi mnga' yang /_/lhag mthong gis ni gzigs gyur cing /_/lta ba thams cad ston mdzad 
[\[307b.4\]]pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos rnams kun la byed pa po/_/shin tu yod pa ma yin yang /_/byas dang ma byas ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mya ngan 'das dang nam mkhar ni/_/rgyal ba grangs su ma chud 
[\[307b.5\]]kyang /_/khams kyi grangs rnams ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/grangs med stobs rnams brnyes gyur la/_/mthu las nyams pa mi mnga' yang /_/zhabs 'bring ba dag tshol mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/
[\[307b.6\]]nam yang byis pa'i blo ldan dang /_/sangs rgyas 'dren pa mi mnga' yang /_/byis pa de dag 'dul mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/yon tan ldan pa thams cad kyi/_/pha rol de bzhin gshegs byon kyang /_/de la nga ni gzhan zhes 
[\[307b.7\]]pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mi skye ba ni rtag tu skyes/_/de dag rgyu las byung min yang /_/ma rig rkyen gyis 'byung zhes pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rgyal ba rnyed dang bkur sti las/_/sgrib pa med pa nyid brnyes la/_/
[\[308a\]]
[\[308a.1\]]chog shes pa ni ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/gang na sems can 'dul yod par/_/snang ba der ni 'dren pa rnams/_/de dag spyod pa ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rig pa gsum gyi tshogs bsags pa/_/
[\[308a.2\]]rig pa skyed par nges par ston/_/'di la mthong ba ci yang med/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'jig rten sgron ma thams cad du/_/skye bo dpag tu med pa 'dul/_/gling bzhi dag kyang ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/'jig rten gsum 
[\[308a.3\]]po gang na yang /_/chos gang phung po gnas pa med/_/'on kyang chos grub bka' stsal pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mtha' gsum gyi ni mthar skyes pa/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams ston mdzad cing /_/sems can rnams la rab ston pa/_/
[\[308a.4\]]'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/chos rnams kun gyi rgyud mkhyen nas/_/'chi 'pho skye ba rnam spangs la/_/de dag thams cad ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/mi skye ba ni gang mthong ba/_/ma rig de ni ye shes bgegs/_/rig pa skyed par 
[\[308a.5\]]ston mdzad pa/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig yin yang /_/sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir/_/'byung ba dag ni bsam mi khyab/_/'di ni 'jig rten 'thun 'jug yin/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di 'dra 'di/_/phyi ma'i 
[\[308a.6\]]dus na thos 'gyur zhing /_/the tsom med la shes 'gyur ba/_/de dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong /_/'jig rten mgon gyis de gsungs nas/_/sras po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la sogs/_/rab tu dga' zhing yi rangs te/_/ston pa'i bka' la mngon par bstod/_/'phags pa 
[\[308a.7\]]'jig rten gyi rjes su 'thun par 'jug pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /_dA na shI la dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/_skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//_//
